text.10: [03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^T3.0002^ea^ ^a^M2.0002^ea^ ^a^P3.0002^ea^, bhikkhave,  sekhabalaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhaabala.m, hiriibala.m, ottappabala.m,  viiriyabala.m, pa~n~naabala.m. katama~nca, bhikkhave, saddhaabala.m? idha,  bhikkhave, ariyasaavako saddho hoti, saddahati tathaagatassa bodhi.m --  `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato  lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho  bhagavaa'ti. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, saddhaabala.m.
text.100: [03] ``katamehi pa~ncahi? idha ^a^P3.0021^ea^, bhikkhave,  sammaadi.t.thi siilaanuggahitaa ca hoti, sutaanuggahitaa ca hoti,  saakacchaanuggahitaa ca hoti, samathaanuggahitaa ca hoti,  vipassanaanuggahitaa ca hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi  a"ngehi anuggahitaa sammaadi.t.thi cetovimuttiphalaa ca hoti  cetovimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca, pa~n~naavimuttiphalaa ca hoti  pa~n~naavimuttiphalaanisa.msaa caa''ti. pa~ncama.m.
text.1001: [03] 145^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye. katamehi pa~ncahi? paa.naatipaatii  hoti, adinnaadaayii hoti, kaamesumicchaacaarii ^a^M2.0151^ea^ hoti, musaavaadii  hoti, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaayii hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave,  pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye.
text.1002: [01] ``pa~ncahi ^a^P3.0171^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi  samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge. katamehi pa~ncahi?  paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti,  kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti, musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti,  suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato hoti. imehi ^a^V2.0161^ea^ kho, bhikkhave,  pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge''ti.  pa~ncama.m.
text.1004: [03] 146^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu mitto na sevitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? kammanta.m kaareti,  adhikara.na.m aadiyati, paamokkhesu bhikkhuusu pa.tiviruddho hoti,  diighacaarika.m anavatthacaarika.m {avatthaanacaarika.m (syaa0)} anuyutto viharati, nappa.tibalo hoti  kaalena kaala.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetu.m ^a^T3.0192^ea^ samaadapetu.m samuttejetu.m  sampaha.msetu.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu mitto na sevitabbo.
text.1005: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu mitto  sevitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? na kammanta.m kaareti, na adhikara.na.m  aadiyati, na paamokkhesu bhikkhuusu pa.tiviruddho hoti, na  diighacaarika.m anavatthacaarika.m anuyutto viharati, pa.tibalo hoti  kaalena kaala.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetu.m samaadapetu.m samuttejetu.m  sampaha.msetu.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu mitto sevitabbo''ti. cha.t.tha.m.
text.1007: [03] 147^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, asappurisadaanaani.  katamaani pa~nca? asakkacca.m deti, acittiikatvaa {acittikatvaa (pii0), aciti.m  katvaa (syaa0), acitti.m katvaa (ka0)} deti, asahatthaa  deti, apaviddha.m {apavi.t.ta.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} deti, anaagamanadi.t.thiko deti. imaani kho,  bhikkhave, pa~nca asappurisadaanaani.
text.1008: [03] ``pa~ncimaani ^a^M2.0152^ea^ ^a^P3.0172^ea^, bhikkhave, sappurisadaanaani.  katamaani pa~nca? sakkacca.m deti, cittiikatvaa deti, sahatthaa deti,  anapaviddha.m deti, aagamanadi.t.thiko deti. imaani kho, bhikkhave,  pa~nca sappurisadaanaanii''ti. sattama.m.
text.1010: [03] 148^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^V2.0162^ea^, bhikkhave, sappurisadaanaani.  katamaani pa~nca? saddhaaya daana.m deti, sakkacca.m daana.m deti, kaalena  daana.m deti, anuggahitacitto {anaggahitacitto (sii0)} daana.m deti, attaana~nca para~nca anupahacca  daana.m deti.
text.1011: [03] ``saddhaaya kho pana, bhikkhave, daana.m datvaa yattha yattha tassa  daanassa ^a^T3.0193^ea^ vipaako nibbattati, a.d.dho ca hoti mahaddhano mahaabhogo,  abhiruupo ca hoti dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya  samannaagato.
text.1012: [03] ``sakkacca.m kho pana, bhikkhave, daana.m datvaa yattha yattha tassa  daanassa vipaako nibbattati, a.d.dho ca hoti mahaddhano mahaabhogo.  yepissa te honti puttaati vaa daaraati vaa daasaati vaa pessaati vaa  kammakaraati {kammakaaraati (ka0)} vaa, tepi sussuusanti sota.m odahanti a~n~naa citta.m  upa.t.thapenti.
text.1013: [03] ``kaalena kho pana, bhikkhave, daana.m datvaa yattha yattha tassa  daanassa vipaako nibbattati, a.d.dho ca hoti mahaddhano mahaabhogo;  kaalaagataa cassa atthaa pacuraa honti.
text.1014: [03] ``anuggahitacitto kho pana, bhikkhave, daana.m datvaa yattha  yattha tassa daanassa vipaako nibbattati, a.d.dho ca hoti mahaddhano  mahaabhogo; u.laaresu ca pa~ncasu kaamagu.nesu bhogaaya citta.m namati.
text.1015: [03] ``attaana~nca ^a^P3.0173^ea^ para~nca anupahacca kho pana,  bhikkhave, daana.m datvaa yattha yattha tassa daanassa vipaako nibbattati,  a.d.dho ca hoti mahaddhano mahaabhogo; na cassa kutoci bhogaana.m  upaghaato aagacchati aggito vaa udakato vaa raajato vaa corato vaa  appiyato vaa daayaadato vaa {appiyato vaa daayaadato vaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  pii0), appiyadaayaadato vaa (ka0)}. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca  sappurisadaanaanii''ti. a.t.thama.m.
text.1017: [03] 149^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^V2.0163^ea^ ^a^M2.0153^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammaa samayavimuttassa  bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? kammaaraamataa,  bhassaaraamataa, niddaaraamataa ^a^T3.0194^ea^, sa"nga.nikaaraamataa, yathaavimutta.m citta.m na  paccavekkhati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa samayavimuttassa  bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti.
text.1018: [01] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno  aparihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? na kammaaraamataa, na  bhassaaraamataa, na niddaaraamataa, na sa"nga.nikaaraamataa, yathaavimutta.m citta.m  paccavekkhati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa samayavimuttassa  bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. navama.m.
text.102: [03] 26^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^V2.0019^ea^, bhikkhave, vimuttaayatanaani  yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato avimutta.m  vaa citta.m vimuccati, aparikkhii.naa ^a^M2.0018^ea^ vaa aasavaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti,  ananuppatta.m vaa anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naati.
text.1020: [03] 150^b^.^eb^ {kathaa0 267} ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa samayavimuttassa  bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? kammaaraamataa,  bhassaaraamataa, niddaaraamataa, indriyesu aguttadvaarataa, bhojane amatta~n~nutaa.  ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno  parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti.
text.1021: [01] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno  aparihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? na kammaaraamataa, na  bhassaaraamataa, na niddaaraamataa, indriyesu guttadvaarataa, bhojane matta~n~nutaa.  ime ^a^P3.0174^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa  samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. dasama.m.
text.1024: [21] datvaa avajaanaati aarabhati ca, saarandada tika.n.da  nirayena ca.
text.103: [03] ``katamaani pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno satthaa dhamma.m  deseti a~n~nataro vaa garu.t.thaaniyo sabrahmacaarii. yathaa yathaa, bhikkhave,  tassa bhikkhuno satthaa dhamma.m deseti, a~n~nataro ^a^T3.0023^ea^ vaa garu.t.thaaniyo  sabrahmacaarii, tathaa tathaa so tasmi.m dhamme atthapa.tisa.mvedii ca hoti  dhammapa.tisa.mvedii ca. tassa atthapa.tisa.mvedino dhammapa.tisa.mvedino  paamojja.m {paamujja.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0) dii0 ni0 3.322} jaayati. pamuditassa   piiti jaayati. piitimanassa kaayo  passambhati. passaddhakaayo sukha.m vedeti {vediyati (sii0)}. sukhino citta.m  samaadhiyati. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa.thama.m vimuttaayatana.m yattha bhikkhuno  appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato avimutta.m vaa citta.m  vimuccati, aparikkhii.naa vaa aasavaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta.m  vaa anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naati.
text.1030: [03] 151^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^T3.0195^ea^ ^a^V2.0164^ea^ ^a^M2.0154^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  su.nantopi saddhamma.m abhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu  sammatta.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? katha.m paribhoti, kathika.m {kathita.m (ka0)} paribhoti,  attaana.m paribhoti, vikkhittacitto dhamma.m su.naati, anekaggacitto  ayoniso ca {ayoniso (syaa0 ka.m0)} manasi karoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi  dhammehi samannaagato su.nantopi saddhamma.m abhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m  kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m.
text.1031: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato su.nanto saddhamma.m  ^a^P3.0175^ea^ bhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu  sammatta.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? na katha.m paribhoti, na kathika.m  paribhoti, na attaana.m paribhoti, avikkhittacitto dhamma.m su.naati,  ekaggacitto yoniso ca manasi karoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave,  pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato su.nanto saddhamma.m bhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m  kusalesu dhammesu sammatta''nti. pa.thama.m.
text.1033: [03] 152^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  su.nantopi saddhamma.m abhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu  sammatta.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? katha.m paribhoti, kathika.m paribhoti,  attaana.m paribhoti, duppa~n~no hoti ja.lo e.lamuugo, ana~n~naate  a~n~naatamaanii hoti. imehi kho ^a^T3.0196^ea^, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi  samannaagato su.nantopi saddhamma.m abhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu  dhammesu sammatta.m.
text.1034: [03] ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0165^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato su.nanto saddhamma.m  bhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m. katamehi pa~ncahi?  na katha.m paribhoti, na kathika.m paribhoti, na attaana.m paribhoti,  pa~n~navaa hoti ^a^M2.0155^ea^ aja.lo ane.lamuugo, na ana~n~naate a~n~naatamaanii hoti.  imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato su.nanto saddhamma.m  bhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta''nti. dutiya.m.
text.1036: [03] 153^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  su.nantopi saddhamma.m abhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu  sammatta.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? makkhii dhamma.m su.naati  makkhapariyu.t.thito, upaarambhacitto {saupaarambhacitto (syaa0 ka.m0)} dhamma.m su.naati randhagavesii,  dhammadesake ^a^P3.0176^ea^ aahatacitto hoti khiilajaato {khilajaato (syaa0  pii0)},  duppa~n~no hoti ja.lo e.lamuugo, ana~n~naate a~n~naatamaanii hoti.  imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato su.nantopi saddhamma.m  abhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m.
text.1037: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato su.nanto saddhamma.m  bhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m. katamehi pa~ncahi?  amakkhii dhamma.m su.naati na makkhapariyu.t.thito, anupaarambhacitto  dhamma.m su.naati na randhagavesii, dhammadesake anaahatacitto hoti  akhiilajaato, pa~n~navaa hoti aja.lo ane.lamuugo, na ^a^T3.0197^ea^ ana~n~naate  a~n~naatamaanii hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi  samannaagato su.nanto saddhamma.m bhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu  dhammesu sammatta''nti. tatiya.m.
text.1039: [03] 154^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa saddhammassa  sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave,  bhikkhuu na sakkacca.m dhamma.m su.nanti, na sakkacca.m dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti, na  sakkacca.m dhamma.m dhaarenti, na sakkacca.m dhaataana.m {dhataana.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} dhammaana.m attha.m  upaparikkhanti, na ^a^V2.0166^ea^ sakkacca.m atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya dhammaanudhamma.m  pa.tipajjanti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa saddhammassa  sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattanti.
text.104: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na heva kho satthaa dhamma.m  deseti, a~n~nataro vaa garu.t.thaaniyo sabrahmacaarii, api ca kho yathaasuta.m  yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena paresa.m deseti. yathaa yathaa, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu yathaasuta.m ^a^P3.0022^ea^ yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena  paresa.m deseti tathaa tathaa so tasmi.m dhamme atthapa.tisa.mvedii ca hoti  dhammapa.tisa.mvedii ca. tassa atthapa.tisa.mvedino dhammapa.tisa.mvedino  paamojja.m jaayati. pamuditassa piiti jaayati. piitimanassa kaayo  passambhati. passaddhakaayo sukha.m vedeti. sukhino citta.m  samaadhiyati. ida.m, bhikkhave, dutiya.m vimuttaayatana.m yattha bhikkhuno  appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato avimutta.m vaa citta.m  vimuccati, aparikkhii.naa vaa aasavaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta.m  vaa anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naati.
text.1040: [03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya  anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu  sakkacca.m dhamma.m su.nanti, sakkacca.m ^a^M2.0156^ea^ dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti, sakkacca.m dhamma.m  dhaarenti, sakkacca.m dhaataana.m dhammaana.m attha.m upaparikkhanti, sakkacca.m  atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya dhammaanudhamma.m pa.tipajjanti. ime ^a^P3.0177^ea^  kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa saddhammassa .thitiyaa  asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. catuttha.m.
text.1042: [03] 155^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa saddhammassa  sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave,  bhikkhuu dhamma.m na pariyaapu.nanti -- sutta.m, geyya.m, veyyaakara.na.m, gaatha.m,  udaana.m, itivuttaka.m, jaataka.m, abbhutadhamma.m, vedalla.m. aya.m, bhikkhave,  pa.thamo dhammo saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati.

text.1051: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m  cetasaa anuvitakkenti anuvicaarenti manasaanupekkhanti. aya.m,  bhikkhave, pa~ncamo dhammo saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya  anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa  saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti.  pa~ncama.m.
text.1053: [03] 156^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0  4.160} ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa saddhammassa  sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave,  bhikkhuu duggahita.m suttanta.m pariyaapu.nanti dunnikkhittehi padabya~njanehi  ^a^V2.0168^ea^. dunnikkhittassa, bhikkhave, padabya~njanassa atthopi dunnayo hoti.  aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo dhammo saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya  sa.mvattati.
text.1054: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu dubbacaa honti,  dovacassakara.nehi dhammehi samannaagataa, akkhamaa appadakkhi.naggaahino  anusaasani.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo saddhammassa sammosaaya  antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati.
text.1055: [03] ``puna ^a^P3.0179^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhuu  bahussutaa aagataagamaa dhammadharaa vinayadharaa maatikaadharaa, te na sakkacca.m  suttanta.m para.m vaacenti; tesa.m accayena chinnamuulako suttanto hoti  appa.tisara.no. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo saddhammassa  sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati.
text.1056: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, theraa bhikkhuu baahulikaa honti  saathalikaa okkamane pubba"ngamaa paviveke nikkhittadhuraa ^a^T3.0200^ea^, na viiriya.m  aarabhanti appattassa pattiyaa ^a^M2.0158^ea^ anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa  sacchikiriyaaya. tesa.m pacchimaa janataa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjati.  saapi hoti baahulikaa saathalikaa okkamane pubba"ngamaa paviveke  nikkhittadhuraa, na viiriya.m aarabhati appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa  adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. aya.m, bhikkhave,  catuttho dhammo saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati.
text.1057: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sa"ngho bhinno hoti. sa"nghe kho  pana, bhikkhave, bhinne a~n~nama~n~na.m akkosaa ca honti, a~n~nama~n~na.m  paribhaasaa ca honti, a~n~nama~n~na.m parikkhepaa ca honti, a~n~nama~n~na.m  pariccajanaa {pariccajaa (syaa0 ka.m0)} ca honti. tattha appasannaa ceva nappasiidanti,  pasannaana~nca ekaccaana.m a~n~nathatta.m hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo  dhammo saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati. ime kho,  bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattanti.
text.1058: [03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya  anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu  suggahita.m suttanta.m pariyaapu.nanti sunikkhittehi ^a^V2.0169^ea^ padabya~njanehi.  sunikkhittassa, bhikkhave, padabya~njanassa atthopi sunayo hoti.  aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo dhammo saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya  anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati.
text.1059: [03] ``puna ^a^P3.0180^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu suvacaa  honti sovacassakara.nehi dhammehi samannaagataa, khamaa  padakkhi.naggaahino anusaasani.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo  saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya ^a^T3.0201^ea^ sa.mvattati.
text.106: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na heva kho satthaa dhamma.m  deseti, a~n~nataro vaa garu.t.thaaniyo sabrahmacaarii, naapi yathaasuta.m  yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena paresa.m deseti, naapi yathaasuta.m  yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena sajjhaaya.m karoti; api ca kho yathaasuta.m  yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m cetasaa anuvitakketi anuvicaareti manasaanupekkhati.  yathaa yathaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m ^a^P3.0023^ea^  dhamma.m cetasaa anuvitakketi anuvicaareti manasaanupekkhati  tathaa tathaa so tasmi.m dhamme atthapa.tisa.mvedii ca hoti dhammapa.tisa.mvedii  ca. tassa atthapa.tisa.mvedino dhammapa.tisa.mvedino paamojja.m jaayati.  pamuditassa piiti jaayati. piitimanassa kaayo passambhati.  passaddhakaayo sukha.m vedeti. sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. ida.m,  bhikkhave, catuttha.m vimuttaayatana.m yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa  aataapino pahitattassa viharato avimutta.m vaa citta.m vimuccati,  aparikkhii.naa vaa aasavaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta.m vaa anuttara.m  yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naati.
text.1060: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhuu bahussutaa aagataagamaa  dhammadharaa vinayadharaa maatikaadharaa, te sakkacca.m suttanta.m para.m vaacenti;  tesa.m accayena na chinnamuulako {acchinnamuulako (ka0) a0 ni0  4.160} suttanto hoti sappa.tisara.no. aya.m,  bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya  anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati.
text.1061: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, theraa bhikkhuu na baahulikaa honti na  saathalikaa, okkamane nikkhittadhuraa paviveke pubba"ngamaa; viiriya.m  aarabhanti appattassa pattiyaa ^a^M2.0159^ea^ anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa  sacchikiriyaaya. tesa.m pacchimaa janataa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjati.  saapi hoti na baahulikaa na saathalikaa, okkamane nikkhittadhuraa  paviveke pubba"ngamaa, viiriya.m aarabhati appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa  adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. aya.m, bhikkhave,  catuttho dhammo saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya  sa.mvattati.
text.1062: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sa"ngho samaggo sammodamaano  avivadamaano ekuddeso phaasu.m viharati. sa"nghe kho pana, bhikkhave,  samagge na ceva a~n~nama~n~na.m akkosaa honti, na ca a~n~nama~n~na.m  paribhaasaa honti, na ca a~n~nama~n~na.m parikkhepaa honti, na ca  a~n~nama~n~na.m pariccajanaa honti. tattha appasannaa ceva pasiidanti,  pasannaana~nca bhiyyobhaavo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo dhammo  saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati. ime  kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya  anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.
text.1064: [03] 157^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncanna.m ^a^T3.0202^ea^ ^a^V2.0170^ea^ ^a^P3.0181^ea^, bhikkhave,  puggalaana.m kathaa dukkathaa puggale puggala.m {puggala.m puggala.m (sii0 pii0)} upanidhaaya. katamesa.m pa~ncanna.m?  assaddhassa, bhikkhave, saddhaakathaa dukkathaa; dussiilassa siilakathaa  dukkathaa; appassutassa baahusaccakathaa dukkathaa; maccharissa {macchariyassa (sii0  pii0 ka0)} caagakathaa  dukkathaa; duppa~n~nassa pa~n~naakathaa dukkathaa.
text.1065: [03] ``kasmaa ca, bhikkhave, assaddhassa saddhaakathaa dukkathaa?  assaddho, bhikkhave, saddhaakathaaya kacchamaanaaya abhisajjati kuppati  byaapajjati patitthiiyati kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti.  ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi so, bhikkhave, saddhaasampada.m attani na  samanupassati {na sampassati (sii0)}, na ca labhati tatonidaana.m piitipaamojja.m. tasmaa  assaddhassa saddhaakathaa dukkathaa.
text.1066: [03] ``kasmaa ca, bhikkhave, dussiilassa siilakathaa dukkathaa?  dussiilo, bhikkhave, siilakathaaya kacchamaanaaya abhisajjati kuppati  byaapajjati patitthiiyati kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti.  ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi so ^a^M2.0160^ea^, bhikkhave, siilasampada.m attani na  samanupassati na ca labhati tatonidaana.m piitipaamojja.m. tasmaa  dussiilassa siilakathaa dukkathaa.
text.1067: [03] ``kasmaa ca, bhikkhave, appassutassa baahusaccakathaa dukkathaa?  appassuto, bhikkhave, baahusaccakathaaya kacchamaanaaya abhisajjati  kuppati byaapajjati patitthiiyati kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca  paatukaroti. ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi so, bhikkhave, sutasampada.m  attani na samanupassati, na ca labhati tatonidaana.m piitipaamojja.m.  tasmaa appassutassa baahusaccakathaa ^a^T3.0203^ea^ dukkathaa.
text.1068: [03] ``kasmaa ca, bhikkhave, maccharissa caagakathaa dukkathaa?  maccharii, bhikkhave, caagakathaaya kacchamaanaaya abhisajjati kuppati  byaapajjati patitthiiyati kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti  ^a^V2.0171^ea^. ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi so, bhikkhave, caagasampada.m attani na  samanupassati na ca labhati ^a^P3.0182^ea^ tatonidaana.m  piitipaamojja.m. tasmaa maccharissa caagakathaa dukkathaa.
text.1069: [03] ``kasmaa ca, bhikkhave, duppa~n~nassa pa~n~naakathaa dukkathaa?  duppa~n~no, bhikkhave, pa~n~naakathaaya kacchamaanaaya abhisajjati kuppati  byaapajjati patitthiiyati kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti.  ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi so, bhikkhave, pa~n~naasampada.m attani na  samanupassati, na ca labhati tatonidaana.m piitipaamojja.m. tasmaa  duppa~n~nassa pa~n~naakathaa dukkathaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m  puggalaana.m kathaa dukkathaa puggale puggala.m upanidhaaya.
text.107: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na heva kho satthaa dhamma.m  deseti a~n~nataro vaa garu.t.thaaniyo sabrahmacaarii, naapi yathaasuta.m  yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena paresa.m deseti ^a^T3.0025^ea^, naapi yathaasuta.m  yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena sajjhaaya.m karoti, naapi yathaasuta.m  yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m cetasaa anuvitakketi anuvicaareti  manasaanupekkhati; api ca khvassa a~n~natara.m samaadhinimitta.m suggahita.m  hoti sumanasikata.m suupadhaarita.m suppa.tividdha.m pa~n~naaya. yathaa yathaa,  bhikkhave, bhikkhuno a~n~natara.m samaadhinimitta.m suggahita.m hoti  sumanasikata.m suupadhaarita.m suppa.tividdha.m pa~n~naaya tathaa tathaa so tasmi.m  dhamme atthapa.tisa.mvedii ca hoti dhammapa.tisa.mvedii ca. tassa  atthapa.tisa.mvedino dhammapa.tisa.mvedino paamojja.m jaayati. pamuditassa  piiti jaayati. piitimanassa kaayo passambhati. passaddhakaayo sukha.m  vedeti. sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncama.m  vimuttaayatana.m yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa  ^a^P3.0024^ea^ viharato ^a^V2.0021^ea^ avimutta.m vaa citta.m  ^a^M2.0020^ea^ vimuccati, aparikkhii.naa vaa aasavaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta.m   vaa anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naati.
text.1070: [03] ``pa~ncanna.m, bhikkhave, puggalaana.m kathaa sukathaa puggale puggala.m  upanidhaaya. katamesa.m pa~ncanna.m? saddhassa, bhikkhave, saddhaakathaa  sukathaa; siilavato siilakathaa sukathaa; bahussutassa baahusaccakathaa  sukathaa; caagavato caagakathaa sukathaa; pa~n~navato pa~n~naakathaa sukathaa.
text.1071: [03] ``kasmaa ca, bhikkhave, saddhassa saddhaakathaa sukathaa? saddho,  bhikkhave, saddhaakathaaya kacchamaanaaya naabhisajjati na kuppati na  byaapajjati na patitthiiyati na kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca  paatukaroti. ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi so, bhikkhave, saddhaasampada.m  attani samanupassati labhati ca tatonidaana.m piitipaamojja.m ^a^T3.0204^ea^. tasmaa  saddhassa saddhaakathaa sukathaa.
text.1072: [03] ``kasmaa ca, bhikkhave, siilavato siilakathaa sukathaa?  siilavaa, bhikkhave, siilakathaaya kacchamaanaaya naabhisajjati na kuppati  na byaapajjati na ^a^M2.0161^ea^ patitthiiyati na kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca  paatukaroti. ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi so, bhikkhave, siilasampada.m  attani samanupassati, labhati ca tatonidaana.m piitipaamojja.m. tasmaa  siilavato siilakathaa sukathaa.
text.1073: [03] ``kasmaa ca, bhikkhave, bahussutassa baahusaccakathaa sukathaa?  bahussuto, bhikkhave, baahusaccakathaaya kacchamaanaaya naabhisajjati na  kuppati na byaapajjati na patitthiiyati ^a^P3.0183^ea^ na kopa~nca  dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi so,  bhikkhave, sutasampada.m attani samanupassati, labhati ca tatonidaana.m  piitipaamojja.m. tasmaa bahussutassa baahusaccakathaa sukathaa.
text.1074: [03] ``kasmaa ^a^V2.0172^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, caagavato caagakathaa sukathaa? caagavaa,  bhikkhave, caagakathaaya kacchamaanaaya naabhisajjati na kuppati na  byaapajjati na patitthiiyati na kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca  paatukaroti. ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi so, bhikkhave, caagasampada.m  attani samanupassati, labhati ca tatonidaana.m piitipaamojja.m. tasmaa  caagavato caagakathaa sukathaa.
text.1075: [01] ``kasmaa ca, bhikkhave, pa~n~navato pa~n~naakathaa sukathaa?  pa~n~navaa, bhikkhave, pa~n~naakathaaya kacchamaanaaya naabhisajjati na kuppati  na byaapajjati na patitthiiyati na kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca  paatukaroti. ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi so, bhikkhave, pa~n~naasampada.m  attani samanupassati labhati ca tatonidaana.m ^a^T3.0205^ea^ piitipaamojja.m. tasmaa  pa~n~navato pa~n~naakathaa sukathaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m  puggalaana.m kathaa sukathaa puggale puggala.m upanidhaayaa''ti. sattama.m.
text.1077: [03] 158^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu saarajja.m okkanto {okkamanto (ka0)} hoti. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu assaddho hoti, dussiilo hoti, appassuto hoti, kusiito  hoti, dupa~n~no hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi, dhammehi  samannaagato bhikkhu saarajja.m okkanto hoti.
text.1078: [01] ``pa~ncahi ^a^M2.0162^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu  visaarado hoti. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho  hoti, siilavaa hoti, bahussuto hoti, aaraddhaviiriyo hoti, pa~n~navaa  hoti. imehi ^a^P3.0184^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi  samannaagato bhikkhu visaarado hotii''ti. a.t.thama.m.
text.108: [03] ``imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca vimuttaayatanaani yattha  bhikkhuno appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato avimutta.m vaa  citta.m vimuccati, aparikkhii.naa vaa aasavaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti,  ananuppatta.m vaa anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naatii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.
text.1080: [03] 159^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosambiya.m  viharati ghositaaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa udaayii  mahatiyaa gihiparisaaya parivuto dhamma.m desento nisinno hoti.  addasaa kho aayasmaa aanando aayasmanta.m udaayi.m mahatiyaa  gihiparisaaya parivuta.m dhamma.m desenta.m nisinna.m. disvaa yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m  ^a^V2.0173^ea^ nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m   etadavoca -- ``aayasmaa, bhante, udaayii mahatiyaa gihiparisaaya parivuto   dhamma.m desetii''ti {desento nisinno''ti (syaa0)}.
text.1081: [03] ``na kho, aananda ^a^T3.0206^ea^, sukara.m paresa.m dhamma.m desetu.m. paresa.m,  aananda, dhamma.m desentena pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetvaa paresa.m dhammo  desetabbo. katame pa~nca? `anupubbi.m katha.m {aanupubbikatha.m (sii0), anupubbikatha.m  (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} kathessaamii'ti paresa.m  dhammo desetabbo; `pariyaayadassaavii katha.m kathessaamii'ti paresa.m dhammo  desetabbo; `anuddayata.m pa.ticca katha.m kathessaamii'ti paresa.m dhammo  desetabbo; `na aamisantaro katha.m kathessaamii'ti paresa.m dhammo  desetabbo; `attaana~nca para~nca anupahacca katha.m kathessaamii'ti paresa.m  dhammo desetabbo. na kho, aananda, sukara.m paresa.m dhamma.m desetu.m.  paresa.m, aananda, dhamma.m desentena ime pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetvaa  paresa.m dhammo desetabbo''ti. navama.m.
text.1083: [03] 160^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, uppannaa duppa.tivinodayaa.  katame pa~nca? uppanno ^a^P3.0185^ea^ raago duppa.tivinodayo,  uppanno doso duppa.tivinodayo, uppanno moho ^a^M2.0163^ea^ duppa.tivinodayo,  uppanna.m pa.tibhaana.m duppa.tivinodaya.m, uppanna.m gamikacitta.m duppa.tivinodaya.m.  ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca uppannaa duppa.tivinodayaa''ti. dasama.m.
text.1090: [03] 161^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^T3.0207^ea^ ^a^V2.0174^ea^, bhikkhave, aaghaatapa.tivinayaa yattha  bhikkhuno uppanno aaghaato sabbaso pa.tivinetabbo. katame pa~nca?  yasmi.m, bhikkhave, puggale aaghaato jaayetha, mettaa tasmi.m puggale  bhaavetabbaa; eva.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo. yasmi.m,  bhikkhave, puggale aaghaato jaayetha, karu.naa tasmi.m puggale bhaavetabbaa;  eva.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo. yasmi.m, bhikkhave,  puggale aaghaato jaayetha, upekkhaa tasmi.m puggale bhaavetabbaa; eva.m  tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo. yasmi.m, bhikkhave, puggale  aaghaato jaayetha, asatiamanasikaaro tasmi.m puggale aapajjitabbo;  eva.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo. yasmi.m ^a^P3.0186^ea^,  bhikkhave, puggale aaghaato jaayetha, kammassakataa tasmi.m  puggale adhi.t.thaatabbaa -- `kammassako ayamaayasmaa kammadaayaado  kammayoni kammabandhu kammappa.tisara.no, ya.m kamma.m karissati kalyaa.na.m  vaa paapaka.m vaa tassa daayaado bhavissatii'ti; eva.m tasmi.m puggale  aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca  aaghaatapa.tivinayaa, yattha bhikkhuno uppanno aaghaato sabbaso  pa.tivinetabbo''ti. pa.thama.m.
text.1092: [03] 162^b^.^eb^ tatra ^a^M2.0164^ea^ kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu  aamantesi -- ``aavuso bhikkhave''ti. ``aavuso''ti kho te  bhikkhuu aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa saariputto  etadavoca --
text.1093: [03] ``pa~ncime, aavuso, aaghaatapa.tivinayaa ^a^T3.0208^ea^ yattha bhikkhuno  uppanno aaghaato sabbaso pa.tivinetabbo. katame pa~nca? idhaavuso,  ekacco puggalo aparisuddhakaayasamaacaaro hoti parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro;  evaruupepi, aavuso, puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo. idha panaavuso,  ekacco ^a^V2.0175^ea^ puggalo aparisuddhavaciisamaacaaro hoti parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro;  evaruupepi, aavuso, puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo. idha panaavuso,  ekacco puggalo aparisuddhakaayasamaacaaro hoti  aparisuddhavaciisamaacaaro, labhati ca kaalena kaala.m cetaso vivara.m  cetaso pasaada.m; evaruupepi, aavuso, puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo.  idha panaavuso, ekacco puggalo aparisuddhakaayasamaacaaro hoti  aparisuddhavaciisamaacaaro, na ca labhati kaalena ^a^P3.0187^ea^  kaala.m cetaso vivara.m cetaso pasaada.m; evaruupepi, aavuso, puggale  aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo. idha panaavuso, ekacco puggalo  parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro, labhati ca kaalena vaa  kaala.m cetaso vivara.m cetaso pasaada.m; evaruupepi, aavuso, puggale  aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo.
text.1094: [03] ``tatraavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo aparisuddhakaayasamaacaaro  parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro, katha.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo?  seyyathaapi, aavuso, bhikkhu pa.msukuuliko rathiyaaya nantaka.m disvaa  vaamena paadena nigga.nhitvaa dakkhi.nena paadena pattharitvaa {vitthaaretvaa (sii0  pii0)}, yo tattha  saaro ta.m paripaatetvaa aadaaya pakkameyya; evameva.m khvaavuso, yvaaya.m  puggalo aparisuddhakaayasamaacaaro parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro, yaassa  aparisuddhakaayasamaacaarataa na ^a^T3.0209^ea^ saassa tasmi.m samaye manasi kaatabbaa,  yaa ^a^M2.0165^ea^ ca khvaassa parisuddhavaciisamaacaarataa saassa tasmi.m samaye manasi  kaatabbaa. eva.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo.
text.1095: [03] ``tatraavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo aparisuddhavaciisamaacaaro  parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro, katha.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo?  seyyathaapi, aavuso, pokkhara.nii sevaalapa.nakapariyonaddhaa. atha  puriso aagaccheyya ghammaabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito  pipaasito. so ta.m pokkhara.ni.m ogaahetvaa ubhohi hatthehi iticiti  ca sevaalapa.naka.m apaviyuuhitvaa a~njalinaa pivitvaa pakkameyya. evameva.m  kho, aavuso ^a^P3.0188^ea^, yvaaya.m puggalo  aparisuddhavaciisamaacaaro parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro, yaassa  aparisuddhavaciisamaacaarataa na saassa tasmi.m samaye manasi kaatabbaa,  yaa ca khvaassa parisuddhakaayasamaacaarataa saassa tasmi.m samaye manasi  kaatabbaa. eva.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo.
text.1096: [03] ``tatraavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo aparisuddhakaayasamaacaaro  aparisuddhavaciisamaacaaro labhati ca ^a^V2.0176^ea^ kaalena kaala.m cetaso vivara.m  cetaso pasaada.m, katha.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo?  seyyathaapi, aavuso, paritta.m gopade {gopadake (sii0 syaa0)} udaka.m. atha puriso aagaccheyya  ghammaabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipaasito. tassa  evamassa -- `ida.m kho paritta.m gopade udaka.m. sacaaha.m a~njalinaa vaa  pivissaami bhaajanena vaa khobhessaamipi ta.m ^a^T3.0210^ea^ lo.lessaamipi ta.m  apeyyampi ta.m karissaami. ya.mnuunaaha.m catukku.n.diko {catugu.n.diko (sii0),  catuku.n.diko (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), catuko.n.diko (dii0 ni0 3.7)} nipatitvaa  gopiitaka.m pivitvaa pakkameyya'nti. so catukku.n.diko nipatitvaa  gopiitaka.m pivitvaa pakkameyya. evameva.m kho, aavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo  aparisuddhakaayasamaacaaro aparisuddhavaciisamaacaaro labhati ca kaalena  kaala.m cetaso vivara.m cetaso pasaada.m, yaassa aparisuddhakaayasamaacaarataa  na saassa tasmi.m samaye manasi kaatabbaa; yaapissa  aparisuddhavaciisamaacaarataa na saapissa tasmi.m samaye manasi kaatabbaa.  ya~nca kho so labhati kaalena kaala.m cetaso vivara.m ^a^P3.0189^ea^  cetaso pasaada.m, tamevassa {tadevassa (sii0 syaa0)} tasmi.m samaye manasi kaatabba.m.  eva.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo.
text.1097: [03] ``tatraavuso ^a^M2.0166^ea^, yvaaya.m puggalo aparisuddhakaayasamaacaaro  aparisuddhavaciisamaacaaro na ca labhati kaalena kaala.m cetaso vivara.m  cetaso pasaada.m, katha.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo?  seyyathaapi, aavuso, puriso aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano  addhaanamaggappa.tipanno. tassa puratopissa duure gaamo pacchatopissa  duure gaamo. so na labheyya sappaayaani bhojanaani, na labheyya  sappaayaani bhesajjaani, na labheyya patiruupa.m upa.t.thaaka.m, na labheyya  gaamantanaayaka.m. tamena.m a~n~nataro puriso passeyya  addhaanamaggappa.tipanno. so tasmi.m purise kaaru~n~na.myeva upa.t.thaapeyya,  anuddaya.myeva upa.t.thaapeyya, anukampa.myeva upa.t.thaapeyya -- `aho vataaya.m  puriso labheyya sappaayaani bhojanaani, labheyya sappaayaani bhesajjaani,  labheyya patiruupa.m upa.t.thaaka.m, labheyya gaamantanaayaka.m! ta.m kissa hetu?  maaya.m ^a^T3.0211^ea^ {aya.m (ka0)} puriso idheva anayabyasana.m aapajjii'ti {aapajjeyya (ka0)}! evameva.m kho,  aavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo aparisuddhakaayasamaacaaro  aparisuddhavaciisamaacaaro na ca labhati kaalena kaala.m cetaso vivara.m  cetaso pasaada.m, evaruupepi {evaruupe (pii0)}, aavuso, puggale kaaru~n~na.myeva upa.t.thaapetabba.m  anuddayaayeva upa.t.thaapetabbaa anukampaayeva upa.t.thaapetabbaa -- `aho vata  ayamaayasmaa kaayaduccarita.m pahaaya kaayasucarita.m bhaaveyya, vaciiduccarita.m  pahaaya vaciisucarita.m bhaaveyya, manoduccarita.m pahaaya manosucarita.m  bhaaveyya ^a^V2.0177^ea^! ta.m kissa hetu? maaya.m aayasmaa {ayamaayasmaa (ka0)} kaayassa   bhedaa para.m mara.naa  apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjii'ti {upapajjatiiti (ka0)}! eva.m tasmi.m puggale  aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo.
text.1098: [03] ``tatraavuso ^a^P3.0190^ea^, yvaaya.m puggalo  parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro labhati ca kaalena kaala.m  cetaso vivara.m cetaso pasaada.m, katha.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato  pa.tivinetabbo? seyyathaapi, aavuso, pokkhara.nii acchodakaa  saatodakaa siitodakaa {acchodikaa saatodikaa siitodikaa (sii0)} setakaa   {setodakaa (ka0)} supatitthaa rama.niiyaa naanaarukkhehi  sa~nchannaa. atha puriso aagaccheyya ghammaabhitatto ghammapareto  kilanto tasito pipaasito ^a^M2.0167^ea^. so ta.m pokkhara.ni.m ogaahetvaa nhaatvaa  ca pivitvaa ca paccuttaritvaa tattheva rukkhacchaayaaya nisiideyya vaa  nipajjeyya vaa.
text.1099: [03] evameva.m kho, aavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro  parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro labhati ca kaalena kaala.m cetaso vivara.m cetaso  pasaada.m, yaapissa ^a^T3.0212^ea^ parisuddhakaayasamaacaarataa saapissa tasmi.m samaye  manasi kaatabbaa; yaapissa parisuddhavaciisamaacaarataa saapissa tasmi.m  samaye manasi kaatabbaa; yampi labhati kaalena kaala.m cetaso vivara.m  cetaso pasaada.m, tampissa tasmi.m samaye manasi kaatabba.m. eva.m tasmi.m  puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo. samantapaasaadika.m, aavuso, puggala.m  aagamma citta.m pasiidati.
text.11: [03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, hiriibala.m? idha, bhikkhave,  ariyasaavako hirimaa hoti, hiriiyati kaayaduccaritena vaciiduccaritena  manoduccaritena, hiriiyati paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa.  ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, hiriibala.m.
text.110: [03] 27^b^.^eb^ ``samaadhi.m, bhikkhave, bhaavetha appamaa.na.m nipakaa  patissataa. samaadhi.m, bhikkhave, bhaavayata.m appamaa.na.m nipakaana.m  patissataana.m pa~nca ~naa.naani paccatta~n~neva uppajjanti. katamaani pa~nca?  `aya.m samaadhi paccuppannasukho ceva aayati~nca sukhavipaako'ti  paccatta~n~neva ~naa.na.m uppajjati, `aya.m samaadhi ariyo niraamiso'ti  paccatta~n~neva ~naa.na.m uppajjati, `aya.m samaadhi   akaapurisasevito'ti {mahaapurisasevitoti (ka0)}  paccatta~n~neva ~naa.na.m uppajjati, `aya.m samaadhi santo ^a^T3.0026^ea^ pa.niito  pa.tippassaddhaladdho ekodibhaavaadhigato, na  sa"nkhaaraniggayhavaaritagato'ti {na ca sasa"nkhaaraniggayhavaaritappatitoti (sii0),  na ca sasa"nkhaaraniggayhavaaritapattoti (syaa0), na ca  sasa"nkhaaraniggayhavaarivaava.toti (ka0), na  sasa"nkhaaraniggayhavaariyaadhigatoti (?) dii0 ni0 3.355; a0 ni0  3.102;   9.27} paccatta~n~neva ~naa.na.m uppajjati, `sato  kho panaaha.m ima.m samaapajjaami sato vu.t.thahaamii'ti {so kho panaaha.m ima.m samaadhi.m  satova samaapajjaami, sato u.t.thahaamiiti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} paccatta~n~neva ~naa.na.m  uppajjati.
text.1100: [03] ``ime kho, aavuso, pa~nca aaghaatapa.tivinayaa, yattha  bhikkhuno uppanno aaghaato sabbaso pa.tivinetabbo''ti. dutiya.m.
text.1102: [03] 163^b^.^eb^ tatra kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu  aamantesi -- ``aavuso bhikkhave''ti. ``aavuso''ti kho te  bhikkhuu aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa saariputto  etadavoca --
text.1103: [03] {a0 ni0  5.65-66} ``pa~ncahaavuso ^a^P3.0191^ea^, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu  ala.m saakaccho sabrahmacaariina.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? idhaavuso, bhikkhu  attanaa ca siilasampanno hoti, siilasampadaakathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m  ^a^V2.0178^ea^ byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca samaadhisampanno hoti,  samaadhisampadaakathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca  pa~n~naasampanno hoti, pa~n~naasampadaakathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa  hoti; attanaa ca vimuttisampanno hoti, vimuttisampadaakathaaya ca  aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno  hoti, vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaakathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti.  imehi kho, aavuso, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m  saakaccho sabrahmacaariina''nti. tatiya.m.
text.1105: [03] 164^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0  5.65} tatra ^a^M2.0168^ea^ kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu  aamantesi...pe0... ``pa~ncahi, aavuso, dhammehi  samannaagato bhikkhu ala.msaajiivo sabrahmacaariina.m. katamehi pa~ncahi?  idhaavuso, bhikkhu attanaa ca siilasampanno hoti ^a^T3.0213^ea^, siilasampadaakathaaya  ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca samaadhisampanno hoti,  samaadhisampadaakathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca  pa~n~naasampanno hoti, pa~n~naasampadaakathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa  hoti; attanaa ca vimuttisampanno hoti, vimuttisampadaakathaaya ca  aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno  hoti, vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaakathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti.  imehi kho, aavuso, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu  ala.msaajiivo sabrahmacaariina''nti. catuttha.m.
text.1107: [03] 165^b^.^eb^ tatra kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu  aamantesi...pe0... ``yo hi koci, aavuso, para.m  pa~nha.m pucchati, sabbo so pa~ncahi .thaanehi, etesa.m vaa a~n~natarena.  katamehi pa~ncahi? mandattaa momuuhattaa {momuhattaa (sii0)} para.m pa~nha.m pucchati, paapiccho  icchaapakato para.m pa~nha.m pucchati, paribhava.m para.m ^a^P3.0192^ea^ pa~nha.m  pucchati, a~n~naatukaamo para.m pa~nha.m pucchati, atha vaa paneva.mcitto {atha vaa  pakuppanto (sii0 pii0)} para.m  pa~nha.m pucchati -- `sace me pa~nha.m pu.t.tho sammadeva byaakarissati icceta.m  kusala.m, no ce {no ca (syaa0)} me pa~nha.m pu.t.tho sammadeva byaakarissati ahamassa  sammadeva byaakarissaamii'ti. yo hi koci, aavuso, para.m pa~nha.m  pucchati, sabbo so imehi pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0179^ea^ .thaanehi, etesa.m vaa a~n~natarena.  aha.m kho panaavuso, eva.mcitto para.m pa~nha.m pucchaami -- `sace me pa~nha.m  pu.t.tho sammadeva byaakarissati ^a^T3.0214^ea^ icceta.m kusala.m, no ce me pa~nha.m pu.t.tho  sammadeva byaakarissati, ahamassa sammadeva byaakarissaamii''ti.  pa~ncama.m.
text.1109: [03] 166^b^.^eb^ tatra kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu  aamantesi...pe0... ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu siilasampanno  samaadhisampanno pa~n~naasampanno sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m ^a^M2.0169^ea^ samaapajjeyyaapi  vu.t.thaheyyaapi {samaapajjeyyapi vu.t.thaheyyapi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} -- attheta.m   .thaana.m. no ce di.t.theva dhamme a~n~na.m aaraadheyya,  atikkammeva kaba.liikaaraahaarabhakkhaana.m {kaba.li.mkaaraahaarabhakkhaana.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  pii0)} devaana.m sahabyata.m a~n~natara.m manomaya.m  kaaya.m upapanno sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjeyyaapi vu.t.thaheyyaapi --  attheta.m .thaana''nti.
text.111: [01] ``samaadhi.m, bhikkhave, bhaavetha appamaa.na.m nipakaa  patissataa. samaadhi.m, bhikkhave, bhaavayata.m appamaa.na.m nipakaana.m  patissataana.m imaani pa~nca ~naa.naani paccatta~n~neva uppajjantii''ti.  sattama.m.

text.1113: [03] atha ^a^V2.0180^ea^ kho aayasmato saariputtassa etadahosi --  ``yaavatatiyakampi {yaavatatiyampi (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} kho me   aayasmaa udaayii pa.tikkosati, na ca me  koci bhikkhu anumodati. ya.mnuunaaha.m yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkameyya''nti.  atha kho aayasmaa saariputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m  nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``idhaavuso,  bhikkhu siilasampanno samaadhisampanno pa~n~naasampanno  sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjeyyaapi vu.t.thaheyyaapi -- attheta.m .thaana.m.  no ce di.t.theva dhamme a~n~na.m ^a^M2.0170^ea^ aaraadheyya, atikkammeva  kaba.liikaaraahaarabhakkhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m a~n~natara.m manomaya.m kaaya.m  upapanno sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjeyyaapi vu.t.thaheyyaapi -- attheta.m  .thaana''nti.
