text.1115: [03] dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho aayasmaa saariputto  bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu siilasampanno  samaadhisampanno pa~n~naasampanno sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m ^a^P3.0194^ea^  samaapajjeyyaapi vu.t.thaheyyaapi -- attheta.m .thaana.m ^a^T3.0216^ea^. no ce di.t.theva dhamme  a~n~na.m aaraadheyya, atikkammeva kaba.liikaaraahaarabhakkhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m  a~n~natara.m manomaya.m kaaya.m upapanno sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjeyyaapi  vu.t.thaheyyaapi -- attheta.m .thaana''nti.
text.1116: [03] tatiyampi kho aayasmaa udaayii aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca  -- ``a.t.thaana.m kho eta.m, aavuso saariputta, anavakaaso ya.m so bhikkhu  atikkammeva kaba.liikaaraahaarabhakkhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m a~n~natara.m manomaya.m  kaaya.m upapanno sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjeyyaapi vu.t.thaheyyaapi --  nattheta.m .thaana''nti.
text.1117: [03] atha kho aayasmato saariputtassa etadahosi -- ``bhagavatopi  kho me sammukhaa aayasmaa udaayii yaavatatiyaka.m pa.tikkosati, na ca me  koci bhikkhu anumodati. ya.mnuunaaha.m tu.nhii assa''nti. atha kho  aayasmaa saariputto tu.nhii ahosi.
text.1118: [03] atha ^a^V2.0181^ea^ kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m udaayi.m aamantesi -- ``ka.m pana  tva.m, udaayi, manomaya.m kaaya.m paccesii''ti? ``ye te, bhante, devaa  aruupino sa~n~naamayaa''ti. ``ki.m nu kho tuyha.m, udaayi, baalassa  abyattassa bha.nitena! tvampi naama bha.nitabba.m ma~n~nasii''ti! atha  kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``atthi naama,  aananda, thera.m bhikkhu.m vihesiyamaana.m ajjhupekkhissatha ^a^M2.0171^ea^. na hi naama,  aananda, kaaru~n~nampi bhavissati theramhi {byattamhi (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} bhikkhumhi  vihesiyamaanamhii''ti.
text.1119: [03] atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``idha, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu siilasampanno samaadhisampanno pa~n~naasampanno  sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjeyyaapi vu.t.thaheyyaapi -- attheta.m .thaana.m.  no ce di.t.theva dhamme a~n~na.m aaraadheyya ^a^T3.0217^ea^, atikkammeva  kaba.liikaaraahaarabhakkhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m a~n~natara.m manomaya.m kaaya.m  upapanno sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjeyyaapi vu.t.thaheyyaapi -- attheta.m  .thaana''nti. idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato u.t.thaayaasanaa  vihaara.m paavisi.
text.1120: [03] atha ^a^P3.0195^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando  acirapakkantassa bhagavato yenaayasmaa upavaa.no tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m upavaa.na.m etadavoca -- ``idhaavuso upavaa.na,  a~n~ne there bhikkhuu vihesenti. maya.m tena na muccaama. anacchariya.m  kho, paneta.m aavuso upavaa.na, ya.m bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa  vu.t.thito etadeva aarabbha udaahareyya yathaa aayasmanta.myevettha upavaa.na.m  pa.tibhaaseyya. idaaneva amhaaka.m saarajja.m okkanta''nti. atha kho  bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena upa.t.thaanasaalaa  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho  bhagavaa aayasmanta.m upavaa.na.m etadavoca --
text.1121: [03] ``katiihi nu kho, upavaa.na, dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu  sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo caa''ti?  ``pa~ncahi, bhante, dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m  piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi pa~ncahi?  idha, bhante, thero bhikkhu siilavaa hoti...pe0... samaadaaya  sikkhati sikkhaapadesu; bahussuto hoti...pe0... di.t.thiyaa  suppa.tividdhaa; kalyaa.navaaco hoti kalyaa.navaakkara.no poriyaa vaacaaya  samannaagato vissa.t.thaaya ^a^T3.0218^ea^ anelagalaaya {anelaga.laaya (syaa0 ka.m0)} atthassa   vi~n~naapaniyaa; catunna.m  jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti  akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii; aasavaana.m ^a^V2.0182^ea^ khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa  upasampajja viharati. imehi kho, bhante, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato  thero bhikkhu ^a^M2.0172^ea^ sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca  bhaavaniiyo caa''ti.
text.1122: [03] ``saadhu ^a^P3.0196^ea^ saadhu, upavaa.na! imehi kho,  upavaa.na, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m  piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca. ime ce, upavaa.na,  pa~nca dhammaa therassa bhikkhuno na sa.mvijjeyyu.m, ta.m sabrahmacaarii na  sakkareyyu.m na garu.m kareyyu.m na maaneyyu.m na puujeyyu.m kha.n.diccena paaliccena  valittacataaya. yasmaa ca kho, upavaa.na, ime pa~nca dhammaa therassa  bhikkhuno sa.mvijjanti, tasmaa ta.m sabrahmacaarii sakkaronti garu.m karonti  maanenti puujentii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.
text.1124: [03] 167^b^.^eb^ tatra kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu  aamantesi -- ``codakena, aavuso, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena  pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetvaa paro codetabbo''.
text.1125: [03] ``katame pa~nca? kaalena vakkhaami, no akaalena; bhuutena  vakkhaami, no abhuutena; sa.nhena vakkhaami, no pharusena; atthasa.mhitena  vakkhaami, no anatthasa.mhitena; mettacitto {mettacittena (sii0 pii0 ka0) cuu.lava0 400  passitabba.m} vakkhaami, no dosantaro {dosantarena (sii0  pii0 ka0)}.  codakena, aavuso, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena ime pa~nca dhamme  ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetvaa paro codetabbo.
text.1126: [03] ``idhaaha.m ^a^T3.0219^ea^, aavuso, ekacca.m puggala.m passaami akaalena  codiyamaana.m no kaalena kupita.m, abhuutena codiyamaana.m no bhuutena  kupita.m, pharusena codiyamaana.m no sa.nhena kupita.m, anatthasa.mhitena  codiyamaana.m no atthasa.mhitena kupita.m, dosantarena codiyamaana.m no  mettacittena kupita.m.
text.1127: [03] ``adhammacuditassa, aavuso, bhikkhuno pa~ncahaakaarehi  avippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo {upadahitabbo (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} -- `akaalenaayasmaa   cudito no kaalena  ^a^P3.0197^ea^, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraaya; abhuutenaayasmaa cudito  no bhuutena ^a^V2.0183^ea^, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraaya; pharusenaayasmaa cudito no  sa.nhena, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraaya ^a^M2.0173^ea^; anatthasa.mhitenaayasmaa cudito no  atthasa.mhitena, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraaya; dosantarenaayasmaa cudito no  mettacittena, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraayaa'ti. adhammacuditassa, aavuso,  bhikkhuno imehi pa~ncahaakaarehi avippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo.
text.1128: [03] ``adhammacodakassa, aavuso, bhikkhuno pa~ncahaakaarehi  vippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo -- `akaalena te, aavuso,   codito {cudito (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} no  kaalena, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraaya; abhuutena te, aavuso, codito no  bhuutena, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraaya; pharusena te, aavuso, codito no  sa.nhena, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraaya; anatthasa.mhitena te, aavuso, codito  no atthasa.mhitena, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraaya; dosantarena te, aavuso,  codito no mettacittena, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraayaa'ti.  adhammacodakassa, aavuso, bhikkhuno imehi pa~ncahaakaarehi  vippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo. ta.m kissa hetu? yathaa na a~n~nopi  bhikkhu ^a^T3.0220^ea^ abhuutena codetabba.m ma~n~neyyaati.
text.1129: [03] ``idha panaaha.m, aavuso, ekacca.m puggala.m passaami kaalena  codiyamaana.m no akaalena kupita.m, bhuutena codiyamaana.m no abhuutena  kupita.m, sa.nhena codiyamaana.m no pharusena kupita.m, atthasa.mhitena  codiyamaana.m no anatthasa.mhitena kupita.m, mettacittena codiyamaana.m no  dosantarena kupita.m.
text.113: [03] 28^b^.^eb^ ``ariyassa ^a^P3.0025^ea^, bhikkhave,  pa~nca"ngikassa sammaasamaadhissa bhaavana.m desessaami. ta.m su.naatha,  saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho  te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.1130: [03] ``dhammacuditassa, aavuso, bhikkhuno pa~ncahaakaarehi  vippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo -- `kaalenaayasmaa cudito no akaalena,  ala.m te vippa.tisaaraaya; bhuutenaayasmaa cudito no abhuutena, ala.m te  vippa.tisaaraaya; sa.nhenaayasmaa cudito no pharusena, ala.m te  vippa.tisaaraaya; atthasa.mhitenaayasmaa cudito no anatthasa.mhitena, ala.m  te vippa.tisaaraaya; mettacittenaayasmaa cudito no dosantarena, ala.m te  vippa.tisaaraayaa'ti. dhammacuditassa ^a^P3.0198^ea^, aavuso,  bhikkhuno imehi pa~ncahaakaarehi vippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo.
text.1131: [03] ``dhammacodakassa, aavuso, bhikkhuno pa~ncahaakaarehi  avippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo -- `kaalena te, aavuso, codito no  akaalena, ala.m ^a^M2.0174^ea^ te avippa.tisaaraaya; bhuutena te, aavuso, codito no  abhuutena, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraaya; sa.nhena te, aavuso, codito no  ^a^V2.0184^ea^ pharusena, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraaya; atthasa.mhitena te, aavuso,  codito no anatthasa.mhitena, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraaya; mettacittena te,  aavuso, codito no dosantarena, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraayaa'ti.  dhammacodakassa, aavuso, bhikkhuno imehi pa~ncahaakaarehi  avippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo. ta.m kissa hetu? yathaa a~n~nopi ^a^T3.0221^ea^  bhikkhu bhuutena coditabba.m ma~n~neyyaati.
text.1132: [03] ``cuditena, aavuso, puggalena dviisu dhammesu pati.t.thaatabba.m --  sacce ca, akuppe ca. ma.m cepi {pa~ncahi (syaa0 ka0)}, aavuso, pare codeyyu.m kaalena vaa  akaalena vaa bhuutena vaa abhuutena vaa sa.nhena vaa pharusena vaa  atthasa.mhitena vaa anatthasa.mhitena vaa mettacittaa {mettacittena (sii0 pii0 ka0) ma0 ni0 1.227  passitabba.m} vaa dosantaraa {dosantarena (sii0 pii0 ka0)} vaa,  ahampi dviisuyeva dhammesu pati.t.thaheyya.m -- sacce ca, akuppe ca. sace  jaaneyya.m -- `attheso mayi dhammo'ti, `atthii'ti na.m vadeyya.m --  `sa.mvijjateso mayi dhammo'ti. sace jaaneyya.m -- `nattheso mayi  dhammo'ti, `natthii'ti na.m vadeyya.m -- `neso dhammo mayi  sa.mvijjatii'ti.
text.1133: [03] ``evampi kho te {evampi kho (ka0)}, saariputta, vuccamaanaa atha ca panidhekacce  moghapurisaa na padakkhi.na.m ga.nhantii''ti.
text.1134: [03] ``ye te, bhante, puggalaa assaddhaa jiivikatthaa na saddhaa  ^a^P3.0199^ea^ agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa sa.thaa maayaavino  ketabino {ke.tubhino (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} uddhataa unna.laa capalaa   mukharaa viki.n.navaacaa indriyesu  aguttadvaaraa bhojane amatta~n~nuno jaagariya.m ananuyuttaa saama~n~ne  anapekkhavanto sikkhaaya na tibbagaaravaa baahulikaa saathalikaa  okkamane pubba"ngamaa paviveke nikkhittadhuraa kusiitaa hiinaviiriyaa  mu.t.thassatino asampajaanaa asamaahitaa vibbhantacittaa duppa~n~naa  e.lamuugaa, te mayaa eva.m vuccamaanaa na padakkhi.na.m ga.nhanti.
text.1135: [03] ``ye pana te, bhante, kulaputtaa ^a^T3.0222^ea^ saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m  pabbajitaa asa.thaa amaayaavino aketabino anuddhataa anunna.laa acapalaa  amukharaa aviki.n.navaacaa indriyesu guttadvaaraa bhojane matta~n~nuno  jaagariya.m ^a^M2.0175^ea^ anuyuttaa saama~n~ne apekkhavanto sikkhaaya tibbagaaravaa na  baahulikaa na saathalikaa okkamane nikkhittadhuraa paviveke pubba"ngamaa  aaraddhaviiriyaa ^a^V2.0185^ea^ pahitattaa upa.t.thitassatino sampajaanaa samaahitaa  ekaggacittaa pa~n~navanto ane.lamuugaa, te mayaa eva.m vuccamaanaa padakkhi.na.m  ga.nhantiiti.
text.1136: [03] ``ye te, saariputta, puggalaa assaddhaa jiivikatthaa na saddhaa  agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa sa.thaa maayaavino ketabino uddhataa  unna.laa capalaa mukharaa viki.n.navaacaa indriyesu aguttadvaaraa bhojane  amatta~n~nuno jaagariya.m ananuyuttaa saama~n~ne anapekkhavanto sikkhaaya  na tibbagaaravaa baahulikaa saathalikaa okkamane pubba"ngamaa paviveke  nikkhittadhuraa kusiitaa hiinaviiriyaa mu.t.thassatino asampajaanaa  asamaahitaa vibbhantacittaa duppa~n~naa e.lamuugaa, ti.t.thantu te.
text.1137: [03] ``ye pana, te saariputta, kulaputtaa saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m  pabbajitaa asa.thaa amaayaavino aketabino anuddhataa anunna.laa acapalaa  amukharaa aviki.n.navaacaa indriyesu guttadvaaraa bhojane matta~n~nuno  jaagariya.m anuyuttaa saama~n~ne apekkhavanto sikkhaaya tibbagaaravaa na  baahulikaa na saathalikaa okkamane nikkhittadhuraa paviveke pubba"ngamaa  aaraddhaviiriyaa pahitattaa upa.t.thitassatino sampajaanaa samaahitaa  ekaggacittaa pa~n~navanto ane.lamuugaa, te tva.m, saariputta, vadeyyaasi  ^a^P3.0200^ea^. ovada, saariputta ^a^T3.0223^ea^, sabrahmacaarii; anusaasa,  saariputta, sabrahmacaarii -- `asaddhammaa vu.t.thaapetvaa saddhamme  pati.t.thaapessaami sabrahmacaarii'ti. eva~nhi te, saariputta,  sikkhitabba''nti. sattama.m.
text.1139: [03] 168^b^.^eb^ tatra kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu  aamantesi -- ``dussiilassa, aavuso, siilavipannassa hatuupaniso  hoti sammaasamaadhi; sammaasamaadhimhi asati sammaasamaadhivipannassa  hatuupanisa.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane asati  yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti nibbidaaviraago;  nibbidaaviraage asati nibbidaaviraagavipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti  vimutti~naa.nadassana.m. seyyathaapi, aavuso, rukkho saakhaapalaasavipanno.  tassa papa.tikaapi na paaripuuri.m gacchati, tacopi  ^a^M2.0176^ea^ ...pe0... pheggupi... saaropi na paaripuuri.m gacchati. evameva.m kho, aavuso,  dussiilassa siilavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti sammaasamaadhi;  sammaasamaadhimhi ^a^V2.0186^ea^ asati sammaasamaadhivipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti  yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane asati  yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti nibbidaaviraago;  nibbidaaviraage asati nibbidaaviraagavipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti  vimutti~naa.nadassana.m.
text.114: [03] ``katamaa ^a^M2.0021^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, ariyassa pa~nca"ngikassa  sammaasamaadhissa bhaavanaa? idha, bhikkhave ^a^V2.0022^ea^, bhikkhu vivicceva  kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so imameva  kaaya.m vivekajena piitisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti  parippharati; naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa vivekajena  piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, dakkho   nhaapako {nahaapako (sii0 pii0)}  vaa nhaapakantevaasii vaa ka.msathaale nhaaniiyacu.n.naani {nahaaniiyacu.n.naani (sii0  pii0)} aakiritvaa udakena  paripphosaka.m paripphosaka.m sanneyya. saaya.m nhaaniiyapi.n.di {saassa nahaaniiyapi.n.dii  (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} snehaanugataa  snehaparetaa santarabaahiraa phu.taa snehena, na ca paggharinii. evameva.m  kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m vivekajena piitisukhena  abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati; naassa ki~nci  sabbaavato kaayassa vivekajena piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti.  ariyassa, bhikkhave, pa~nca"ngikassa sammaasamaadhissa aya.m pa.thamaa  bhaavanaa.
text.1140: [03] ``siilavato, aavuso, siilasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti  sammaasamaadhi; sammaasamaadhimhi sati sammaasamaadhisampannassa  upanisasampanna.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane sati  yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidaaviraago;  nibbidaaviraage sati nibbidaaviraagasampannassa upanisasampanna.m ^a^T3.0224^ea^ hoti  vimutti~naa.nadassana.m. seyyathaapi, aavuso, rukkho,  saakhaapalaasasampanno. tassa papa.tikaapi paaripuuri.m gacchati,  tacopi...pe0... pheggupi... saaropi ^a^P3.0201^ea^ paaripuuri.m  gacchati. evameva.m kho, aavuso, siilavato siilasampannassa  upanisasampanno hoti sammaasamaadhi; sammaasamaadhimhi sati  sammaasamaadhisampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m;  yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane sati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno  hoti nibbidaaviraago; nibbidaaviraage sati  nibbidaaviraagasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti  vimutti~naa.nadassana''nti {a0 ni0  5.168;  6.50;  7.65}. a.t.thama.m.
text.1142: [03] 169^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa aanando yenaayasmaa  saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa saariputtena saddhi.m  sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m {saaraa.niiya.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}   viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando aayasmanta.m  saariputta.m etadavoca --
text.1143: [03] ``kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhu  khippanisanti ca hoti, kusalesu dhammesu suggahitaggaahii ca, bahu~nca  ga.nhaati, gahita~ncassa nappamussatii''ti? ``aayasmaa kho aanando  bahussuto. pa.tibhaatu aayasmanta.myeva aananda''nti. ``tenahaavuso  saariputta, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi ^a^M2.0177^ea^ karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti.  ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmato aanandassa  paccassosi. aayasmaa aanando etadavoca --
text.1144: [03] ``idhaavuso saariputta, bhikkhu atthakusalo ca hoti,  dhammakusalo ca, bya~njanakusalo ca ^a^V2.0187^ea^, niruttikusalo ca, pubbaaparakusalo  ca. ettaavataa kho ^a^T3.0225^ea^, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca  hoti kusalesu dhammesu, suggahitaggaahii ca, bahu~nca ga.nhaati,  gahita~ncassa nappamussatii''ti. ``acchariya.m, aavuso! abbhuta.m,  aavuso!! yaava subhaasita.m cida.m aayasmataa aanandena. imehi ca  maya.m pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagata.m aayasmanta.m aananda.m dhaarema --  `aayasmaa aanando atthakusalo dhammakusalo bya~njanakusalo  niruttikusalo pubbaaparakusalo'''ti. navama.m.
text.1146: [03] 170^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^P3.0202^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa  aanando kosambiya.m viharati ghositaaraame. atha kho aayasmaa  bhaddaji yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa  aanandena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa  ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m bhaddaji.m  aayasmaa aanando etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu kho, aavuso bhaddaji,  dassanaana.m agga.m, ki.m savanaana.m agga.m, ki.m sukhaana.m agga.m, ki.m sa~n~naana.m  agga.m, ki.m bhavaana.m agga''nti?
text.1147: [03] ``atthaavuso, brahmaa abhibhuu anabhibhuuto a~n~nadatthudaso  vasavattii, yo ta.m brahmaana.m passati, ida.m dassanaana.m agga.m. atthaavuso,  aabhassaraa naama devaa sukhena abhisannaa parisannaa. te kadaaci  karahaci udaana.m udaanenti -- `aho sukha.m, aho sukha'nti! yo ta.m  sadda.m su.naati, ida.m savanaana.m agga.m. atthaavuso, subhaki.nhaa naama  devaa. te santa.myeva tusitaa sukha.m pa.tivedenti, ida.m sukhaana.m agga.m.  atthaavuso, aaki~nca~n~naayatanuupagaa devaa, ida.m sa~n~naana.m ^a^T3.0226^ea^ agga.m.  atthaavuso, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanuupagaa devaa, ida.m bhavaana.m agga''nti.  ``sameti kho ida.m aayasmato bhaddajissa, yadida.m bahunaa janenaa''ti?
text.1148: [03] ``aayasmaa ^a^M2.0178^ea^ kho, aanando, bahussuto. pa.tibhaatu  aayasmanta.myeva aananda''nti. ``tenahaavuso bhaddaji, su.naahi, saadhuka.m  manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa  bhaddaji aayasmato aanandassa paccassosi. aayasmaa aanando  etadavoca --
text.1149: [03] ``yathaa ^a^V2.0188^ea^ passato kho, aavuso, anantaraa aasavaana.m khayo  hoti, ida.m dassanaana.m agga.m. yathaa su.nato anantaraa aasavaana.m khayo  hoti, ida.m savanaana.m agga.m. yathaa sukhitassa anantaraa aasavaana.m  khayo hoti, ida.m sukhaana.m agga.m. yathaa sa~n~nissa anantaraa  aasavaana.m khayo hoti, ida.m sa~n~naana.m agga.m. yathaa bhuutassa anantaraa  aasavaana.m khayo hoti, ida.m bhavaana.m agga''nti. dasama.m.
text.115: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m  vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja ^a^T3.0027^ea^ viharati. so imameva  kaaya.m samaadhijena piitisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti  parippharati; naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa samaadhijena  piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, udakarahado  gambhiiro ubbhidodako {ubbhitodako (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}. tassa nevassa puratthimaaya disaaya udakassa  aayamukha.m, na pacchimaaya disaaya udakassa aayamukha.m, na uttaraaya  disaaya ^a^P3.0026^ea^ udakassa aayamukha.m, na dakkhi.naaya disaaya  udakassa aayamukha.m, devo ca kaalena kaala.m sammaa dhaara.m   naanuppaveccheyya {devo ca na kaalena... anupaveccheyya (dii0 ni0 1.227 aadayo;  ma0 ni0 2.251 aadayo}.  atha kho tamhaava udakarahadaa siitaa vaaridhaaraa ubbhijjitvaa tameva  udakarahada.m siitena vaarinaa abhisandeyya parisandeyya paripuureyya  paripphareyya; naassa ki~nci sabbaavato udakarahadassa siitena vaarinaa  apphu.ta.m assa. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m  samaadhijena piitisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti  parippharati; naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa samaadhijena  piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti. ariyassa, bhikkhave, pa~nca"ngikassa  sammaasamaadhissa aya.m dutiyaa bhaavanaa.
text.1153: [22] pucchaa nirodho codanaa, siila.m nisanti bhaddajiiti..
text.1156: [03] 171^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V2.0189^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa  bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti ^a^T3.0227^ea^. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu  bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.1157: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato upaasako saarajja.m  okkanto hoti. katamehi pa~ncahi? paa.naatipaatii hoti,  adinnaadaayii hoti, kaamesumicchaacaarii hoti, musaavaadii hoti,  suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaayii hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi  dhammehi samannaagato upaasako saarajja.m okkanto hoti.
text.1158: [03] ``pa~ncahi ^a^M2.0179^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato upaasako visaarado  hoti. katamehi pa~ncahi? paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti,  adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti,  musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato  hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato upaasako  visaarado hotii''ti. pa.thama.m.
text.116: [03] ``puna ^a^M2.0022^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca  viraagaa...pe0...  tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so imameva kaaya.m nippiitikena  sukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati; naassa  ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa nippiitikena sukhena apphu.ta.m hoti.  seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, uppaliniya.m vaa paduminiya.m vaa pu.n.dariikiniya.m  ^a^V2.0023^ea^ vaa appekaccaani uppalaani vaa padumaani vaa pu.n.dariikaani vaa udake  jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani udakaanuggataani anto nimuggaposiini.  taani yaava ^a^T3.0028^ea^ caggaa yaava ca muulaa siitena vaarinaa abhisannaani  parisannaani paripuuraani paripphu.taani; naassa ki~nci sabbaavata.m  uppalaana.m vaa padumaana.m vaa pu.n.dariikaana.m vaa siitena vaarinaa apphu.ta.m  assa. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m nippiitikena  sukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati; naassa  ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa nippiitikena sukhena apphu.ta.m hoti.  ariyassa, bhikkhave, pa~nca"ngikassa sammaasamaadhissa aya.m tatiyaa  bhaavanaa.
text.1160: [03] 172^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  upaasako avisaarado agaara.m ajjhaavasati. katamehi pa~ncahi?  paa.naatipaatii ^a^P3.0204^ea^ hoti...pe0...  suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaayii hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi  dhammehi samannaagato upaasako avisaarado agaara.m ajjhaavasati.
text.1161: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato upaasako visaarado  agaara.m ajjhaavasati. katamehi ^a^V2.0190^ea^ pa~ncahi? paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato  hoti...pe0... suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato hoti. imehi  kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato upaasako visaarado  agaara.m ajjhaavasatii''ti. dutiya.m.
text.1163: [03] 173^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  upaasako yathaabhata.m nikkhitto ^a^T3.0228^ea^ eva.m niraye. katamehi pa~ncahi?  paa.naatipaatii hoti...pe0... suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaayii hoti. imehi  kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato upaasako yathaabhata.m  nikkhitto eva.m niraye.
text.1164: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato upaasako yathaabhata.m  nikkhitto eva.m sagge. katamehi pa~ncahi? paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato  hoti...pe0... suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato hoti. imehi  kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato upaasako yathaabhata.m  nikkhitto eva.m sagge''ti. tatiya.m.
text.1166: [03] 174^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M2.0180^ea^ kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.  ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.1167: [03] ``pa~nca, gahapati, bhayaani veraani appahaaya `dussiilo' iti  vuccati, niraya~nca upapajjati. katamaani pa~nca? paa.naatipaata.m,  adinnaadaana.m, kaamesumicchaacaara.m, musaavaada.m, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaana.m --  imaani ^a^P3.0205^ea^ kho, gahapati, pa~nca bhayaani veraani  appahaaya `dussiilo' iti vuccati, niraya~nca upapajjati.
text.1168: [03] ``pa~nca, gahapati, bhayaani veraani pahaaya `siilavaa' iti  vuccati, sugati~nca upapajjati ^a^V2.0191^ea^. katamaani pa~nca? paa.naatipaata.m,  adinnaadaana.m, kaamesumicchaacaara.m, musaavaada.m, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaana.m --  imaani kho, gahapati, pa~nca bhayaani veraani pahaaya `siilavaa' iti  vuccati, sugati~nca upapajjati.
text.1169: [03] ``ya.m, gahapati, paa.naatipaatii paa.naatipaatapaccayaa di.t.thadhammikampi  bhaya.m vera.m pasavati, samparaayikampi bhaya.m vera.m pasavati, cetasikampi ^a^T3.0229^ea^  dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti, paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato neva  di.t.thadhammika.m bhaya.m vera.m pasavati, na samparaayika.m bhaya.m vera.m pasavati, na  cetasika.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. paa.naatipaataa pa.tiviratassa  eva.m ta.m bhaya.m vera.m vuupasanta.m hoti.
text.117: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa ^a^P3.0027^ea^  ...pe0...  catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati. so imameva kaaya.m parisuddhena cetasaa pariyodaatena pharitvaa  nisinno hoti; naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa parisuddhena cetasaa  pariyodaatena apphu.ta.m hoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso odaatena  vatthena sasiisa.m paarupitvaa nisinno assa; naassa ki~nci sabbaavato  kaayassa odaatena vatthena apphu.ta.m assa. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m parisuddhena cetasaa pariyodaatena pharitvaa  nisinno hoti; naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa parisuddhena cetasaa  pariyodaatena apphu.ta.m hoti. ariyassa, bhikkhave, pa~nca"ngikassa  sammaasamaadhissa aya.m catutthaa bhaavanaa.
text.1173: [03] ``ya.m, gahapati, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaayii  suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanapaccayaa di.t.thadhammikampi bhaya.m vera.m pasavati,  samparaayikampi bhaya.m vera.m pasavati, cetasikampi dukkha.m domanassa.m  pa.tisa.mvedeti, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato neva di.t.thadhammika.m  bhaya.m vera.m pasavati, na samparaayika.m bhaya.m vera.m pasavati, na cetasika.m  dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa  pa.tiviratassa eva.m ta.m bhaya.m vera.m vuupasanta.m hotii''ti.
text.118: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paccavekkha.naanimitta.m  suggahita.m hoti sumanasikata.m suupadhaarita.m suppa.tividdha.m pa~n~naaya.  seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, a~n~nova a~n~na.m {a~n~no vaa a~n~na.m vaa (sii0), a~n~no vaa  a~n~na.m (syaa0 ka.m0), a~n~no a~n~na.m (?)} paccavekkheyya, .thito vaa nisinna.m  paccavekkheyya, nisinno vaa nipanna.m paccavekkheyya. evameva.m kho,  bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paccavekkha.naanimitta.m ^a^T3.0029^ea^ suggahita.m hoti sumanasikata.m  suupadhaarita.m suppa.tividdha.m pa~n~naaya. ariyassa, bhikkhave, pa~nca"ngikassa  sammaasamaadhissa aya.m pa~ncamaa {pa~ncamii (sii0)} bhaavanaa. eva.m bhaavite kho ^a^M2.0023^ea^, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu {eva.m bhaavite kho bhikkhave (sii0)} ariye pa~nca"ngike sammaasamaadhimhi eva.m bahuliikate yassa  yassa abhi~n~naasacchikara.niiyassa dhammassa citta.m abhininnaameti  abhi~n~naasacchikiriyaaya, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati  sati aayatane.
text.1180: [27] loke adinna.m naadiyati, paradaara.m na gacchati.
text.1183: [22] kaayassa ^a^T3.0230^ea^ bhedaa sappa~n~no, sugati.m sopapajjatii''ti..  catuttha.m.
text.1185: [03] 175^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  upaasako upaasakaca.n.daalo ca hoti upaasakamala~nca upaasakapatiku.t.tho  ca {upaasakapatiki.t.tho ca (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. katamehi pa~ncahi? assaddho hoti; dussiilo hoti;  kotuuhalama"ngaliko hoti, ma"ngala.m pacceti no kamma.m; ito ca bahiddhaa  dakkhi.neyya.m gavesati; tattha ca pubbakaara.m karoti. imehi kho,  bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato upaasako upaasakaca.n.daalo ca  hoti upaasakamala~nca upaasakapatiku.t.tho ca.
text.1186: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato upaasako  upaasakaratana~nca hoti upaasakapaduma~nca upaasakapu.n.dariika~nca {upaasakapu.n.dariiko ca  (pii0 ka0)}.  katamehi pa~ncahi? saddho hoti; siilavaa hoti; akotuuhalama"ngaliko  hoti, kamma.m pacceti no ma"ngala.m; na ito bahiddhaa dakkhi.neyya.m  gavesati; idha ca pubbakaara.m karoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi  dhammehi samannaagato upaasako upaasakaratana~nca hoti upaasakapaduma~nca  upaasakapu.n.dariika~ncaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.
text.1188: [03] 176^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M2.0182^ea^ kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati pa~ncamattehi  upaasakasatehi parivuto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho  anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.1189: [03] ``tumhe kho, gahapati, bhikkhusa"ngha.m paccupa.t.thitaa  ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena ^a^V2.0193^ea^. na kho,  gahapati, taavatakeneva tu.t.thi kara.niiyaa -- `maya.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m  paccupa.t.thitaa ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarenaa'ti ^a^T3.0231^ea^.  tasmaatiha, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `kinti ^a^P3.0207^ea^  maya.m kaalena kaala.m paviveka.m piiti.m upasampajja  vihareyyaamaa'ti! eva~nhi vo, gahapati, sikkhitabba''nti.
text.119: [03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, udakama.niko aadhaare .thapito puuro  udakassa samatittiko kaakapeyyo ^a^V2.0024^ea^. tamena.m balavaa puriso yato yato  aavajjeyya {aava.t.teyya (syaa0 ka.m0)}, aagaccheyya udaka''nti? ``eva.m, bhante'' ^a^P3.0028^ea^.  ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m bhaavite ariye  pa~nca"ngike sammaasamaadhimhi eva.m bahuliikate yassa yassa  abhi~n~naasacchikara.niiyassa dhammassa citta.m abhininnaameti  abhi~n~naasacchikiriyaaya, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati  sati aayatane.
text.1190: [03] eva.m vutte aayasmaa saariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaava subhaasita.m cida.m, bhante,  bhagavataa -- `tumhe kho, gahapati, bhikkhusa"ngha.m paccupa.t.thitaa  ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena. na kho,  gahapati, taavatakeneva tu.t.thi kara.niiyaa -- maya.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m paccupa.t.thitaa  ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarenaati.  tasmaatiha, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- kinti maya.m kaalena kaala.m  paviveka.m piiti.m upasampajja vihareyyaamaati! eva~nhi vo, gahapati,  sikkhitabba'nti. yasmi.m, bhante, samaye ariyasaavako paviveka.m  piiti.m upasampajja viharati, pa~ncassa .thaanaani tasmi.m samaye na honti.  yampissa kaamuupasa.mhita.m dukkha.m domanassa.m, tampissa tasmi.m samaye na  hoti. yampissa kaamuupasa.mhita.m sukha.m somanassa.m, tampissa tasmi.m  samaye na hoti. yampissa akusaluupasa.mhita.m dukkha.m domanassa.m,  tampissa tasmi.m samaye na hoti. yampissa akusaluupasa.mhita.m sukha.m  somanassa.m, tampissa tasmi.m samaye na hoti. yampissa  kusaluupasa.mhita.m dukkha.m domanassa.m, tampissa tasmi.m samaye na hoti.  yasmi.m, bhante, samaye ariyasaavako paviveka.m piiti.m upasampajja  viharati, imaanissa pa~nca {imaani pa~ncassa (syaa0 ka.m0)} .thaanaani tasmi.m samaye na hontii''ti.
text.1191: [03] ``saadhu ^a^M2.0183^ea^ saadhu, saariputta! yasmi.m, saariputta, samaye  ariyasaavako ^a^P3.0208^ea^ paviveka.m ^a^T3.0232^ea^ piiti.m upasampajja viharati,  pa~ncassa .thaanaani tasmi.m samaye na honti. yampissa kaamuupasa.mhita.m  dukkha.m domanassa.m, tampissa tasmi.m samaye na hoti. yampissa  kaamuupasa.mhita.m sukha.m somanassa.m, tampissa tasmi.m samaye na hoti.  yampissa akusaluupasa.mhita.m dukkha.m domanassa.m, tampissa tasmi.m samaye na  hoti. yampissa akusaluupasa.mhita.m sukha.m somanassa.m, tampissa tasmi.m  samaye na hoti. yampissa kusaluupasa.mhita.m dukkha.m domanassa.m,  tampissa tasmi.m samaye na hoti. yasmi.m, saariputta, samaye  ariyasaavako paviveka.m piiti.m upasampajja viharati, imaanissa {imaanettha (sii0)} pa~nca  .thaanaani tasmi.m samaye na hontii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.
text.1193: [03] 177^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaa ^a^V2.0194^ea^, bhikkhave, va.nijjaa upaasakena  akara.niiyaa. katamaa pa~nca? satthava.nijjaa, sattava.nijjaa,  ma.msava.nijjaa, majjava.nijjaa, visava.nijjaa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave,  pa~nca va.nijjaa upaasakena akara.niiyaa''ti. sattama.m.
text.1195: [03] 178^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu tumhehi  di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa -- `aya.m puriso paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa  pa.tiviratoti {pa.tivirato hotiiti (sii0), pa.tivirato hoti (syaa0 ka.m0  pii0)}. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa paa.naatipaataa verama.nihetu  hananti vaa bandhanti vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karontii'''ti?  ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``saadhu, bhikkhave! mayaapi kho eta.m,  bhikkhave, neva di.t.tha.m na suta.m -- `aya.m puriso paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya  paa.naatipaataa pa.tiviratoti. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa paa.naatipaataa  verama.nihetu hananti vaa bandhanti vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa  karontii'ti. api ca, khvassa tatheva paapakamma.m ^a^T3.0233^ea^ ^a^P3.0209^ea^  pavedenti {tatheva paapaka.m kamma.m pavedayanti (sii0), tadeva paapakamma.m pavedeti  (syaa0 ka.m0)} -- `aya.m puriso itthi.m vaa purisa.m vaa   jiivitaa voropesiiti {voropetiiti (syaa0 ka.m0)}.  tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa paa.naatipaatahetu hananti vaa bandhanti  ^a^M2.0184^ea^ vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karonti. api nu tumhehi evaruupa.m  di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa'''ti? ``di.t.tha~nca no, bhante, suta~nca suyyissati  {suuyissati (sii0 pii0)} caa''ti.
text.1196: [03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu tumhehi di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m  vaa -- `aya.m puriso adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tiviratoti.  tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa adinnaadaanaa verama.nihetu hananti vaa bandhanti  vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karontii'''ti? ``no heta.m bhante''.  ``saadhu, bhikkhave! mayaapi kho eta.m, bhikkhave, neva di.t.tha.m na  suta.m -- `aya.m puriso adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tiviratoti.  tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa adinnaadaanaa verama.nihetu hananti vaa  bandhanti vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karontii'ti. api ca  khvassa tatheva paapakamma.m pavedenti -- `aya.m puriso gaamaa vaa ara~n~naa  vaa adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyiiti {aadiyati (syaa0 ka.m0)}. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa  adinnaadaanahetu hananti vaa bandhanti vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m  ^a^V2.0195^ea^ vaa karonti. api nu tumhehi evaruupa.m di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa'''ti?  ``di.t.tha~nca no, bhante, suta~nca suyyissati caa''ti.
text.1197: [03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu tumhehi di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m  vaa -- `aya.m puriso kaamesumicchaacaara.m pahaaya kaamesumicchaacaaraa  pa.tiviratoti. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa kaamesumicchaacaaraa verama.nihetu  hananti vaa bandhanti vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karontii'''ti?  ``no heta.m ^a^T3.0234^ea^, bhante''. ``saadhu, bhikkhave! mayaapi kho eta.m,  bhikkhave, neva di.t.tha.m na suta.m -- `aya.m puriso kaamesumicchaacaara.m  pahaaya kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tiviratoti. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa  kaamesumicchaacaaraa verama.nihetu hananti vaa bandhanti vaa pabbaajenti  vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karontii'ti. api ca khvassa tatheva paapakamma.m  pavedenti -- `aya.m puriso paritthiisu parakumaariisu caaritta.m   aapajjiiti {aapajjati (syaa0 ka.m0)}.  tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa kaamesumicchaacaarahetu hananti ^a^P3.0210^ea^  vaa bandhanti vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karonti.  api nu tumhehi evaruupa.m di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa'''ti? ``di.t.tha~nca no,  bhante, suta~nca suyyissati caa''ti.
text.1198: [03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu tumhehi di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m  vaa -- `aya.m puriso musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tiviratoti.  tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa ^a^M2.0185^ea^ musaavaadaa verama.nihetu hananti vaa bandhanti vaa  pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karontii'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.  ``saadhu, bhikkhave! mayaapi kho eta.m, bhikkhave, neva di.t.tha.m na suta.m  -- `aya.m puriso musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tiviratoti. tamena.m  raajaano gahetvaa musaavaadaa verama.nihetu hananti vaa bandhanti vaa  pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karontii'ti. api ca khvassa tatheva  paapakamma.m pavedenti -- `aya.m puriso gahapatissa vaa gahapatiputtassa  vaa musaavaadena attha.m pabha~njiiti {bha~njatiiti (sii0), bha~njati (syaa0 ka.m0),  bha~njiiti (pii0)}. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa musaavaadahetu  hananti vaa bandhanti vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karonti.  api nu tumhehi evaruupa.m di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa'''ti? ``di.t.tha~nca no,  bhante, suta~nca suyyissati caa''ti ^a^T3.0235^ea^.
text.1199: [03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu tumhehi di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m  vaa -- `aya.m puriso suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaana.m pahaaya  suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tiviratoti. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa  suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa verama.nihetu hananti vaa bandhanti vaa  pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m ^a^V2.0196^ea^ vaa karontii'ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.  ``saadhu, bhikkhave! mayaapi kho eta.m, bhikkhave, neva di.t.tha.m na suta.m  -- `aya.m puriso suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaana.m pahaaya  suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa ^a^P3.0211^ea^ pa.tiviratoti. tamena.m  raajaano gahetvaa suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa verama.nihetu hananti vaa  bandhanti vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karontii'ti. api ca  khvassa tatheva paapakamma.m pavedenti -- `aya.m puriso  suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaana.m anuyutto itthi.m vaa purisa.m vaa jiivitaa  voropesi {voropeti (syaa0)}; aya.m puriso suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaana.m anuyutto gaamaa vaa  ara~n~naa vaa adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyi {aadiyati (sii0 syaa0)}; aya.m puriso  suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaana.m anuyutto paritthiisu parakumaariisu caaritta.m  aapajji {aapajjati (sii0 syaa0)}; aya.m puriso suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaana.m anuyutto gahapatissa  vaa gahapatiputtassa vaa musaavaadena attha.m pabha~njiiti. tamena.m raajaano  gahetvaa suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanahetu hananti vaa bandhanti vaa  pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karonti. api nu tumhehi evaruupa.m  di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa'''ti? ``di.t.tha~nca no, bhante, suta~nca suyyissati  caa''ti. a.t.thama.m.
text.12: [03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, ottappabala.m? idha, bhikkhave,  ariyasaavako ottappii hoti, ottappati kaayaduccaritena  vaciiduccaritena manoduccaritena, ottappati paapakaana.m akusalaana.m  dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, ottappabala.m.
text.120: [03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, same bhuumibhaage pokkhara.nii catura.msaa  aalibaddhaa puuraa udakassa samatittikaa kaakapeyyaa. tamena.m balavaa  puriso yato yato aali.m mu~nceyya, aagaccheyya udaka''nti? ``eva.m,  bhante''. ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m bhaavite ariye  pa~nca"ngike sammaasamaadhimhi eva.m bahuliikate yassa yassa  abhi~n~naasacchikara.niiyassa dhammassa...pe0... sati sati aayatane.
text.1201: [03] 179^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T3.0236^ea^ ^a^M2.0186^ea^ kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati pa~ncamattehi  upaasakasatehi parivuto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. atha kho bhagavaa  aayasmanta.m saariputta.m aamantesi -- ``ya.m ka~nci {ya.m ki~nci (sii0 pii0)}, saariputta,  jaaneyyaatha gihi.m odaatavasana.m pa~ncasu sikkhaapadesu sa.mvutakammanta.m  catunna.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhi.m  akicchalaabhi.m akasiralaabhi.m, so aaka"nkhamaano attanaava attaana.m  byaakareyya -- `khii.nanirayomhi khii.natiracchaanayoni  khii.napettivisayo khii.naapaayaduggativinipaato, sotaapannohamasmi  avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no'''ti.
text.1202: [03] ``katamesu pa~ncasu sikkhaapadesu sa.mvutakammanto hoti? idha  ^a^P3.0212^ea^, saariputta, ariyasaavako paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato  hoti, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato  hoti, musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa  pa.tivirato hoti. imesu pa~ncasu sikkhaapadesu sa.mvutakammanto hoti.
text.1203: [03] ``katamesa.m ^a^V2.0197^ea^ catunna.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m  nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii? idha, saariputta,  ariyasaavako buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- `itipi so  bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu  anuttaro purisadammasaarathi, satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti.  ayamassa pa.thamo aabhicetasiko di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaro adhigato hoti  avisuddhassa cittassa visuddhiyaa apariyodaatassa cittassa  pariyodapanaaya.
text.1204: [03] ``puna capara.m, saariputta, ariyasaavako dhamme aveccappasaadena  samannaagato hoti ^a^T3.0237^ea^ -- `svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo sandi.t.thiko  akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii'ti.  ayamassa dutiyo aabhicetasiko di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaro adhigato  hoti avisuddhassa cittassa visuddhiyaa apariyodaatassa cittassa  pariyodapanaaya.
text.1205: [03] ``puna ^a^M2.0187^ea^ capara.m, saariputta, ariyasaavako sa"nghe aveccappasaadena  samannaagato hoti -- `suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho  ujuppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho ~naayappa.tipanno bhagavato  saavakasa"ngho saamiicippa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, yadida.m cattaari  purisayugaani a.t.tha purisapuggalaa esa bhagavato saavakasa"ngho aahuneyyo  paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m  lokassaa'ti. ayamassa tatiyo aabhicetasiko di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaro  adhigato hoti ^a^P3.0213^ea^ avisuddhassa cittassa visuddhiyaa  apariyodaatassa cittassa pariyodapanaaya.
text.1206: [03] ``puna capara.m, saariputta, ariyasaavako ariyakantehi siilehi  samannaagato hoti akha.n.dehi acchiddehi asabalehi akammaasehi  bhujissehi vi~n~nuppasatthehi aparaama.t.thehi samaadhisa.mvattanikehi.  ayamassa catuttho aabhicetasiko di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaro adhigato hoti  avisuddhassa cittassa visuddhiyaa apariyodaatassa cittassa  pariyodapanaaya. imesa.m catunna.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m  nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii.
text.1207: [03] ``ya.m ka~nci, saariputta, jaaneyyaatha gihi.m odaatavasana.m --  imesu pa~ncasu sikkhaapadesu sa.mvutakammanta.m, imesa~nca catunna.m  aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhi.m ^a^T3.0238^ea^ akicchalaabhi.m  akasiralaabhi.m, so aaka"nkhamaano attanaava attaana.m byaakareyya --  `khii.nanirayomhi ^a^V2.0198^ea^ khii.natiracchaanayoni khii.napettivisayo  khii.naapaayaduggativinipaato, sotaapannohamasmi avinipaatadhammo  niyato sambodhiparaaya.no'''ti.
text.121: [03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, subhuumiya.m catumahaapathe {caatummahaapathe (sii0 pii0),  catummahaapathe (syaa0 ka.m0)} aaja~n~naratho  yutto assa .thito odhastapatodo ^a^T3.0030^ea^. tamena.m dakkho yoggaacariyo  assadammasaarathi abhiruhitvaa vaamena hatthena rasmiyo gahetvaa  dakkhi.nena hatthena patoda.m gahetvaa yenicchaka.m yadicchaka.m saareyyapi  paccaasaareyyapi. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m bhaavite ariye  pa~nca"ngike sammaasamaadhimhi eva.m bahuliikate yassa yassa  abhi~n~naasacchikara.niiyassa dhammassa citta.m abhininnaameti  abhi~n~naasacchikiriyaaya, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati  sati aayatane.
