text.1239: [03] 180^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M2.0189^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu caarika.m carati  mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m. addasaa kho bhagavaa  addhaanamaggappa.tipanno a~n~natarasmi.m padese mahanta.m saalavana.m;   disvaana {disvaa (sii0 pii0)}  maggaa okkamma {ukkamma (katthaci)} yena ta.m saalavana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m  saalavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m padese sita.m paatvaakaasi.
text.124: [03] ``so sace aka"nkhati -- `parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m cetasaa  ceto paricca pajaaneyya.m -- saraaga.m ^a^V2.0025^ea^ vaa citta.m saraaga.m cittanti  pajaaneyya.m, viitaraaga.m vaa citta.m viitaraaga.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, sadosa.m  vaa citta.m... viitadosa.m vaa citta.m... samoha.m vaa citta.m... viitamoha.m vaa  citta.m... sa.mkhitta.m vaa citta.m... vikkhitta.m vaa citta.m... mahaggata.m vaa  citta.m... amahaggata.m vaa citta.m... sauttara.m vaa citta.m... anuttara.m vaa  citta.m... samaahita.m vaa citta.m... asamaahita.m vaa citta.m... vimutta.m vaa  citta.m... avimutta.m vaa citta.m avimutta.m cittanti pajaaneyya'nti, tatra  tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati aayatane.
text.1240: [03] atha kho aayasmato aanandassa etadahosi -- ``ko ^a^T3.0240^ea^ nu kho  hetu ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa paatukammaaya? na akaara.nena  tathaagataa sita.m paatukarontii''ti. atha kho aayasmaa ^a^V2.0200^ea^ aanando  bhagavanta.m ^a^P3.0215^ea^ etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu  ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa paatukammaaya? na akaara.nena tathaagataa  sita.m paatukarontii''ti.
text.1241: [03] ``bhuutapubba.m, aananda, imasmi.m padese nagara.m ahosi iddha~nceva  phiita~nca bahujana.m aaki.n.namanussa.m. ta.m kho panaananda, nagara.m kassapo  bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho upanissaaya vihaasi. kassapassa kho  panaananda, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa gavesii naama upaasako  ahosi siilesu aparipuurakaarii. gavesinaa kho, aananda, upaasakena  pa~ncamattaani upaasakasataani pa.tidesitaani samaadapitaani {samaadaapitaani (?)} ahesu.m  siilesu aparipuurakaarino. atha kho, aananda, gavesissa upaasakassa  etadahosi -- `aha.m kho imesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaasakasataana.m   bahuupakaaro {bahukaaro (katthaci)}  pubba"ngamo samaadapetaa {samaadaapetaa (?)}, aha~ncamhi siilesu aparipuurakaarii, imaani ca  pa~nca upaasakasataani siilesu aparipuurakaarino. icceta.m samasama.m,  natthi ki~nci atireka.m; handaaha.m atirekaayaa'''ti.
text.1242: [03] ``atha kho, aananda, gavesii upaasako yena taani pa~nca  upaasakasataani tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa taani pa~nca  upaasakasataani etadavoca -- `ajjatagge ma.m aayasmanto siilesu  paripuurakaari.m dhaarethaa'ti! atha kho, aananda, tesa.m pa~ncanna.m  upaasakasataana.m etadahosi -- `ayyo kho gavesii amhaaka.m bahuupakaaro  pubba"ngamo samaadapetaa ^a^T3.0241^ea^. ayyo hi naama gavesii ^a^M2.0190^ea^ siilesu paripuurakaarii  bhavissati. kima"nga.m {kima"nga (sii0 pii0)} pana maya'nti {pana na mayanti  (sii0) a0 ni0  4.159; cuu.lava0 330; sa.m0 ni0  5.1020   paa.liyaa sa.msandetabba.m}! atha kho, aananda, taani  pa~nca upaasakasataani yena gavesii upaasako tenupasa"nkami.msu;  upasa"nkamitvaa gavesi.m upaasaka.m etadavocu.m -- `ajjatagge ayyo gavesii  imaanipi pa~nca upaasakasataani siilesu paripuurakaarino dhaaretuu'ti.  atha kho, aananda, gavesissa upaasakassa etadahosi -- `aha.m kho  imesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaasakasataana.m bahuupakaaro pubba"ngamo samaadapetaa,  aha~ncamhi siilesu paripuurakaarii, imaanipi pa~nca upaasakasataani  siilesu paripuurakaarino ^a^P3.0216^ea^. icceta.m samasama.m, natthi  ki~nci atireka.m; handaaha.m atirekaayaa'''ti!
text.1243: [03] ``atha kho, aananda, gavesii upaasako yena taani pa~nca  upaasakasataani tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa taani pa~nca  upaasakasataani etadavoca -- `ajjatagge ma.m aayasmanto brahmacaari.m  dhaaretha aaraacaari {anaacaari.m (pii0)} virata.m methunaa gaamadhammaa'ti. atha kho, aananda,  tesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaasakasataana.m ^a^V2.0201^ea^ etadahosi -- `ayyo kho gavesii  amhaaka.m bahuupakaaro pubba"ngamo samaadapetaa. ayyo hi naama gavesii  brahmacaarii bhavissati aaraacaarii virato methunaa gaamadhammaa. kima"nga.m  pana maya'nti! atha kho, aananda, taani pa~nca upaasakasataani yena  gavesii upaasako tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa gavesi.m upaasaka.m  etadavocu.m -- `ajjatagge ayyo gavesii imaanipi pa~nca ^a^T2.0242^ea^  upaasakasataani brahmacaarino dhaaretu aaraacaarino virataa methunaa  gaamadhammaa'ti. atha kho, aananda, gavesissa upaasakassa etadahosi  -- `aha.m kho imesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaasakasataana.m bahuupakaaro pubba"ngamo  samaadapetaa. aha~ncamhi siilesu paripuurakaarii. imaanipi pa~nca  upaasakasataani siilesu paripuurakaarino. aha~ncamhi brahmacaarii  aaraacaarii virato methunaa gaamadhammaa. imaanipi pa~nca  upaasakasataani brahmacaarino aaraacaarino virataa methunaa gaamadhammaa.  icceta.m samasama.m, natthi ki~nci atireka.m; handaaha.m atirekaayaa'''ti.
text.1244: [03] ``atha kho, aananda, gavesii upaasako yena taani pa~nca  upaasakasataani tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa taani pa~nca  upaasakasataani etadavoca -- `ajjatagge ma.m aayasmanto ekabhattika.m  dhaaretha rattuuparata.m virata.m ^a^M2.0191^ea^ vikaalabhojanaa'ti. atha kho, aananda, tesa.m  pa~ncanna.m upaasakasataana.m etadahosi -- `ayyo kho gavesii bahuupakaaro  pubba"ngamo samaadapetaa. ayyo hi naama gavesii ekabhattiko  bhavissati rattuuparato virato vikaalabhojanaa. kima"nga.m pana maya'nti!  atha kho, aananda, taani pa~nca upaasakasataani yena gavesii  upaasako tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa gavesi.m upaasaka.m etadavocu.m  ^a^P3.0217^ea^ -- `ajjatagge ayyo gavesii imaanipi pa~nca  upaasakasataani ekabhattike dhaaretu rattuuparate virate vikaalabhojanaa'ti.  atha kho, aananda, gavesissa upaasakassa etadahosi -- `aha.m  kho imesa.m pa~ncanna.m ^a^T3.0243^ea^ upaasakasataana.m bahuupakaaro pubba"ngamo samaadapetaa.  aha~ncamhi siilesu paripuurakaarii. imaanipi pa~nca upaasakasataani  siilesu paripuurakaarino. aha~ncamhi brahmacaarii aaraacaarii virato  methunaa gaamadhammaa. imaanipi pa~nca upaasakasataani brahmacaarino  aaraacaarino virataa methunaa gaamadhammaa. aha~ncamhi ekabhattiko  rattuuparato virato vikaalabhojanaa. imaanipi pa~nca upaasakasataani  ekabhattikaa rattuuparataa virataa vikaalabhojanaa. icceta.m samasama.m,  natthi ki~nci atireka.m; handaaha.m atirekaayaa'''ti.
text.1245: [03] ``atha kho, aananda, gavesii upaasako yena kassapo bhagavaa  araha.m sammaasambuddho tenupasa"nkami ^a^V2.0202^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa kassapa.m bhagavanta.m  arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m etadavoca -- `labheyyaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato  santike pabbajja.m labheyya.m upasampada'nti. alattha kho, aananda,  gavesii upaasako kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa  santike pabbajja.m, alattha upasampada.m. aciruupasampanno kho panaananda,  gavesii bhikkhu eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto  nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m  pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m  abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m  brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti abbha~n~naasi.  a~n~nataro ca panaananda, gavesii bhikkhu arahata.m ahosi.
text.1246: [03] ``atha ^a^T3.0244^ea^ kho, aananda, tesa pa~ncanna.m upaasakasataana.m etadahosi  -- `ayyo kho gavesii amhaaka.m bahuupakaaro pubba"ngamo samaadapetaa.  ayyo hi naama gavesii kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani  acchaadetvaa ^a^M2.0192^ea^ agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissati. kima"nga.m pana  maya'nti! atha kho, aananda, taani pa~nca upaasakasataani yena  kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho tenupasa"nkami.msu ^a^P3.0218^ea^;  upasa"nkamitvaa kassapa.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m  etadavocu.m -- `labheyyaama maya.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m,  labheyyaama upasampada'nti. alabhi.msu kho, aananda, taani pa~nca  upaasakasataani kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa santike  pabbajja.m, alabhi.msu upasampada.m.
text.1247: [03] ``atha kho, aananda, gavesissa bhikkhuno etadahosi --  `aha.m kho imassa anuttarassa vimuttisukhassa nikaamalaabhii homi  akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii. aho vatimaanipi pa~nca bhikkhusataani  imassa anuttarassa vimuttisukhassa nikaamalaabhino assu  akicchalaabhino akasiralaabhino'ti. atha kho, aananda, taani  pa~nca bhikkhusataani vuupaka.t.thaa {bhikkhusataani ekekaa vuupaka.t.thaa (syaa0 ka.m0)} appamattaa   aataapino pahitattaa viharantaa  nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m  pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m  abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihari.msu. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m  brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti abbha~n~ni.msu''.
text.1248: [03] ``iti kho ^a^T3.0245^ea^, aananda, taani pa~nca bhikkhusataani  gavesiipamukhaani uttaruttari {uttaruttari.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}   pa.niitapa.niita.m ^a^V2.0203^ea^ vaayamamaanaa anuttara.m vimutti.m  sacchaaka.msu. tasmaatiha, aananda, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `uttaruttari  pa.niitapa.niita.m vaayamamaanaa anuttara.m vimutti.m sacchikarissaamaa'ti.  eva~nhi vo, aananda, sikkhitabba''nti. dasama.m.
text.125: [03] ``so sace aaka"nkhati -- `anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m  anussareyya.m, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m, dvepi jaatiyo...pe0...  iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussareyya'nti, tatra  tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati aayatane.
text.1252: [22] piiti va.nijjaa raajaano, gihii ceva gavesinaati..
text.1255: [03] 181^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^V2.0204^ea^ ^a^M2.0193^ea^, bhikkhave,   aara~n~nikaa {aara~n~nataa (sabbattha) pari0 443 passitabba.m}. katame  pa~nca? mandattaa momuuhattaa aara~n~niko hoti, paapiccho icchaapakato  aara~n~niko hoti, ummaadaa cittakkhepaa aara~n~niko hoti, va.n.nita.m  buddhehi buddhasaavakehiiti aara~n~niko hoti, appicchata.myeva nissaaya  santu.t.thi.myeva nissaaya sallekha.myeva nissaaya paviveka.myeva nissaaya  idamatthita.myeva {idama.t.thita.myeva (sii0 pii0)} nissaaya aara~n~niko hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave,  pa~nca aara~n~nikaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m aara~n~nikaana.m  yvaaya.m aara~n~niko appicchata.myeva nissaaya santu.t.thi.myeva nissaaya  sallekha.myeva nissaaya paviveka.myeva nissaaya idamatthita.myeva nissaaya  aara~n~niko hoti, aya.m ^a^T3.0246^ea^ imesa.m pa~ncanna.m aara~n~nikaana.m aggo ca se.t.tho  ca mokkho {paamokkho (a0 ni0  4.95;  10.91)} ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
text.1256: [03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, gavaa khiira.m, khiiramhaa dadhi, dadhimhaa  navaniita.m, navaniitamhaa sappi, sappimhaa sappima.n.do, sappima.n.do {sappimhaa  sappima.n.do (ka0) sa.m0 ni0  3.662} tattha  aggamakkhaayati; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, imesa.m pa~ncanna.m aara~n~nikaana.m  yvaaya.m aara~n~niko appicchata.myeva nissaaya santu.t.thi.myeva nissaaya  sallekha.myeva nissaaya paviveka.myeva nissaaya idamatthita.myeva nissaaya  aara~n~niko hoti, aya.m imesa.m pa~ncanna.m aara~n~nikaana.m aggo ca se.t.tho  ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro caa''ti. pa.thama.m.
text.1258: [03] 182^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^V2.0205^ea^, bhikkhave, pa.msukuulikaa. katame  pa~nca? mandattaa momuuhattaa pa.msukuuliko hoti...pe0... idamatthita.myeva  nissaaya pa.msukuuliko hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca  pa.msukuulikaa''ti. dutiya.m.
text.126: [03] ``so sace aaka"nkhati -- `dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena  atikkantamaanusakena...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaaneyya'nti, tatra  tatreva ^a^T3.0031^ea^ sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati aayatane.
text.1260: [03] 183^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, rukkhamuulikaa. katame  pa~nca? mandattaa momuuhattaa rukkhamuuliko hoti...pe0...  idamatthita.myeva nissaaya rukkhamuuliko hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave,  pa~nca rukkhamuulikaa''ti. tatiya.m.
text.1262: [03] 184^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^M2.0194^ea^ ^a^P3.0220^ea^, bhikkhave,  sosaanikaa. katame pa~nca? mandattaa momuuhattaa sosaaniko  hoti...pe0... idamatthita.myeva nissaaya sosaaniko hoti. ime  kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca sosaanikaa''ti. catuttha.m.
text.127: [03] ``so sace aaka"nkhati -- `aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m  cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa  upasampajja vihareyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati  sati aayatane''ti. a.t.thama.m.
text.1274: [03] 190^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, pattapi.n.dikaa. katame  pa~nca? mandattaa momuuhattaa pattapi.n.diko hoti, paapiccho icchaapakato  pattapi.n.diko hoti, ummaadaa cittakkhepaa pattapi.n.diko hoti,  `va.n.nita.m buddhehi buddhasaavakehii'ti pattapi.n.diko hoti, appicchata.myeva  nissaaya ^a^T3.0247^ea^ santu.t.thi.myeva nissaaya sallekha.myeva nissaaya paviveka.myeva  nissaaya idamatthita.myeva nissaaya pattapi.n.diko hoti. ime kho,  bhikkhave, pa~nca pattapi.n.dikaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m  pattapi.n.dikaana.m yvaaya.m pattapi.n.diko appicchata.myeva nissaaya santu.t.thi.myeva  nissaaya sallekha.myeva ^a^M2.0195^ea^ nissaaya paviveka.myeva nissaaya idamatthita.myeva  nissaaya pattapi.n.diko hoti, aya.m imesa.m pa~ncanna.m pattapi.n.dikaana.m  aggo ca se.t.tho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
text.1275: [03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, gavaa khiira.m, khiiramhaa dadhi, dadhimhaa  navaniita.m, navaniitamhaa sappi, sappimhaa sappima.n.do, sappima.n.do tattha  aggamakkhaayati; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, imesa.m pa~ncanna.m pattapi.n.dikaana.m  yvaaya.m pattapi.n.diko appicchata.myeva ^a^P3.0221^ea^ nissaaya  santu.t.thi.myeva nissaaya sallekha.myeva nissaaya paviveka.myeva nissaaya  idamatthita.myeva nissaaya pattapi.n.diko hoti, aya.m imesa.m pa~ncanna.m  pattapi.n.dikaana.m aggo ca se.t.tho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro  caa''ti. dasama.m.
text.1282: [03] 191^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^V2.0207^ea^, bhikkhave, poraa.naa braahma.nadhammaa  etarahi sunakhesu sandissanti, no braahma.nesu. katame pa~nca? pubbe  suda.m {pubbassuda.m (ka0)}, bhikkhave, braahma.naa braahma.ni.myeva gacchanti, no abraahma.ni.m.  etarahi, bhikkhave, braahma.naa braahma.nimpi gacchanti, abraahma.nimpi  gacchanti. etarahi, bhikkhave, sunakhaa sunakhi.myeva gacchanti, no  asunakhi.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo poraa.no braahma.nadhammo etarahi  sunakhesu sandissati, no braahma.nesu.
text.1283: [03] ``pubbe suda.m, bhikkhave, braahma.naa braahma.ni.m utuni.myeva gacchanti,  no anutuni.m. etarahi, bhikkhave, braahma.naa ^a^P3.0222^ea^  braahma.ni.m utunimpi gacchanti, anutunimpi gacchanti ^a^M2.0196^ea^. etarahi,  bhikkhave, sunakhaa sunakhi.m utuni.myeva gacchanti, no anutuni.m. aya.m,  bhikkhave, dutiyo poraa.no braahma.nadhammo etarahi sunakhesu  sandissati, no braahma.nesu.
text.1284: [03] ``pubbe suda.m, bhikkhave, braahma.naa braahma.ni.m neva ki.nanti no  vikki.nanti, sampiyeneva sa.mvaasa.m sa.mbandhaaya {sa.msaggatthaaya (sii0 pii0)} sa.mpavattenti. etarahi,  bhikkhave, braahma.naa braahma.ni.m ki.nantipi vikki.nantipi, sampiyenapi  sa.mvaasa.m sa.mbandhaaya sa.mpavattenti. etarahi, bhikkhave, sunakhaa sunakhi.m  neva ki.nanti no vikki.nanti, sampiyeneva sa.mvaasa.m sa.mbandhaaya  sa.mpavattenti. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo poraa.no braahma.nadhammo etarahi  sunakhesu sandissati, no braahma.nesu.
text.1285: [03] ``pubbe suda.m, bhikkhave, braahma.naa na sannidhi.m karonti  dhanassapi ^a^T3.0249^ea^ dha~n~nassapi rajatassapi jaataruupassapi. etarahi,  bhikkhave, braahma.naa sannidhi.m karonti dhanassapi dha~n~nassapi rajatassapi  jaataruupassapi. etarahi, bhikkhave, sunakhaa na sannidhi.m karonti  dhanassapi dha~n~nassapi rajatassapi jaataruupassapi. aya.m, bhikkhave,  catuttho poraa.no braahma.nadhammo etarahi sunakhesu sandissati, no  braahma.nesu.
text.1286: [03] ``pubbe ^a^V2.0208^ea^ suda.m, bhikkhave, braahma.naa saaya.m saayamaasaaya paato  paataraasaaya bhikkha.m pariyesanti. etarahi, bhikkhave, braahma.naa  yaavadattha.m udaraavadehaka.m bhu~njitvaa avasesa.m aadaaya pakkamanti.  etarahi, bhikkhave, sunakhaa saaya.m saayamaasaaya paato paataraasaaya  bhikkha.m pariyesanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo poraa.no braahma.nadhammo  etarahi sunakhesu sandissati, no braahma.nesu. ime kho, bhikkhave,  pa~nca poraa.naa braahma.nadhammaa etarahi sunakhesu sandissanti, no  braahma.nesuu''ti. pa.thama.m.
text.1288: [03] 192^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P3.0223^ea^ kho do.no braahma.no  yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi.  sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.  ekamanta.m nisinno kho do.no braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca --
text.1289: [03] ``suta.m ^a^M2.0197^ea^ meta.m, bho gotama -- `na sama.no gotamo braahma.ne  ji.n.ne vu.d.dhe mahallake addhagate vayoanuppatte abhivaadeti vaa paccu.t.theti  vaa aasanena vaa nimantetii'ti. tayida.m, bho gotama, tatheva. na  hi bhava.m gotamo braahma.ne ji.n.ne vu.d.dhe mahallake addhagate vayoanuppatte  abhivaadeti vaa paccu.t.theti vaa ^a^T3.0250^ea^ aasanena vaa nimanteti. tayida.m, bho  gotama, na sampannamevaa''ti. ``tvampi no, do.na, braahma.no  pa.tijaanaasii''ti? ``ya~nhi ta.m, bho gotama, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya  -- `braahma.no ubhato sujaato -- maatito ca pitito ca,  sa.msuddhagaha.niko, yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhito anupakku.t.tho  jaativaadena, ajjhaayako mantadharo, ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu  sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m itihaasapa~ncamaana.m, padako  veyyaakara.no lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu anavayo'ti, mameva ta.m, bho  gotama, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya. aha~nhi, bho gotama, braahma.no  ubhato sujaato -- maatito ca pitito ca, sa.msuddhagaha.niko, yaava  sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena, ajjhaayako  mantadharo, ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m  itihaasapa~ncamaana.m, padako veyyaakara.no lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu  anavayo''ti.
text.129: [03] 29^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, ca"nkame aanisa.msaa.  katame pa~nca? addhaanakkhamo ^a^P3.0030^ea^ hoti, padhaanakkhamo  hoti, appaabaadho hoti, asita.m piita.m khaayita.m saayita.m sammaa  pari.naama.m gacchati, ca"nkamaadhigato samaadhi cira.t.thitiko hoti. ime  kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca ca"nkame aanisa.msaa''ti. navama.m.
text.1290: [03] ``ye kho, te do.na, braahma.naana.m pubbakaa ^a^P3.0224^ea^  isayo mantaana.m kattaaro mantaana.m pavattaaro, yesamida.m ^a^V2.0209^ea^ etarahi braahma.naa  poraa.na.m mantapada.m giita.m pavutta.m samihita.m tadanugaayanti tadanubhaasanti  bhaasitamanubhaasanti sajjhaayitamanusajjhaayanti vaacitamanuvaacenti,  seyyathida.m -- a.t.thako, vaamako, vaamadevo, vessaamitto,   yamadaggi {yamataggi (sii0) dii0 ni0 1.284, 526, 536; ma0 ni0 2.427;  mahaava0 300; a0 ni0  5.192 passitabba.m},  a"ngiiraso, bhaaradvaajo, vaase.t.tho, kassapo, bhagu; tyaassu'me pa~nca  braahma.ne pa~n~naapenti -- brahmasama.m, devasama.m, mariyaada.m, sambhinnamariyaada.m,  braahma.naca.n.daala.myeva pa~ncama.m. tesa.m tva.m do.na, katamo''ti?
text.1291: [03] ``na kho maya.m, bho gotama, pa~nca braahma.ne jaanaama, atha kho  maya.m braahma.naatveva ^a^T3.0251^ea^ jaanaama. saadhu me bhava.m gotamo tathaa dhamma.m desetu  yathaa aha.m ime pa~nca braahma.ne jaaneyya''nti. ``tena hi, braahma.na,  su.nohi, saadhuka.m ^a^M2.0198^ea^ manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m bho''ti  kho do.no braahma.no bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.1292: [03] ``katha~nca, do.na, braahma.no brahmasamo hoti? idha, do.na,  braahma.no ubhato sujaato hoti -- maatito ca pitito ca,  sa.msuddhagaha.niko, yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho  jaativaadena. so a.t.thacattaaliisavassaani komaarabrahmacariya.m {kodhaara.m brahmacariya.m  (syaa0 ka0)} carati  mante adhiiyamaano. a.t.thacattaaliisavassaani komaarabrahmacariya.m caritvaa  mante adhiiyitvaa aacariyassa aacariyadhana.m pariyesati dhammeneva, no  adhammena.
text.1293: [03] ``tattha ca, do.na, ko dhammo? neva ^a^P3.0225^ea^  kasiyaa na va.nijjaaya na gorakkhena na issatthena {na issattena (ka0)} na raajaporisena na  sippa~n~natarena, kevala.m bhikkhaacariyaaya kapaala.m anatima~n~namaano. so  aacariyassa aacariyadhana.m niyyaadetvaa {niiyyaadetvaa (sii0), niiyaadetvaa (pii0),  niyyaatetvaa (katthaci)} kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa  kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati.  so eva.m pabbajito samaano mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa  viharati, tathaa dutiya.m tathaa tatiya.m tathaa catuttha.m {catutthi.m (sii0)}, iti uddhamadho  tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa  vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena {abyaapajjhena (ka0)  abyaabajjhena (?)} pharitvaa viharati.  karu.naa...pe0... muditaa... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m  pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m tathaa tatiya.m tathaa catuttha.m ^a^T3.0252^ea^, iti  uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m  upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena  abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharati. so ime cattaaro ^a^V2.0210^ea^ brahmavihaare bhaavetvaa  kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m brahmaloka.m upapajjati. eva.m kho,  do.na, braahma.no brahmasamo hoti.
text.1294: [03] ``katha~nca, do.na, braahma.no devasamo hoti? idha, do.na,  braahma.no ubhato sujaato hoti -- maatito ca pitito ca,  sa.msuddhagaha.niko, yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho  jaativaadena ^a^M2.0199^ea^. so a.t.thacattaaliisavassaani komaarabrahmacariya.m carati  mante adhiiyamaano. a.t.thacattaaliisavassaani komaarabrahmacariya.m caritvaa  mante adhiiyitvaa aacariyassa aacariyadhana.m pariyesati dhammeneva, no  adhammena. tattha ca, do.na, ko dhammo? neva kasiyaa na  va.nijjaaya na gorakkhena na issatthena na raajaporisena na  sippa~n~natarena, kevala.m bhikkhaacariyaaya kapaala.m ^a^P3.0226^ea^  anatima~n~namaano. so aacariyassa aacariyadhana.m niyyaadetvaa daara.m  pariyesati dhammeneva, no adhammena.
text.1295: [03] ``tattha ca, do.na, ko dhammo? neva kayena na vikkayena,  braahma.ni.myeva udakuupassa.t.tha.m. so braahma.ni.myeva gacchati, na khattiyi.m na  vessi.m na suddi.m na ca.n.daali.m na nesaadi.m na veni.m {na ve.ni.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  pii0)} na rathakaari.m na  pukkusi.m gacchati, na gabbhini.m gacchati, na paayamaana.m gacchati, na  anutuni.m gacchati. kasmaa ca, do.na, braahma.no na gabbhini.m gacchati?  sace, do.na, braahma.no gabbhini.m gacchati, atimii.lhajo naama so  hoti maa.navako vaa maa.navikaa {maa.navakii (ka0)} vaa ^a^T3.0253^ea^. tasmaa, do.na, braahma.no na  gabbhini.m gacchati. kasmaa ca, do.na, braahma.no na paayamaana.m gacchati?  sace, do.na, braahma.no paayamaana.m gacchati, asucipa.tipii.lito naama  so hoti maa.navako vaa maa.navikaa vaa. tasmaa, do.na, braahma.no na  paayamaana.m gacchati. tassa saa hoti braahma.nii neva kaamatthaa na  davatthaa na ratatthaa, pajatthaava braahma.nassa braahma.nii hoti. so methuna.m  uppaadetvaa kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa  agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati. so eva.m pabbajito samaano  vivicceva kaamehi...pe0...   catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so ime  cattaaro jhaane ^a^V2.0211^ea^ bhaavetvaa kaayassa bhedaa ^a^P3.0227^ea^ para.m mara.naa  sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. eva.m kho, do.na, braahma.no devasamo  hoti.
text.1296: [03] ``katha~nca, do.na, braahma.no mariyaado hoti? idha, do.na,  braahma.no ubhato sujaato hoti -- maatito ca pitito ca,  sa.msuddhagaha.niko, yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho  jaativaadena. so a.t.thacattaaliisavassaani komaarabrahmacariya.m carati  mante adhiiyamaano. a.t.thacattaaliisavassaani komaarabrahmacariya.m caritvaa  mante adhiiyitvaa aacariyassa aacariyadhana.m pariyesati dhammeneva, no  adhammena ^a^M2.0200^ea^. tattha ca, do.na, ko dhammo? neva kasiyaa na  va.nijjaaya na gorakkhena na issatthena na raajaporisena na  sippa~n~natarena, kevala.m bhikkhaacariyaaya kapaala.m anatima~n~namaano. so  aacariyassa aacariyadhana.m niyyaadetvaa daara.m pariyesati dhammeneva, no  adhammena.
text.1297: [03] ``tattha ca, do.na ^a^T3.0254^ea^, ko dhammo? neva kayena na vikkayena,  braahma.ni.myeva udakuupassa.t.tha.m. so braahma.ni.myeva gacchati, na khattiyi.m na  vessi.m na suddi.m na ca.n.daali.m na nesaadi.m na veni.m na rathakaari.m na  pukkusi.m gacchati, na gabbhini.m gacchati, na paayamaana.m gacchati, na  anutuni.m gacchati. kasmaa ca, do.na, braahma.no na gabbhini.m gacchati?  sace, do.na, braahma.no gabbhini.m gacchati, atimii.lhajo naama so  hoti maa.navako vaa maa.navikaa vaa. tasmaa, do.na, braahma.no na  gabbhini.m gacchati. kasmaa ca, do.na, braahma.no na paayamaana.m gacchati?  sace, do.na, braahma.no paayamaana.m gacchati, asucipa.tipii.lito naama  so hoti maa.navako vaa maa.navikaa vaa. tasmaa, do.na, braahma.no na  paayamaana.m gacchati. tassa saa hoti braahma.nii neva kaamatthaa na  davatthaa na ratatthaa, pajatthaava braahma.nassa braahma.nii hoti. so methuna.m  uppaadetvaa tameva puttassaada.m nikaamayamaano ku.tumba.m ajjhaavasati, na  agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati. yaava poraa.naana.m braahma.naana.m  mariyaado tattha ti.t.thati, ta.m na viitikkamati. `yaava poraa.naana.m  braahma.naana.m mariyaado tattha braahma.no .thito ta.m na viitikkamatii'ti, kho,  do.na, tasmaa braahma.no mariyaadoti vuccati. eva.m kho, do.na,  braahma.no mariyaado hoti.
text.1298: [03] ``katha~nca, do.na, braahma.no sambhinnamariyaado hoti? idha  ^a^P3.0228^ea^, do.na, braahma.no ubhato sujaato hoti -- maatito  ca pitito ca, sa.msuddhagaha.niko, yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto  ^a^V2.0212^ea^ anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena ^a^T3.0255^ea^. so a.t.thacattaaliisavassaani komaarabrahmacariya.m  carati mante adhiiyamaano. a.t.thacattaaliisavassaani komaarabrahmacariya.m  caritvaa mante adhiiyitvaa aacariyassa aacariyadhana.m pariyesati  dhammeneva, no adhammena.
text.1299: [03] ``tattha ca, do.na, ko dhammo? neva kasiyaa na va.nijjaaya  na gorakkhena na issatthena na raajaporisena na sippa~n~natarena, kevala.m  bhikkhaacariyaaya kapaala.m anatima~n~namaano. so aacariyassa  aacariyadhana.m niyyaadetvaa daara.m ^a^M2.0201^ea^ pariyesati dhammenapi adhammenapi  kayenapi vikkayenapi braahma.nimpi udakuupassa.t.tha.m. so braahma.nimpi  gacchati khattiyimpi gacchati vessimpi gacchati suddimpi gacchati  ca.n.daalimpi gacchati nesaadimpi gacchati venimpi gacchati  rathakaarimpi gacchati pukkusimpi gacchati gabbhinimpi gacchati  paayamaanampi gacchati utunimpi gacchati anutunimpi gacchati. tassa  saa hoti braahma.nii kaamatthaapi davatthaapi ratatthaapi pajatthaapi  braahma.nassa braahma.nii hoti. yaava poraa.naana.m braahma.naana.m mariyaado tattha  na ti.t.thati, ta.m viitikkamati. `yaava poraa.naana.m braahma.naana.m mariyaado  tattha braahma.no na .thito ta.m viitikkamatii'ti kho, do.na, tasmaa braahma.no  sambhinnamariyaadoti vuccati. eva.m kho, do.na, braahma.no  sambhinnamariyaado hoti.
text.13: [03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, viiriyabala.m? idha, bhikkhave,  ariyasaavako aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya,  kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro  kusalesu dhammesu. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, viiriyabala.m.
text.1300: [01] ``katha~nca, do.na, braahma.no braahma.naca.n.daalo hoti?  idha, do.na, braahma.no ubhato sujaato hoti -- maatito ca pitito  ca, sa.msuddhagaha.niko, yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto ^a^T3.0256^ea^ anupakku.t.tho  jaativaadena. so a.t.thacattaaliisavassaani ^a^P3.0229^ea^  komaarabrahmacariya.m carati mante adhiiyamaano. a.t.thacattaaliisavassaani  komaarabrahmacariya.m caritvaa mante adhiiyitvaa aacariyassa aacariyadhana.m  pariyesati dhammenapi adhammenapi kasiyaapi va.nijjaayapi gorakkhenapi  issatthenapi raajaporisenapi sippa~n~natarenapi, kevalampi  bhikkhaacariyaaya, kapaala.m anatima~n~namaano.
text.1301: [01] ``so aacariyassa aacariyadhana.m niyyaadetvaa daara.m  pariyesati dhammenapi adhammenapi kayenapi vikkayenapi braahma.nimpi  udakuupassa.t.tha.m. so braahma.nimpi gacchati khattiyimpi gacchati  vessimpi gacchati suddimpi gacchati ca.n.daalimpi gacchati nesaadimpi  gacchati venimpi gacchati rathakaarimpi gacchati pukkusimpi gacchati  gabbhinimpi gacchati paayamaanampi gacchati utunimpi gacchati  anutunimpi gacchati. tassa saa hoti braahma.nii kaamatthaapi  davatthaapi ratatthaapi pajatthaapi braahma.nassa ^a^V2.0213^ea^ braahma.nii hoti. so  sabbakammehi jiivika.m {jiivita.m (ka0)} kappeti. tamena.m braahma.naa evamaaha.msu -- `kasmaa  bhava.m braahma.no pa.tijaanamaano sabbakammehi jiivika.m kappetii'ti? so  evamaaha -- `seyyathaapi, bho, aggi sucimpi .dahati asucimpi  .dahati, na ca tena aggi upalippati {upalimpati (ka0)}; evameva.m kho, bho, sabbakammehi  cepi braahma.no jiivika.m kappeti, na ca tena braahma.no upalippati'.  `sabbakammehi jiivika.m kappetii'ti kho, do.na ^a^M2.0202^ea^, tasmaa braahma.no  braahma.naca.n.daaloti vuccati. eva.m kho, do.na, braahma.no braahma.naca.n.daalo  hoti.
text.1302: [03] ``ye kho te, do.na, braahma.naana.m pubbakaa ^a^T3.0257^ea^ isayo mantaana.m  kattaaro mantaana.m pavattaaro yesamida.m etarahi braahma.naa poraa.na.m mantapada.m  giita.m pavutta.m samiihita.m tadanugaayanti tadanubhaasanti bhaasitamanubhaasanti  sajjhaayitamanusajjhaayanti vaacimanuvaacenti, seyyathida.m -- a.t.thako,  vaamako, vaamadevo, vessaamitto, yamadaggi, a"ngiiraso, bhaaradvaajo,  vaase.t.tho ^a^P3.0230^ea^, kassapo, bhagu; tyaassume pa~nca braahma.ne  pa~n~naapenti -- brahmasama.m, devasama.m, mariyaada.m, sambhinnamariyaada.m,  braahma.naca.n.daala.myeva pa~ncama.m. tesa.m tva.m, do.na, katamo''ti?
text.1303: [01] ``eva.m sante maya.m, bho gotama, braahma.naca.n.daalampi na  puurema. abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo  dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. dutiya.m.
text.1305: [03] 193^b^.^eb^ atha kho sa"ngaaravo braahma.no yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m  katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno  kho sa"ngaaravo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bho  gotama, hetu ko paccayo, yena kadaaci diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa  nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa? ko pana, bho gotama, hetu ko  paccayo, yena kadaaci diigharatta.m asajjhaayakataapi mantaa pa.tibhanti,  pageva sajjhaayakataa''ti?
text.1306: [03] ``yasmi.m, braahma.na, samaye kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati  kaamaraagaparetena, uppannassa ca kaamaraagassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m  nappajaanaati ^a^V2.0214^ea^, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na  passati, paratthampi tasmi.m ^a^T3.0258^ea^ samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati,  ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, diigharatta.m  sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa.  seyyathaapi, braahma.na, udapatto sa.msa.t.tho laakhaaya vaa haliddiyaa vaa  niiliyaa vaa ma~nji.t.thaaya vaa. tattha cakkhumaa puriso saka.m ^a^P3.0231^ea^  mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano yathaabhuuta.m nappajaaneyya  ^a^M2.0203^ea^ na passeyya. evameva.m kho, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena  cetasaa viharati kaamaraagaparetena, uppannassa ca kaamaraagassa nissara.na.m  yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati  na passati, paratthampi...pe0... ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m  nappajaanaati na passati, diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti,  pageva asajjhaayakataa.
text.1307: [03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye byaapaadapariyu.t.thitena  cetasaa viharati byaapaadaparetena, uppannassa ca byaapaadassa nissara.na.m  yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati  na passati, paratthampi...pe0... ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m  nappajaanaati na passati, diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti,  pageva asajjhaayakataa. seyyathaapi, braahma.na, udapatto agginaa  santatto ukkudhito {ukka.t.thito (sii0 pii0), ukku.t.thito (syaa0 ka.m0)}   ussadakajaato {usumakajaato (katthaci), ussurakajaato (ka0), usmudakajaato  (ma0 ni0 3 majjhimanikaaye)}. tattha cakkhumaa puriso saka.m  mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano yathaabhuuta.m nappajaaneyya na passeyya.  evameva.m kho, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye byaapaadapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa  viharati byaapaadaparetena, uppannassa ca byaapaadassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m  nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na  passati, paratthampi...pe0... ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m  nappajaanaati na passati, diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti ^a^T3.0259^ea^,  pageva asajjhaayakataa.
text.1308: [03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye thinamiddhapariyu.t.thitena  cetasaa viharati thinamiddhaparetena, uppannassa ca thinamiddhassa  nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m  nappajaanaati na passati, paratthampi...pe0... ubhayatthampi tasmi.m  samaye yathaabhuuta.m ^a^P3.0232^ea^ nappajaanaati na passati, diigharatta.m  sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa.  seyyathaapi, braahma.na, udapatto sevaalapa.nakapariyonaddho. tattha  cakkhumaa puriso saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano yathaabhuuta.m  nappajaaneyya na passeyya. evameva.m kho, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye  thinamiddhapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati thinamiddhaparetena, uppannassa ca  thinamiddhassa ^a^V2.0215^ea^ nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m  ^a^M2.0204^ea^ samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, paratthampi...pe0...  ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, diigharatta.m  sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa.
text.1309: [03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye uddhaccakukkuccapariyu.t.thitena  cetasaa viharati uddhaccakukkuccaparetena, uppannassa ca uddhaccakukkuccassa  nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m  nappajaanaati na passati, paratthampi...pe0... ubhayatthampi tasmi.m  samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi  mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa. seyyathaapi, braahma.na,  udapatto vaaterito calito bhanto uumijaato {ummijaato (pii0)}. tattha cakkhumaa  puriso saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano yathaabhuuta.m nappajaaneyya na  passeyya. evameva.m kho, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye  uddhaccakukkuccapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati uddhaccakukkuccaparetena,  uppannassa ca uddhaccakukkuccassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati,  attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati,  paratthampi...pe0... ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na  passati, diigharatta.m ^a^P3.0233^ea^ sajjhaayakataapi mantaa  nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa.
text.131: [03] 30^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M2.0025^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu  caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m yena icchaana"ngala.m naama  kosalaana.m braahma.nagaamo tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa ^a^V2.0026^ea^ icchaana"ngale  viharati icchaana"ngalavanasa.n.de. assosu.m kho icchaana"ngalakaa  {icchaana"ngalikaa (sii0) a0 ni0  6.42; a0 ni0  8.86} braahma.nagahapatikaa -- ``sama.no  khalu bho gotamo sakyaputto  sakyakulaa pabbajito icchaana"ngala.m anuppatto; icchaana"ngale viharati  icchaana"ngalavanasa.n.de. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no  kittisaddo abbhuggato -- itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho  vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi,  satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m  samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m  pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m ^a^T3.0032^ea^  brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m  hotii''ti. atha kho icchaana"ngalakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa tassaa rattiyaa  accayena pahuuta.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m aadaaya yena icchaana"ngalavanasa.n.do  tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bahidvaarako.t.thake a.t.tha.msu uccaasaddamahaasaddaa.
text.1310: [01] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye  vicikicchaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati vicikicchaaparetena 3.0260, uppannaaya  ca vicikicchaaya nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m  samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, paratthampi...pe0...  ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, diigharatta.m  sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa.  seyyathaapi, braahma.na, udapatto aavilo lu.lito kalaliibhuuto andhakaare  nikkhitto. tattha cakkhumaa puriso saka.m mukhanimitta.m  paccavekkhamaano yathaabhuuta.m nappajaaneyya na passeyya. evameva.m kho,  braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye vicikicchaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati  vicikicchaaparetena, uppannaaya ca vicikicchaaya nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m  nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na  passati, paratthampi...pe0... ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m  nappajaanaati na passati, diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti,  pageva asajjhaayakataa.
text.1311: [03] ``yasmi~nca ^a^V2.0216^ea^ ^a^M2.0205^ea^ kho, braahma.na, samaye na kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena  cetasaa viharati na kaamaraagaparetena, uppannassa ca kaamaraagassa  nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati passati, paratthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati  passati, ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati passati,  diigharatta.m asajjhaayakataapi mantaa pa.tibhanti, pageva sajjhaayakataa.  seyyathaapi, braahma.na, udapatto asa.msa.t.tho laakhaaya vaa haliddiyaa vaa  niiliyaa vaa ma~nji.t.thaaya ^a^P3.0234^ea^ vaa. tattha cakkhumaa  puriso saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano yathaabhuuta.m pajaaneyya passeyya.  evameva.m kho, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye na kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa  viharati...pe0... ^a^T3.0261^ea^.
text.1312: [03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye na byaapaadapariyu.t.thitena  cetasaa viharati...pe0... seyyathaapi, braahma.na, udapatto agginaa  asantatto anukkudhito anussadakajaato. tattha cakkhumaa puriso saka.m  mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano yathaabhuuta.m pajaaneyya passeyya. evameva.m  kho, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye na byaapaadapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa  viharati...pe0....
text.1313: [01] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye na  thinamiddhapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati...pe0... ^a^P3.0235^ea^  seyyathaapi, braahma.na, udapatto na sevaalapa.nakapariyonaddho. tattha  cakkhumaa puriso saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano yathaabhuuta.m pajaaneyya  passeyya. evameva.m kho, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye na  thinamiddhapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati...pe0....
text.1314: [03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na ^a^T3.0262^ea^, yasmi.m samaye na  uddhaccakukkuccapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati...pe0... seyyathaapi, braahma.na,  udapatto na vaaterito na calito na bhanto na uumijaato. tattha  cakkhumaa puriso saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano yathaabhuuta.m pajaaneyya  passeyya. evameva.m kho, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye na  uddhaccakukkuccapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati ^a^V2.0217^ea^ ...pe0....
text.1315: [01] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye na  vicikicchaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati na vicikicchaaparetena,  uppannaaya ca vicikicchaaya nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati ^a^P3.0236^ea^,  attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati passati,  paratthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati passati, ubhayatthampi  tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati passati, diigharatta.m asajjhaayakataapi  ^a^M2.0206^ea^ mantaa pa.tibhanti, pageva sajjhaayakataa. seyyathaapi, braahma.na, udapatto  accho vippasanno anaavilo aaloke nikkhitto. tattha cakkhumaa  puriso saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano yathaabhuuta.m pajaaneyya passeyya.  evameva.m kho, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye na vicikicchaapariyu.t.thitena  cetasaa viharati na vicikicchaaparetena, uppannaaya ca vicikicchaaya  nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati passati, paratthampi...pe0... ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye  yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati passati, diigharatta.m asajjhaayakataapi mantaa  pa.tibhanti, pageva sajjhaayakataa.
text.1316: [03] ``aya.m kho, braahma.na, hetu aya.m paccayo, yena kadaaci diigharatta.m  sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa ^a^T3.0263^ea^. aya.m  pana, braahma.na, hetu aya.m paccayo, yena kadaaci diigharatta.m  asajjhaayakataapi mantaa pa.tibhanti, pageva sajjhaayakataa''ti.
text.1317: [01] ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m  gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. tatiya.m.
text.1319: [03] 194^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane  kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena kaara.napaalii {kara.napaalii (ka0)} braahma.no  licchaviina.m kammanta.m kaareti. addasaa kho kaara.napaalii braahma.no  pi"ngiyaani.m braahma.na.m duuratova ^a^P3.0237^ea^ aagacchanta.m; disvaa  pi"ngiyaani.m braahma.na.m etadavoca --
text.132: [03] tena ^a^P3.0031^ea^ kho pana samayena aayasmaa naagito  bhagavato upa.t.thaako hoti. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m naagita.m  aamantesi -- ``ke pana kho, naagita, uccaasaddamahaasaddaa, keva.t.taa  ma~n~ne macchavilope''ti? ``ete, bhante, icchaana"ngalakaa  braahma.nagahapatikaa pahuuta.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m aadaaya bahidvaarako.t.thake  .thitaa bhagavanta~n~neva uddissa bhikkhusa"ngha~ncaa''ti. ``maaha.m, naagita,  yasena samaagama.m, maa ca mayaa yaso. yo kho, naagita, nayimassa  nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa  nikaamalaabhii assa akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, yassaaha.m  nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa  nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii ^a^M2.0026^ea^ akasiralaabhii.   so ta.m {soha.m (ka0), so (syaa0 ka.m0)} mii.lhasukha.m  middhasukha.m laabhasakkaarasilokasukha.m saadiyeyyaa''ti.
text.1320: [03] ``handa, kuto nu bhava.m pi"ngiyaanii aagacchati divaa  divassaa''ti? ``itoha.m {idhaaha.m (syaa0 ka.m0), ito hi kho aha.m (ma0 ni0 1.288)},  bho, aagacchaami sama.nassa gotamassa  santikaa''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nati bhava.m, pi"ngiyaanii, sama.nassa  ^a^V2.0218^ea^ gotamassa pa~n~naaveyyattiya.m? pa.n.dito ma~n~ne''ti? ``ko caaha.m, bho,  ko ca sama.nassa gotamassa pa~n~naaveyyattiya.m jaanissaami! sopi  nuunassa taadisova yo sama.nassa gotamassa pa~n~naaveyyattiya.m  jaaneyyaa''ti! ``u.laaraaya khalu bhava.m, pi"ngiyaanii, sama.na.m  gotama.m pasa.msaaya pasa.msatii''ti. ``ko caaha.m, bho,   ko ca sama.na.m ^a^M2.0207^ea^ gotama.m  pasa.msissaami! pasatthappasatthova {pasa.t.thapasa.t.tho ca (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} so bhava.m gotamo se.t.tho  devamanussaana''nti. ``ki.m pana bhava.m, pi"ngiyaanii, atthavasa.m  sampassamaano sama.ne gotame eva.m abhippasanno''ti?
text.1321: [01] ``seyyathaapi, bho, puriso aggarasaparititto na  a~n~nesa.m hiinaana.m rasaana.m piheti; evameva.m kho, bho, yato yato tassa  bhoto gotamassa ^a^T3.0264^ea^ dhamma.m su.naati -- yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi  veyyaakara.naso, yadi abbhutadhammaso -- tato tato na a~n~nesa.m  puthusama.nabraahma.nappavaadaana.m piheti.
text.1322: [03] ``seyyathaapi, bho, puriso jighacchaadubbalyapareto madhupi.n.dika.m  adhigaccheyya. so yato yato saayetha, labhateva {saayeyya, labhetheva (ma0 ni0 1.205)}  saadurasa.m asecanaka.m;  evameva.m kho, bho, yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhamma.m su.naati  -- yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyaakara.naso, yadi  abbhutadhammaso -- tato tato labhateva attamanata.m, labhati cetaso  pasaada.m.
text.1323: [03] ``seyyathaapi, bho, puriso candanagha.tika.m adhigaccheyya --  haricandanassa vaa lohitacandanassa vaa. so yato yato ghaayetha --  yadi muulato, yadi majjhato, yadi aggato -- adhigacchateva ^a^P3.0238^ea^  {adhigacchetheva (?)} surabhigandha.m asecanaka.m; evameva.m kho, bho, yato yato tassa  bhoto gotamassa dhamma.m su.naati -- yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi  veyyaakara.naso, yadi abbhutadhammaso -- tato tato adhigacchati  paamojja.m adhigacchati somanassa.m.
text.1324: [03] ``seyyathaapi, bho, puriso aabaadhiko dukkhito  baa.lhagilaano. tassa kusalo bhisakko .thaanaso aabaadha.m niihareyya;  evameva.m kho, bho, yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhamma.m su.naati  -- yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyaakara.naso, yadi  abbhutadhammaso -- tato tato sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa  abbhattha.m gacchanti.
text.1325: [03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^V2.0219^ea^ ^a^M2.0208^ea^, bho, pokkhara.nii acchodakaa saatodakaa  siitodakaa setakaa supatitthaa rama.niiyaa. atha puriso aagaccheyya  ghammaabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipaasito ^a^T3.0265^ea^. so ta.m  pokkhara.ni.m ogaahetvaa nhaatvaa ca pivitvaa ca  sabbadarathakilamathapari.laaha.m pa.tippassambheyya. evameva.m kho, bho, yato  yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhamma.m su.naati -- yadi suttaso, yadi  geyyaso, yadi veyyaakara.naso, yadi abbhutadhammaso -- tato tato  sabbadarathakilamathapari.laahaa pa.tippassambhantii''ti.
text.1326: [03] eva.m vutte kaara.napaalii braahma.no u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m  karitvaa dakkhi.na.m jaa.numa.n.dala.m pathaviya.m nihantvaa yena bhagavaa  tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa tikkhattu.m udaana.m udaanesi --
text.133: [03] ``adhivaasetu daani, bhante, bhagavaa, adhivaasetu sugato;  adhivaasanakaalo daani, bhante, bhagavato. yena yeneva daani bhagavaa  gamissati ta.mninnaava gamissanti braahma.nagahapatikaa negamaa ceva  jaanapadaa ca. seyyathaapi, bhante, thullaphusitake deve vassante  yathaaninna.m udakaani pavattanti; evameva.m kho, bhante, yena yeneva daani  bhagavaa gamissati, ta.mninnaava gamissanti braahma.nagahapatikaa negamaa ceva  ^a^T3.0033^ea^ jaanapadaa ca. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa hi, bhante, bhagavato  siilapa~n~naa.na''nti.
text.1330: [01] ``abhikkanta.m, bho pi"ngiyaani, abhikkanta.m, bho  pi"ngiyaani! seyyathaapi, bho pi"ngiyaani, nikkujjita.m {nikujjita.m (ka0)} vaa ukkujjeyya  pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya andhakaare  ^a^P3.0239^ea^ vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- cakkhumanto ruupaani  dakkhantiiti; evameva.m bhotaa pi"ngiyaaninaa anekapariyaayena dhammo  pakaasito. esaaha.m, bho pi"ngiyaani, ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m  gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m pi"ngiyaanii  dhaaretu, ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. catuttha.m.
text.1332: [03] 195^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane  kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena pa~ncamattaani  licchavisataani bhagavanta.m payirupaasanti. appekacce licchavii niilaa  honti niilava.n.naa niilavatthaa niilaala"nkaaraa, appekacce licchavii piitaa  honti piitava.n.naa piitavatthaa piitaala"nkaaraa ^a^T3.0266^ea^, appekacce licchavii  lohitakaa honti lohitakava.n.naa lohitakavatthaa lohitakaala"nkaaraa,  appekacce licchavii odaataa ^a^M2.0209^ea^ honti odaatava.n.naa odaatavatthaa  odaataala"nkaaraa. tyassuda.m bhagavaa atirocati va.n.nena ceva yasasaa ca.
text.1333: [03] atha ^a^V2.0220^ea^ kho pi"ngiyaanii braahma.no u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m  karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``pa.tibhaati ma.m, bhagavaa, pa.tibhaati ma.m, sugataa''ti. ``pa.tibhaatu ta.m  pi"ngiyaanii''ti bhagavaa avoca. atha kho pi"ngiyaanii braahma.no  bhagavato sammukhaa saaruppaaya gaathaaya abhitthavi --
text.1334: [21] ``padma.m {paduma.m (ka0) sa.m0 ni0  1.132} yathaa kokanada.m {kokanuda.m (syaa0  ka.m0)} sugandha.m,
text.1338: [03] atha kho te licchavii pa~ncahi uttaraasa"ngasatehi pi"ngiyaani.m  braahma.na.m acchaadesu.m. atha kho pi"ngiyaanii braahma.no tehi pa~ncahi  uttaraasa"ngasatehi bhagavanta.m acchaadesi ^a^P3.0240^ea^.
text.1339: [03] atha kho bhagavaa te licchavii etadavoca -- ``pa~ncanna.m,  licchavii, ratanaana.m paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m. katamesa.m pa~ncanna.m?  tathaagatassa arahato sammaasambuddhassa paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m.  tathaagatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desetaa puggalo dullabho lokasmi.m.  tathaagatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desitassa vi~n~naataa puggalo  dullabho lokasmi.m. tathaagatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desitassa  vi~n~naataa ^a^T3.0267^ea^ dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno puggalo dullabho lokasmi.m. kata~n~nuu  katavedii puggalo dullabho lokasmi.m. imesa.m kho, licchavii, pa~ncanna.m  ratanaana.m paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi''nti {a0 ni0  5.143}. pa~ncama.m.
text.134: [03] ``maaha.m ^a^V2.0027^ea^, naagita, yasena samaagama.m, maa ca mayaa yaso. yo  kho, naagita, nayimassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa  upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikaamalaabhii assa akicchalaabhii  akasiralaabhii, yassaaha.m nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa  upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii  akasiralaabhii. so ta.m mii.lhasukha.m middhasukha.m laabhasakkaarasilokasukha.m  saadiyeyya. asitapiitakhaayitasaayitassa ^a^P3.0032^ea^ kho,  naagita, uccaarapassaavo -- eso tassa nissando. piyaana.m kho,  naagita, vipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa uppajjanti  sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa -- eso tassa nissando.  asubhanimittaanuyoga.m anuyuttassa kho, naagita, subhanimitte  paa.tikulyataa {pa.tikkuulataa (sii0), pa.tikkuulyataa (syaa0 ka.m0)} sa.n.thaati -- eso   tassa nissando. chasu kho,  naagita, phassaayatanesu aniccaanupassino viharato phasse paa.tikulyataa  sa.n.thaati -- eso tassa nissando. pa~ncasu kho, naagita,  upaadaanakkhandhesu udayabbayaanupassino viharato upaadaane paa.tikulyataa  sa.n.thaati -- eso tassa nissando''ti. dasama.m.
text.1341: [03] 196^b^.^eb^ ``tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato  sammaasambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva  sato pa~nca mahaasupinaa paaturahesu.m. katame pa~nca? tathaagatassa,  bhikkhave, arahato sammaasambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa  bodhisattasseva sato ^a^M2.0210^ea^ aya.m mahaapathavii mahaasayana.m ahosi, himavaa  pabbataraajaa bibbohana.m {bibbohana.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), bimba + ohana.m =  iti padavibhaago} ahosi, puratthime samudde vaamo hattho ohito  ahosi, pacchime samudde dakkhi.no hattho ohito ^a^V2.0221^ea^ ahosi, dakkhi.ne  samudde ubho paadaa ohitaa ahesu.m. tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato  sammaasambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva  sato aya.m pa.thamo mahaasupino paaturahosi.
text.1342: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa arahato sammaasambuddhassa  pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato tiriyaa naama  ti.najaati naabhiyaa uggantvaa nabha.m aahacca .thitaa ahosi.  tathaagatassa, bhikkhave ^a^P3.0241^ea^, arahato sammaasambuddhassa  pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato aya.m dutiyo  mahaasupino paaturahosi.
text.1343: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa arahato sammaasambuddhassa  pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato setaa kimii  ka.nhasiisaa paadehi ussakkitvaa ( ) {(agganakhato) katthaci dissati} yaava  jaa.numa.n.dalaa pa.ticchaadesu.m. tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato ^a^T3.0268^ea^ sammaasambuddhassa  pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato aya.m tatiyo mahaasupino  paaturahosi.
text.1344: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa arahato sammaasambuddhassa  pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato cattaaro saku.naa  naanaava.n.naa catuuhi disaahi aagantvaa paadamuule nipatitvaa sabbasetaa  sampajji.msu. tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammaasambuddhassa pubbeva  sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato aya.m catuttho  mahaasupino paaturahosi.
text.1345: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho pubbeva  sambodhaa anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samaano mahato mii.lhapabbatassa  uparuupari ca"nkamati alippamaano mii.lhena. tathaagatassa, bhikkhave,  arahato sammaasambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa  bodhisattasseva sato aya.m pa~ncamo mahaasupino paaturahosi.
text.1346: [03] ``yampi ^a^M2.0211^ea^, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa arahato sammaasambuddhassa  pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato aya.m mahaapathavii  mahaasayana.m ahosi, himavaa pabbataraajaa bibbohana.m ahosi, puratthime  samudde vaamo hattho ohito ahosi, pacchime samudde dakkhi.no hattho  ohito ahosi, dakkhi.ne samudde ubho paadaa ohitaa ahesu.m;  tathaagatena ^a^V2.0222^ea^, bhikkhave, arahataa sammaasambuddhena anuttaraa sammaasambodhi  abhisambuddhaa. tassaa abhisambodhaaya aya.m pa.thamo mahaasupino  paaturahosi.
text.1347: [03] ``yampi ^a^P3.0242^ea^, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa arahato  sammaasambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva  sato tiriyaa naama ^a^T3.0269^ea^ ti.najaati naabhiyaa uggantvaa nabha.m aahacca .thitaa  ahosi; tathaagatena, bhikkhave, arahataa sammaasambuddhena ariyo  a.t.tha"ngiko maggo abhisambujjhitvaa yaava devamanussehi suppakaasito.  tassa abhisambodhaaya aya.m dutiyo mahaasupino paaturahosi.
text.1348: [03] ``yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa arahato sammaasambuddhassa  pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato setaa kimii  ka.nhasiisaa paadehi ussakkitvaa yaava jaa.numa.n.dalaa pa.ticchaadesu.m; bahuu,  bhikkhave, gihii odaatavasanaa tathaagata.m paa.nupetaa {paa.nupeta.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  pii0)} sara.na.m gataa. tassa  abhisambodhaaya aya.m tatiyo mahaasupino paaturahosi.
text.1349: [03] ``yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa arahato sammaasambuddhassa  pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato cattaaro saku.naa  naanaava.n.naa catuuhi disaahi aagantvaa paadamuule nipatitvaa sabbasetaa  sampajji.msu; cattaarome, bhikkhave, va.n.naa khattiyaa braahma.naa vessaa suddaa  te tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitvaa  anuttara.m vimutti.m sacchikaronti. tassa abhisambodhaaya aya.m catuttho  mahaasupino paaturahosi.
text.1350: [03] ``yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho pubbeva  sambodhaa anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samaano mahato mii.lhapabbatassa  uparuupari ca"nkamati ^a^M2.0212^ea^ alippamaano mii.lhena; laabhii, bhikkhave,  tathaagato ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m,   ta.m {tattha ca (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}  tathaagato agathito {agadhito (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} amucchito   anajjhosanno {anajjhaapanno (ka0) anajjhopanno (sii0 syaa0)} aadiinavadassaavii  nissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati. tassa abhisambodhaaya aya.m pa~ncamo  mahaasupino ^a^T3.0270^ea^ paaturahosi.
text.1351: [03] ``tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammaasambuddhassa pubbeva  sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato ime pa~nca mahaasupinaa  paaturahesu''nti. cha.t.tha.m.
text.1353: [03] 197^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^V2.0223^ea^ ^a^P3.0243^ea^, bhikkhave,  vassassa antaraayaa, ya.m nemittaa {nemittakaa (katthaci)} na jaananti, yattha nemittaana.m cakkhu  na kamati. katame pa~nca? upari, bhikkhave, aakaase tejodhaatu  pakuppati. tena uppannaa meghaa pa.tivigacchanti. aya.m, bhikkhave,  pa.thamo vassassa antaraayo, ya.m nemittaa na jaananti, yattha nemittaana.m  cakkhu na kamati.
text.1354: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, upari aakaase vaayodhaatu pakuppati.  tena uppannaa meghaa pa.tivigacchanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo vassassa  antaraayo, ya.m nemittaa na jaananti, yattha nemittaana.m cakkhu na kamati.
text.1355: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, raahu asurindo paa.ninaa udaka.m  sampa.ticchitvaa mahaasamudde cha.d.deti. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo vassassa  antaraayo, ya.m nemittaa na jaananti, yattha nemittaana.m cakkhu na kamati.
text.1356: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, vassavalaahakaa devaa pamattaa honti.  aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho vassassa antaraayo, ya.m nemittaa na jaananti,  yattha nemittaana.m cakkhu na kamati.
text.1357: [01] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, manussaa adhammikaa honti.  aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo vassassa antaraayo, ya.m nemittaa na jaananti,  yattha nemittaana.m cakkhu na kamati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca  vassassa antaraayaa, ya.m nemittaa na jaananti, yattha nemittaana.m cakkhu  na kamatii''ti. sattama.m.
text.1359: [03] 198^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^T3.0271^ea^ ^a^M2.0213^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagataa vaacaa  subhaasitaa hoti, no dubbhaasitaa, anavajjaa ca ananuvajjaa ca  vi~n~nuuna.m {ananuvajjaa vi~n~nuuna.m (syaa0 ka.m0)}. katamehi pa~ncahi? kaalena ^a^P3.0244^ea^ ca  bhaasitaa hoti, saccaa ca bhaasitaa hoti, sa.nhaa ca bhaasitaa hoti,  atthasa.mhitaa ca bhaasitaa hoti, mettacittena ca bhaasitaa hoti.  imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagataa ^a^V2.0224^ea^ vaacaa subhaasitaa  hoti, no dubbhaasitaa, anavajjaa ca ananuvajjaa ca vi~n~nuuna''nti.  a.t.thama.m.
text.1361: [03] 199^b^.^eb^ ``ya.m, bhikkhave, siilavanto pabbajitaa kula.m  upasa"nkamanti, tattha manussaa pa~ncahi .thaanehi bahu.m pu~n~na.m pasavanti.  katamehi pa~ncahi? yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye siilavante pabbajite  kula.m upasa"nkamante manussaa disvaa cittaani pasaadenti {pasiidanti (syaa0 ka.m0  ka0)}, saggasa.mvattanika.m, bhikkhave, ta.m kula.m tasmi.m samaye pa.tipada.m pa.tipanna.m hoti.
text.1362: [03] ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye siilavante pabbajite kula.m  upasa"nkamante manussaa paccu.t.thenti abhivaadenti aasana.m denti,  uccaakuliinasa.mvattanika.m, bhikkhave, ta.m kula.m tasmi.m samaye pa.tipada.m  pa.tipanna.m hoti.
text.1363: [03] ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye siilavante pabbajite kula.m  upasa"nkamante manussaa maccheramala.m pa.tivinenti {pa.tivinodenti (sii0 pii0)},   mahesakkhasa.mvattanika.m, bhikkhave, ta.m kula.m tasmi.m samaye pa.tipada.m pa.tipanna.m hoti.
text.1364: [01] ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye siilavante pabbajite kula.m  upasa"nkamante manussaa yathaasatti yathaabala.m sa.mvibhajanti,  mahaabhogasa.mvattanika.m ^a^T3.0272^ea^, bhikkhave, ta.m kula.m tasmi.m samaye pa.tipada.m pa.tipanna.m  hoti.
text.1365: [03] ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye siilavante pabbajite kula.m  upasa"nkamante manussaa paripucchanti paripa~nhanti dhamma.m su.nanti,  mahaapa~n~naasa.mvattanika.m, bhikkhave, ta.m kula.m tasmi.m samaye pa.tipada.m pa.tipanna.m  hoti. ya.m ^a^P3.0245^ea^, bhikkhave, siilavanto pabbajitaa  kula.m upasa"nkamanti, tattha manussaa imehi pa~ncahi .thaanehi bahu.m pu~n~na.m  pasavantii''ti. navama.m.
text.1367: [03] 200^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaa ^a^M2.0214^ea^, bhikkhave,   nissaara.niiyaa {nissara.niiyaa (pii0), nissara.niyaa (dii0 ni0 3.321)} dhaatuyo.  katamaa pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ^a^V2.0225^ea^ kaama.m {kaame (syaa0 ka.m0)  dii0 ni0 3.321} manasikaroto  kaamesu citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati.  nekkhamma.m kho panassa manasikaroto nekkhamme citta.m pakkhandati  pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati. tassa ta.m citta.m sugata.m {sukata.m (pii0 ka0)} subhaavita.m  suvu.t.thita.m suvimutta.m suvisa.myutta.m {visa.myutta.m (katthaci, dii0 ni0 3.321)} kaamehi;   ye ca kaamapaccayaa uppajjanti aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, mutto so tehi, na so   ta.m vedana.m vediyati. idamakkhaata.m kaamaana.m nissara.na.m.
text.1368: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno byaapaada.m manasikaroto  byaapaade citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati.  abyaapaada.m kho panassa manasikaroto abyaapaade citta.m pakkhandati  pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati. tassa ta.m citta.m sugata.m subhaavita.m  suvu.t.thita.m suvimutta.m suvisa.myutta.m byaapaadena; ye ca byaapaadapaccayaa  uppajjanti aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, mutto so tehi, na so ta.m vedana.m  vediyati. idamakkhaata.m byaapaadassa nissara.na.m.
text.1369: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno vihesa.m manasikaroto ^a^T3.0273^ea^  vihesaaya citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati.  avihesa.m kho panassa manasikaroto avihesaaya citta.m pakkhandati  pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati. tassa ta.m citta.m sugata.m subhaavita.m  suvu.t.thita.m suvimutta.m suvisa.myutta.m vihesaaya; ye ca vihesaapaccayaa  uppajjanti aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, mutto so tehi, na so ta.m vedana.m  vediyati. idamakkhaata.m vihesaaya nissara.na.m.
text.1370: [03] ``puna ^a^P3.0246^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ruupa.m  manasikaroto ruupe citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na  vimuccati. aruupa.m kho panassa manasikaroto aruupe citta.m  pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati. tassa ta.m citta.m sugata.m  subhaavita.m suvu.t.thita.m suvimutta.m suvisa.myutta.m ruupehi; ye ca ruupapaccayaa  uppajjanti aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, mutto so tehi, na so ta.m vedana.m  vediyati. idamakkhaata.m ruupaana.m nissara.na.m.
text.1371: [03] ``puna ^a^M2.0215^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sakkaaya.m manasikaroto  sakkaaye citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati.  sakkaayanirodha.m kho panassa manasikaroto ^a^V2.0226^ea^ sakkaayanirodhe citta.m  pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati. tassa ta.m citta.m sugata.m  subhaavita.m suvu.t.thita.m suvimutta.m suvisa.myutta.m sakkaayena; ye ca sakkaayapaccayaa  uppajjanti aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, mutto so tehi, na so ta.m vedana.m  vediyati. idamakkhaata.m sakkaayassa nissara.na.m.
text.1372: [03] ``tassa kaamanandiipi naanuseti, byaapaadanandiipi naanuseti,  vihesaanandiipi naanuseti ^a^T3.0274^ea^, ruupanandiipi naanuseti, sakkaayanandiipi  naanuseti (so) {( ) katthaci natthi} kaamanandiyaapi ananusayaa, byaapaadanandiyaapi  ananusayaa, vihesaanandiyaapi ananusayaa, ruupanandiyaapi ananusayaa,  sakkaayanandiyaapi ananusayaa. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  niranusayo, acchecchi {acchejji (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} ta.nha.m,   vivattayi {vaavattayi (sii0)} sa.myojana.m, sammaa  maanaabhisamayaa antamakaasi dukkhassa. imaa kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca  nissaara.niiyaa dhaatuyo''ti. dasama.m.
