text.1381: [03] 201^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T3.0275^ea^ ^a^V2.0227^ea^ ^a^M2.0216^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa   kimilaaya.m {kimbilaaya.m (sii0 pii0) a0 ni0  6.40;  7.59} viharati ve.luvane.  atha kho aayasmaa kimilo {kimbilo (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m  nisinno kho aayasmaa kimilo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu  kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo na  cira.t.thitiko hotii''ti? ``idha, kimila, tathaagate parinibbute  bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo upaasakaa upaasikaayo satthari agaaravaa  viharanti appatissaa, dhamme agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa, sa"nghe  agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa, sikkhaaya agaaravaa viharanti  appatissaa, a~n~nama~n~na.m agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa. aya.m kho,  kimila, hetu aya.m paccayo, yena tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo na  cira.t.thitiko hotii''ti.
text.1382: [03] ``ko pana, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena tathaagate parinibbute  saddhammo cira.t.thitiko hotii''ti? ``idha, kimila, tathaagate  parinibbute bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo upaasakaa upaasikaayo satthari  sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa, dhamme sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa,  sa"nghe sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa, sikkhaaya sagaaravaa viharanti  sappatissaa, a~n~nama~n~na.m sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa. aya.m kho,  kimila, hetu aya.m paccayo, yena tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo ^a^T3.0276^ea^  cira.t.thitiko hotii''ti. pa.thama.m.
text.1384: [03] 202^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^P3.0248^ea^, bhikkhave,  aanisa.msaa dhammassavane. katame pa~nca? assuta.m su.naati  ^a^V2.0228^ea^, suta.m pariyodaapeti, ka"nkha.m vitarati {vihanati (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)},   di.t.thi.m uju.m karoti, cittamassa  pasiidati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa dhammassavane''ti.  dutiya.m.
text.1386: [03] 203^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^M2.0217^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato  ra~n~no bhadro {bhaddo (pii0)} assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no  a"ngantveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.
text.1387: [03] ``katamehi pa~ncahi? ajjavena, javena, maddavena, khantiyaa,  soraccena -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no  bhadro assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"ngantveva  sa"nkha.m gacchati. ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi  samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo  a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa.
text.1388: [03] ``katamehi pa~ncahi? ajjavena, javena, maddavena, khantiyaa,  soraccena -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo  anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. tatiya.m.
text.1390: [03] 204^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, balaani. katamaani  pa~nca? saddhaabala.m, hiribala.m, ottappabala.m, viiriyabala.m, pa~n~naabala.m --  imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca balaanii''ti. catuttha.m.
text.1392: [03] 205^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0  9.71; ma0 ni0 1.185; dii0 ni0 3.319}  ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, cetokhilaa. katame  pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave ^a^T3.0277^ea^, bhikkhu satthari ka"nkhati vicikicchati  naadhimuccati ^a^P3.0249^ea^ na sampasiidati. yo so,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na  sampasiidati, tassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya ^a^V2.0229^ea^ saataccaaya  padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya  padhaanaaya, aya.m pa.thamo cetokhilo.
text.1393: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhamme ka"nkhati...pe0...  sa"nghe ka"nkhati...pe0... sikkhaaya ka"nkhati...pe0... sabrahmacaariisu  kupito hoti anattamano aahatacitto khilajaato. yo so,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacaariisu kupito hoti ^a^M2.0218^ea^ anattamano aahatacitto  khilajaato, tassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya  padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya  padhaanaaya, aya.m pa~ncamo cetokhilo. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca  cetokhilaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.
text.1395: [03] 206^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0  9.72; dii0 ni0 3.320} ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave,   cetasovinibandhaa {cetovinibaddhaa (saaratthadiipanii.tiikaaya.m)}.  katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaamesu aviitaraago  {avigataraago (ka0)} hoti  avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipaaso avigatapari.laaho  avigatata.nho. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaamesu aviitaraago hoti  avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipaaso avigatapari.laaho  avigatata.nho, tassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya  padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya  padhaanaaya, aya.m pa.thamo cetasovinibandho.
text.1396: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye aviitaraago  hoti...pe0... ruupe aviitaraago ^a^T3.0278^ea^ hoti...pe0... yaavadattha.m udaraavadehaka.m  bhu~njitvaa seyyasukha.m passasukha.m middhasukha.m anuyutto viharati...pe0...  a~n~natara.m devanikaaya.m pa.nidhaaya ^a^P3.0250^ea^ brahmacariya.m carati  -- `iminaaha.m siilena vaa vatena vaa tapena vaa brahmacariyena vaa devo  vaa bhavissaami deva~n~nataro vaa'ti. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  a~n~natara.m devanikaaya.m pa.nidhaaya brahmacariya.m carati -- `iminaaha.m  siilena vaa vatena vaa tapena vaa brahmacariyena vaa devo vaa bhavissaami  deva~n~nataro vaa'ti, tassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya  saataccaaya padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya  saataccaaya padhaanaaya, aya.m pa~ncamo cetasovinibandho. ime kho,  bhikkhave, pa~nca cetasovinibandhaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.
text.1398: [03] 207^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^V2.0230^ea^, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa yaaguyaa.  katame pa~nca? khudda.m {khuda.m (sii0 pii0) khudhaati sakkataanuloma.m. mahaava0 282}   pa.tihanati, pipaasa.m pa.tivineti, vaata.m  anulometi, vatthi.m sodheti, aamaavasesa.m ^a^M2.0219^ea^ paaceti. ime kho,  bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa yaaguyaa''ti. sattama.m.
text.14: [03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, pa~n~naabala.m? idha, bhikkhave,  ariyasaavako pa~n~navaa hoti udayatthagaaminiyaa ^a^V2.0003^ea^ pa~n~naaya samannaagato  ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa. ida.m vuccati,  bhikkhave, pa~n~naabala.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca sekhabalaani.
text.1400: [03] 208^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa dantaka.t.thassa  akhaadane. katame pa~nca? acakkhussa.m, mukha.m duggandha.m hoti,  rasahara.niyo na visujjhanti, pitta.m semha.m bhatta.m   pariyonandhati {pariyonaddhanti (sii0 pii0), pariyonaddhati (syaa0  ka.m0 ka0) cuu.lava0 282 passitabba.m},  bhattamassa nacchaadeti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa  dantaka.t.thassa akhaadane.
text.1401: [03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa dantaka.t.thassa khaadane. katame  pa~nca? cakkhussa.m, mukha.m ^a^T3.0279^ea^ na duggandha.m hoti, rasahara.niyo  visujjhanti, pitta.m semha.m bhatta.m na pariyonandhati, bhattamassa chaadeti.  ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa dantaka.t.thassa khaadane''ti.  a.t.thama.m.
text.1403: [03] 209^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 249} ``pa~ncime ^a^P3.0251^ea^, bhikkhave,  aadiinavaa aayatakena giitassarena dhamma.m bha.nantassa. katame pa~nca?  attanaapi tasmi.m sare saarajjati, parepi tasmi.m sare saarajjanti,  gahapatikaapi ujjhaayanti -- `yatheva maya.m gaayaama, evameva.m kho  sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa gaayantii'ti, sarakuttimpi nikaamayamaanassa  samaadhissa bha"ngo hoti, pacchimaa janataa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjati.  ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa aayatakena giitassarena dhamma.m  bha.nantassaa''ti. navama.m.
text.1405: [03] 210^b^.^eb^ {mahaava0 353} ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa mu.t.thassatissa  asampajaanassa nidda.m okkamayato ^a^V2.0231^ea^. katame pa~nca? dukkha.m supati,  dukkha.m pa.tibujjhati, paapaka.m supina.m passati, devataa na rakkhanti,  asuci muccati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa mu.t.thassatissa  asampajaanassa nidda.m okkamayato.
text.1406: [03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa upa.t.thitassatissa  sampajaanassa nidda.m okkamayato. katame pa~nca? sukha.m supati, sukha.m  pa.tibujjhati, na paapaka.m supina.m passati ^a^M2.0220^ea^, devataa rakkhanti, asuci na  muccati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa upa.t.thitassatissa  sampajaanassa nidda.m okkamayato''ti. dasama.m.
text.141: [03] 31^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T3.0034^ea^ ^a^M2.0027^ea^ ^a^V2.0028^ea^ samaya.m...pe0... anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame.  atha kho sumanaa raajakumaarii pa~ncahi rathasatehi pa~ncahi  raajakumaarisatehi parivutaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho  sumanaa raajakumaarii bhagavanta.m etadavoca --
text.1410: [22] vinibandha.m yaagu ka.t.tha.m, giita.m mu.t.thassatinaa caati..
text.1413: [03] 211^b^.^eb^ ``yo ^a^V2.0232^ea^ ^a^P3.0252^ea^ so, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu akkosakaparibhaasako ariyuupavaadii sabrahmacaariina.m, tassa pa~nca  aadiinavaa paa.tika"nkhaa. katame pa~nca? paaraajiko vaa hoti  chinnaparipantho {chinnaparibandho (ka0)}, a~n~natara.m vaa sa.mkili.t.tha.m aapatti.m aapajjati, baa.lha.m vaa  rogaata"nka.m phusati, sammuu.lho kaala.m karoti, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa  apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. yo so, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu akkosakaparibhaasako ariyuupavaadii sabrahmacaariina.m, tassa ime  pa~nca aadiinavaa paa.tika"nkhaa''ti. pa.thama.m.
text.1415: [03] 212^b^.^eb^ ``yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bha.n.danakaarako  kalahakaarako vivaadakaarako bhassakaarako sa"nghe adhikara.nakaarako,  tassa pa~nca aadiinavaa paa.tika"nkhaa. katame pa~nca? anadhigata.m  naadhigacchati, adhigataa {adhigata.m (sabbattha)}   parihaayati, paapako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati,  sammuu.lho kaala.m karoti, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m  vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  bha.n.danakaarako kalahakaarako vivaadakaarako bhassakaarako sa"nghe  adhikara.nakaarako, tassa ime pa~nca aadiinavaa paa.tika"nkhaa''ti.  dutiya.m.
text.1417: [03] 213^b^.^eb^ {mahaava0 209; dii0 ni0 3.316} ``pa~ncime  ^a^T3.0281^ea^ ^a^M2.0221^ea^, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa dussiilassa  siilavipattiyaa. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, dussiilo  siilavipanno pamaadaadhikara.na.m mahati.m bhogajaani.m nigacchati. aya.m,  bhikkhave, pa.thamo aadiinavo dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa.
text.1418: [03] ``puna ^a^V2.0233^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, dussiilassa siilavipannassa paapako  kittisaddo abbhuggacchati. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo aadiinavo  dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa.
text.1419: [03] ``puna ^a^P3.0253^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, dussiilo  siilavipanno ya~n~nadeva parisa.m upasa"nkamati -- yadi khattiyaparisa.m,  yadi braahma.naparisa.m, yadi gahapatiparisa.m, yadi sama.naparisa.m --  avisaarado upasa"nkamati ma"nkubhuuto. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo  aadiinavo dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa.
text.142: [03] ``idhassu, bhante, bhagavato dve saavakaa samasaddhaa samasiilaa  samapa~n~naa -- eko daayako, eko adaayako. te kaayassa bhedaa  ^a^P3.0033^ea^ para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjeyyu.m.  devabhuutaana.m pana nesa.m {tesa.m (sii0)}, bhante, siyaa viseso, siyaa naanaakara.na''nti?
text.1420: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, dussiilo siilavipanno sammuu.lho  kaala.m karoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho aadiinavo dussiilassa  siilavipattiyaa.
text.1421: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, dussiilo siilavipanno kaayassa bhedaa  para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. aya.m,  bhikkhave, pa~ncamo aadiinavo dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa. ime kho,  bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa.
text.1422: [03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa siilavato siilasampadaaya.  katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, siilavaa siilasampanno  appamaadaadhikara.na.m mahanta.m bhogakkhandha.m adhigacchati. aya.m, bhikkhave,  pa.thamo aanisa.mso siilavato siilasampadaaya.
text.1423: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, siilavato siilasampannassa kalyaa.no  kittisaddo abbhuggacchati. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo aanisa.mso  siilavato siilasampadaaya.
text.1424: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, siilavaa siilasampanno ya~n~nadeva parisa.m  upasa"nkamati -- yadi khattiyaparisa.m, yadi braahma.naparisa.m ^a^T3.0282^ea^, yadi  gahapatiparisa.m, yadi sama.naparisa.m -- visaarado upasa"nkamati  ama"nkubhuuto. aya.m bhikkhave, tatiyo aanisa.mso siilavato  siilasampadaaya.
text.1425: [03] ``puna ^a^M2.0222^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, siilavaa siilasampanno asammuu.lho  kaala.m karoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho aanisa.mso siilavato  siilasampadaaya.
text.1426: [03] ``puna ^a^V2.0234^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, siilavaa siilasampanno kaayassa bhedaa  para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo  aanisa.mso siilavato siilasampadaaya. ime ^a^P3.0254^ea^ kho,  bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa siilavato siilasampadaayaa''ti. tatiya.m.
text.1428: [03] 214^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa bahubhaa.nismi.m  puggale. katame pa~nca? musaa bha.nati, pisu.na.m bha.nati, pharusa.m  bha.nati, samphappalaapa.m bha.nati, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m  duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca  aadiinavaa bahubhaa.nismi.m puggale.
text.1429: [03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa mantabhaa.nismi.m puggale.  katame pa~nca? na musaa bha.nati, na pisu.na.m bha.nati, na pharusa.m  bha.nati, na samphappalaapa.m bha.nati, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m  sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa  mantabhaa.nismi.m puggale''ti. catuttha.m.
text.143: [03] ``siyaa, sumane''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ``yo so, sumane,  daayako so amu.m adaayaka.m devabhuuto samaano pa~ncahi .thaanehi  adhiga.nhaati -- dibbena aayunaa, dibbena va.n.nena, dibbena sukhena,  dibbena yasena, dibbena aadhipateyyena. yo so, sumane, daayako  so amu.m adaayaka.m devabhuuto samaano imehi pa~ncahi .thaanehi  adhiga.nhaati''.
text.1431: [03] 215^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa akkhantiyaa.  katame pa~nca? bahuno janassa appiyo hoti amanaapo, verabahulo  ca hoti, vajjabahulo ca, sammuu.lho kaala.m karoti, kaayassa bhedaa para.m  mara.naa apaaya.m ^a^T3.0283^ea^ duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. ime kho,  bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa akkhantiyaa.
text.1432: [03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa khantiyaa. katame pa~nca?  bahuno janassa piyo hoti manaapo, na verabahulo hoti, na  vajjabahulo, asammuu.lho kaala.m karoti, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa  sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca  aanisa.msaa khantiyaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.
text.1434: [03] 216^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^V2.0235^ea^ ^a^P3.0255^ea^, bhikkhave,  aadiinavaa akkhantiyaa. katame pa~nca? bahuno janassa appiyo  hoti amanaapo, luddo ca hoti, vippa.tisaarii ca, sammuu.lho  ^a^M2.0223^ea^ kaala.m karoti, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m  upapajjati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa akkhantiyaa.
text.1435: [03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa khantiyaa. katame pa~nca?  bahuno janassa piyo hoti manaapo, aluddo ca hoti, avippa.tisaarii  ca, asammuu.lho kaala.m karoti, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m  sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa  khantiyaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.
text.1437: [03] 217^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa apaasaadike.  katame pa~nca? attaapi attaana.m upavadati, anuvicca vi~n~nuu  garahanti, paapako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati, sammuu.lho kaala.m karoti,  kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati.  ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa apaasaadike.
text.1438: [03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa paasaadike ^a^T3.0284^ea^. katame pa~nca?  attaapi attaana.m na upavadati, anuvicca vi~n~nuu pasa.msanti, kalyaa.no  kittisaddo abbhuggacchati, asammuu.lho kaala.m karoti, kaayassa bhedaa  para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. ime kho, bhikkhave,  pa~nca aanisa.msaa paasaadike''ti. sattama.m.
text.144: [03] ``sace pana te, bhante, tato cutaa itthatta.m aagacchanti,  manussabhuutaana.m pana nesa.m, bhante, siyaa viseso, siyaa  naanaakara.na''nti? ``siyaa, sumane''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ``yo  so, sumane, daayako so amu.m adaayaka.m manussabhuuto samaano pa~ncahi  .thaanehi adhiga.nhaati -- maanusakena aayunaa, maanusakena va.n.nena,  maanusakena sukhena, maanusakena yasena, maanusakena aadhipateyyena.  yo so, sumane, daayako so amu.m adaayaka.m manussabhuuto samaano  imehi pa~ncahi .thaanehi adhiga.nhaati''.
text.1440: [03] 218^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa apaasaadike.  katame pa~nca? appasannaa ^a^P3.0256^ea^ nappasiidanti,  pasannaana~nca ekaccaana.m a~n~nathatta.m hoti, satthusaasana.m akata.m {na kata.m (syaa0 ka.m0  ka0)} hoti,  pacchimaa janataa ^a^V2.0236^ea^ di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjati, cittamassa nappasiidati. ime  kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa apaasaadike.
text.1441: [01] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa paasaadike. katame  pa~nca? appasannaa pasiidanti, pasannaana~nca bhiyyobhaavo hoti,  satthusaasana.m kata.m hoti, pacchimaa janataa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjati,  cittamassa pasiidati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa  paasaadike''ti. a.t.thama.m.
text.1443: [03] 219^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^M2.0224^ea^, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa aggismi.m.  katame pa~nca? acakkhusso, dubba.n.nakara.no, dubbalakara.no,  sa"nga.nikaapava.d.dhano {sa"nga.nikaapavaddhano (sii0), sa"nga.nikaaraamabaddhano (ka0)},   tiracchaanakathaapavattaniko hoti. ime kho,  bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa aggismi''nti. navama.m.
text.1445: [03] 220^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa madhuraaya.m.  katame pa~nca? visamaa, bahurajaa, ca.n.dasunakhaa, vaa.layakkhaa,  dullabhapi.n.daa -- ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa madhuraaya''nti.  dasama.m.
text.1449: [22] apaasaadikaa dve vuttaa, aggismi.m madhurena caati..
text.145: [03] ``sace ^a^T3.0035^ea^ pana te, bhante, ubho agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti,  pabbajitaana.m pana nesa.m, bhante ^a^V2.0029^ea^, siyaa viseso, siyaa naanaakara.na''nti?  ``siyaa, sumane''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ``yo so, sumane,  daayako so amu.m adaayaka.m pabbajito samaano pa~ncahi .thaanehi  adhiga.nhaati -- yaacitova bahula.m ciivara.m paribhu~njati appa.m ayaacito,  yaacitova bahula.m pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njati ^a^M2.0028^ea^ appa.m ayaacito, yaacitova  bahula.m senaasana.m paribhu~njati appa.m ayaacito, yaacitova bahula.m  gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m paribhu~njati appa.m ayaacito. yehi  kho pana sabrahmacaariihi saddhi.m viharati tyassa manaapeneva bahula.m  kaayakammena samudaacaranti appa.m amanaapena, manaapeneva bahula.m  vaciikammena samudaacaranti appa.m amanaapena, manaapeneva bahula.m  manokammena samudaacaranti appa.m amanaapena, manaapa.myeva bahula.m upahaara.m  upaharanti appa.m amanaapa.m ^a^P3.0034^ea^. yo so, sumane,  daayako so amu.m adaayaka.m pabbajito samaano imehi pa~ncahi .thaanehi  adhiga.nhaatii''ti.
text.1452: [03] 221^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^V2.0237^ea^, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa diighacaarika.m  anavatthacaarika.m anuyuttassa viharato. katame pa~nca? assuta.m na  su.naati, suta.m na pariyodaapeti, sutenekaccena avisaarado hoti,  gaa.lha.m {baa.lha.m (syaa0)} rogaata"nka.m phusati, na ca mittavaa hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave,  pa~nca aadiinavaa diighacaarika.m anavatthacaarika.m anuyuttassa viharato.
text.1453: [03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa samavatthacaare. katame pa~nca?  assuta.m su.naati, suta.m pariyodaapeti, sutenekaccena visaarado hoti,  na gaa.lha.m rogaata"nka.m phusati, mittavaa ca hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave,  pa~nca aanisa.msaa samavatthacaare''ti. pa.thama.m.
text.1455: [03] 222^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^M2.0225^ea^, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa diighacaarika.m  anavatthacaarika.m anuyuttassa viharato. katame pa~nca? anadhigata.m  naadhigacchati, adhigataa parihaayati, adhigatenekaccena avisaarado  hoti, gaa.lha.m rogaata"nka.m phusati, na ca mittavaa hoti. ime kho,  bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa diighacaarika.m anavatthacaarika.m anuyuttassa  viharato.
text.1456: [01] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa ^a^T3.0286^ea^ samavatthacaare. katame  pa~nca? anadhigata.m adhigacchati, adhigataa na parihaayati,  adhigatenekaccena visaarado hoti, na gaa.lha.m rogaata"nka.m phusati,  mittavaa ca hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa  samavatthacaare''ti. dutiya.m.
text.1458: [03] 223^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^V2.0238^ea^ ^a^P3.0258^ea^, bhikkhave,  aadiinavaa atinivaase. katame pa~nca? bahubha.n.do hoti  bahubha.n.dasannicayo, bahubhesajjo hoti bahubhesajjasannicayo, bahukicco  hoti bahukara.niiyo byatto ki.mkara.niiyesu, sa.msa.t.tho viharati  gaha.t.thapabbajitehi ananulomikena gihisa.msaggena, tamhaa ca aavaasaa  pakkamanto saapekkho pakkamati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa  atinivaase.
text.1459: [03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa samavatthavaase. katame pa~nca?  na bahubha.n.do hoti na bahubha.n.dasannicayo, na bahubhesajjo hoti na  bahubhesajjasannicayo, na bahukicco hoti na bahukara.niiyo na byatto  ki.mkara.niiyesu, asa.msa.t.tho viharati gaha.t.thapabbajitehi ananulomikena  gihisa.msaggena, tamhaa ca aavaasaa pakkamanto anapekkho pakkamati.  ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa samavatthavaase''ti. tatiya.m.
text.146: [03] ``sace pana te, bhante, ubho arahatta.m paapu.nanti, arahattappattaana.m  pana nesa.m, bhante, siyaa viseso, siyaa naanaakara.na''nti? ``ettha  kho panesaaha.m, sumane, na ki~nci naanaakara.na.m vadaami, yadida.m  vimuttiyaa vimutti''nti {vimuttanti (syaa0 ka.m0)}.
text.1461: [03] 224^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa atinivaase.  katame pa~nca? aavaasamaccharii hoti, kulamaccharii hoti,  laabhamaccharii hoti, va.n.namaccharii hoti, dhammamaccharii hoti. ime  kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa atinivaase.
text.1462: [03] ``pa~ncime ^a^M2.0226^ea^, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa samavatthavaase. katame pa~nca?  na ^a^T3.0287^ea^ aavaasamaccharii hoti, na kulamaccharii hoti, na laabhamaccharii  hoti, na va.n.namaccharii hoti, na dhammamaccharii hoti. ime kho,  bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa samavatthavaase''ti. catuttha.m.
text.1464: [03] 225^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa   kuluupake {kulupake (syaa0 pii0), kuluupage (sii0)}.  katame pa~nca? anaamantacaare ^a^P3.0259^ea^ aapajjati, raho  nisajjaaya aapajjati, pa.ticchanne aasane aapajjati, maatugaamassa uttari  chappa~ncavaacaahi ^a^V2.0239^ea^ dhamma.m desento aapajjati, kaamasa"nkappabahulo viharati.  ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa kuluupake''ti. pa~ncama.m.
text.1466: [03] 226^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa kuluupakassa  bhikkhuno ativela.m kulesu sa.msa.t.thassa viharato. katame pa~nca?  maatugaamassa abhi.nhadassana.m, dassane sati sa.msaggo, sa.msagge sati  vissaaso, vissaase sati otaaro, oti.n.nacittasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m  -- `anabhirato vaa brahmacariya.m carissati a~n~natara.m vaa sa.mkili.t.tha.m  aapatti.m aapajjissati sikkha.m vaa paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattissati'.  ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa kuluupakassa bhikkhuno ativela.m  kulesu sa.msa.t.thassa viharato''ti. cha.t.tha.m.
text.1468: [03] 227^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa bhogesu.  katame pa~nca? aggisaadhaara.naa bhogaa, udakasaadhaara.naa bhogaa,  raajasaadhaara.naa bhogaa, corasaadhaara.naa bhogaa, appiyehi daayaadehi  saadhaara.naa bhogaa. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa bhogesu.
text.1469: [03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa bhogesu. katame pa~nca?  bhoge nissaaya attaana.m sukheti pii.neti sammaa ^a^T3.0288^ea^ sukha.m pariharati,  maataapitaro sukheti pii.neti sammaa sukha.m pariharati,  puttadaaradaasakammakaraporise sukheti ^a^M2.0227^ea^ pii.neti sammaa sukha.m pariharati,  mittaamacce sukheti pii.neti sammaa sukha.m pariharati, sama.nabraahma.nesu  uddhaggika.m dakkhi.na.m pati.t.thaapeti sovaggika.m sukhavipaaka.m saggasa.mvattanika.m.  ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa bhogesuu''ti. sattama.m.
text.147: [03] ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaava~ncida.m, bhante,  alameva daanaani daatu.m ala.m pu~n~naani kaatu.m; yatra hi naama  devabhuutassaapi upakaaraani pu~n~naani, manussabhuutassaapi upakaaraani  pu~n~naani, pabbajitassaapi upakaaraani pu~n~naanii''ti. ``evameta.m,  sumane! ala~nhi, sumane, daanaani daatu.m ala.m pu~n~naani kaatu.m!  devabhuutassaapi upakaaraani pu~n~naani, manussabhuutassaapi upakaaraani  pu~n~naani, pabbajitassaapi upakaaraani pu~n~naanii''ti ^a^T3.0036^ea^.
text.1471: [03] 228^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^P3.0260^ea^, bhikkhave,  aadiinavaa ussuurabhatte kule. katame pa~nca? ye te atithii paahunaa,  te na kaalena ^a^V2.0240^ea^ pa.tipuujenti; yaa taa balipa.tiggaahikaa devataa, taa na  kaalena pa.tipuujenti; ye te sama.nabraahma.naa ekabhattikaa rattuuparataa virataa  vikaalabhojanaa, te na kaalena pa.tipuujenti; daasakammakaraporisaa  vimukhaa kamma.m karonti; taavataka.myeva asamayena bhutta.m anojavanta.m  hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa ussuurabhatte kule.
text.1472: [03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa samayabhatte kule. katame  pa~nca? ye te atithii paahunaa, te kaalena pa.tipuujenti; yaa taa  balipa.tiggaahikaa devataa, taa kaalena pa.tipuujenti; ye te sama.nabraahma.naa  ekabhattikaa rattuuparataa virataa vikaalabhojanaa, te kaalena pa.tipuujenti;  daasakammakaraporisaa avimukhaa kamma.m karonti; taavataka.myeva samayena  bhutta.m ojavanta.m hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa  samayabhatte kule''ti. a.t.thama.m.
text.1474: [03] 229^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa ka.nhasappe.  katame pa~nca? asuci, duggandho, sabhiiru, sappa.tibhayo, mittadubbhii  -- ime kho, bhikkhave ^a^T3.0289^ea^, pa~nca aadiinavaa ka.nhasappe. evameva.m kho,  bhikkhave, pa~ncime aadiinavaa maatugaame. katame pa~nca? asuci,  duggandho, sabhiiru, sappa.tibhayo, mittadubbhii -- ime kho, bhikkhave,  pa~nca aadiinavaa maatugaame''ti. navama.m.
text.1476: [03] 230^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa ka.nhasappe.  katame pa~nca? kodhano, upanaahii, ghoraviso, dujjivho, mittadubbhii  -- ime ^a^P3.0261^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa ka.nhasappe.
text.1477: [03] ``evameva.m ^a^M2.0228^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncime aadiinavaa maatugaame.  katame pa~nca? kodhano, upanaahii, ghoraviso, dujjivho, mittadubbhii.  tatrida.m, bhikkhave, maatugaamassa ghoravisataa -- yebhuyyena, bhikkhave,  maatugaamo tibbaraago. tatrida.m, bhikkhave, maatugaamassa dujjivhataa --  yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, maatugaamo pisu.navaaco. tatrida.m, bhikkhave,  maatugaamassa mittadubbhitaa -- yebhuyyena ^a^V2.0241^ea^, bhikkhave, maatugaamo  aticaarinii. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa maatugaame''ti.  dasama.m.
text.148: [03] idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana {ida.m vatvaa (sii0 pii0) evamuparipi} sugato athaapara.m etadavoca  satthaa --
text.1481: [22] dve ca kuluupakaa bhogaa, bhatta.m sappaapare duveti..
text.1484: [03] 231^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi *3.0290 ^a^V2.0242^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  aavaasiko bhikkhu abhaavaniiyo hoti. katamehi pa~ncahi? na  aakappasampanno hoti na vattasampanno; na bahussuto hoti na sutadharo;  na pa.tisallekhitaa {sallekhitaa (ka0 sii0)} hoti na pa.tisallaanaaraamo; na kalyaa.navaaco hoti  na kalyaa.navaakkara.no; duppa~n~no hoti ja.lo e.lamuugo. imehi kho,  bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu abhaavaniiyo  hoti.
text.1485: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu  bhaavaniiyo hoti. katamehi pa~ncahi? aakappasampanno ^a^P3.0262^ea^  hoti vattasampanno; bahussuto hoti sutadharo;  pa.tisallekhitaa hoti pa.tisallaanaaraamo; kalyaa.navaaco hoti  kalyaa.navaakkara.no; pa~n~navaa hoti aja.lo ^a^M2.0229^ea^ ane.lamuugo. imehi kho,  bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu bhaavaniiyo  hotii''ti. pa.thama.m.
text.1487: [03] 232^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  aavaasiko bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca  bhaavaniiyo ca.
text.1488: [03] ``katamehi pa~ncahi? siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto  viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii,  samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu; bahussuto hoti sutadharo  sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa  pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m ^a^T3.0291^ea^ parisuddha.m  brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa  vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa  ^a^V2.0243^ea^; kalyaa.navaaco hoti kalyaa.navaakkara.no poriyaa vaacaaya samannaagato  vissa.t.thaaya anelagalaaya atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa; catunna.m jhaanaana.m  aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti  akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii; aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m  pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja  viharati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato  aavaasiko bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca  bhaavaniiyo caa''ti. dutiya.m.
text.1490: [03] 233^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  aavaasiko bhikkhu aavaasa.m sobheti. katamehi pa~ncahi? siilavaa  ^a^P3.0263^ea^ hoti...pe0... samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu;  bahussuto hoti...pe0... di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa; kalyaa.navaaco hoti  kalyaa.navaakkara.no poriyaa vaacaaya samannaagato vissa.t.thaaya anelagalaaya  atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa; pa.tibalo hoti upasa"nkamante dhammiyaa kathaaya  sandassetu.m samaadapetu.m samuttejetu.m sampaha.msetu.m; catunna.m jhaanaana.m  aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti  akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi  dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu aavaasa.m sobhetii''ti. tatiya.m.
text.1492: [03] 234^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^M2.0230^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  aavaasiko bhikkhu aavaasassa ^a^T3.0292^ea^ bahuupakaaro hoti. katamehi pa~ncahi?  siilavaa hoti...pe0... samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu;  bahussuto hoti...pe0... di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa; kha.n.daphulla.m  pa.tisa"nkharoti; mahaa kho pana bhikkhusa"ngho abhikkanto  naanaaverajjakaa bhikkhuu gihiina.m upasa"nkamitvaa aaroceti -- `mahaa  kho, aavuso, bhikkhusa"ngho abhikkanto naanaaverajjakaa bhikkhuu,  karotha pu~n~naani, samayo pu~n~naani kaatu'nti; catunna.m jhaanaana.m  aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti  akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi  dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu aavaasassa bahuupakaaro  hotii''ti. catuttha.m.
text.1494: [03] 235^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0244^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  aavaasiko bhikkhu gihiina.m {gihi.m (syaa0), gihii (katthaci)} anukampati.   katamehi pa~ncahi?  adhisiile {adhisiilesu (syaa0)} samaadapeti; dhammadassane niveseti; gilaanake upasa"nkamitvaa  sati.m uppaadeti -- `arahaggata.m aayasmanto ^a^P3.0264^ea^ sati.m  upa.t.thaapethaa'ti; mahaa kho pana bhikkhusa"ngho abhikkanto naanaaverajjakaa  bhikkhuu gihiina.m upasa"nkamitvaa aaroceti -- `mahaa kho, aavuso,  bhikkhusa"ngho abhikkanto naanaaverajjakaa bhikkhuu, karotha pu~n~naani,  samayo pu~n~naani kaatu'nti; ya.m kho panassa bhojana.m denti luukha.m vaa  pa.niita.m vaa ta.m attanaa paribhu~njati, saddhaadeyya.m na vinipaateti. imehi  kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu  gihiina.m anukampatii''ti. pa~ncama.m.
text.1496: [03] 236^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^T3.0293^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  aavaasiko bhikkhu yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye. katamehi  pa~ncahi? ananuvicca apariyogaahetvaa ava.n.naarahassa va.n.na.m bhaasati;  ananuvicca apariyogaahetvaa va.n.naarahassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati; ananuvicca  apariyogaahetvaa appasaadaniiye .thaane pasaada.m upada.mseti; ananuvicca  apariyogaahetvaa ^a^M2.0231^ea^ pasaadaniiye .thaane appasaada.m upada.mseti; saddhaadeyya.m  vinipaateti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato  aavaasiko bhikkhu yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye.
text.1497: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu  yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge. katamehi pa~ncahi? anuvicca  pariyogaahetvaa ava.n.naarahassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati; anuvicca pariyogaahetvaa  va.n.naarahassa va.n.na.m bhaasati; anuvicca pariyogaahetvaa appasaadaniiye  .thaane appasaada.m upada.mseti; anuvicca pariyogaahetvaa pasaadaniiye .thaane  pasaada.m upada.mseti; saddhaadeyya.m na vinipaateti. imehi kho, bhikkhave,  pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu yathaabhata.m nikkhitto  eva.m sagge''ti. cha.t.tha.m.
text.1499: [03] 237^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0245^ea^ ^a^P3.0265^ea^, bhikkhave,  dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m  niraye. katamehi pa~ncahi? ananuvicca apariyogaahetvaa  ava.n.naarahassa va.n.na.m bhaasati; ananuvicca apariyogaahetvaa va.n.naarahassa  ava.n.na.m bhaasati; aavaasamaccharii hoti aavaasapaligedhii; kulamaccharii  hoti kulapaligedhii; saddhaadeyya.m vinipaateti. imehi ^a^T3.0294^ea^ kho, bhikkhave,  pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu yathaabhata.m nikkhitto  eva.m niraye.
text.15: [03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m ^a^T3.0003^ea^ -- `saddhaabalena  samannaagataa bhavissaama sekhabalena, hiriibalena... ottappabalena  ^a^P3.0003^ea^... viiriyabalena... pa~n~naabalena samannaagataa bhavissaama  sekhabalenaa'ti. eva~nhi kho, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. dutiya.m.
text.1500: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu  yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge. katamehi pa~ncahi? anuvicca  pariyogaahetvaa ava.n.naarahassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati; anuvicca pariyogaahetvaa  va.n.naarahassa va.n.na.m bhaasati; na aavaasamaccharii hoti na  aavaasapaligedhii; na kulamaccharii hoti na kulapaligedhii; saddhaadeyya.m  na vinipaateti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato  aavaasiko bhikkhu yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge''ti. sattama.m.
text.1502: [03] 238^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  aavaasiko bhikkhu yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye. katamehi  pa~ncahi? ananuvicca apariyogaahetvaa ^a^M2.0232^ea^ ava.n.naarahassa va.n.na.m bhaasati;  ananuvicca apariyogaahetvaa va.n.naarahassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati;  aavaasamaccharii hoti; kulamaccharii hoti; laabhamaccharii hoti.  imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko  bhikkhu yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye.
text.1503: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu  yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge. katamehi pa~ncahi? anuvicca  pariyogaahetvaa ava.n.naarahassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati; anuvicca pariyogaahetvaa  va.n.naarahassa va.n.na.m bhaasati ^a^P3.0266^ea^; na aavaasamaccharii  hoti; na kulamaccharii hoti ^a^V2.0246^ea^; na laabhamaccharii hoti. imehi kho,  bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu yathaabhata.m  nikkhitto eva.m sagge''ti. a.t.thama.m.

text.1537: [03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncime aadiinavaa sivathikuupame  puggale. katame pa~nca? idha ^a^P3.0269^ea^, bhikkhave, ekacco  puggalo asucinaa kaayakammena samannaagato hoti; asucinaa  vaciikammena samannaagato hoti; asucinaa manokammena samannaagato  hoti. idamassa asucitaaya vadaami. seyyathaapi saa, bhikkhave,  sivathikaa asuci; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.
text.1538: [03] ``tassa asucinaa kaayakammena samannaagatassa, asucinaa  vaciikammena samannaagatassa, asucinaa manokammena samannaagatassa  paapako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati. idamassa duggandhataaya vadaami.  seyyathaapi saa, bhikkhave, sivathikaa duggandhaa; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave,  ima.m puggala.m vadaami.
text.1539: [03] ``tamena.m asucinaa kaayakammena samannaagata.m, asucinaa  vaciikammena samannaagata.m, asucinaa manokammena samannaagata.m pesalaa  sabrahmacaarii aarakaa parivajjanti. idamassa sappa.tibhayasmi.m vadaami.  seyyathaapi saa, bhikkhave, sivathikaa sappa.tibhayaa; tathuupamaaha.m,  bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.
text.1540: [03] ``so asucinaa kaayakammena samannaagato, asucinaa  vaciikammena samannaagato ^a^T3.0299^ea^, asucinaa manokammena samannaagato sabhaagehi  puggalehi saddhi.m sa.mvasati. idamassa vaa.laavaasasmi.m ^a^V2.0251^ea^ vadaami.  seyyathaapi saa ^a^M2.0236^ea^, bhikkhave, sivathikaa vaa.laana.m amanussaana.m aavaaso;  tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.
text.1541: [01] ``tamena.m asucinaa kaayakammena samannaagata.m, asucinaa  vaciikammena samannaagata.m, asucinaa manokammena samannaagata.m pesalaa  sabrahmacaarii disvaa khiiyadhamma.m {khiiyanadhamma.m (sii0)} aapajjanti -- `aho vata no dukkha.m  ye maya.m evaruupehi puggalehi saddhi.m sa.mvasaamaa'ti! idamassa  aarodanaaya vadaami. seyyathaapi saa, bhikkhave, sivathikaa bahuno  janassa aarodanaa; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. ime  kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa sivathikuupame puggale''ti. navama.m.
text.1543: [03] 250^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^P3.0270^ea^, bhikkhave,  aadiinavaa puggalappasaade. katame pa~nca? yasmi.m, bhikkhave, puggale  puggalo abhippasanno hoti, so tathaaruupa.m aapatti.m aapanno hoti  yathaaruupaaya aapattiyaa sa"ngho ukkhipati. tassa eva.m hoti --  `yo kho myaaya.m puggalo piyo manaapo so sa"nghena ukkhitto'ti.  bhikkhuusu appasaadabahulo hoti. bhikkhuusu appasaadabahulo samaano  a~n~ne bhikkhuu na bhajati. a~n~ne bhikkhuu abhajanto saddhamma.m na  su.naati. saddhamma.m asu.nanto saddhammaa parihaayati. aya.m, bhikkhave,  pa.thamo aadiinavo puggalappasaade.
text.1544: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, yasmi.m puggale puggalo abhippasanno  hoti, so tathaaruupa.m aapatti.m aapanno hoti yathaaruupaaya aapattiyaa  sa"ngho ante nisiidaapeti ^a^T3.0300^ea^. tassa eva.m hoti -- `yo kho myaaya.m  puggalo piyo manaapo so sa"nghena ante nisiidaapito'ti.  bhikkhuusu appasaadabahulo hoti. bhikkhuusu appasaadabahulo samaano  a~n~ne bhikkhuu na bhajati. a~n~ne bhikkhuu abhajanto saddhamma.m na  su.naati. saddhamma.m asu.nanto saddhammaa parihaayati. aya.m, bhikkhave,  dutiyo aadiinavo puggalappasaade.

text.1599: [03] 286^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0260^ea^ ^a^M2.0243^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye. katamehi pa~ncahi?  paa.naatipaatii hoti, adinnaadaayii hoti, abrahmacaarii hoti, musaavaadii  hoti, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaayii hoti. imehi ^a^P3.0276^ea^  kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu yathaabhata.m  nikkhitto eva.m niraye.
text.160: [03] 32^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^P3.0035^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe  viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho cundii raajakumaarii  pa~ncahi rathasatehi pa~ncahi ca kumaarisatehi parivutaa yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.  ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho cundii raajakumaarii bhagavanta.m etadavoca --
text.1600: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu yathaabhata.m  nikkhitto eva.m sagge. katamehi pa~ncahi ^a^T3.0307^ea^? paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato  hoti, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, abrahmacariyaa pa.tivirato hoti,  musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato  hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu  yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge''ti. pa.thama.m.
text.1602: [03] 287-292^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagataa  bhikkhunii...pe0... sikkhamaanaa... saama.nero... saama.nerii...  upaasako... upaasikaa yathaabhata.m nikkhittaa eva.m niraye. katamehi  pa~ncahi? paa.naatipaatinii hoti, adinnaadaayinii hoti,  kaamesumicchaacaarinii hoti, musaavaadinii hoti,  suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaayinii hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi  dhammehi samannaagataa upaasikaa yathaabhata.m nikkhittaa eva.m niraye.
text.1603: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagataa upaasikaa yathaabhata.m  nikkhittaa eva.m sagge. katamehi pa~ncahi? paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirataa  hoti, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirataa hoti, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirataa  hoti, musaavaadaa pa.tivirataa ^a^V2.0261^ea^ hoti, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa  pa.tivirataa hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi  samannaagataa upaasikaa yathaabhata.m nikkhittaa eva.m sagge''ti. sattama.m.
text.1605: [03] 293^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^M2.0244^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  aajiivako yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye. katamehi pa~ncahi?  paa.naatipaatii hoti, adinnaadaayii hoti, abrahmacaarii hoti, musaavaadii  hoti, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaayii hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave,  pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato ^a^T3.0308^ea^ aajiivako yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m  niraye''ti. a.t.thama.m.
text.1607: [03] 294-302^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  niga.n.tho...pe0... mu.n.dasaavako... ja.tilako... paribbaajako...  maaga.n.diko... teda.n.diko... aaruddhako... gotamako... devadhammiko  ^a^P3.0277^ea^ yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye. katamehi  pa~ncahi? paa.naatipaatii hoti, adinnaadaayii hoti...pe0...  suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaayii hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi  dhammehi samannaagato devadhammiko yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye''ti.  sattarasama.m.
text.161: [03] ``amhaaka.m, bhante, bhaataa cundo naama ^a^T3.0037^ea^ raajakumaaro, so evamaaha  -- `yadeva so hoti itthii vaa puriso vaa buddha.m sara.na.m gato, dhamma.m  sara.na.m gato, sa"ngha.m sara.na.m gato, paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato,  adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato, musaavaadaa  pa.tivirato, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato, so kaayassa bhedaa  para.m mara.naa sugati.myeva upapajjati, no duggati'nti. saaha.m, bhante,  bhagavanta.m pucchaami -- `katha.mruupe kho, bhante, satthari pasanno kaayassa  bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.myeva upapajjati, no duggati.m? katha.mruupe dhamme  pasanno kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.myeva upapajjati, no duggati.m?  katha.mruupe sa"nghe pasanno kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.myeva  upapajjati, no duggati.m? katha.mruupesu siilesu paripuurakaarii kaayassa  bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.myeva upapajjati, no duggati'''nti?
text.1610: [03] 303^b^.^eb^ ``raagassa ^a^V2.0262^ea^, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya pa~nca dhammaa  bhaavetabbaa. katame pa~nca? asubhasa~n~naa, mara.nasa~n~naa,  aadiinavasa~n~naa, aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~naa, sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~naa {sabbatthapi  evameva dissati} --  raagassa, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya ime pa~nca dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti.
text.1611: [03] 304^b^.^eb^ ``raagassa, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya pa~nca dhammaa  bhaavetabbaa. katame pa~nca? aniccasa~n~naa, anattasa~n~naa, mara.nasa~n~naa,  aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~naa, sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~naa -- raagassa,  bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya ime pa~nca dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti.
text.1612: [03] 305^b^.^eb^ ``raagassa ^a^M2.0245^ea^, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya pa~nca dhammaa  bhaavetabbaa. katame pa~nca? aniccasa~n~naa, anicce dukkhasa~n~naa,  dukkhe anattasa~n~naa, pahaanasa~n~naa, viraagasa~n~naa -- raagassa, bhikkhave,  abhi~n~naaya ime pa~nca dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti.
text.1613: [03] 306^b^.^eb^ ``raagassa, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya pa~nca dhammaa  bhaavetabbaa. katame pa~nca? saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m,  samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m -- raagassa, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya ime  pa~nca dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti.
text.1614: [03] 307^b^.^eb^ ``raagassa ^a^T3.0309^ea^ ^a^P3.0278^ea^, bhikkhave,  abhi~n~naaya pa~nca dhammaa bhaavetabbaa. katame pa~nca? saddhaabala.m,  viiriyabala.m, satibala.m, samaadhibala.m, pa~n~naabala.m -- raagassa, bhikkhave,  abhi~n~naaya ime pa~nca dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti.
text.1615: [03] 308-1151^b^.^eb^ ``raagassa, bhikkhave, pari~n~naaya...  parikkhayaaya... pahaanaaya... khayaaya... vayaaya... viraagaaya...  nirodhaaya... caagaaya... pa.tinissaggaaya pa~nca dhammaa bhaavetabbaa.  dosassa... mohassa... kodhassa... upanaahassa... makkhassa...  pa.laasassa... issaaya... macchariyassa... maayaaya... saa.theyyassa...  thambhassa... saarambhassa... maanassa... atimaanassa ^a^V2.0263^ea^ ... madassa...  pamaadassa abhi~n~naaya... pari~n~naaya... parikkhayaaya... pahaanaaya...  khayaaya... vayaaya... viraagaaya... nirodhaaya... caagaaya...  pa.tinissaggaaya pa~nca dhammaa bhaavetabbaa.
text.1616: [03] ``katame pa~nca? saddhaabala.m, viiriyabala.m, satibala.m,  samaadhibala.m, pa~n~naabala.m -- pamaadassa, bhikkhave, pa.tinissaggaaya ime  pa~nca dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti.
text.162: [03] ``yaavataa, cundi, sattaa apadaa vaa dvipadaa vaa catuppadaa vaa  bahuppadaa vaa {apaadaa vaa dviipaadaa vaacatuppaadaa vaa bahuppaadaa vaa (sii0) a0 ni0  4.34;  itivu0 90} ruupino vaa aruupino vaa sa~n~nino vaa asa~n~nino vaa  nevasa~n~ninaasa~n~nino vaa, tathaagato tesa.m aggamakkhaayati ^a^V2.0031^ea^ araha.m  sammaasambuddho. ye kho, cundi, buddhe pasannaa, agge te pasannaa.  agge kho pana pasannaana.m aggo vipaako hoti.
text.163: [03] ``yaavataa, cundi, dhammaa sa"nkhataa, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo  tesa.m aggamakkhaayati. ye, cundi, ariye a.t.tha"ngike magge pasannaa,  agge te pasannaa, agge kho pana pasannaana.m aggo vipaako hoti.
text.164: [03] ``yaavataa ^a^M2.0030^ea^, cundi, dhammaa sa"nkhataa vaa asa"nkhataa vaa,  viraago tesa.m {tesa.m dhammaana.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)} aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- madanimmadano pipaasavinayo  aalayasamugghaato va.t.tupacchedo ta.nhaakkhayo viraago nirodho nibbaana.m.  ye kho, cundi ^a^P3.0036^ea^, viraage ^a^T3.0038^ea^ dhamme pasannaa, agge te  pasannaa. agge kho pana pasannaana.m aggo vipaako hoti.
text.165: [03] ``yaavataa, cundi, sa"nghaa vaa ga.naa vaa, tathaagatasaavakasa"ngho  tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- cattaari purisayugaani a.t.tha  purisapuggalaa, esa bhagavato saavakasa"ngho aahuneyyo paahuneyyo  dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. ye  kho, cundi, sa"nghe pasannaa, agge te pasannaa. agge kho pana  pasannaana.m aggo vipaako hoti.
text.166: [03] ``yaavataa, cundi, siilaani, ariyakantaani siilaani   tesa.m {ariyakantaanitesa.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}  aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- akha.n.daani acchiddaani asabalaani  akammaasaani bhujissaani vi~n~nuppasatthaani aparaama.t.thaani  samaadhisa.mvattanikaani. ye kho, cundi, ariyakantesu siilesu  paripuurakaarino, agge te paripuurakaarino. agge kho pana  paripuurakaariina.m aggo vipaako hotii''ti.
text.17: [03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu di.t.theva dhamme dukkha.m viharati savighaata.m saupaayaasa.m sapari.laaha.m,  kaayassa ca bhedaa para.m mara.naa ^a^M2.0003^ea^ duggati paa.tika"nkhaa. katamehi pa~ncahi?  idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti,  anottappii hoti, kusiito hoti, duppa~n~no hoti. imehi kho,  bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu di.t.theva dhamme dukkha.m  viharati savighaata.m saupaayaasa.m sapari.laaha.m, kaayassa ca bhedaa para.m  mara.naa duggati paa.tika"nkhaa.

text.174: [22] devabhuuto manusso vaa, aggappatto pamodatii''ti..  dutiya.m.
text.176: [03] 33^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa bhaddiye viharati jaatiyaa  vane. atha kho uggaho ^a^T3.0039^ea^ me.n.dakanattaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m  nisinno kho uggaho me.n.dakanattaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca --
text.177: [03] ``adhivaasetu ^a^M2.0031^ea^ me, bhante, bhagavaa svaatanaaya attacatuttho  bhatta''nti ^a^P3.0037^ea^. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena.  atha kho uggaho me.n.dakanattaa bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa  u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.
text.178: [03] atha kho bhagavaa tassaa rattiyaa accayena pubba.nhasamaya.m  nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena uggahassa me.n.dakanattuno nivesana.m  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho  uggaho me.n.dakanattaa bhagavanta.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa  santappesi sampavaaresi. atha kho uggaho me.n.dakanattaa bhagavanta.m  bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho  uggaho me.n.dakanattaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``imaa me, bhante,  kumaariyo patikulaani gamissanti. ovadatu taasa.m, bhante, bhagavaa;  anusaasatu taasa.m, bhante, bhagavaa, ya.m taasa.m assa diigharatta.m hitaaya  sukhaayaa''ti.
text.179: [03] atha kho bhagavaa taa kumaariyo etadavoca -- ``tasmaatiha,  kumaariyo, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `yassa vo {yassa kho (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} maataapitaro bhattuno  dassanti atthakaamaa hitesino anukampakaa anukampa.m upaadaaya, tassa  bhavissaama pubbu.t.thaayiniyo pacchaanipaatiniyo ki.mkaarapa.tissaaviniyo  ^a^V2.0033^ea^ manaapacaariniyo piyavaadiniyo'ti. eva~nhi vo, kumaariyo,  sikkhitabba.m.
text.18: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu di.t.theva dhamme  sukha.m viharati avighaata.m anupaayaasa.m apari.laaha.m, kaayassa ca bhedaa para.m  mara.naa sugati paa.tika"nkhaa. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu saddho hoti, hiriimaa hoti, ottappii hoti, aaraddhaviiriyo  hoti, pa~n~navaa hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi  samannaagato bhikkhu di.t.theva dhamme sukha.m viharati avighaata.m anupaayaasa.m  apari.laaha.m, kaayassa ca bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati paa.tika"nkhaa''ti.  tatiya.m.
text.180: [03] ``tasmaatiha, kumaariyo, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `ye te bhattu  garuno {guruno (ka0)} bhavissanti maataati vaa pitaati vaa sama.nabraahma.naati vaa, te  sakkarissaama garu.m karissaama {garukarissaama (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} maanessaama   puujessaama abbhaagate ca  aasanodakena pa.tipuujessaamaa'ti {puujessaamaati (sii0)}. eva~nhi vo, kumaariyo,  sikkhitabba.m.
text.181: [03] ``tasmaatiha ^a^T3.0040^ea^, kumaariyo, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `ye te bhattu  abbhantaraa kammantaa u.n.naati vaa kappaasaati vaa, tattha dakkhaa  bhavissaama analasaa ^a^M2.0032^ea^, tatrupaayaaya viima.msaaya samannaagataa, ala.m kaatu.m  ala.m sa.mvidhaatu'nti. eva~nhi vo, kumaariyo, sikkhitabba.m.
text.182: [03] ``tasmaatiha, kumaariyo, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `yo so bhattu  abbhantaro {abbhantare (ka0)} antojano daasaati vaa pessaati vaa ^a^P3.0038^ea^  kammakaraati vaa, tesa.m kata~nca katato jaanissaama akata~nca akatato  jaanissaama, gilaanakaana~nca balaabala.m jaanissaama, khaadaniiya.m  bhojaniiya~ncassa pacca.msena {paccaya.m tena (ka0 sii0), paccaya.msena (syaa0 ka.m0),  paccaya.m senaasana.m paccatta.msena (ka0) a0 ni0  8.46} sa.mvibhajissaamaa'ti  {vibhajissaamaati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}. eva~nhi vo, kumaariyo, sikkhitabba.m.
text.183: [03] ``tasmaatiha, kumaariyo, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `ya.m bhattaa  aaharissati dhana.m vaa dha~n~na.m vaa rajata.m vaa jaataruupa.m vaa, ta.m aarakkhena  {ta.m aarakkhaaya (sii0)} guttiyaa sampaadessaama, tattha ca bhavissaama adhuttii athenii aso.n.dii  avinaasikaayo'ti. eva~nhi vo, kumaariyo, sikkhitabba.m. imehi  kho, kumaariyo, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato maatugaamo kaayassa bhedaa  para.m mara.naa manaapakaayikaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjatii''ti.
text.184: [21] ``yo na.m bharati sabbadaa, nicca.m aataapi ussuko.
text.186: [21] ``na ^a^T3.0041^ea^ caapi sotthi bhattaara.m, issaacaarena {icchaacaarena (sii0),  issaavaadena (pii0)} rosaye.
text.187: [22] bhattu ca garuno sabbe, pa.tipuujeti pa.n.ditaa..
text.191: [22] manaapaa naama te devaa, yattha saa upapajjatii''ti..  tatiya.m.
text.193: [03] 34^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane  kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. atha kho siiho senaapati yena bhagavaa ^a^P3.0039^ea^  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^M2.0033^ea^ bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho siiho senaapati bhagavanta.m  etadavoca -- ``sakkaa nu kho, bhante, bhagavaa sandi.t.thika.m daanaphala.m  pa~n~naapetu''nti?
text.194: [03] ``sakkaa, siihaa''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ``daayako, siiha,  daanapati bahuno janassa piyo hoti manaapo. yampi, siiha, daayako  daanapati bahuno janassa piyo hoti manaapo, idampi sandi.t.thika.m  daanaphala.m.

text.197: [03] ``puna capara.m, siiha, daayako daanapati ya.m yadeva parisa.m  upasa"nkamati -- yadi khattiyaparisa.m yadi braahma.naparisa.m yadi  gahapatiparisa.m yadi sama.naparisa.m -- visaarado ^a^T3.0042^ea^ {visaaradova (sii0) a0 ni0  7.57  passitabba.m} upasa"nkamati ama"nkubhuuto.  yampi, siiha, daayako daanapati ya.m yadeva parisa.m upasa"nkamati --  yadi ^a^V2.0035^ea^ khattiyaparisa.m yadi braahma.naparisa.m yadi gahapatiparisa.m yadi  sama.naparisa.m -- visaarado upasa"nkamati ama"nkubhuuto, idampi sandi.t.thika.m  daanaphala.m.

text.199: [03] eva.m vutte siiho senaapati bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``yaanimaani, bhante, bhagavataa cattaari sandi.t.thikaani daanaphalaani  akkhaataani, naaha.m ettha bhagavato saddhaaya gacchaami; aha.m petaani  jaanaami. aha.m, bhante, daayako daanapati bahuno janassa piyo  manaapo. aha.m, bhante, daayako daanapati; ma.m santo sappurisaa  bhajanti. aha.m, bhante, daayako daanapati; mayha.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo  abbhuggato -- `siiho senaapati daayako kaarako ^a^M2.0034^ea^ sa"nghupa.t.thaako'ti.  aha.m, bhante ^a^P3.0040^ea^, daayako daanapati ya.m yadeva parisa.m  upasa"nkamaami -- yadi khattiyaparisa.m yadi braahma.naparisa.m yadi  gahapatiparisa.m yadi sama.naparisa.m -- visaarado upasa"nkamaami  ama"nkubhuuto. yaanimaani, bhante, bhagavataa cattaari sandi.t.thikaani  daanaphalaani akkhaataani, naaha.m ettha bhagavato saddhaaya gacchaami; aha.m  petaani jaanaami. ya~nca kho ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa evamaaha --  `daayako, siiha, daanapati kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m  loka.m upapajjatii'ti, etaaha.m na jaanaami; ettha ca panaaha.m ^a^T3.0043^ea^ bhagavato  saddhaaya gacchaamii''ti. ``evameta.m, siiha, evameta.m, siiha! daayako  daanapati kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjatii''ti.

text.299: [03] 43^b^.^eb^ atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.  ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.30: [03] ``na taava, bhikkhave, akusalassa samaapatti hoti yaava pa~n~naa  paccupa.t.thitaa hoti kusalesu dhammesu. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, pa~n~naa  antarahitaa hoti, duppa~n~naa {duppa~n~na.m (ka0)} pariyu.t.thaaya ti.t.thati; atha akusalassa  samaapatti hotii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.
text.300: [03] ``pa~ncime, gahapati, dhammaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa dullabhaa  lokasmi.m. katame pa~nca? aayu, gahapati, i.t.tho kanto manaapo  dullabho lokasmi.m; va.n.no i.t.tho kanto manaapo dullabho lokasmi.m; sukha.m  i.t.tha.m kanta.m manaapa.m dullabha.m lokasmi.m; yaso i.t.tho kanto manaapo dullabho  lokasmi.m; saggaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa dullabhaa lokasmi.m. ime ^a^T3.0052^ea^ kho,  gahapati, pa~nca dhammaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa dullabhaa lokasmi.m.
text.301: [03] ``imesa.m ^a^V2.0044^ea^ kho, gahapati, pa~ncanna.m dhammaana.m i.t.thaana.m kantaana.m  manaapaana.m dullabhaana.m lokasmi.m na aayaacanahetu ^a^P3.0048^ea^ vaa  patthanaahetu vaa {na patthanaahetu vaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pa.tilaabha.m   vadaami. imesa.m kho, gahapati, pa~ncanna.m  dhammaana.m i.t.thaana.m kantaana.m manaapaana.m dullabhaana.m lokasmi.m aayaacanahetu vaa  patthanaahetu vaa pa.tilaabho abhavissa, ko idha kena haayetha?
text.302: [03] ``na kho, gahapati, arahati ariyasaavako aayukaamo aayu.m  aayaacitu.m vaa abhinanditu.m vaa aayussa vaapi hetu. aayukaamena,  gahapati, ariyasaavakena aayusa.mvattanikaa pa.tipadaa pa.tipajjitabbaa.  aayusa.mvattanikaa hissa pa.tipadaa pa.tipannaa aayupa.tilaabhaaya sa.mvattati.  so laabhii hoti aayussa dibbassa vaa maanusassa vaa.
text.303: [03] ``na kho, gahapati, arahati ariyasaavako va.n.nakaamo va.n.na.m  aayaacitu.m vaa abhinanditu.m vaa va.n.nassa vaapi hetu. va.n.nakaamena,  gahapati, ariyasaavakena va.n.nasa.mvattanikaa pa.tipadaa pa.tipajjitabbaa.  va.n.nasa.mvattanikaa hissa pa.tipadaa pa.tipannaa va.n.napa.tilaabhaaya sa.mvattati.  so laabhii hoti va.n.nassa dibbassa vaa maanusassa vaa.
text.304: [03] ``na ^a^M2.0042^ea^ kho, gahapati, arahati ariyasaavako sukhakaamo sukha.m  aayaacitu.m vaa abhinanditu.m vaa sukhassa vaapi hetu. sukhakaamena,  gahapati, ariyasaavakena sukhasa.mvattanikaa pa.tipadaa pa.tipajjitabbaa.  sukhasa.mvattanikaa hissa pa.tipadaa pa.tipannaa sukhapa.tilaabhaaya sa.mvattati.  so laabhii hoti sukhassa dibbassa vaa maanusassa vaa.
text.305: [03] ``na kho, gahapati, arahati ariyasaavako yasakaamo yasa.m ^a^T3.0053^ea^  aayaacitu.m vaa abhinanditu.m vaa yasassa vaapi hetu. yasakaamena,  gahapati, ariyasaavakena yasasa.mvattanikaa pa.tipadaa pa.tipajjitabbaa.  yasasa.mvattanikaa hissa pa.tipadaa pa.tipannaa yasapa.tilaabhaaya sa.mvattati.  so laabhii hoti yasassa dibbassa vaa maanusassa vaa.
text.306: [03] ``na kho, gahapati, arahati ariyasaavako saggakaamo sagga.m  aayaacitu.m vaa abhinanditu.m vaa saggaana.m vaapi hetu. saggakaamena,  gahapati, ariyasaavakena saggasa.mvattanikaa pa.tipadaa ^a^V2.0045^ea^ pa.tipajjitabbaa.  saggasa.mvattanikaa hissa pa.tipadaa pa.tipannaa saggapa.tilaabhaaya sa.mvattati.  so laabhii hoti saggaana''nti.
text.311: [21] ``di.t.the dhamme ca {di.t.theva dhamme (sii0)} yo attho, yo cattho samparaayiko.
text.314: [03] 44^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane  kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa  pattaciivaramaadaaya yena uggassa gahapatino vesaalikassa nivesana.m  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho  uggo gahapati vesaaliko ^a^T3.0054^ea^ yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ^a^M2.0043^ea^ ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho  uggo gahapati vesaaliko bhagavanta.m etadavoca --
text.315: [03] ``sammukhaa meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m --  `manaapadaayii labhate manaapa'nti. manaapa.m me, bhante, saalapupphaka.m {saalipupphaka.m  (ka0)} khaadaniiya.m; ta.m me bhagavaa pa.tigga.nhaatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti.  pa.tiggahesi bhagavaa anukampa.m upaadaaya.
text.316: [03] ``sammukhaa meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m --  `manaapadaayii labhate manaapa'nti. manaapa.m me, bhante, sampannakolaka.m  suukarama.msa.m {sampannasuukarama.msa.m (sii0), sampannavarasuukarama.msa.m (syaa0)}; ta.m   me bhagavaa pa.tigga.nhaatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti.  pa.tiggahesi bhagavaa anukampa.m upaadaaya.
text.317: [03] ``sammukhaa ^a^V2.0046^ea^ meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m --  `manaapadaayii labhate manaapa'nti. manaapa.m me, bhante,   nibbattatelaka.m {nibaddhatelaka.m (pii0 sii0 a.t.tha0), nibba.t.tatelaka.m (syaa0  a.t.tha0)}  naaliyasaaka.m; ta.m me bhagavaa pa.tigga.nhaatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti.  pa.tiggahesi bhagavaa anukampa.m upaadaaya.
text.318: [03] ``sammukhaa meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m --  `manaapadaayii labhate manaapa'nti. manaapo me, bhante, saaliina.m odano  vicitakaa.lako {vigatakaalako (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} anekasuupo   anekabya~njano; ta.m me bhagavaa pa.tigga.nhaatu  anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. pa.tiggahesi bhagavaa anukampa.m upaadaaya.
text.319: [03] ``sammukhaa ^a^P3.0050^ea^ meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m  sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `manaapadaayii labhate manaapa'nti. manaapaani  me, bhante, kaasikaani vatthaani; taani me bhagavaa pa.tigga.nhaatu  anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. pa.tiggahesi bhagavaa anukampa.m upaadaaya.
text.32: [03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, sattaa kaamesu la.litaa {palaa.litaa  (sii0)}.  asitabyaabha"ngi.m {asitabyaabha"ngi cepi (?)}, bhikkhave, kulaputto ohaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m  pabbajito hoti, `saddhaapabbajito kulaputto'ti ala.m vacanaaya. ta.m  kissa hetu? labbhaa {labbhaa hi (syaa0)}, bhikkhave, yobbanena kaamaa te ca kho yaadisaa  vaa taadisaa vaa. ye ca, bhikkhave, hiinaa kaamaa ye ca majjhimaa  kaamaa ye ca pa.niitaa kaamaa ^a^V2.0006^ea^, sabbe kaamaa `kaamaa'tveva sa"nkha.m  gacchanti. seyyathaapi ^a^P3.0006^ea^, bhikkhave, daharo kumaaro  mando uttaanaseyyako dhaatiyaa pamaadamanvaaya ka.t.tha.m vaa ka.thala.m {kathala.m (ka0)} vaa mukhe  aahareyya. tamena.m dhaati siigha.m siigha.m {siighasiigha.m (sii0)} manasi kareyya; siigha.m siigha.m  manasi karitvaa siigha.m siigha.m aahareyya. no ce sakku.neyya siigha.m siigha.m  aaharitu.m, vaamena hatthena siisa.m pariggahetvaa dakkhi.nena hatthena  va"nka"nguli.m karitvaa salohitampi aahareyya. ta.m kissa hetu?  `atthesaa, bhikkhave, kumaarassa vihesaa; nesaa natthii'ti vadaami.  kara.niiya~nca kho eta.m {eva.m (ka0)}, bhikkhave, dhaatiyaa atthakaamaaya hitesiniyaa  anukampikaaya, anukampa.m upaadaaya. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, so  kumaaro vuddho ^a^T3.0007^ea^ hoti ala.mpa~n~no, anapekkhaa daani {anapekkhaa pana (sii0 syaa0  ka.m0)}, bhikkhave, dhaati  tasmi.m kumaare hoti -- `attagutto daani kumaaro naala.m pamaadaayaa'ti.
text.320: [03] ``sammukhaa meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m --  `manaapadaayii labhate manaapa'nti ^a^T3.0055^ea^. manaapo me, bhante, palla"nko  gonakatthato pa.talikatthato kadalimigapavarapaccatthara.no {kaadalimigapavarapaccatthara.no  (sii0)} sauttaracchado  ubhatolohitakuupadhaano. api ca, bhante, mayampeta.m jaanaama -- `neta.m  bhagavato kappatii'ti. ida.m me, bhante, candanaphalaka.m agghati  adhikasatasahassa.m; ta.m me bhagavaa ^a^M2.0044^ea^ pa.tigga.nhaatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti.  pa.tiggahesi bhagavaa anukampa.m upaadaaya. atha kho bhagavaa ugga.m  gahapati.m vesaalika.m iminaa anumodaniiyena anumodi --
text.322: [27] yo ujjubhuutesu {ujubhuutesu (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} dadaati chandasaa.
text.329: [03] atha kho bhagavaa ugga.m gahapati.m vesaalika.m iminaa  anumodaniiyena anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.
text.33: [03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, yaavakiiva~nca bhikkhuno saddhaaya  akata.m hoti kusalesu dhammesu, hiriyaa akata.m hoti kusalesu dhammesu,  ottappena akata.m hoti kusalesu dhammesu, viiriyena akata.m hoti  ^a^M2.0006^ea^ kusalesu dhammesu, pa~n~naaya akata.m hoti kusalesu dhammesu,  anurakkhitabbo taava me so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti. yato ca  kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno saddhaaya kata.m hoti kusalesu dhammesu,  hiriyaa kata.m hoti kusalesu dhammesu, ottappena kata.m hoti kusalesu  dhammesu, viiriyena kata.m hoti kusalesu dhammesu, pa~n~naaya kata.m hoti  kusalesu dhammesu, anapekkho daanaaha.m, bhikkhave {panaaha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}, tasmi.m bhikkhusmi.m  homi -- `attagutto daani bhikkhu naala.m pamaadaayaa'''ti. sattama.m.
text.330: [03] atha kho uggo gahapati vesaaliko aparena samayena  kaalamakaasi. kaala"nkato {kaalakato (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} ca uggo gahapati vesaaliko a~n~natara.m  manomaya.m kaaya.m upapajji. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho uggo  devaputto ^a^T3.0056^ea^ abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.no kevalakappa.m ^a^P3.0051^ea^  jetavana.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thita.m kho ugga.m  devaputta.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``kacci te, ugga, yathaadhippaayo''ti?  ``taggha me, bhagavaa, yathaadhippaayo''ti. atha kho bhagavaa ugga.m  devaputta.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
text.335: [21] ``yo ^a^M2.0045^ea^ aggadaayii varadaayii, se.t.thadaayii ca yo naro.
text.336: [22] diighaayu yasavaa hoti, yattha yatthuupapajjatii''ti..  catuttha.m.
text.338: [03] 45^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, pu~n~naabhisandaa  kusalaabhisandaa sukhassaahaaraa sovaggikaa sukhavipaakaa  saggasa.mvattanikaa i.t.thaaya kantaaya manaapaaya hitaaya sukhaaya sa.mvattanti.
text.339: [03] ``katame pa~nca? yassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ciivara.m  paribhu~njamaano appamaa.na.m cetosamaadhi.m ^a^V2.0048^ea^ upasampajja viharati, appamaa.no  tassa pu~n~naabhisando kusalaabhisando sukhassaahaaro sovaggiko  sukhavipaako saggasa.mvattaniko i.t.thaaya kantaaya manaapaaya hitaaya sukhaaya  sa.mvattati.
text.340: [03] ``yassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njamaano...pe0...  yassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihaara.m paribhu~njamaano...pe0... yassa,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu ma~ncapii.tha.m ^a^T3.0057^ea^ paribhu~njamaano...pe0....
text.341: [03] ``yassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m  paribhu~njamaano appamaa.na.m cetosamaadhi.m upasampajja ^a^P3.0052^ea^  viharati, appamaa.no tassa pu~n~naabhisando kusalaabhisando  sukhassaahaaro sovaggiko sukhavipaako saggasa.mvattaniko i.t.thaaya  kantaaya manaapaaya hitaaya sukhaaya sa.mvattati. ime kho, bhikkhave,  pa~nca pu~n~naabhisandaa kusalaabhisandaa sukhassaahaaraa sovaggikaa  sukhavipaakaa saggasa.mvattanikaa i.t.thaaya kantaaya manaapaaya hitaaya sukhaaya  sa.mvattanti.
text.342: [03] ``imehi ca pana, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi pu~n~naabhisandehi  kusalaabhisandehi samannaagatassa ariyasaavakassa na sukara.m pu~n~nassa  pamaa.na.m gahetu.m -- `ettako pu~n~naabhisando kusalaabhisando sukhassaahaaro  sovaggiko sukhavipaako saggasa.mvattaniko i.t.thaaya kantaaya manaapaaya  hitaaya sukhaaya sa.mvattatii'ti. atha kho asa"nkheyyo appameyyo  mahaapu~n~nakkhandhotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.
text.343: [03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, mahaasamudde na sukara.m udakassa pamaa.na.m  gahetu.m -- `ettakaani udakaa.lhakaaniiti vaa ^a^M2.0046^ea^ ettakaani  udakaa.lhakasataaniiti vaa ettakaani udakaa.lhakasahassaaniiti vaa  ettakaani udakaa.lhakasatasahassaaniiti vaa; atha kho asa"nkheyyo  appameyyo mahaaudakakkhandhotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati'. evameva.m kho,  bhikkhave, imehi pa~ncahi pu~n~naabhisandehi kusalaabhisandehi  samannaagatassa ariyasaavakassa na sukara.m pu~n~nassa pamaa.na.m gahetu.m --  `ettako pu~n~naabhisando kusalaabhisando sukhassaahaaro sovaggiko  sukhavipaako saggasa.mvattaniko ^a^T3.0058^ea^ i.t.thaaya kantaaya manaapaaya hitaaya sukhaaya  sa.mvattatii'ti. atha kho asa"nkheyyo appameyyo mahaapu~n~nakkhandhotveva  sa"nkha.m gacchatii''ti.
text.346: [26] najjo yathaa naraga.nasa"nghasevitaa {maccha ga.nasa.mghasevitaa (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)  sa.m0 ni0  5.1037 passitabba.m},
text.35: [03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme. katamehi pa~ncahi? asaddho,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme ^a^P3.0007^ea^.  ahiriko, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme.  anottappii, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme.  kusiito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme. duppa~n~no,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme. imehi kho,  bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu cavati, nappati.t.thaati  saddhamme.
text.353: [03] 46^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaa, bhikkhave, sampadaa. katamaa pa~nca?  saddhaasampadaa, siilasampadaa, sutasampadaa, caagasampadaa, pa~n~naasampadaa  -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca sampadaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.
text.355: [03] 47^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, dhanaani. katamaani  pa~nca? saddhaadhana.m, siiladhana.m, sutadhana.m, caagadhana.m, pa~n~naadhana.m.
text.356: [03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, saddhaadhana.m? idha, bhikkhave,  ariyasaavako saddho hoti, saddahati tathaagatassa bodhi.m -- `itipi  so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. ida.m  vuccati, bhikkhave, saddhaadhana.m.
text.357: [03] ``katama~nca ^a^M2.0047^ea^ ^a^V2.0050^ea^, bhikkhave, siiladhana.m? idha, bhikkhave,  ariyasaavako paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti...pe0...  suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa^a^T3.0059^ea^ pa.tivirato hoti. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave,  siiladhana.m.
text.358: [03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, sutadhana.m? idha, bhikkhave,  ariyasaavako bahussuto hoti...pe0... di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdho. ida.m  vuccati, bhikkhave, sutadhana.m.
text.359: [03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, caagadhana.m? idha, bhikkhave,  ariyasaavako vigatamalamaccherena cetasaa agaara.m ajjhaavasati muttacaago  payatapaa.ni vossaggarato yaacayogo daanasa.mvibhaagarato. ida.m vuccati,  bhikkhave, caagadhana.m.
text.36: [03] ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0007^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu na cavati,  pati.t.thaati saddhamme. katamehi pa~ncahi? saddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na  cavati ^a^T3.0008^ea^, pati.t.thaati saddhamme. hiriimaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati,  pati.t.thaati saddhamme. ottappii, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, pati.t.thaati  saddhamme. aaraddhaviiriyo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, pati.t.thaati  saddhamme. pa~n~navaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, pati.t.thaati saddhamme.  imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu na  cavati, pati.t.thaati saddhamme''ti. a.t.thama.m.
text.360: [03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, pa~n~naadhana.m? idha, bhikkhave,  ariyasaavako pa~n~navaa hoti, udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato  ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa. ida.m vuccati,  bhikkhave, pa~n~naadhana.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhanaanii''ti.
text.364: [22] adaliddoti ta.m aahu, amogha.m tassa jiivita.m..
text.366: [22] anuyu~njetha medhaavii, sara.m buddhaana saasana''nti..  sattama.m.
text.368: [03] 48^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, alabbhaniiyaani  .thaanaani sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa  kenaci vaa lokasmi.m. katamaani pa~nca? `jaraadhamma.m maa jiirii'ti  alabbhaniiya.m .thaana.m sama.nena ^a^T3.0060^ea^ vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa  brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m. `byaadhidhamma.m maa  byaadhiiyii'ti {vyaadhidhamma.m ``maa vyaadhiiyii''ti (sii0 pii0)} ...pe0... `mara.nadhamma.m   maa miiyii'ti... `khayadhamma.m maa  khiiyii'ti... `nassanadhamma.m maa nassii'ti alabbhaniiya.m .thaana.m sama.nena  vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa  lokasmi.m.
text.369: [03] ``assutavato ^a^V2.0051^ea^ ^a^M2.0048^ea^, bhikkhave, puthujjanassa jaraadhamma.m jiirati. so  jaraadhamme ji.n.ne na iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho mayhevekassa  {mayhamevekassa (sii0)} jaraadhamma.m jiirati, atha kho yaavataa sattaana.m aagati gati cuti  upapatti sabbesa.m sattaana.m jaraadhamma.m jiirati. aha~nceva {aha~nce (?)} kho pana  jaraadhamme ji.n.ne soceyya.m kilameyya.m parideveyya.m, urattaa.li.m kandeyya.m,  sammoha.m aapajjeyya.m, bhattampi me nacchaadeyya, kaayepi dubba.n.niya.m  okkameyya, kammantaapi nappavatteyyu.m {kammantopi nappavatteyya (ka0)}, amittaapi attamanaa assu,  mittaapi dummanaa assuu'ti. so jaraadhamme ji.n.ne socati kilamati  paridevati, urattaa.li.m kandati, sammoha.m aapajjati. aya.m vuccati,  bhikkhave -- `assutavaa puthujjano viddho savisena sokasallena  attaana.myeva paritaapeti'''.
text.370: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, assutavato puthujjanassa byaadhidhamma.m  ^a^P3.0055^ea^ byaadhiiyati...pe0... mara.nadhamma.m miiyati...  khayadhamma.m khiiyati... nassanadhamma.m nassati. so nassanadhamme na.t.the  na iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho mayhevekassa nassanadhamma.m  nassati, atha kho yaavataa sattaana.m aagati gati cuti upapatti sabbesa.m  sattaana.m nassanadhamma.m nassati. aha~nceva kho pana nassanadhamme na.t.the  soceyya.m kilameyya.m parideveyya.m, urattaa.li.m kandeyya.m ^a^T3.0061^ea^, sammoha.m aapajjeyya.m,  bhattampi me nacchaadeyya, kaayepi dubba.n.niya.m okkameyya, kammantaapi  nappavatteyyu.m, amittaapi attamanaa assu, mittaapi dummanaa assuu'ti.  so nassanadhamme na.t.the socati kilamati paridevati, urattaa.li.m  kandati, sammoha.m aapajjati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave -- `assutavaa  puthujjano viddho savisena sokasallena attaana.myeva paritaapeti'''.
text.371: [03] ``sutavato ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavakassa jaraadhamma.m  jiirati. so jaraadhamme ji.n.ne iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho  mayhevekassa jaraadhamma.m jiirati, atha kho yaavataa sattaana.m aagati gati  cuti upapatti sabbesa.m sattaana.m jaraadhamma.m jiirati. aha~nceva kho pana  jaraadhamme ji.n.ne soceyya.m kilameyya.m parideveyya.m, urattaa.li.m kandeyya.m,  sammoha.m aapajjeyya.m, bhattampi me nacchaadeyya, kaayepi dubba.n.niya.m  okkameyya, kammantaapi nappavatteyyu.m, amittaapi attamanaa assu,  mittaapi dummanaa assuu'ti. so jaraadhamme ji.n.ne na socati na  kilamati na paridevati, na urattaa.li.m kandati, na sammoha.m aapajjati  ^a^M2.0049^ea^. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave -- `sutavaa ariyasaavako   abbuhi {abbahi (sii0)} savisa.m  sokasalla.m, yena viddho assutavaa puthujjano attaana.myeva paritaapeti.  asoko visallo ariyasaavako attaana.myeva parinibbaapeti'''.
text.372: [03] ``puna ^a^V2.0052^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, sutavato ariyasaavakassa byaadhidhamma.m  byaadhiiyati...pe0... mara.nadhamma.m miiyati... khayadhamma.m khiiyati...  nassanadhamma.m nassati. so nassanadhamme ^a^T3.0062^ea^ na.t.the iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati  -- `na kho mayhevekassa nassanadhamma.m nassati, atha kho yaavataa  sattaana.m aagati gati cuti upapatti sabbesa.m sattaana.m nassanadhamma.m  ^a^P3.0056^ea^ nassati. aha~nceva kho pana nassanadhamme na.t.the  soceyya.m kilameyya.m parideveyya.m, urattaa.li.m kandeyya.m, sammoha.m aapajjeyya.m,  bhattampi me nacchaadeyya, kaayepi dubba.n.niya.m okkameyya, kammantaapi  nappavatteyyu.m, amittaapi attamanaa assu, mittaapi dummanaa assuu'ti.  so nassanadhamme na.t.the na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na  urattaa.li.m kandati, na sammoha.m aapajjati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave --  `sutavaa ariyasaavako abbuhi savisa.m sokasalla.m, yena viddho  assutavaa puthujjano attaana.myeva paritaapeti. asoko visallo  ariyasaavako attaana.myeva parinibbaapetii'''ti.
text.373: [03] ``imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca alabbhaniiyaani .thaanaani  sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa  lokasmi''nti.

text.38: [03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme. katamehi  pa~ncahi? assaddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso cavati,  nappati.t.thaati saddhamme. ahiriko, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaaravo  appatisso cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme. anottappii, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme. kusiito  ^a^M2.0007^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme.  duppa~n~no, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso cavati,  nappati.t.thaati saddhamme. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi  samannaagato bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme.
