text.387: [27] mayaava {mayaa vaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} a~n~nena vaa esa attho.
text.389: [22] kamma.m da.lha.m kinti karomi daanii''ti.. a.t.thama.m.
text.39: [03] ``pa~ncahi ^a^P3.0008^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu sagaaravo sappatisso na cavati, pati.t.thaati saddhamme.  katamehi pa~ncahi? saddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaaravo sappatisso na  cavati, pati.t.thaati saddhamme. hirimaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaaravo  sappatisso na cavati, pati.t.thaati saddhamme. ottappii, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu sagaaravo sappatisso ^a^T3.0009^ea^ na cavati, pati.t.thaati saddhamme.  aaraddhaviiriyo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaaravo sappatisso na cavati,  pati.t.thaati saddhamme. pa~n~navaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaaravo sappatisso  na cavati, pati.t.thaati saddhamme. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi  dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sagaaravo sappatisso na cavati,  pati.t.thaati saddhamme''ti. navama.m.
text.391: [03] 49^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^P3.0057^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa  saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho  raajaa pasenadi kosalo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.
text.392: [03] (tena kho pana samayena mallikaa devii kaala"nkataa hoti.) {( ) natthi  (sii0)} atha  kho a~n~nataro puriso yena raajaa pasenadi kosalo tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa upaka.n.nake aaroceti --  ``mallikaa devii, deva {deva devii (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, kaala"nkataa''ti. eva.m vutte raajaa pasenadi  kosalo dukkhii dummano pattakkhandho adhomukho pajjhaayanto  appa.tibhaano nisiidi.
text.393: [01] atha kho bhagavaa raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m dukkhi.m  dummana.m pattakkhandha.m adhomukha.m pajjhaayanta.m ^a^T3.0064^ea^ appa.tibhaana.m viditvaa raajaana.m  pasenadi.m kosala.m etadavoca -- ``pa~ncimaani, mahaaraaja,  alabbhaniiyaani .thaanaani sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena  vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m. katamaani pa~nca? `jaraadhamma.m  maa jiirii'ti alabbhaniiya.m .thaana.m...pe0... na socanaaya  paridevanaaya...pe0... kamma.m da.lha.m kinti karomi daanii''ti. navama.m.
text.395: [03] 50^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa naarado paa.taliputte  viharati kukku.taaraame. tena kho pana samayena mu.n.dassa ra~n~no bhaddaa  devii kaala"nkataa ^a^M2.0051^ea^ hoti piyaa manaapaa. so bhaddaaya deviyaa  kaala"nkataaya piyaaya manaapaaya neva nhaayati {nahaayati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} na   vilimpati na bhatta.m  bhu~njati na kammanta.m payojeti -- rattindiva.m {rattidiva.m (ka0)} bhaddaaya deviyaa sariire  ajjhomucchito. atha kho mu.n.do raajaa piyaka.m kosaarakkha.m {sokaarakkha.m  (syaa0)}  ^a^V2.0054^ea^ aamantesi -- ``tena hi, samma piyaka ^a^P3.0058^ea^, bhaddaaya  deviyaa sariira.m aayasaaya telado.niyaa pakkhipitvaa a~n~nissaa  aayasaaya do.niyaa pa.tikujjatha, yathaa maya.m bhaddaaya deviyaa sariira.m  ciratara.m passeyyaamaa''ti. ``eva.m, devaa''ti kho piyako  kosaarakkho mu.n.dassa ra~n~no pa.tissutvaa bhaddaaya deviyaa sariira.m  aayasaaya telado.niyaa pakkhipitvaa a~n~nissaa aayasaaya do.niyaa  pa.tikujji.
text.396: [03] atha kho piyakassa kosaarakkhassa etadahosi -- ``imassa  kho mu.n.dassa ra~n~no bhaddaa devii kaala"nkataa piyaa manaapaa. so bhaddaaya  deviyaa kaala"nkataaya piyaaya manaapaaya neva nhaayati na vilimpati na  bhatta.m bhu~njati na kammanta.m payojeti ^a^T3.0065^ea^ -- rattindiva.m bhaddaaya deviyaa  sariire ajjhomucchito. ka.m {ki.m (ka0)} nu kho mu.n.do raajaa sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m  vaa payirupaaseyya, yassa dhamma.m sutvaa sokasalla.m pajaheyyaa''ti!
text.397: [03] atha kho piyakassa kosaarakkhassa etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho  aayasmaa naarado paa.taliputte viharati kukku.taaraame. ta.m kho  panaayasmanta.m naarada.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `pa.n.dito  viyatto {vyatto (sii0 pii0), byatto (syaa0 ka.m0, dii0 ni0 2.407)} medhaavii   bahussuto cittakathii kalyaa.napa.tibhaano vuddho ceva {buddho ceva (ka0)}  arahaa ca' {arahaa caa'ti (?)}. ya.mnuuna mu.n.do raajaa aayasmanta.m naarada.m payirupaaseyya,  appeva naama mu.n.do raajaa aayasmato naaradassa dhamma.m sutvaa sokasalla.m  pajaheyyaa''ti.
text.398: [03] atha kho piyako kosaarakkho yena mu.n.do raajaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa mu.n.da.m raajaana.m etadavoca -- ``aya.m kho, deva, aayasmaa  naarado paa.taliputte viharati kukku.taaraame. ta.m kho panaayasmanta.m naarada.m  eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii  bahussuto cittakathii kalyaa.napa.tibhaano vuddho ceva ^a^M2.0052^ea^ arahaa ca' {arahaa  caa'ti (?)}. yadi  pana devo aayasmanta.m naarada.m payirupaaseyya, appeva naama devo  aayasmato naaradassa dhamma.m sutvaa sokasalla.m pajaheyyaa''ti. ``tena  hi, samma piyaka ^a^P3.0059^ea^, aayasmanta.m naarada.m pa.tivedehi.  katha~nhi naama maadiso sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa vijite vasanta.m pubbe  appa.tisa.mvidito upasa"nkamitabba.m ma~n~neyyaa''ti ^a^T3.0066^ea^! ``eva.m, devaa''ti  kho piyako kosaarakkho mu.n.dassa ra~n~no pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa  naarado tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m naarada.m abhivaadetvaa  ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho piyako kosaarakkho  aayasmanta.m naarada.m etadavoca --
text.399: [03] ``imassa ^a^V2.0055^ea^, bhante, mu.n.dassa ra~n~no bhaddaa devii kaala"nkataa piyaa  manaapaa. so bhaddaaya deviyaa kaala"nkataaya piyaaya manaapaaya neva  nhaayati na vilimpati na bhatta.m bhu~njati na kammanta.m payojeti --  rattindiva.m bhaddaaya deviyaa sariire ajjhomucchito. saadhu, bhante,  aayasmaa naarado mu.n.dassa ra~n~no tathaa dhamma.m desetu yathaa mu.n.do raajaa  aayasmato naaradassa dhamma.m sutvaa sokasalla.m pajaheyyaa''ti.  ``yassadaani, piyaka, mu.n.do raajaa kaala.m ma~n~natii''ti.
text.400: [03] atha kho piyako kosaarakkho u.t.thaayaasanaa aayasmanta.m naarada.m  abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena mu.n.do raajaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa mu.n.da.m raajaana.m etadavoca -- ``kataavakaaso kho, deva,  aayasmataa naaradena. yassadaani devo kaala.m ma~n~natii''ti. ``tena  hi, samma piyaka, bhadraani bhadraani yaanaani yojaapehii''ti. ``eva.m,  devaa''ti kho piyako kosaarakkho mu.n.dassa ra~n~no pa.tissutvaa  bhadraani bhadraani yaanaani yojaapetvaa mu.n.da.m raajaana.m etadavoca --  ``yuttaani kho te, deva, bhadraani bhadraani yaanaani. yassadaani  devo kaala.m ^a^T3.0067^ea^ ma~n~natii''ti.
text.401: [03] atha kho mu.n.do raajaa bhadra.m yaana.m {bhadra.m bhadra.m yaana.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0), bhadda.m yaana.m  (pii0)} abhiruhitvaa bhadrehi bhadrehi  yaanehi yena kukku.taaraamo tena paayaasi mahaccaa {mahacca (bahuusu)} raajaanubhaavena  aayasmanta.m naarada.m dassanaaya. yaavatikaa yaanassa bhuumi yaanena  gantvaa, yaanaa paccorohitvaa pattikova aaraama.m paavisi. atha kho  mu.n.do raajaa ^a^M2.0053^ea^ yena aayasmaa naarado tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  aayasmanta.m naarada.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m  ^a^P3.0060^ea^ nisinna.m kho mu.n.da.m raajaana.m aayasmaa naarado  etadavoca --

text.41: [03] 10^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0008^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso abhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m  viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? assaddho, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso abhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m  viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitu.m. ahiriko, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaaravo  appatisso abhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m  aapajjitu.m. anottappii, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso  abhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitu.m.  kusiito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso abhabbo imasmi.m  dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitu.m. duppa~n~no, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso abhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m  viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitu.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi  samannaagato bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso abhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye  vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitu.m.
text.42: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sagaaravo  sappatisso bhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m  aapajjitu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? saddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaaravo  sappatisso bhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye ^a^M2.0008^ea^ vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m  aapajjitu.m. hiriimaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu...pe0... ottappii, bhikkhave  ^a^P3.0009^ea^, bhikkhu...pe0... aaraddhaviiriyo, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu...pe0... pa~n~navaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaaravo sappatisso  bhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitu.m. imehi  kho, bhikkhave ^a^T3.0010^ea^, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sagaaravo  sappatisso bhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m  aapajjitu''nti. dasama.m.
text.423: [22] kamma.m da.lha.m kinti karomi daanii''ti {jaa0 1 jaatakepi}..
text.424: [03] eva.m ^a^T3.0071^ea^ vutte mu.n.do raajaa aayasmanta.m naarada.m etadavoca -- ``ko  naamo {ko nu kho (sii0 pii0)} aya.m, bhante, dhammapariyaayo''ti? ``sokasallahara.no naama  aya.m, mahaaraaja, dhammapariyaayo''ti. ``taggha, bhante, sokasallahara.no {taggha bhante  sokasallahara.no, taggha bhante sokasallahara.no (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  pii0)}! ima~nhi me, bhante, dhammapariyaaya.m sutvaa sokasalla.m pahiina''nti.
text.425: [03] atha kho mu.n.do raajaa piyaka.m kosaarakkha.m aamantesi --  ``tena hi, samma piyaka, bhaddaaya deviyaa sariira.m jhaapetha; thuupa~ncassaa  karotha. ajjatagge daani maya.m nhaayissaama ceva vilimpissaama  bhatta~nca bhu~njissaama kammante ca payojessaamaa''ti. dasama.m.
text.429: [22] sampadaa ca dhana.m .thaana.m, kosalo naaradena caati..
text.434: [03] 51^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V2.0059^ea^ ^a^M2.0056^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m ^a^T3.0072^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa  bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu  bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.435: [03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aavara.naa niivara.naa cetaso ajjhaaruhaa  pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.naa. katame pa~nca? kaamacchando, bhikkhave,  aavara.no niivara.no cetaso ajjhaaruho pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.no.  byaapaado, bhikkhave, aavara.no niivara.no cetaso ajjhaaruho pa~n~naaya  dubbaliikara.no. thinamiddha.m, bhikkhave, aavara.na.m niivara.na.m cetaso  ajjhaaruha.m pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.na.m. uddhaccakukkucca.m, bhikkhave, aavara.na.m  niivara.na.m cetaso ajjhaaruha.m pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.na.m. vicikicchaa,  bhikkhave, aavara.naa niivara.naa cetaso ajjhaaruhaa pa~n~naaya  dubbaliikara.naa. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aavara.naa niivara.naa cetaso  ajjhaaruhaa pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.naa.
text.436: [03] ``so vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ime pa~nca aavara.ne niivara.ne  cetaso ajjhaaruhe pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne appahaaya, abalaaya pa~n~naaya  dubbalaaya attattha.m vaa ~nassati parattha.m ^a^P3.0064^ea^ vaa ~nassati  ubhayattha.m vaa ~nassati uttari {uttari.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaa manussadhammaa  alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m sacchikarissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.  seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, nadii pabbateyyaa duura"ngamaa {duuragamaa (sii0)} siighasotaa haarahaarinii.  tassaa puriso ^a^T3.0073^ea^ ubhato na"ngalamukhaani vivareyya. eva~nhi so,  bhikkhave, majjhe nadiyaa soto vikkhitto visa.to byaadi.n.no   neva {na ceva (ka0)} duura"ngamo assa na {na ca (ka0)} siighasoto   na {na ca (ka0)} haarahaarii {haarahaari.nii (sii0)}. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave,  so vata bhikkhu ime pa~nca aavara.ne niivara.ne ^a^V2.0060^ea^ cetaso ajjhaaruhe  pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne appahaaya, abalaaya pa~n~naaya dubbalaaya attattha.m  ^a^M2.0057^ea^ vaa ~nassati parattha.m vaa ~nassati ubhayattha.m vaa ~nassati uttari vaa  manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m sacchikarissatiiti neta.m  .thaana.m vijjati.
text.437: [03] ``so vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ime pa~nca aavara.ne niivara.ne  cetaso ajjhaaruhe pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne pahaaya, balavatiyaa pa~n~naaya  attattha.m vaa ~nassati parattha.m vaa ~nassati ubhayattha.m vaa ~nassati uttari  vaa manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m sacchikarissatiiti  .thaanameta.m vijjati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, nadii pabbateyyaa duura"ngamaa  siighasotaa haarahaarinii. tassaa puriso ubhato na"ngalamukhaani  pidaheyya. eva~nhi so, bhikkhave, majjhe nadiyaa soto  avikkhitto avisa.to abyaadi.n.no duura"ngamo ceva assa siighasoto  ca haarahaarii ca. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, so vata bhikkhu ime pa~nca  aavara.ne niivara.ne cetaso ajjhaaruhe pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne pahaaya,  balavatiyaa pa~n~naaya attattha.m vaa ~nassati parattha.m vaa ~nassati ubhayattha.m  vaa ~nassati uttari vaa manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m  sacchikarissatiiti .thaanameta.m vijjatii''ti. pa.thama.m.
text.439: [03] 52^b^.^eb^ ``akusalaraasiiti ^a^T3.0074^ea^ ^a^P3.0065^ea^,  bhikkhave, vadamaano pa~nca niivara.ne {ime pa~nca niivara.ne (sii0)} sammaa   vadamaano vadeyya. kevalo  haaya.m {haya.m (sii0), caaya.m (syaa0 ka.m0), saaya.m (ka0)}, bhikkhave,   akusalaraasi yadida.m pa~nca niivara.naa. katame pa~nca?  kaamacchandaniivara.na.m, byaapaadaniivara.na.m, thinamiddhaniivara.na.m,  uddhaccakukkuccaniivara.na.m, vicikicchaaniivara.na.m. akusalaraasiiti,  bhikkhave, vadamaano ime pa~nca niivara.ne sammaa vadamaano vadeyya.  kevalo haaya.m, bhikkhave, akusalaraasi yadida.m pa~nca niivara.naa''ti.  dutiya.m.
text.441: [03] 53^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, padhaaniya"ngaani.  katamaani pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, saddahati  tathaagatassa bodhi.m -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho  vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa  devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti ^a^V2.0061^ea^. appaabaadho hoti  ^a^M2.0058^ea^ appaata"nko; samavepaakiniyaa gaha.niyaa samannaagato naatisiitaaya   naaccu.nhaaya majjhimaaya padhaanakkhamaaya; asa.tho hoti amaayaavii; yathaabhuuta.m attaana.m  aavikattaa satthari vaa vi~n~nuusu vaa sabrahmacaariisu; aaraddhaviiriyo  viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya,  thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu; pa~n~navaa  hoti, udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya  sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca  padhaaniya"ngaanii''ti. tatiya.m.
text.443: [03] 54^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^T3.0075^ea^, bhikkhave, asamayaa padhaanaaya.  katame pa~nca? idha ^a^P3.0066^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ji.n.no  hoti jaraayaabhibhuuto. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo asamayo padhaanaaya.
text.444: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu byaadhito hoti  byaadhinaabhibhuuto. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo asamayo padhaanaaya.
text.445: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, dubbhikkha.m hoti dussassa.m dullabhapi.n.da.m,  na sukara.m u~nchena paggahena yaapetu.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo asamayo  padhaanaaya.
text.446: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhaya.m hoti a.tavisa"nkopo,  cakkasamaaruu.lhaa jaanapadaa pariyaayanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho  asamayo padhaanaaya.
text.447: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sa"ngho bhinno hoti. sa"nghe kho  pana, bhikkhave, bhinne a~n~nama~n~na.m akkosaa ca honti, a~n~nama~n~na.m  paribhaasaa ca honti, a~n~nama~n~na.m parikkhepaa ca honti, a~n~nama~n~na.m  pariccajaa ca honti. tattha appasannaa ceva nappasiidanti, pasannaana~nca  ekaccaana.m a~n~nathatta.m hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo asamayo  padhaanaaya. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca asamayaa padhaanaayaati.
text.448: [03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, samayaa padhaanaaya. katame pa~nca?  idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu daharo hoti ^a^V2.0062^ea^ yuvaa susu kaa.lakeso bhadrena  yobbanena samannaagato pa.thamena vayasaa. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo  samayo padhaanaaya.
text.449: [03] ``puna ^a^M2.0059^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appaabaadho hoti appaata"nko,  samavepaakiniyaa gaha.niyaa samannaagato naatisiitaaya naaccu.nhaaya  majjhimaaya ^a^T3.0076^ea^ padhaanakkhamaaya. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo samayo  padhaanaaya.
text.45: [21] sa.mkhitta.m vitthata.m dukkhaa, bhata.m sikkhaaya pa~ncama.m.
text.450: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, subhikkha.m hoti susassa.m ^a^P3.0067^ea^  sulabhapi.n.da.m, sukara.m u~nchena paggahena yaapetu.m. aya.m,  bhikkhave, tatiyo samayo padhaanaaya.
text.451: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, manussaa samaggaa sammodamaanaa  avivadamaanaa khiirodakiibhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m piyacakkhuuhi sampassantaa  viharanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho samayo padhaanaaya.
text.452: [01] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sa"ngho samaggo sammodamaano  avivadamaano ekuddeso phaasu viharati. sa"nghe kho pana, bhikkhave,  samagge na ceva a~n~nama~n~na.m akkosaa honti, na ca a~n~nama~n~na.m  paribhaasaa honti, na ca a~n~nama~n~na.m parikkhepaa honti, na ca  a~n~nama~n~na.m pariccajaa honti. tattha appasannaa ceva pasiidanti,  pasannaana~nca bhiyyobhaavo {bhiiyyobhaavaaya (ka0)} hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo samayo  padhaanaaya. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca samayaa padhaanaayaa''ti.  catuttha.m.
text.454: [03] 55^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane  anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena saavatthiya.m ubho  maataaputtaa vassaavaasa.m upagami.msu {upasa"nkami.msu (ka0)} -- bhikkhu ca bhikkhunii ca. te  a~n~nama~n~nassa abhi.nha.m dassanakaamaa ahesu.m. maataapi puttassa abhi.nha.m  dassanakaamaa ahosi; puttopi maatara.m abhi.nha.m dassanakaamo ahosi.  tesa.m abhi.nha.m dassanaa sa.msaggo ahosi. sa.msagge sati vissaaso  ahosi. vissaase sati otaaro ahosi. te oti.n.nacittaa  sikkha.m apaccakkhaaya ^a^T3.0077^ea^ dubbalya.m anaavikatvaa methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevi.msu.
text.455: [03] atha ^a^V2.0063^ea^ kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m  nisinno kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``idha, bhante,  saavatthiya.m ubho maataaputtaa ^a^M2.0060^ea^ vassaavaasa.m upagami.msu -- bhikkhu ca  bhikkhunii ca, te a~n~nama~n~nassa abhi.nha.m ^a^P3.0068^ea^  dassanakaamaa ahesu.m, maataapi puttassa abhi.nha.m dassanakaamaa ahosi,  puttopi maatara.m abhi.nha.m dassanakaamo ahosi. tesa.m abhi.nha.m dassanaa  sa.msaggo ahosi, sa.msagge sati vissaaso ahosi, vissaase sati  otaaro ahosi, te oti.n.nacittaa sikkha.m apaccakkhaaya dubbalya.m  anaavikatvaa methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevi.msuu''ti.
text.456: [03] ``ki.m nu so, bhikkhave, moghapuriso ma~n~nati -- `na maataa  putte saarajjati, putto vaa pana maatarii'ti? naaha.m, bhikkhave, a~n~na.m  ekaruupampi samanupassaami eva.m {ya.m eva.m (sii0)} rajaniiya.m eva.m kamaniiya.m eva.m madaniiya.m  eva.m bandhaniiya.m eva.m mucchaniiya.m eva.m antaraayakara.m anuttarassa  yogakkhemassa adhigamaaya yathayida.m, bhikkhave, itthiruupa.m. itthiruupe,  bhikkhave, sattaa rattaa giddhaa gathitaa {gadhitaa (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} mucchitaa   ajjhosannaa {ajjhopannaa (bahuusu)}. te diigharatta.m socanti itthiruupavasaanugaa.
text.457: [03] ``naaha.m, bhikkhave, a~n~na.m ekasaddampi...pe0... ekagandhampi...  ekarasampi... ekapho.t.thabbampi samanupassaami eva.m rajaniiya.m eva.m  kamaniiya.m eva.m madaniiya.m eva.m bandhaniiya.m eva.m mucchaniiya.m eva.m  antaraayakara.m anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaaya yathayida.m, bhikkhave,  itthipho.t.thabba.m ^a^T3.0078^ea^. itthipho.t.thabbe, bhikkhave, sattaa rattaa giddhaa gathitaa  mucchitaa ajjhosannaa. te diigharatta.m socanti itthipho.t.thabbavasaanugaa.
text.458: [03] ``itthii, bhikkhave, gacchantiipi purisassa citta.m pariyaadaaya  ti.t.thati; .thitaapi...pe0... nisinnaapi... sayaanaapi... hasantiipi...  bha.nantiipi... gaayantiipi... rodantiipi... ugghaatitaapi {ugghaanitaapi (sii0)} ... mataapi  purisassa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati. ya~nhi ta.m, bhikkhave, sammaa  vadamaano vadeyya -- `samantapaaso maarassaa'ti maatugaama.myeva sammaa  vadamaano vadeyya -- `samantapaaso maarassaa'''ti.
text.46: [22] samaapatti ca kaamesu, cavanaa dve agaaravaati..
text.460: [22] aasiivisampi aasiide {aasadde (syaa0 ka.m0)}, yena da.t.tho na jiivati..
text.462: [22] mu.t.thassati.m ^a^M2.0061^ea^ taa bandhanti, pekkhitena   sitena ca {mhitena ca (syaa0 ka.m0)}..
text.464: [22] neso jano svaasiisado, api ugghaatito mato..
text.466: [22] ruupaa saddaa rasaa gandhaa, pho.t.thabbaa ca manoramaa..
text.468: [22] kaala.m gati {gati.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bhavaabhava.m, sa.msaarasmi.m purakkhataa..
text.470: [22] te ve paara"ngataa loke, ye pattaa aasavakkhaya''nti..  pa~ncama.m.
text.472: [03] 56^b^.^eb^ atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena sako  upajjhaayo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa saka.m upajjhaaya.m etadavoca --  ``etarahi me, bhante, madhurakajaato ceva kaayo, disaa ca me na  pakkhaayanti, dhammaa ca ma.m nappa.tibhanti, thinamiddha~nca me citta.m  pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, anabhirato ca brahmacariya.m caraami, atthi ca me  dhammesu vicikicchaa''ti.
text.473: [03] atha kho so bhikkhu ta.m saddhivihaarika.m bhikkhu.m aadaaya yena  bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca  -- ``aya.m, bhante, bhikkhu evamaaha -- `etarahi me, bhante,  madhurakajaato ceva kaayo, disaa ca ma.m na pakkhaayanti, dhammaa ca me  nappa.tibhanti, thinamiddha~nca me citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, anabhirato  ca brahmacariya.m caraami, atthi ca me dhammesu vicikicchaa'''ti.
text.474: [03] ``eva~nheta.m ^a^V2.0065^ea^ ^a^P3.0070^ea^, bhikkhu, hoti  indriyesu aguttadvaarassa, bhojane amatta~n~nuno, jaagariya.m ananuyuttassa,  avipassakassa kusalaana.m dhammaana.m, pubbarattaapararatta.m bodhipakkhiyaana.m  dhammaana.m bhaavanaanuyoga.m ananuyuttassa viharato, ya.m madhurakajaato ceva  kaayo hoti, disaa cassa na ^a^M2.0062^ea^ pakkhaayanti, dhammaa ca ta.m  nappa.tibhanti, thinamiddha~ncassa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, anabhirato  ca brahmacariya.m carati, hoti cassa dhammesu vicikicchaa. tasmaatiha  te, bhikkhu, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `indriyesu guttadvaaro bhavissaami,  bhojane matta~n~nuu, jaagariya.m anuyutto, vipassako kusalaana.m dhammaana.m,  pubbarattaapararatta.m bodhipakkhiyaana.m dhammaana.m bhaavanaanuyoga.m anuyutto  viharissaamii'ti. eva~nhi te, bhikkhu, sikkhitabba''nti.
text.475: [03] atha kho so bhikkhu bhagavataa iminaa ovaadena ovadito  u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha  kho so bhikkhu eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto  nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m  pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m  abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m  brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti abbha~n~naasi.  a~n~nataro pana so bhikkhu arahata.m ahosi.
text.476: [03] atha kho so bhikkhu arahatta.m patto yena sako upajjhaayo  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa saka.m upajjhaaya.m etadavoca -- ``etarahi  me, bhante, na ceva {na tveva (sii0)} madhurakajaato kaayo, disaa ca me pakkhaayanti,  dhammaa ca ma.m pa.tibhanti, thinamiddha~nca me citta.m na pariyaadaaya  ti.t.thati, abhirato ca brahmacariya.m caraami, natthi ca me dhammesu  vicikicchaa''ti. atha kho so bhikkhu ta.m saddhivihaarika.m bhikkhu.m  aadaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m ^a^P3.0071^ea^  abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho  so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aya.m, bhante, bhikkhu evamaaha  -- `etarahi me, bhante, na ceva madhurakajaato kaayo, disaa ca me  pakkhaayanti, dhammaa ca ma.m pa.tibhanti, thinamiddha~nca me citta.m na  pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, abhirato ca brahmacariya.m caraami, natthi ca me  dhammesu vicikicchaa'''ti.
text.477: [03] ``eva~nheta.m, bhikkhu, hoti indriyesu guttadvaarassa, bhojane  matta~n~nuno, jaagariya.m anuyuttassa, vipassakassa kusalaana.m dhammaana.m,  pubbarattaapararatta.m bodhipakkhiyaana.m dhammaana.m bhaavanaanuyoga.m ^a^V2.0066^ea^  anuyuttassa viharato, ya.m na ceva madhurakajaato kaayo hoti, disaa  cassa pakkhaayanti, dhammaa ca ^a^M2.0063^ea^ ta.m pa.tibhanti, thinamiddha~ncassa  citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, abhirato ca brahmacariya.m carati, na  cassa hoti dhammesu vicikicchaa. tasmaatiha vo, bhikkhave, eva.m  sikkhitabba.m -- `indriyesu guttadvaaraa bhavissaama, bhojane matta~n~nuno,  jaagariya.m anuyuttaa, vipassakaa kusalaana.m dhammaana.m, pubbarattaapararatta.m  bodhipakkhiyaana.m dhammaana.m bhaavanaanuyoga.m anuyuttaa viharissaamaa'ti.  eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. cha.t.tha.m.
text.479: [03] 57^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, .thaanaani abhi.nha.m  paccavekkhitabbaani itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena  vaa. katamaani pa~nca? `jaraadhammomhi, jara.m anatiito'ti abhi.nha.m  paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa.  `byaadhidhammomhi, byaadhi.m anatiito'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m  itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa.  `mara.nadhammomhi, mara.na.m anatiito'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa  ^a^P3.0072^ea^ vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa.  `sabbehi me piyehi manaapehi naanaabhaavo vinaabhaavo'ti abhi.nha.m  paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa.  `kammassakomhi, kammadaayaado kammayoni kammabandhu kammapa.tisara.no.  ya.m kamma.m karissaami -- kalyaa.na.m vaa paapaka.m vaa -- tassa daayaado  bhavissaamii'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa  gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa.
text.480: [03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, atthavasa.m pa.ticca `jaraadhammomhi, jara.m  anatiito'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena  vaa pabbajitena vaa? atthi, bhikkhave, sattaana.m yobbane yobbanamado,  yena madena mattaa kaayena duccarita.m caranti, vaacaaya duccarita.m caranti,  manasaa duccarita.m caranti. tassa ta.m .thaana.m abhi.nha.m paccavekkhato yo  yobbane yobbanamado so sabbaso vaa pahiiyati tanu vaa pana hoti.  ida.m kho, bhikkhave, atthavasa.m pa.ticca `jaraadhammomhi, jara.m  anatiito'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena  vaa pabbajitena vaa.
text.481: [03] ``ki~nca ^a^V2.0067^ea^, bhikkhave, atthavasa.m pa.ticca  `byaadhidhammomhi, byaadhi.m anatiito'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m  itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa? atthi,  bhikkhave, sattaana.m aarogye aarogyamado, yena madena mattaa kaayena  ^a^M2.0064^ea^ duccarita.m caranti, vaacaaya duccarita.m caranti, manasaa duccarita.m  caranti. tassa ta.m .thaana.m abhi.nha.m paccavekkhato yo aarogye  aarogyamado so sabbaso vaa pahiiyati tanu vaa pana hoti. ida.m  kho, bhikkhave, atthavasa.m pa.ticca `byaadhidhammomhi, byaadhi.m  anatiito'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena  vaa pabbajitena vaa.
text.482: [03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, atthavasa.m pa.ticca `mara.nadhammomhi, mara.na.m  anatiito'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena  vaa pabbajitena vaa? atthi, bhikkhave, sattaana.m jiivite jiivitamado,  yena madena mattaa kaayena duccarita.m caranti, vaacaaya duccarita.m ^a^P3.0073^ea^  caranti, manasaa duccarita.m caranti. tassa ta.m .thaana.m abhi.nha.m  paccavekkhato yo jiivite jiivitamado so sabbaso vaa pahiiyati tanu  vaa pana hoti. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, atthavasa.m pa.ticca  `mara.nadhammomhi, mara.na.m anatiito'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa  vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa.
text.483: [03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, atthavasa.m pa.ticca `sabbehi me piyehi  manaapehi naanaabhaavo vinaabhaavo'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa  vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa? atthi, bhikkhave,  sattaana.m piyesu manaapesu yo chandaraago yena raagena rattaa kaayena  duccarita.m caranti, vaacaaya duccarita.m caranti, manasaa duccarita.m caranti.  tassa ta.m .thaana.m abhi.nha.m paccavekkhato yo piyesu manaapesu chandaraago  so sabbaso vaa pahiiyati tanu vaa pana hoti. ida.m kho, bhikkhave,  atthavasa.m pa.ticca `sabbehi me piyehi manaapehi naanaabhaavo  vinaabhaavo'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa  gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa.
text.484: [03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, atthavasa.m pa.ticca `kammassakomhi,  kammadaayaado kammayoni kammabandhu kammapa.tisara.no, ya.m kamma.m  karissaami -- kalyaa.na.m vaa paapaka.m vaa -- tassa daayaado  bhavissaamii'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa  gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa ^a^V2.0068^ea^? atthi, bhikkhave, sattaana.m  kaayaduccarita.m vaciiduccarita.m manoduccarita.m. tassa ta.m .thaana.m abhi.nha.m  paccavekkhato sabbaso vaa duccarita.m pahiiyati tanu vaa pana hoti.  ida.m kho, bhikkhave, atthavasa.m pa.ticca `kammassakomhi, kammadaayaado  kammayoni kammabandhu kammapa.tisara.no, ya.m kamma.m karissaami --  kalyaa.na.m vaa paapaka.m vaa -- tassa daayaado bhavissaamii'ti ^a^M2.0065^ea^  abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa  pabbajitena vaa.
text.485: [03] ``sa kho {sace (pii0 ka0)} so, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati  -- `na ^a^P3.0074^ea^ kho aha~n~neveko jaraadhammo {aha~nceveko jaraadhammomhi  (ka0)} jara.m anatiito,  atha kho yaavataa sattaana.m aagati gati cuti upapatti sabbe sattaa  jaraadhammaa jara.m anatiitaa'ti. tassa ta.m .thaana.m abhi.nha.m paccavekkhato  maggo sa~njaayati. so ta.m magga.m aasevati bhaaveti bahuliikaroti.  tassa ta.m magga.m aasevato bhaavayato bahuliikaroto sa.myojanaani sabbaso  pahiiyanti anusayaa byantiihonti.
text.486: [03] ``sa kho so, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati  -- `na kho aha~n~neveko byaadhidhammo byaadhi.m anatiito, atha kho  yaavataa sattaana.m aagati gati cuti upapatti sabbe sattaa byaadhidhammaa  byaadhi.m anatiitaa'ti. tassa ta.m .thaana.m abhi.nha.m paccavekkhato maggo  sa~njaayati. so ta.m magga.m aasevati bhaaveti bahuliikaroti. tassa ta.m  magga.m aasevato bhaavayato bahuliikaroto sa.myojanaani sabbaso  pahiiyanti, anusayaa byantiihonti.
text.487: [03] ``sa kho so, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati  -- `na kho aha~n~neveko mara.nadhammo mara.na.m anatiito, atha kho  yaavataa sattaana.m aagati gati cuti upapatti sabbe sattaa mara.nadhammaa  mara.na.m anatiitaa'ti. tassa ta.m .thaana.m abhi.nha.m paccavekkhato maggo  sa~njaayati. so ta.m magga.m aasevati bhaaveti bahuliikaroti. tassa ta.m  magga.m aasevato bhaavayato bahuliikaroto sa.myojanaani sabbaso  pahiiyanti, anusayaa byantiihonti.
text.488: [03] ``sa kho so, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati  -- `na kho mayhevekassa sabbehi piyehi manaapehi naanaabhaavo  vinaabhaavo, atha kho yaavataa sattaana.m aagati gati cuti upapatti  sabbesa.m sattaana.m piyehi manaapehi naanaabhaavo vinaabhaavo'ti. tassa  ta.m .thaana.m abhi.nha.m ^a^V2.0069^ea^ paccavekkhato maggo sa~njaayati. so ta.m  magga.m aasevati bhaaveti bahuliikaroti. tassa ta.m magga.m aasevato  bhaavayato bahuliikaroto sa.myojanaani sabbaso pahiiyanti, anusayaa  byantiihonti.
text.489: [03] ``sa kho so, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati  -- `na ^a^M2.0066^ea^ kho aha~n~neveko kammassako kammadaayaado kammayoni  kammabandhu kammappa.tisara.no, ya.m kamma.m karissaami -- kalyaa.na.m vaa  paapaka.m vaa -- tassa daayaado bhavissaami; atha kho yaavataa sattaana.m  aagati gati cuti upapatti sabbe sattaa kammassakaa kammadaayaadaa  kammayoni kammabandhu kammappa.tisara.naa, ya.m kamma.m karissanti --  kalyaa.na.m vaa paapaka.m vaa -- tassa daayaadaa bhavissantii'ti ^a^P3.0075^ea^.  tassa ta.m .thaana.m abhi.nha.m paccavekkhato maggo sa~njaayati.  so ta.m magga.m aasevati bhaaveti bahuliikaroti. tassa ta.m magga.m  aasevato bhaavayato bahuliikaroto sa.myojanaani sabbaso pahiiyanti,  anusayaa byantiihontii''ti.
text.49: [03] 11^b^.^eb^ ``pubbaaha.m ^a^V2.0009^ea^, bhikkhave, ananussutesu dhammesu  abhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippatto pa.tijaanaami. pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave,  tathaagatassa tathaagatabalaani, yehi balehi samannaagato tathaagato aasabha.m  .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti.  katamaani pa~nca? saddhaabala.m, hiriibala.m, ottappabala.m, viiriyabala.m,  pa~n~naabala.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca tathaagatassa tathaagatabalaani  yehi balehi samannaagato tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu  siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavattetii''ti. pa.thama.m.
text.491: [22] yathaa dhammaa tathaa sattaa {santaa (syaa0 ka.m0)}, jigucchanti puthujjanaa..
text.493: [22] na meta.m patiruupassa, mama eva.m vihaarino..
text.496: [21] ``sabbe made abhibhosmi, nekkhamma.m da.t.thu khemato {nekkhamme da.t.thu khemata.m  (a0 ni0  3.39) ubhayatthapi a.t.thakathaaya sameti}.
text.497: [22] tassa me ahu ussaaho, nibbaana.m abhipassato..
text.501: [03] 58^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V2.0070^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati  mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa  pattaciivaramaadaaya vesaali.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. vesaaliya.m pi.n.daaya  caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto mahaavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa  a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi.
text.502: [03] tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa licchavikumaarakaa sajjaani  dhanuuni aadaaya kukkurasa"nghaparivutaa mahaavane anuca"nkamamaanaa  anuvicaramaanaa addasu ^a^M2.0067^ea^ bhagavanta.m a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule  nisinna.m; disvaana sajjaani dhanuuni nikkhipitvaa kukkurasa"ngha.m  ekamanta.m uyyojetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa  bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ^a^P3.0076^ea^ tu.nhiibhuutaa tu.nhiibhuutaa  pa~njalikaa bhagavanta.m payirupaasanti.
text.503: [03] tena kho pana samayena mahaanaamo licchavi mahaavane  ja"nghaavihaara.m anuca"nkamamaano addasa te licchavikumaarake tu.nhiibhuute  tu.nhiibhuute pa~njalike bhagavanta.m payirupaasante; disvaa yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.  ekamanta.m nisinno kho mahaanaamo licchavi udaana.m udaanesi --  `bhavissanti vajjii, bhavissanti vajjii'''ti!
text.504: [03] ``ki.m pana tva.m, mahaanaama, eva.m vadesi -- `bhavissanti  vajjii, bhavissanti vajjii'''ti? ``ime, bhante, licchavikumaarakaa  ca.n.daa pharusaa apaanubhaa {apajahaati (sii0), apaa.tubhaa (syaa0 ka.m0), apajahaa  (pii0), apaanutaa (katthaci)}. yaanipi taani   kulesu pahe.nakaani {pahiinakaani (sii0), pahii.nakaani (syaa0 ka.m0  pii0)}  pahiiyanti, ucchuuti vaa badaraati vaa puuvaati vaa modakaati vaa  sa.mkulikaati vaa {sakkhalikaati vaa (sii0 pii0)}, taani vilumpitvaa vilumpitvaa khaadanti;  kulitthiinampi kulakumaariinampi pacchaaliya.m khipanti. te daanime  tu.nhiibhuutaa tu.nhiibhuutaa pa~njalikaa bhagavanta.m payirupaasantii''ti.
text.505: [03] ``yassa kassaci, mahaanaama, kulaputtassa pa~nca dhammaa  sa.mvijjanti -- yadi vaa ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa, yadi vaa  ra.t.thikassa pettanikassa {muddhaabhisittassa (ka0) a0 ni0  5.135, 136 passitabba.m}, yadi   vaa senaaya senaapatikassa, yadi ^a^V2.0071^ea^  vaa gaamagaama.nikassa, yadi vaa puugagaama.nikassa, ye vaa pana kulesu  paccekaadhipacca.m kaarenti, vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani.
text.506: [03] ``katame pa~nca? idha, mahaanaama, kulaputto  u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigatehi bhogehi baahaabalaparicitehi sedaavakkhittehi  dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi maataapitaro sakkaroti garu.m karoti maaneti  puujeti ^a^P3.0077^ea^. tamena.m maataapitaro sakkataa garukataa  maanitaa puujitaa kalyaa.nena manasaa anukampanti -- `cira.m jiiva,  diighamaayu.m paalehii'ti. maataapitaanukampitassa, mahaanaama, kulaputtassa  vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani.
text.507: [03] ``puna ^a^M2.0068^ea^ capara.m, mahaanaama, kulaputto  u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigatehi bhogehi baahaabalaparicitehi sedaavakkhittehi  dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi puttadaaradaasakammakaraporise {... saamantasa.mvohaare  (sii0 pii0)} sakkaroti garu.m  karoti maaneti puujeti. tamena.m puttadaaradaasakammakaraporisaa sakkataa  garukataa maanitaa puujitaa kalyaa.nena manasaa anukampanti -- `cira.m  jiiva, diighamaayu.m paalehii'ti. puttadaaradaasakammakaraporisaanukampitassa,  mahaanaama, kulaputtassa vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani.
text.508: [03] ``puna capara.m, mahaanaama, kulaputto u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigatehi  bhogehi baahaabalaparicitehi sedaavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi  khettakammantasaamantasabyohaare sakkaroti garu.m karoti maaneti puujeti.  tamena.m khettakammantasaamantasabyohaaraa sakkataa garukataa maanitaa puujitaa  kalyaa.nena manasaa anukampanti -- `cira.m jiiva, diighamaayu.m paalehii'ti.  khettakammantasaamantasabyohaaraanukampitassa, mahaanaama, kulaputtassa  vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani.
text.509: [03] ``puna capara.m, mahaanaama, kulaputto u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigatehi  bhogehi baahaabalaparicitehi sedaavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi  yaavataa balipa.tiggaahikaa devataa sakkaroti garu.m karoti maaneti puujeti.  tamena.m balipa.tiggaahikaa devataa sakkataa garukataa maanitaa puujitaa  kalyaa.nena manasaa anukampanti -- `cira.m jiiva, diighamaayu.m paalehii'ti.  devataanukampitassa, mahaanaama, kulaputtassa vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa,  no parihaani.
text.51: [03] 12^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^P3.0010^ea^, bhikkhave,  sekhabalaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhaabala.m, hiriibala.m, ottappabala.m,  viiriyabala.m, pa~n~naabala.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca sekhabalaani.  imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m sekhabalaana.m eta.m agga.m eta.m  sa"ngaahika.m eta.m sa"nghaataniya.m, yadida.m pa~n~naabala.m.
text.510: [03] ``puna ^a^V2.0072^ea^ capara.m, mahaanaama, kulaputto  u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigatehi bhogehi baahaabalaparicitehi sedaavakkhittehi  dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi sama.nabraahma.ne sakkaroti garu.m karoti maaneti  puujeti. tamena.m sama.nabraahma.naa sakkataa garukataa maanitaa puujitaa  kalyaa.nena manasaa anukampanti -- `cira.m jiiva, diighamaayu.m paalehii'ti.  sama.nabraahma.naanukampitassa ^a^P3.0078^ea^, mahaanaama, kulaputtassa  vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani.
text.511: [03] ``yassa kassaci, mahaanaama, kulaputtassa ime pa~nca dhammaa  sa.mvijjanti -- yadi vaa ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa, yadi vaa  ra.t.thikassa pettanikassa ^a^M2.0069^ea^, yadi vaa senaaya senaapatikassa, yadi  vaa gaamagaama.nikassa, yadi vaa puugagaama.nikassa, ye vaa pana kulesu  paccekaadhipacca.m kaarenti, vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaanii''ti.

text.52: [03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^M2.0009^ea^, bhikkhave ^a^T3.0011^ea^, kuu.taagaarassa eta.m agga.m eta.m sa"ngaahika.m  eta.m sa"nghaataniya.m, yadida.m kuu.ta.m. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, imesa.m  pa~ncanna.m sekhabalaana.m eta.m agga.m eta.m sa"ngaahika.m eta.m sa"nghaataniya.m,  yadida.m pa~n~naabala.m.
text.521: [03] 59^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  dullabho vu.d.dhapabbajito. katamehi pa~ncahi? dullabho, bhikkhave,  vu.d.dhapabbajito nipu.no, dullabho aakappasampanno, dullabho bahussuto  ^a^V2.0073^ea^, dullabho dhammakathiko, dullabho vinayadharo. imehi kho,  bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato dullabho vu.d.dhapabbajito''ti.  navama.m.
text.523: [03] 60^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  dullabho vu.d.dhapabbajito. katamehi pa~ncahi? dullabho, bhikkhave,  vu.d.dhapabbajito suvaco, dullabho suggahitaggaahii ^a^P3.0079^ea^,  dullabho padakkhi.naggaahii, dullabho dhammakathiko, dullabho vinayadharo.  imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato dullabho  vu.d.dhapabbajito''ti. dasama.m.
text.53: [03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `saddhaabalena  samannaagataa bhavissaama sekhabalena, hiriibalena... ottappabalena...  viiriyabalena... pa~n~naabalena samannaagataa bhavissaama sekhabalenaa'ti.  eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. dutiya.m.
text.530: [03] 61^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaa ^a^M2.0070^ea^ ^a^V2.0074^ea^, bhikkhave, sa~n~naa  bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa honti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa  amatapariyosaanaa. katamaa pa~nca? asubhasa~n~naa, mara.nasa~n~naa,  aadiinavasa~n~naa, aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~naa, sabbaloke   anabhiratasa~n~naa {anabhiratisa~n~naa (ka0) a0 ni0  5.121-122, 303-304 passitabba.m} --  imaa kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca sa~n~naa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa  honti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa''ti. pa.thama.m.
text.532: [03] 62^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaa, bhikkhave, sa~n~naa bhaavitaa  bahuliikataa mahapphalaa honti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa.  katamaa pa~nca? aniccasa~n~naa, anattasa~n~naa, mara.nasa~n~naa, aahaare  pa.tikuulasa~n~naa, sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~naa -- imaa ^a^P3.0080^ea^  kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca sa~n~naa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa honti  mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa''ti. dutiya.m.
text.534: [03] 63^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, va.d.dhiihi va.d.dhamaano  ariyasaavako ariyaaya va.d.dhiyaa va.d.dhati, saaraadaayii ca hoti  varaadaayii ca kaayassa. katamaahi pa~ncahi? saddhaaya va.d.dhati,  siilena va.d.dhati, sutena va.d.dhati, caagena va.d.dhati, pa~n~naaya va.d.dhati --  imaahi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi va.d.dhiihi va.d.dhamaano ariyasaavako  ariyaaya va.d.dhiyaa va.d.dhati, saaraadaayii ca hoti varaadaayii ca  kaayassaa''ti.
text.540: [03] 64^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^M2.0071^ea^, bhikkhave, va.d.dhiihi  va.d.dhamaanaa ariyasaavikaa ariyaaya va.d.dhiyaa va.d.dhati, saaraadaayinii  ca hoti varaadaayinii ca kaayassa. katamaahi pa~ncahi? saddhaaya  va.d.dhati, siilena va.d.dhati, sutena va.d.dhati, caagena va.d.dhati, pa~n~naaya  va.d.dhati -- imaahi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi va.d.dhiihi va.d.dhamaanaa  ariyasaavikaa ariyaaya va.d.dhiyaa va.d.dhati, saaraadaayinii ca hoti  varaadaayinii ca kaayassaa''ti.
text.546: [03] 65^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0  5.164} ``pa~ncahi ^a^P3.0081^ea^, bhikkhave,  dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.msaakaccho sabrahmacaariina.m. katamehi  pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attanaa ca siilasampanno hoti,  siilasampadaaya kathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca  samaadhisampanno hoti, samaadhisampadaaya kathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m  byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca pa~n~naasampanno hoti, pa~n~naasampadaaya  kathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca vimuttisampanno  hoti, vimuttisampadaaya kathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti;  attanaa ca vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno hoti,  vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaaya kathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti.  imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu  ala.msaakaccho sabrahmacaariina''nti. pa~ncama.m.
text.548: [03] 66^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0  5.164} ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0076^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi  samannaagato bhikkhu ala.msaajiivo sabrahmacaariina.m. katamehi pa~ncahi?  idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attanaa ca siilasampanno hoti, siilasampadaaya  kathaaya ca kata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca samaadhisampanno  hoti, samaadhisampadaaya kathaaya ca ^a^M2.0072^ea^ kata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti;  attanaa ca pa~n~naasampanno hoti, pa~n~naasampadaaya kathaaya ca kata.m pa~nha.m  byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca vimuttisampanno hoti, vimuttisampadaaya  kathaaya ca kata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca  vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno hoti, vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaaya kathaaya  ca kata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi  dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.msaajiivo sabrahmacaariina''nti. cha.t.tha.m.
text.55: [03] 13^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^V2.0010^ea^, bhikkhave, balaani. katamaani  pa~nca? saddhaabala.m, viiriyabala.m, satibala.m, samaadhibala.m, pa~n~naabala.m --  imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca balaanii''ti. tatiya.m.
text.550: [03] 67^b^.^eb^ ``yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vaa  bhikkhunii vaa pa~nca dhamme {ime pa~nca dhamme (ka0)} bhaaveti,   pa~nca dhamme {ime pa~nca dhamme (ka0)} bahuliikaroti, tassa  dvinna.m phalaana.m a~n~natara.m phala.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- di.t.theva ^a^P3.0082^ea^  dhamme a~n~naa, sati vaa upaadisese anaagaamitaa.
text.551: [03] ``katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  chandasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti,  viiriyasamaadhi...pe0...  cittasamaadhi...  viima.msaasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti,  usso.lhi~n~neva pa~ncami.m {usso.lhiiyeva pa~ncamii (sii0)}. yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vaa  bhikkhunii vaa ime pa~nca dhamme bhaaveti, ime pa~nca dhamme  bahuliikaroti, tassa dvinna.m phalaana.m a~n~natara.m phala.m paa.tika"nkha.m --  di.t.theva dhamme a~n~naa, sati vaa upaadisese anaagaamitaa''ti. sattama.m.
text.553: [03] 68^b^.^eb^ ``pubbevaaha.m, bhikkhave, sambodhaa anabhisambuddho  bodhisattova samaano pa~nca dhamme bhaavesi.m, pa~nca dhamme   bahuliikaasi.m {bahulimakaasi.m (ka0), bahulamakaasi.m (ka0)}.  katame pa~nca? chandasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaavesi.m  ^a^V2.0077^ea^, viiriyasamaadhi...  cittasamaadhi...  viima.msaasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaavesi.m,  usso.lhi~n~neva pa~ncami.m. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m  usso.lhipa~ncamaana.m dhammaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa yassa yassa  abhi~n~naasacchikara.niiyassa dhammassa citta.m abhininnaamesi.m  abhi~n~naasacchikiriyaaya, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.ni.m sati sati  aayatane.
text.554: [03] ``so ^a^M2.0073^ea^ sace aaka"nkhi.m -- `anekavihita.m iddhividha.m  paccanubhaveyya.m...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteyya'nti, tatra  tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.ni.m sati sati aayatane.
text.555: [03] ``so sace aaka"nkhi.m...pe0... `aasavaana.m ^a^P3.0083^ea^  khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m  paapu.ni.m sati sati aayatane''ti. a.t.thama.m.
text.557: [03] 69^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa bhaavitaa  bahuliikataa ekantanibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya  abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattanti.
text.558: [01] ``katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  asubhaanupassii kaaye viharati, aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~nii, sabbaloke  anabhiratasa~n~nii {anabhiratisa~n~nii (ka0) a0 ni0  5.121-122, 303-304 passitabba.m},   sabbasa"nkhaaresu aniccaanupassii, mara.nasa~n~naa kho  panassa ajjhatta.m suupa.t.thitaa hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa  bhaavitaa bahuliikataa ekantanibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya  abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. navama.m.
text.560: [03] 70^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa bhaavitaa  bahuliikataa aasavaana.m khayaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu asubhaanupassii kaaye viharati, aahaare  pa.tikuulasa~n~nii ^a^V2.0078^ea^, sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~nii, sabbasa"nkhaaresu  aniccaanupassii, mara.nasa~n~naa kho panassa ajjhatta.m suupa.t.thitaa hoti.  ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa aasavaana.m  khayaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. dasama.m.

text.567: [03] 71^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^M2.0074^ea^ ^a^V2.0079^ea^ ^a^P3.0084^ea^,  bhikkhave, dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa cetovimuttiphalaa ca honti  cetovimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca, pa~n~naavimuttiphalaa ca honti  pa~n~naavimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca.
text.568: [03] ``katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asubhaanupassii kaaye  viharati, aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~nii {pa.tikkuulasa~n~nii (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)},   sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~nii,  sabbasa"nkhaaresu aniccaanupassii, mara.nasa~n~naa kho panassa ajjhatta.m  suupa.t.thitaa hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa bhaavitaa  bahuliikataa cetovimuttiphalaa ca honti cetovimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca,  pa~n~naavimuttiphalaa ca honti pa~n~naavimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca. yato  kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cetovimutto ca hoti pa~n~naavimutto ca hoti  -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu ukkhittapaligho itipi,  sa.mki.n.naparikho {sa.mki.n.naparikkho (syaa0 ka.m0)} itipi, abbuu.lhesiko itipi, niragga.lo itipi,  ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhaaro visa.myutto itipi'''.
text.569: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ukkhittapaligho hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhuno avijjaa pahiinaa hoti ucchinnamuulaa  taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. eva.m kho,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu ukkhittapaligho hoti.
text.57: [03] 14^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, balaani. katamaani  pa~nca? saddhaabala.m, viiriyabala.m, satibala.m, samaadhibala.m, pa~n~naabala.m.
text.570: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sa.mki.n.naparikho hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ponobhaviko {ponobbhaviko (syaa0 ka0)} jaatisa.msaaro pahiino hoti  ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo.  eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sa.mki.n.naparikho hoti.
text.571: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abbuu.lhesiko hoti? idha  ^a^P3.0085^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ta.nhaa ^a^V2.0080^ea^ pahiinaa hoti  ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa.  eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abbuu.lhesiko hoti.
text.572: [03] ``katha~nca ^a^M2.0075^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu niragga.lo hoti?  idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani  honti ucchinnamuulaani taalaavatthukataani anabhaava.mkataani aayati.m  anuppaadadhammaani. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu niragga.lo hoti.
text.573: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhaaro  visa.myutto hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno asmimaano pahiino  hoti ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo.  eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhaaro visa.myutto  hotii''ti. pa.thama.m.
text.575: [03] 72^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa bhaavitaa  bahuliikataa cetovimuttiphalaa ca honti cetovimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca,  pa~n~naavimuttiphalaa ca honti pa~n~naavimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca. katame  pa~nca? aniccasa~n~naa, anicce dukkhasa~n~naa, dukkhe anattasa~n~naa,  pahaanasa~n~naa, viraagasa~n~naa -- ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa  bhaavitaa bahuliikataa cetovimuttiphalaa ca honti  cetovimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca, pa~n~naavimuttiphalaa ca honti  pa~n~naavimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca. yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  cetovimutto ca hoti pa~n~naavimutto ca -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave,  `bhikkhu ukkhittapaligho itipi, sa.mki.n.naparikho itipi,  abbuu.lhesiko itipi, niragga.lo itipi, ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhaaro  visa.myutto itipi'''.
text.576: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ukkhittapaligho hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhuno avijjaa pahiinaa hoti ucchinnamuulaa  taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. eva.m kho,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu ukkhittapaligho hoti.
text.577: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sa.mki.n.naparikho hoti? idha  ^a^P3.0086^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ponobhaviko ^a^V2.0081^ea^  jaatisa.msaaro pahiino hoti ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato  aayati.m anuppaadadhammo. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  sa.mki.n.naparikho ^a^T3.0098^ea^ hoti.
text.578: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abbuu.lhesiko hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ta.nhaa pahiinaa hoti ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa  anabhaava.mkataa ^a^M2.0076^ea^ aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu abbuu.lhesiko hoti.
text.579: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu niragga.lo hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani honti  ucchinnamuulaani taalaavatthukataani anabhaava.mkataani aayati.m  anuppaadadhammaani. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu niragga.lo hoti.
text.58: [03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, saddhaabala.m? idha, bhikkhave,  ariyasaavako saddho hoti, saddahati tathaagatassa bodhi.m -- `itipi  so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu  anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti  ^a^P3.0011^ea^. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, saddhaabala.m.
text.580: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhaaro  visa.myutto hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno asmimaano pahiino  hoti ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo.  eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhaaro visa.myutto  hotii''ti. dutiya.m.
text.582: [03] 73^b^.^eb^ atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.  ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ```dhammavihaarii, dhammavihaarii'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu  kho, bhante, bhikkhu dhammavihaarii hotii''ti?
text.583: [03] ``idha, bhikkhu, bhikkhu dhamma.m pariyaapu.naati -- sutta.m, geyya.m,  veyyaakara.na.m, gaatha.m, udaana.m, itivuttaka.m, jaataka.m, abbhutadhamma.m, vedalla.m.  so taaya dhammapariyattiyaa divasa.m atinaameti, ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m,  naanuyu~njati ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhu -- `bhikkhu  pariyattibahulo, no dhammavihaarii'''.
text.584: [03] ``puna ^a^T3.0099^ea^ ^a^V2.0082^ea^ ^a^P3.0087^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhu, bhikkhu  yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena paresa.m deseti. so taaya  dhammapa~n~nattiyaa divasa.m atinaameti, ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, naanuyu~njati  ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhu -- `bhikkhu  pa~n~nattibahulo, no dhammavihaarii'''.
text.585: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhu, bhikkhu yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m  vitthaarena sajjhaaya.m karoti. so tena sajjhaayena divasa.m  atinaameti, ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, naanuyu~njati ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m.  aya.m vuccati, bhikkhu -- `bhikkhu sajjhaayabahulo, no dhammavihaarii'''.
text.586: [03] ``puna ^a^M2.0077^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhu, bhikkhu yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m  dhamma.m cetasaa anuvitakketi anuvicaareti manasaanupekkhati. so tehi  dhammavitakkehi divasa.m atinaameti, ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, naanuyu~njati  ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhu -- `bhikkhu  vitakkabahulo, no dhammavihaarii'''.
text.587: [03] ``idha, bhikkhu, bhikkhu dhamma.m pariyaapu.naati -- sutta.m, geyya.m,  veyyaakara.na.m, gaatha.m, udaana.m, itivuttaka.m, jaataka.m, abbhutadhamma.m, vedalla.m.  so taaya dhammapariyattiyaa na divasa.m atinaameti, naapi ri~ncati  pa.tisallaana.m, anuyu~njati ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhu,  bhikkhu dhammavihaarii hoti.
text.588: [03] ``iti kho, bhikkhu, desito mayaa pariyattibahulo, desito  pa~n~nattibahulo, desito sajjhaayabahulo, desito vitakkabahulo, desito  dhammavihaarii. ya.m kho, bhikkhu {ya.m bhikkhu (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, satthaaraa kara.niiya.m saavakaana.m  hitesinaa anukampakena anukampa.m upaadaaya, kata.m vo ta.m mayaa.  etaani, bhikkhu, rukkhamuulaani, etaani su~n~naagaaraani. jhaayatha,  bhikkhu, maa pamaadattha ^a^T3.0100^ea^, maa pacchaa vippa.tisaarino ahuvattha. aya.m vo  amhaaka.m anusaasanii''ti. tatiya.m.
text.59: [03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, viiriyabala.m? idha, bhikkhave,  ariyasaavako aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya,  kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro  kusalesu dhammesu. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, viiriyabala.m.
text.590: [03] 74^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P3.0088^ea^ kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu  yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa  ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m  etadavoca -- ```dhammavihaarii ^a^V2.0083^ea^ dhammavihaarii'ti, bhante, vuccati.  kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu dhammavihaarii hotii''ti?
text.591: [03] ``idha, bhikkhu, bhikkhu dhamma.m pariyaapu.naati -- sutta.m, geyya.m,  veyyaakara.na.m, gaatha.m, udaana.m, itivuttaka.m, jaataka.m, abbhutadhamma.m, vedalla.m;  uttari {uttari.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} cassa pa~n~naaya attha.m nappajaanaati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhu --  `bhikkhu pariyattibahulo, no dhammavihaarii'''.
text.592: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhu, bhikkhu yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m  vitthaarena paresa.m deseti, uttari cassa pa~n~naaya attha.m nappajaanaati.  aya.m vuccati, bhikkhu -- `bhikkhu pa~n~nattibahulo, no dhammavihaarii'''.
text.593: [03] ``puna ^a^M2.0078^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhu, bhikkhu yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m  dhamma.m vitthaarena sajjhaaya.m karoti, uttari cassa pa~n~naaya attha.m  nappajaanaati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhu -- `bhikkhu sajjhaayabahulo, no  dhammavihaarii'''.
text.594: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhu, bhikkhu yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m  cetasaa anuvitakketi anuvicaareti manasaanupekkhati, uttari cassa  pa~n~naaya attha.m nappajaanaati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhu -- `bhikkhu  vitakkabahulo, no dhammavihaarii'''.
text.595: [03] ``idha, bhikkhu, bhikkhu dhamma.m pariyaapu.naati -- sutta.m, geyya.m,  veyyaakara.na.m, gaatha.m, udaana.m, itivuttaka.m, jaataka.m, abbhutadhamma.m, vedalla.m;  uttari cassa pa~n~naaya attha.m pajaanaati. eva.m kho, bhikkhu, bhikkhu  dhammavihaarii hoti.
text.596: [03] ``iti kho, bhikkhu, desito mayaa pariyattibahulo, desito  ^a^P3.0089^ea^ pa~n~nattibahulo, desito sajjhaayabahulo, desito  vitakkabahulo, desito dhammavihaarii. ya.m kho, bhikkhu, satthaaraa  kara.niiya.m saavakaana.m hitesinaa anukampakena anukampa.m upaadaaya, kata.m  vo ta.m mayaa. etaani, bhikkhu, rukkhamuulaani, etaani su~n~naagaaraani.  jhaayatha bhikkhu, maa pamaadattha, maa pacchaa vippa.tisaarino ahuvattha.  aya.m vo amhaaka.m anusaasanii''ti. catuttha.m.
text.598: [03] 75^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^V2.0084^ea^, bhikkhave, yodhaajiivaa  santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave,  ekacco yodhaajiivo rajagga~n~neva disvaa sa.msiidati visiidati na  santhambhati na sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m. evaruupopi {evaruupo (sii0) pu0 pa0 193},  bhikkhave,  idhekacco {ekacco (sii0)} yodhaajiivo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo yodhaajiivo  santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.
text.599: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo sahati rajagga.m;  api ca kho dhajagga~n~neva disvaa sa.msiidati ^a^T3.0101^ea^ visiidati, na santhambhati,  na sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco  yodhaajiivo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo yodhaajiivo santo  sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.
text.6: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0001^ea^ ^a^V2.0001^ea^ ^a^M2.0001^ea^ ^a^P3.0001^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m  bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra  kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti  te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.60: [03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave ^a^T3.0012^ea^, satibala.m? idha, bhikkhave,  ariyasaavako satimaa hoti paramena satinepakkena samannaagato,  cirakatampi cirabhaasitampi saritaa anussaritaa. ida.m vuccati,  bhikkhave, satibala.m.
text.600: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo sahati rajagga.m  sahati dhajagga.m; api ca kho ussaara.na~n~neva {ussaadana.myeva (sii0 pii0)} sutvaa sa.msiidati  visiidati, na santhambhati, na ^a^M2.0079^ea^ sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m.  evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave,  tatiyo yodhaajiivo santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.
text.601: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo sahati rajagga.m,  sahati dhajagga.m, sahati ussaara.na.m; api ca kho sampahaare ha~n~nati  {aaha~n~nati (sii0)} byaapajjati. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo hoti.  aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho yodhaajiivo santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.
text.602: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo sahati rajagga.m,  sahati dhajagga.m, sahati ussaara.na.m, sahati ^a^P3.0090^ea^ sampahaara.m.  so ta.m sa"ngaama.m abhivijinitvaa vijitasa"ngaamo tameva sa"ngaamasiisa.m  ajjhaavasati. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo hoti.  aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo yodhaajiivo santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.  ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca yodhaajiivaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m.
text.603: [03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncime yodhaajiivuupamaa puggalaa  santo sa.mvijjamaanaa bhikkhuusu ^a^V2.0085^ea^. katame pa~nca? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu rajagga~n~neva disvaa sa.msiidati visiidati, na  santhambhati, na sakkoti brahmacariya.m sandhaaretu.m {santaanetu.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  pii0)}. sikkhaadubbalya.m  aavikatvaa sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. kimassa rajaggasmi.m?  idha, bhikkhave ^a^T3.0102^ea^, bhikkhu su.naati -- `amukasmi.m naama gaame vaa  nigame vaa itthii vaa kumaarii vaa abhiruupaa dassaniiyaa paasaadikaa  paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagataa'ti. so ta.m sutvaa sa.msiidati  visiidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti brahmacariya.m sandhaaretu.m.  sikkhaadubbalya.m aavikatvaa sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati.  idamassa rajaggasmi.m.
text.604: [03] ``seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, yodhaajiivo rajagga~n~neva disvaa  sa.msiidati visiidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m;  tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. evaruupopi, bhikkhave,  idhekacco puggalo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo yodhaajiivuupamo  puggalo santo sa.mvijjamaano bhikkhuusu.
text.605: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sahati rajagga.m; api ca kho  dhajagga~n~neva disvaa sa.msiidati visiidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti  brahmacariya.m sandhaaretu.m. sikkhaadubbalya.m ^a^M2.0080^ea^ aavikatvaa sikkha.m  paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. kimassa dhajaggasmi.m? idha, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu na heva kho su.naati -- `amukasmi.m naama gaame vaa nigame  vaa itthii vaa kumaarii vaa abhiruupaa dassaniiyaa paasaadikaa paramaaya  va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagataa'ti; api ca kho saama.m passati itthi.m  vaa kumaari.m vaa abhiruupa.m dassaniiya.m paasaadika.m paramaaya  va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagata.m. so ta.m disvaa sa.msiidati visiidati,  na santhambhati, na sakkoti ^a^P3.0091^ea^ brahmacariya.m sandhaaretu.m.  sikkhaadubbalya.m aavikatvaa sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati.  idamassa dhajaggasmi.m.
text.606: [03] ``seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, yodhaajiivo sahati rajagga.m; api  ca kho dhajagga~n~neva disvaa sa.msiidati ^a^T3.0103^ea^ visiidati, na santhambhati, na  sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.  evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave,  dutiyo yodhaajiivuupamo puggalo santo sa.mvijjamaano bhikkhuusu.
text.607: [03] ``puna ^a^V2.0086^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sahati rajagga.m, sahati  dhajagga.m; api ca kho ussaara.na~n~neva sutvaa sa.msiidati visiidati, na  santhambhati, na sakkoti brahmacariya.m sandhaaretu.m. sikkhaadubbalya.m  aavikatvaa sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. kimassa ussaara.naaya?  idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu.m ara~n~nagata.m vaa rukkhamuulagata.m vaa  su~n~naagaaragata.m vaa maatugaamo upasa"nkamitvaa uuhasati {uhasati (ka0), ohasati  (syaa0 ka.m0) pu0 pa0 196} ullapati ujjagghati  uppa.n.deti. so maatugaamena uuhasiyamaano ullapiyamaano  ujjagghiyamaano uppa.n.diyamaano sa.msiidati visiidati, na santhambhati,  na sakkoti brahmacariya.m sandhaaretu.m. sikkhaadubbalya.m aavikatvaa  sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. idamassa ussaara.naaya.
text.608: [03] ``seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, yodhaajiivo sahati rajagga.m,  sahati dhajagga.m; api ca kho ussaara.na~n~neva sutvaa sa.msiidati  visiidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m; tathuupamaaha.m,  bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco  puggalo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo yodhaajiivuupamo puggalo  santo sa.mvijjamaano bhikkhuusu.
text.609: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sahati rajagga.m, sahati  dhajagga.m, sahati ussaara.na.m; api ^a^T3.0104^ea^ ca kho sampahaare ha~n~nati byaapajjati.  kimassa sampahaarasmi.m ^a^M2.0081^ea^? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu.m ara~n~nagata.m  vaa rukkhamuulagata.m vaa ^a^P3.0092^ea^ su~n~naagaaragata.m vaa maatugaamo  upasa"nkamitvaa abhinisiidati abhinipajjati ajjhottharati. so  maatugaamena abhinisiidiyamaano abhinipajjiyamaano ajjhotthariyamaano  sikkha.m apaccakkhaaya dubbalya.m anaavikatvaa methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevati.  idamassa sampahaarasmi.m.
text.61: [03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, samaadhibala.m? idha, bhikkhave,  ariyasaavako vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m  savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m ^a^M2.0010^ea^ pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati;  vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m  avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati; piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca  sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti  ^a^V2.0011^ea^ -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati; sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva  somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m  catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave,  samaadhibala.m.
text.610: [03] ``seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, yodhaajiivo sahati rajagga.m,  sahati dhajagga.m, sahati ussaara.na.m, api ca kho sampahaare ha~n~nati  byaapajjati; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. evaruupopi,  bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho  yodhaajiivuupamo puggalo santo sa.mvijjamaano bhikkhuusu.
text.611: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sahati rajagga.m, sahati  dhajagga.m, sahati ussaara.na.m, sahati sampahaara.m, so ta.m sa"ngaama.m  abhivijinitvaa vijitasa"ngaamo tameva sa"ngaamasiisa.m ajjhaavasati  ^a^V2.0087^ea^. kimassa sa"ngaamavijayasmi.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  ara~n~nagata.m vaa rukkhamuulagata.m vaa su~n~naagaaragata.m vaa maatugaamo  upasa"nkamitvaa abhinisiidati abhinipajjati ajjhottharati. so  maatugaamena abhinisiidiyamaano abhinipajjiyamaano ajjhotthariyamaano  vinive.thetvaa vinimocetvaa yena kaama.m pakkamati. so vivitta.m  senaasana.m bhajati ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m  vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m.
text.612: [03] ``so ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa  nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m  upa.t.thapetvaa ^a^T3.0105^ea^. so abhijjha.m loke pahaaya vigataabhijjhena cetasaa  viharati, abhijjhaaya citta.m parisodheti; byaapaadapadosa.m pahaaya  abyaapannacitto viharati, sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii byaapaadapadosaa  citta.m parisodheti; thinamiddha.m pahaaya vigatathinamiddho viharati  aalokasa~n~nii sato sampajaano, thinamiddhaa citta.m parisodheti;  uddhaccakukkucca.m pahaaya anuddhato viharati ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto,  uddhaccakukkuccaa citta.m parisodheti; vicikiccha.m pahaaya  ti.n.navicikiccho viharati akatha.mkathii ^a^P3.0093^ea^ kusalesu  dhammesu, vicikicchaaya citta.m parisodheti. so ime pa~nca niivara.ne  pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne vivicceva  kaamehi...pe0... piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato  sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti  -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati. sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa, pubbeva  somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m  catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati.
text.613: [03] ``so ^a^M2.0082^ea^ eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate  ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m  khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m  dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii  pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `ime aasavaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati,  `aya.m aasavasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodho'ti  yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati. tassa eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m  vimuccati, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, avijjaasavaapi ^a^V2.0088^ea^ citta.m  vimuccati, vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati,  vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti ^a^T3.0106^ea^ pajaanaati.  idamassa sa"ngaamavijayasmi.m.
text.614: [03] ``seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, yodhaajiivo sahati rajagga.m,  sahati dhajagga.m, sahati ussaara.na.m, sahati sampahaara.m, so ta.m sa"ngaama.m  abhivijinitvaa vijitasa"ngaamo tameva sa"ngaamasiisa.m ajjhaavasati;  tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. evaruupopi, bhikkhave,  idhekacco puggalo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo yodhaajiivuupamo  puggalo santo sa.mvijjamaano bhikkhuusu. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca  yodhaajiivuupamaa puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa bhikkhuusuu''ti. pa~ncama.m.
text.616: [03] 76^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, yodhaajiivaa santo  sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco  yodhaajiivo asicamma.m gahetvaa dhanukalaapa.m ^a^P3.0094^ea^ sannayhitvaa  viyuu.lha.m sa"ngaama.m otarati. so tasmi.m sa"ngaame ussahati vaayamati.  tamena.m ussahanta.m vaayamanta.m pare hananti pariyaapaadenti.  evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave,  pa.thamo yodhaajiivo santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.
text.617: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo asicamma.m  gahetvaa dhanukalaapa.m sannayhitvaa viyuu.lha.m sa"ngaama.m otarati. so  tasmi.m sa"ngaame ussahati ^a^M2.0083^ea^ vaayamati. tamena.m ussahanta.m  vaayamanta.m pare upalikkhanti {upalikhanti (ka0)}, tamena.m apanenti; apanetvaa ~naatakaana.m  nenti. so ~naatakehi niiyamaano appatvaava ~naatake antaraamagge kaala.m  karoti. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo hoti. aya.m,  bhikkhave, dutiyo yodhaajiivo santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.
text.618: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo asicamma.m  gahetvaa dhanukalaapa.m ^a^T3.0107^ea^ sannayhitvaa viyuu.lha.m sa"ngaama.m otarati. so  tasmi.m sa"ngaame ussahati vaayamati. tamena.m ussahanta.m vaayamanta.m pare  upalikkhanti, tamena.m apanenti; apanetvaa ~naatakaana.m nenti. tamena.m  ~naatakaa upa.t.thahanti paricaranti. so ~naatakehi upa.t.thahiyamaano  paricariyamaano teneva aabaadhena kaala.m karoti ^a^V2.0089^ea^. evaruupopi,  bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo  yodhaajiivo santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.
text.619: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo asicamma.m  gahetvaa dhanukalaapa.m sannayhitvaa viyuu.lha.m sa"ngaama.m otarati. so  tasmi.m sa"ngaame ussahati vaayamati. tamena.m ussahanta.m vaayamanta.m pare  upalikkhanti, tamena.m apanenti; apanetvaa ~naatakaana.m nenti. tamena.m  ~naatakaa upa.t.thahanti paricaranti. so ~naatakehi upa.t.thahiyamaano  paricariyamaano vu.t.thaati tamhaa aabaadhaa. evaruupopi, bhikkhave,  idhekacco yodhaajiivo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho yodhaajiivo  santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.
text.62: [03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, pa~n~naabala.m? idha, bhikkhave,  ariyasaavako pa~n~navaa hoti udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato  ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa. ida.m vuccati,  bhikkhave, pa~n~naabala.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca balaanii''ti.  catuttha.m.
text.620: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo asicamma.m  gahetvaa dhanukalaapa.m sannayhitvaa viyuu.lha.m sa"ngaama.m otarati. so ta.m  sa"ngaama.m abhivijinitvaa vijitasa"ngaamo ^a^P3.0095^ea^ tameva  sa"ngaamasiisa.m ajjhaavasati. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco  yodhaajiivo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo yodhaajiivo santo  sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca yodhaajiivaa  santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m.
text.621: [03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncime yodhaajiivuupamaa puggalaa  santo sa.mvijjamaanaa bhikkhuusu. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu ^a^T3.0108^ea^ a~n~natara.m gaama.m vaa nigama.m ^a^M2.0084^ea^ vaa upanissaaya viharati.  so pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya tameva gaama.m vaa nigama.m  vaa pi.n.daaya pavisati arakkhiteneva kaayena arakkhitaaya vaacaaya  arakkhitena cittena anupa.t.thitaaya satiyaa asa.mvutehi indriyehi. so  tattha passati maatugaama.m dunnivattha.m vaa duppaaruta.m vaa. tassa ta.m  maatugaama.m disvaa dunnivattha.m vaa duppaaruta.m vaa raago citta.m anuddha.mseti.  so raagaanuddha.msitena cittena sikkha.m apaccakkhaaya dubbalya.m  anaavikatvaa methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevati.
text.622: [03] ``seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, yodhaajiivo asicamma.m gahetvaa  dhanukalaapa.m sannayhitvaa viyuu.lha.m sa"ngaama.m otarati, so tasmi.m sa"ngaame  ussahati vaayamati, tamena.m ussahanta.m vaayamanta.m pare hananti  pariyaapaadenti; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.  evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco ^a^V2.0090^ea^ puggalo hoti. aya.m,  bhikkhave, pa.thamo yodhaajiivuupamo puggalo santo sa.mvijjamaano bhikkhuusu.

text.627: [03] ``so sabrahmacaariihi eva.m ovadiyamaano eva.m anusaasiyamaano  evamaaha -- `ki~ncaapi, aavuso, appassaadaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa  bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo; atha kho nevaaha.m  sakkomi brahmacariya.m sandhaaretu.m, sikkhaadubbalya.m aavikatvaa sikkha.m  paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattissaamii'''ti. so sikkhaadubbalya.m aavikatvaa  sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati.
