text.637: [03] 77^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, anaagatabhayaani  sampassamaanena alameva aara~n~nikena {aara~n~nakena (sabbattha a0 ni0  5.181; pari0 443)}   bhikkhunaa appamattena aataapinaa  pahitattena ^a^P3.0101^ea^ viharitu.m appattassa ^a^M2.0089^ea^ pattiyaa  anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya.
text.638: [03] ``katamaani pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, aara~n~niko bhikkhu iti  pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m kho etarahi ekako ara~n~ne viharaami.  ekaka.m kho pana ma.m {ekaka.m kho pana (syaa0 ka.m0)} ara~n~ne viharanta.m   ahi vaa ma.m .da.mseyya, vicchiko {vicchikaa (syaa0)}  vaa ^a^V2.0095^ea^ ma.m .da.mseyya, satapadii vaa ma.m .da.mseyya, tena me assa  kaala"nkiriyaa, so mamassa antaraayo; handaaha.m viiriya.m aarabhaami  appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa  sacchikiriyaayaa'ti. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa.thama.m anaagatabhaya.m  sampassamaanena alameva aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa appamattena aataapinaa  pahitattena viharitu.m appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya  asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya.
text.639: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, aara~n~niko bhikkhu iti  pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m kho etarahi ekako ara~n~ne viharaami.  ekako kho panaaha.m ara~n~ne viharanto upakkhalitvaa vaa papateyya.m, bhatta.m  vaa bhutta.m me byaapajjeyya, pitta.m vaa me kuppeyya, semha.m vaa me kuppeyya,  satthakaa vaa me vaataa kuppeyyu.m, tena me assa kaala"nkiriyaa, so  mamassa antaraayo; handaaha.m viiriya.m aarabhaami appattassa pattiyaa  anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa ^a^T3.0116^ea^ sacchikiriyaayaa'ti. ida.m,  bhikkhave, dutiya.m anaagatabhaya.m sampassamaanena alameva aara~n~nikena  bhikkhunaa appamattena aataapinaa pahitattena viharitu.m appattassa pattiyaa  anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya.
text.64: [03] 15^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, balaani. katamaani  pa~nca? saddhaabala.m, viiriyabala.m, satibala.m, samaadhibala.m, pa~n~naabala.m  ^a^P3.0012^ea^. kattha ca, bhikkhave, saddhaabala.m da.t.thabba.m? catuusu  sotaapattiya"ngesu. ettha saddhaabala.m da.t.thabba.m. kattha ca, bhikkhave,  viiriyabala.m da.t.thabba.m? catuusu sammappadhaanesu. ettha viiriyabala.m ^a^T3.0013^ea^ da.t.thabba.m.  kattha ca, bhikkhave, satibala.m da.t.thabba.m? catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu.  ettha satibala.m da.t.thabba.m. kattha ca, bhikkhave, samaadhibala.m da.t.thabba.m?  catuusu jhaanesu. ettha samaadhibala.m da.t.thabba.m. kattha ca, bhikkhave,  pa~n~naabala.m da.t.thabba.m? catuusu ariyasaccesu. ettha pa~n~naabala.m da.t.thabba.m.  imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca balaanii''ti. pa~ncama.m.
text.640: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, aara~n~niko bhikkhu iti  pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m kho etarahi ekako ara~n~ne viharaami.  ekako kho panaaha.m ara~n~ne viharanto vaa.lehi samaagaccheyya.m, siihena vaa  byagghena vaa diipinaa vaa acchena vaa taracchena vaa, te ma.m jiivitaa  voropeyyu.m, tena me assa kaala"nkiriyaa ^a^P3.0102^ea^, so  mamassa antaraayo; handaaha.m viiriya.m aarabhaami appattassa pattiyaa  anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaayaa'ti. ida.m,  bhikkhave, tatiya.m anaagatabhaya.m sampassamaanena alameva aara~n~nikena  bhikkhunaa appamattena aataapinaa pahitattena viharitu.m ^a^M2.0090^ea^ appattassa  pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya.
text.641: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, aara~n~niko bhikkhu iti  pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m kho etarahi ekako ara~n~ne viharaami.  ekako kho panaaha.m ara~n~ne viharanto maa.navehi samaagaccheyya.m  katakammehi vaa akatakammehi vaa, te ma.m jiivitaa voropeyyu.m, tena me  assa kaala"nkiriyaa ^a^V2.0096^ea^, so mamassa antaraayo; handaaha.m viiriya.m  aarabhaami appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa  sacchikiriyaayaa'ti. ida.m, bhikkhave, catuttha.m anaagatabhaya.m  sampassamaanena alameva aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa appamattena aataapinaa  pahitattena viharitu.m appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa ^a^T3.0117^ea^ adhigamaaya  asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya.
text.642: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, aara~n~niko bhikkhu iti  pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m kho etarahi ekako ara~n~ne viharaami.  santi kho panaara~n~ne vaa.laa amanussaa, te ma.m jiivitaa voropeyyu.m, tena  me assa kaala"nkiriyaa, so mamassa antaraayo; handaaha.m viiriya.m  aarabhaami appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa  sacchikiriyaayaa'ti. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncama.m anaagatabhaya.m  sampassamaanena alameva aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa appamattena aataapinaa  pahitattena viharitu.m appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya  asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya.
text.643: [03] ``imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca anaagatabhayaani sampassamaanena  alameva aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa appamattena aataapinaa pahitattena  viharitu.m appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa  sacchikiriyaayaa''ti. sattama.m.
text.645: [03] 78^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^P3.0103^ea^, bhikkhave,  anaagatabhayaani sampassamaanena alameva bhikkhunaa appamattena  aataapinaa pahitattena viharitu.m appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa  adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. katamaani pa~nca?  idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m kho etarahi  daharo yuvaa susukaa.lakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannaagato pa.thamena vayasaa  ^a^M2.0091^ea^. hoti kho pana so samayo ya.m ima.m kaaya.m jaraa phusati.  ji.n.nena kho pana jaraaya abhibhuutena na sukara.m buddhaana.m saasana.m manasi  kaatu.m, na sukaraani ara~n~navanapatthaani ^a^T3.0118^ea^ pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevitu.m.  puraa ma.m so dhammo aagacchati ani.t.tho akanto amanaapo; handaaha.m  pa.tikacceva {pa.tigacceva (sii0)} viiriya.m aarabhaami appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa  adhigamaaya ^a^V2.0097^ea^ asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya, yenaaha.m dhammena  samannaagato ji.n.nakopi phaasu.m {phaasu (pii0 ka0)} viharissaamii'ti. ida.m, bhikkhave,  pa.thama.m anaagatabhaya.m sampassamaanena alameva bhikkhunaa appamattena  aataapinaa pahitattena viharitu.m appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa  adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya.
text.646: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati --  `aha.m kho etarahi appaabaadho appaata"nko samavepaakiniyaa gaha.niyaa  samannaagato naatisiitaaya naaccu.nhaaya majjhimaaya padhaanakkhamaaya.  hoti kho pana so samayo ya.m ima.m kaaya.m byaadhi phusati.  byaadhitena kho pana byaadhinaa abhibhuutena {byaadhaabhibhuutena (sii0 pii0 ka0)}   na sukara.m buddhaana.m saasana.m  manasi kaatu.m, na sukaraani ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani  pa.tisevitu.m. puraa ma.m so dhammo aagacchati ani.t.tho akanto  amanaapo; handaaha.m pa.tikacceva viiriya.m aarabhaami appattassa pattiyaa  anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya ^a^P3.0104^ea^,  yenaaha.m dhammena samannaagato byaadhitopi phaasu.m  viharissaamii'ti. ida.m, bhikkhave, dutiya.m anaagatabhaya.m sampassamaanena  alameva bhikkhunaa appamattena aataapinaa pahitattena viharitu.m appattassa  pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya.
text.647: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati --  `etarahi kho subhikkha.m susassa.m sulabhapi.n.da.m ^a^T3.0119^ea^, sukara.m u~nchena paggahena  yaapetu.m. hoti kho pana so samayo ya.m dubbhikkha.m hoti dussassa.m  dullabhapi.n.da.m, na sukara.m u~nchena paggahena yaapetu.m. dubbhikkhe kho pana  manussaa yena subhikkha.m tena sa"nkamanti {tenupasa"nkamanti (ka0)}. tattha sa"nga.nikavihaaro  hoti aaki.n.navihaaro. sa"nga.nikavihaare kho pana sati  aaki.n.navihaare na sukara.m buddhaana.m saasana.m manasi ^a^M2.0092^ea^ kaatu.m, na  sukaraani ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevitu.m. puraa  ma.m so dhammo aagacchati ani.t.tho akanto amanaapo; handaaha.m  pa.tikacceva viiriya.m aarabhaami appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa  adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya, yenaaha.m dhammena  samannaagato dubbhikkhepi phaasu viharissaamii'ti. ida.m, bhikkhave,  tatiya.m anaagatabhaya.m sampassamaanena alameva bhikkhunaa appamattena  aataapinaa pahitattena viharitu.m appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa  adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya.
text.648: [03] ``puna ^a^V2.0098^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati  -- `etarahi kho manussaa samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa  khiirodakiibhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m piyacakkhuuhi sampassantaa viharanti.  hoti kho pana so samayo ya.m bhaya.m hoti a.tavisa"nkopo,  cakkasamaaruu.lhaa jaanapadaa pariyaayanti. bhaye kho pana sati manussaa  yena khema.m tena sa"nkamanti. tattha sa"nga.nikavihaaro hoti  aaki.n.navihaaro. sa"nga.nikavihaare ^a^P3.0105^ea^ kho pana  sati aaki.n.navihaare na sukara.m buddhaana.m saasana.m manasi kaatu.m, na  sukaraani ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani ^a^T3.0120^ea^ pa.tisevitu.m. puraa  ma.m so dhammo aagacchati ani.t.tho akanto amanaapo; handaaha.m  pa.tikacceva viiriya.m aarabhaami appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa  adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya, yenaaha.m dhammena  samannaagato bhayepi phaasu.m viharissaamii'ti. ida.m, bhikkhave, catuttha.m  anaagatabhaya.m sampassamaanena alameva bhikkhunaa appamattena aataapinaa  pahitattena viharitu.m appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya  asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya.
text.649: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati --  `etarahi kho sa"ngho samaggo sammodamaano avivadamaano ekuddeso  phaasu viharati. hoti kho pana so samayo ya.m sa"ngho bhijjati.  sa"nghe kho pana bhinne na sukara.m buddhaana.m saasana.m manasi kaatu.m, na  sukaraani ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevitu.m. puraa  ma.m so dhammo aagacchati ani.t.tho akanto amanaapo; handaaha.m  pa.tikacceva viiriya.m aarabhaami appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa  adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya, yenaaha.m dhammena  samannaagato bhinnepi sa"nghe phaasu.m viharissaamii'ti. ida.m, bhikkhave,  pa~ncama.m anaagatabhaya.m sampassamaanena alameva bhikkhunaa appamattena  ^a^M2.0093^ea^ aataapinaa pahitattena viharitu.m appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa  adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya.
text.650: [03] ``imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca anaagatabhayaani sampassamaanena  alameva bhikkhunaa appamattena aataapinaa ^a^T3.0121^ea^ pahitattena viharitu.m appattassa  pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti.  a.t.thama.m.
text.652: [03] 79^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^V2.0099^ea^, bhikkhave,  anaagatabhayaani etarahi asamuppannaani aayati.m samuppajjissanti.  taani vo {kho (katthaci)} pa.tibujjhitabbaani ^a^P3.0106^ea^; pa.tibujjhitvaa ca  tesa.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.
text.653: [03] ``katamaani pa~nca? bhavissanti, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu  anaagatamaddhaana.m abhaavitakaayaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa  abhaavitapa~n~naa. te abhaavitakaayaa samaanaa abhaavitasiilaa  abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa a~n~ne upasampaadessanti. tepi {te (sii0)} na  sakkhissanti vinetu.m adhisiile adhicitte adhipa~n~naaya. tepi  bhavissanti abhaavitakaayaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa  abhaavitapa~n~naa. te abhaavitakaayaa samaanaa abhaavitasiilaa  abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa a~n~ne upasampaadessanti. tepi {te (?)} na  sakkhissanti vinetu.m adhisiile adhicitte adhipa~n~naaya. tepi  bhavissanti abhaavitakaayaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa  abhaavitapa~n~naa. iti kho, bhikkhave, dhammasandosaa vinayasandoso;  vinayasandosaa dhammasandoso. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa.thama.m anaagatabhaya.m  etarahi asamuppanna.m aayati.m samuppajjissati. ta.m vo pa.tibujjhitabba.m;  pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tassa pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.
text.654: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhuu anaagatamaddhaana.m  abhaavitakaayaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa. te  abhaavitakaayaa samaanaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa  a~n~nesa.m nissaya.m dassanti. tepi na sakkhissanti vinetu.m  adhisiile adhicitte adhipa~n~naaya ^a^T3.0122^ea^. tepi bhavissanti abhaavitakaayaa  abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa ^a^M2.0094^ea^ abhaavitapa~n~naa. te  abhaavitakaayaa samaanaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa  a~n~nesa.m nissaya.m dassanti. tepi na sakkhissanti vinetu.m  adhisiile adhicitte adhipa~n~naaya. tepi bhavissanti abhaavitakaayaa  abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa. iti kho, bhikkhave,  dhammasandosaa vinayasandoso; vinayasandosaa dhammasandoso. ida.m,  bhikkhave, dutiya.m anaagatabhaya.m etarahi asamuppanna.m aayati.m  samuppajjissati. ta.m vo pa.tibujjhitabba.m; pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tassa  pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.
text.655: [03] ``puna ^a^V2.0100^ea^ ^a^P3.0107^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave,  bhavissanti bhikkhuu anaagatamaddhaana.m abhaavitakaayaa abhaavitasiilaa  abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa. te abhaavitakaayaa samaanaa  abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa abhidhammakatha.m vedallakatha.m  kathentaa ka.nhadhamma.m okkamamaanaa na bujjhissanti. iti kho,  bhikkhave, dhammasandosaa vinayasandoso; vinayasandosaa dhammasandoso.  ida.m, bhikkhave, tatiya.m anaagatabhaya.m etarahi asamuppanna.m aayati.m  samuppajjissati. ta.m vo pa.tibujjhitabba.m; pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tassa  pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.
text.656: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhuu anaagatamaddhaana.m  abhaavitakaayaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa. te  abhaavitakaayaa samaanaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa  ye te suttantaa tathaagatabhaasitaa gambhiiraa gambhiiratthaa lokuttaraa  su~n~nataappa.tisa.myuttaa, tesu bha~n~namaanesu ^a^T3.0123^ea^ na sussuusissanti, na sota.m  odahissanti, na a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thapessanti, na ca te dhamme  uggahetabba.m pariyaapu.nitabba.m ma~n~nissanti. ye pana te suttantaa  kavitaa {kavikataa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0, sa.m0 ni0  2.229) .tiikaa oloketabbaa}   kaaveyyaa cittakkharaa cittabya~njanaa baahirakaa saavakabhaasitaa,  tesu bha~n~namaanesu sussuusissanti, sota.m odahissanti, a~n~naa citta.m  upa.t.thapessanti, te ca dhamme uggahetabba.m pariyaapu.nitabba.m ma~n~nissanti.  iti kho, bhikkhave, dhammasandosaa vinayasandoso; vinayasandosaa  dhammasandoso. ida.m, bhikkhave, catuttha.m anaagatabhaya.m etarahi  asamuppanna.m aayati.m samuppajjissati. ta.m vo pa.tibujjhitabba.m;  pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tassa pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.
text.657: [03] ``puna ^a^M2.0095^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhuu  anaagatamaddhaana.m abhaavitakaayaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa  abhaavitapa~n~naa ^a^P3.0108^ea^. te abhaavitakaayaa samaanaa  abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa theraa bhikkhuu   baahulikaa {baahullikaa (syaa0 ka.m0) a0 ni0  2.49;  3.96}  bhavissanti saathalikaa okkamane pubba"ngamaa paviveke nikkhittadhuraa, na  viiriya.m aarabhissanti appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya  asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. tesa.m pacchimaa janataa di.t.thaanugati.m  aapajjissati. saapi bhavissati baahulikaa saathalikaa okkamane  pubba"ngamaa paviveke nikkhittadhuraa, na viiriya.m aarabhissati appattassa  pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya.  iti kho, bhikkhave, dhammasandosaa vinayasandoso; vinayasandosaa  dhammasandoso. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncama.m anaagatabhaya.m ^a^T3.0124^ea^ etarahi  asamuppanna.m aayati.m samuppajjissati. ta.m vo pa.tibujjhitabba.m;  pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tassa pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m ^a^V2.0101^ea^. ``imaani  kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca anaagatabhayaani etarahi asamuppannaani aayati.m  samuppajjissanti. taani vo pa.tibujjhitabbaani; pa.tibujjhitvaa ca  tesa.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba''nti. navama.m.
text.659: [03] 80^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, anaagatabhayaani  etarahi asamuppannaani aayati.m samuppajjissanti. taani vo  pa.tibujjhitabbaani; pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tesa.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.
text.66: [03] 16^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, balaani. katamaani  pa~nca? saddhaabala.m, viiriyabala.m, satibala.m, samaadhibala.m, pa~n~naabala.m --  imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca balaani. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave,  pa~ncanna.m balaana.m eta.m agga.m eta.m sa"ngaahika.m eta.m sa"nghaataniya.m, yadida.m  pa~n~naabala.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kuu.taagaarassa eta.m agga.m eta.m  sa"ngaahika.m eta.m sa"nghaataniya.m, yadida.m kuu.ta.m. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave,  imesa.m pa~ncanna.m balaana.m eta.m agga.m eta.m sa"ngaahika.m eta.m sa"nghaataniya.m,  yadida.m pa~n~naabala''nti. cha.t.tha.m.
text.660: [03] ``katamaani pa~nca? bhavissanti, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu  anaagatamaddhaana.m ciivare kalyaa.nakaamaa. te ciivare kalyaa.nakaamaa  samaanaa ri~ncissanti pa.msukuulikatta.m, ri~ncissanti ara~n~navanapatthaani  pantaani senaasanaani; gaamanigamaraajadhaaniisu osaritvaa vaasa.m  kappessanti, ciivarahetu ca anekavihita.m anesana.m appatiruupa.m  aapajjissanti. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa.thama.m anaagatabhaya.m etarahi  asamuppanna.m aayati.m samuppajjissati. ta.m vo pa.tibujjhitabba.m;  pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tassa pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.
text.661: [03] ``puna ^a^P3.0109^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhavissanti  bhikkhuu anaagatamaddhaana.m pi.n.dapaate kalyaa.nakaamaa. te pi.n.dapaate  kalyaa.nakaamaa samaanaa ri~ncissanti pi.n.dapaatikatta.m ^a^M2.0096^ea^,  ri~ncissanti ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani;  gaamanigamaraajadhaaniisu osaritvaa vaasa.m kappessanti jivhaggena  rasaggaani pariyesamaanaa, pi.n.dapaatahetu ca anekavihita.m anesana.m  appatiruupa.m aapajjissanti. ida.m, bhikkhave, dutiya.m anaagatabhaya.m  etarahi asamuppanna.m aayati.m samuppajjissati. ta.m ^a^T3.0125^ea^ vo pa.tibujjhitabba.m;  pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tassa pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.
text.662: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhuu anaagatamaddhaana.m  senaasane kalyaa.nakaamaa. te senaasane kalyaa.nakaamaa samaanaa  ri~ncissanti rukkhamuulikatta.m {aara~n~nakatta.m (syaa0 ka.m0)}, ri~ncissanti ara~n~navanapatthaani  pantaani senaasanaani; gaamanigamaraajadhaaniisu osaritvaa vaasa.m  kappessanti, senaasanahetu ^a^V2.0102^ea^ ca anekavihita.m anesana.m  appatiruupa.m aapajjissanti. ida.m, bhikkhave, tatiya.m anaagatabhaya.m  etarahi asamuppanna.m aayati.m samuppajjissati. ta.m vo pa.tibujjhitabba.m;  pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tassa pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.
text.663: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhuu anaagatamaddhaana.m  bhikkhuniisikkhamaanaasama.nuddesehi sa.msa.t.thaa viharissanti.  bhikkhuniisikkhamaanaasama.nuddesehi sa.msagge kho pana, bhikkhave, sati  eta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- `anabhirataa vaa brahmacariya.m carissanti, a~n~natara.m  vaa sa.mkili.t.tha.m aapatti.m aapajjissanti, sikkha.m vaa paccakkhaaya  hiinaayaavattissanti'. ida.m, bhikkhave, catuttha.m anaagatabhaya.m etarahi  asamuppanna.m aayati.m samuppajjissati. ta.m vo pa.tibujjhitabba.m;  pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tassa pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.
text.664: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhuu anaagatamaddhaana.m  aaraamikasama.nuddesehi sa.msa.t.thaa viharissanti. aaraamikasama.nuddesehi  sa.msagge kho pana, bhikkhave, sati eta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- `anekavihita.m  sannidhikaaraparibhoga.m ^a^P3.0110^ea^ anuyuttaa viharissanti,  o.laarikampi nimitta.m karissanti, pathaviyaapi haritaggepi'. ida.m,  bhikkhave, pa~ncama.m anaagatabhaya.m etarahi ^a^T3.0126^ea^ asamuppanna.m aayati.m  samuppajjissati. ta.m vo pa.tibujjhitabba.m; pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tassa  pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.
text.665: [03] ``imaani ^a^M2.0097^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca anaagatabhayaani  etarahi asamuppannaani aayati.m samuppajjissanti. taani vo  pa.tibujjhitabbaani; pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tesa.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba''nti.  dasama.m.
text.669: [22] yodhaajiivaa ca dve vuttaa, cattaaro ca anaagataati..
text.672: [03] 81^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0103^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi  samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca  agaru ca abhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi pa~ncahi? rajaniiye rajjati,  dussaniiye {dusaniiye (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} dussati, mohaniiye   muyhati, kuppaniiye {kupaniiye (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0), kopaniiye (pii0)} kuppati, madaniiye  majjati -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato thero  bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca agaru ca  abhaavaniiyo ca.
text.673: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu  sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca.  katamehi pa~ncahi? rajaniiye ^a^P3.0111^ea^ na rajjati,  dussaniiye na ^a^T3.0127^ea^ dussati, mohaniiye na muyhati, kuppaniiye na kuppati,  madaniiye na majjati -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi  samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu  ca bhaavaniiyo caa''ti. pa.thama.m.
text.675: [03] 82^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato thero  bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca agaru ca  abhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi ^a^M2.0098^ea^ pa~ncahi? aviitaraago hoti,  aviitadoso hoti, aviitamoho hoti, makkhii ca, pa.laasii ca --  imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu  sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca agaru ca abhaavaniiyo ca.
text.676: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu  sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca.  katamehi pa~ncahi? viitaraago hoti, viitadoso ^a^V2.0104^ea^ hoti,  viitamoho hoti, amakkhii ca, apa.laasii ca -- imehi kho,  bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m  piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo caa''ti. dutiya.m.
text.678: [03] 83^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato thero  bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca agaru ca  abhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi pa~ncahi? kuhako ca hoti, lapako ca,  nemittiko {nimittiko (syaa0 ka.m0), nimittako (ka0)} ca,   nippesiko ca, laabhena ca laabha.m nijigiisitaa {nijigi.msitaa  (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} --  imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu  sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca agaru ca abhaavaniiyo ca.
text.679: [03] ``pa~ncahi ^a^P3.0112^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca  bhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi pa~ncahi? na ca kuhako hoti, na ca  lapako, na ca nemittiko, na ca nippesiko, na ca laabhena laabha.m  nijigiisitaa -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato  thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca  bhaavaniiyo caa''ti. tatiya.m.
text.68: [03] 17^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0012^ea^ ^a^M2.0011^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu attahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no parahitaaya. katamehi pa~ncahi?  idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attanaa siilasampanno hoti, no para.m  siilasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa samaadhisampanno hoti, no para.m  samaadhisampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa pa~n~naasampanno hoti, no para.m  pa~n~naasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa vimuttisampanno hoti, no para.m  vimuttisampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno hoti,  no para.m vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaaya samaadapeti. imehi ^a^P3.0013^ea^  kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagato ^a^T3.0014^ea^ bhikkhu  attahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no parahitaayaa''ti. sattama.m.
text.681: [03] 84^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^T3.0128^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato thero  bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti, amanaapo ca agaru ca  abhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi pa~ncahi? assaddho hoti, ahiriko  hoti, anottappii hoti ^a^M2.0099^ea^, kusiito hoti, duppa~n~no hoti --  imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu  sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca agaru ca abhaavaniiyo ca.
text.682: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu  sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca.  katamehi pa~ncahi? saddho hoti, hiriimaa hoti, ottappii ^a^V2.0105^ea^  hoti, aaraddhaviiriyo hoti, pa~n~navaa hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave,  pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca  hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo caa''ti. catuttha.m.
text.684: [03] 85^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato thero  bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca agaru ca  abhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi pa~ncahi? akkhamo hoti ruupaana.m,  akkhamo saddaana.m, akkhamo gandhaana.m, akkhamo rasaana.m, akkhamo  pho.t.thabbaana.m -- imehi ^a^P3.0113^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi  dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti  amanaapo ca agaru ca abhaavaniiyo ca.
text.685: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu  sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca.  katamehi pa~ncahi? khamo hoti ruupaana.m, khamo saddaana.m, khamo  gandhaana.m, khamo rasaana.m, khamo pho.t.thabbaana.m -- imehi kho, bhikkhave,  pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca  hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo caa''ti. pa~ncama.m.
text.687: [03] 86^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato thero  bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca.  katamehi pa~ncahi? atthapa.tisambhidaapatto hoti,  dhammapa.tisambhidaapatto hoti, niruttipa.tisambhidaapatto hoti,  pa.tibhaanapa.tisambhidaapatto hoti ^a^T3.0129^ea^, yaani taani sabrahmacaariina.m  uccaavacaani ki.mkara.niiyaani tattha dakkho hoti analaso tatrupaayaaya  viima.msaaya samannaagato ala.m kaatu.m ^a^M2.0100^ea^ ala.m sa.mvidhaatu.m -- imehi  kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu  sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo caa''ti.  cha.t.tha.m.
text.689: [03] 87^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0106^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi  samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu  ca bhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi pa~ncahi? siilavaa hoti,  paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati. aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu  vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu; bahussuto  hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa  majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa ^a^P3.0114^ea^ saattha.m  sabya~njana.m {saatthaa sabya~njanaa (sii0)} kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti,  tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa {dhataa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vacasaa paricitaa  manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa; kalyaa.navaaco hoti  kalyaa.navaakkara.no poriyaa vaacaaya samannaagato vissa.t.thaaya anelaga.laaya  atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa; catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m  di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii  akasiralaabhii; aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m  di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. imehi  kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu  sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo caa''ti.  sattama.m.
text.691: [03] 88^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato thero  bhikkhu bahujanaahitaaya ^a^T3.0130^ea^ pa.tipanno hoti bahujanaasukhaaya bahuno  janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m.
text.692: [03] ``katamehi pa~ncahi? thero hoti ratta~n~nuu cirapabbajito;  ~naato hoti yasassii sagaha.t.thapabbajitaana.m {gaha.t.thapabbajitaana.m (sii0)} bahujanaparivaaro; laabhii hoti  ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m; bahussuto  hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa  majjhekalyaa.naa ^a^M2.0101^ea^ pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m  kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa  bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa  appa.tividdhaa; micchaadi.t.thiko hoti vipariitadassano, so bahujana.m  saddhammaa vu.t.thaapetvaa asaddhamme pati.t.thaapeti. thero bhikkhu ratta~n~nuu  cirapabbajito itipissa di.t.thaanugati.m ^a^P3.0115^ea^ aapajjanti  ^a^V2.0107^ea^, ~naato thero bhikkhu yasassii sagaha.t.thapabbajitaana.m  bahujanaparivaaro itipissa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjanti, laabhii thero  bhikkhu ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m  itipissa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjanti, bahussuto thero bhikkhu sutadharo  sutasannicayo itipissa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjanti. imehi kho,  bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu bahujanaahitaaya  pa.tipanno hoti bahujanaasukhaaya bahuno janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya  dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m.
text.693: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu  bahujanahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti bahujanasukhaaya bahuno janassa atthaaya  hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m.

text.696: [03] 89^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa sekhassa  bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca ^a^V2.0108^ea^?  kammaaraamataa, bhassaaraamataa, niddaaraamataa, sa"nga.nikaaraamataa,  yathaavimutta.m citta.m na paccavekkhati -- ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca  dhammaa sekhassa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti.
text.697: [01] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa sekhassa bhikkhuno  aparihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? na kammaaraamataa, na  bhassaaraamataa, na niddaaraamataa, na sa"nga.nikaaraamataa, yathaavimutta.m citta.m  paccavekkhati -- ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa sekhassa bhikkhuno  aparihaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. navama.m.
text.699: [03] 90^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa sekhassa  bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave,  sekho bhikkhu bahukicco hoti bahukara.niiyo ^a^T3.0132^ea^ viyatto ki.mkara.niiyesu;  ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, naanuyu~njati ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m. aya.m,  bhikkhave, pa.thamo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattati.
text.7: [03] ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, sekhabalaani {sekkhabalaani (ka0)}. katamaani pa~nca?  saddhaabala.m, hiriibala.m {hiribala.m (sii0 pii0)}, ottappabala.m, viiriyabala.m  {viriyabala.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, pa~n~naabala.m -- imaani  kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca sekhabalaani.
text.70: [03] 18^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu parahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no attahitaaya. katamehi pa~ncahi?  idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attanaa na siilasampanno hoti, para.m  siilasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na samaadhisampanno hoti, para.m  samaadhisampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na pa~n~naasampanno hoti, para.m  pa~n~naasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na vimuttisampanno hoti, para.m  vimuttisampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno  hoti, para.m vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaaya samaadapeti. imehi kho,  bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu parahitaaya pa.tipanno  hoti, no attahitaayaa''ti. a.t.thama.m.
text.700: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu appamattakena kammena  divasa.m atinaameti; ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, naanuyu~njati ajjhatta.m  cetosamatha.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno  parihaanaaya sa.mvattati.
text.701: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu sa.msa.t.tho viharati  gaha.t.thapabbajitehi ananulomikena gihisa.msaggena; ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m,  naanuyu~njati ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m ^a^P3.0117^ea^. aya.m,  bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattati.
text.702: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu akaalena gaama.m  pavisati, atidivaa pa.tikkamati; ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, naanuyu~njati  ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo sekhassa  bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattati.
text.703: [03] ``puna ^a^M2.0103^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu yaaya.m kathaa  aabhisallekhikaa cetovivara.nasappaayaa, seyyathida.m -- appicchakathaa  santu.t.thikathaa pavivekakathaa asa.msaggakathaa viiriyaarambhakathaa ^a^V2.0109^ea^  siilakathaa samaadhikathaa pa~n~naakathaa vimuttikathaa  vimutti~naa.nadassanakathaa, evaruupiyaa kathaaya na nikaamalaabhii hoti na  akicchalaabhii na akasiralaabhii {kicchalaabhii kasiralaabhii (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  pii)}; ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, naanuyu~njati  ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo dhammo sekhassa  bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa  sekhassa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti.
text.704: [03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya  sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu ^a^T3.0133^ea^ na  bahukicco hoti na bahukara.niiyo viyatto ki.mkara.niiyesu; na ri~ncati  pa.tisallaana.m, anuyu~njati ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo  dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattati.
text.705: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu na appamattakena kammena  divasa.m atinaameti; na ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, anuyu~njati ajjhatta.m  cetosamatha.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno  aparihaanaaya sa.mvattati.
text.706: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu asa.msa.t.tho viharati  gaha.t.thapabbajitehi ananulomikena gihisa.msaggena; na ri~ncati  pa.tisallaana.m, anuyu~njati ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m ^a^P3.0118^ea^.  aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya  sa.mvattati.
text.707: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu na atikaalena gaama.m  pavisati, naatidivaa pa.tikkamati; na ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, anuyu~njati  ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo sekhassa  bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattati.
text.708: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu yaaya.m kathaa  aabhisallekhikaa cetovivara.nasappaayaa, seyyathida.m -- appicchakathaa  santu.t.thikathaa pavivekakathaa asa.msaggakathaa viiriyaarambhakathaa siilakathaa  samaadhikathaa pa~n~naakathaa vimuttikathaa vimutti~naa.nadassanakathaa,  evaruupiyaa kathaaya ^a^M2.0104^ea^ nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii  akasiralaabhii; na ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, anuyu~njati ajjhatta.m  cetosamatha.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno  ^a^V2.0110^ea^ aparihaanaaya sa.mvattati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa  sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. dasama.m.
text.712: [22] pa.tisambhidaa ca siilena, thero sekhaa pare duveti..
text.715: [03] 91^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaa ^a^V2.0111^ea^, bhikkhave, sampadaa.  katamaa pa~nca? saddhaasampadaa, siilasampadaa, sutasampadaa, caagasampadaa,  pa~n~naasampadaa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca sampadaa''ti. pa.thama.m.
text.717: [03] 92^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaa ^a^P3.0119^ea^, bhikkhave,  sampadaa. katamaa pa~nca? siilasampadaa, samaadhisampadaa,  pa~n~naasampadaa, vimuttisampadaa, vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaa -- imaa kho,  bhikkhave, pa~nca sampadaa''ti. dutiya.m.
text.719: [03] 93^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, a~n~naabyaakara.naani.  katamaani pa~nca? mandattaa momuuhattaa a~n~na.m byaakaroti; paapiccho  icchaapakato a~n~na.m byaakaroti; ummaadaa cittakkhepaa a~n~na.m byaakaroti;  adhimaanena a~n~na.m byaakaroti; sammadeva a~n~na.m byaakaroti. imaani  kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca a~n~naabyaakara.naanii''ti. tatiya.m.
text.72: [03] 19^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu neva attahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no parahitaaya. katamehi  pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attanaa na siilasampanno hoti, no  para.m siilasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na samaadhisampanno hoti, no  para.m samaadhisampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na pa~n~naasampanno hoti, no  para.m pa~n~naasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na vimuttisampanno hoti, no  para.m vimuttisampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno  hoti, no para.m vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaaya samaadapeti. imehi  ^a^P3.0014^ea^ kho ^a^V2.0013^ea^ ^a^M2.0012^ea^, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu  neva attahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no parahitaayaa''ti. navama.m.
text.721: [03] 94^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^M2.0105^ea^, bhikkhave, phaasuvihaaraa.  katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca  akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m  upasampajja viharati; vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m  jhaana.m... ^a^T3.0135^ea^  ^a^V2.0112^ea^   tatiya.m jhaana.m...  catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati; aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m  cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa  upasampajja viharati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca phaasuvihaaraa''ti.  catuttha.m.
text.723: [03] 95^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu nacirasseva akuppa.m pa.tivijjhati. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha  ^a^P3.0120^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthapa.tisambhidaapatto hoti,  dhammapa.tisambhidaapatto hoti, niruttipa.tisambhidaapatto hoti,  pa.tibhaanapa.tisambhidaapatto hoti, yathaavimutta.m citta.m paccavekkhati.  imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu  nacirasseva akuppa.m pa.tivijjhatii''ti. pa~ncama.m.
text.725: [03] 96^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu aanaapaanassati.m aasevanto nacirasseva akuppa.m pa.tivijjhati.  katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appa.t.tho hoti appakicco  subharo susantoso jiivitaparikkhaaresu; appaahaaro hoti anodarikatta.m  anuyutto; appamiddho hoti jaagariya.m anuyutto; bahussuto hoti  sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa  pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m  brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa  vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa; yathaavimutta.m  citta.m paccavekkhati. imehi ^a^T3.0136^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi  samannaagato bhikkhu aanaapaanassati.m aasevanto nacirasseva akuppa.m  pa.tivijjhatii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.
text.727: [03] 97^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^M2.0106^ea^ ^a^V2.0113^ea^, bhikkhave,  dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aanaapaanassati.m bhaavento nacirasseva  akuppa.m pa.tivijjhati. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  appa.t.tho hoti appakicco subharo susantoso jiivitaparikkhaaresu;  appaahaaro hoti anodarikatta.m anuyutto; appamiddho ^a^P3.0121^ea^  hoti jaagariya.m anuyutto; yaaya.m kathaa aabhisallekhikaa  cetovivara.nasappaayaa, seyyathida.m -- appicchakathaa...pe0...  vimutti~naa.nadassanakathaa, evaruupiyaa kathaaya nikaamalaabhii hoti  akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii; yathaavimutta.m citta.m paccavekkhati. imehi  kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aanaapaanassati.m  bhaavento nacirasseva akuppa.m pa.tivijjhatii''ti. sattama.m.
text.729: [03] 98^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu aanaapaanassati.m bahuliikaronto nacirasseva akuppa.m  pa.tivijjhati. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appa.t.tho  hoti appakicco subharo susantoso jiivitaparikkhaaresu; appaahaaro  hoti anodarikatta.m anuyutto; appamiddho hoti jaagariya.m anuyutto;  aara~n~nako hoti pantasenaasano; yathaavimutta.m citta.m paccavekkhati.  imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato ^a^T3.0137^ea^ bhikkhu  aanaapaanassati.m bahuliikaronto nacirasseva akuppa.m pa.tivijjhatii''ti.  a.t.thama.m.
text.731: [03] 99^b^.^eb^ ``siiho, bhikkhave, migaraajaa saayanhasamaya.m  aasayaa nikkhamati; aasayaa nikkhamitvaa vijambhati; vijambhitvaa  samantaa catuddisa.m {catuddisaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0) a0 ni0  4.33; sa.m0 ni0  3.78 passitabba.m}  anuviloketi; samantaa catuddisa.m {catuddisaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)  a0 ni0  4.33; sa.m0 ni0  3.78 passitabba.m} anuviloketvaa  tikkhattu.m siihanaada.m nadati; tikkhattu.m siihanaada.m naditvaa gocaraaya  pakkamati. so hatthissa cepi pahaara.m deti, sakkacca~n~neva pahaara.m deti,  no asakkacca.m; mahi.msassa {mahisassa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} cepi pahaara.m deti, sakkacca~n~neva pahaara.m deti,  no asakkacca.m; gavassa cepi pahaara.m deti, sakkacca~n~neva pahaara.m deti, no  asakkacca.m; diipissa cepi ^a^M2.0107^ea^ pahaara.m deti, sakkacca~n~neva pahaara.m  deti ^a^V2.0114^ea^, no asakkacca.m; khuddakaana~ncepi ^a^P3.0122^ea^  paa.naana.m pahaara.m deti antamaso sasabi.laaraanampi {sasabi.laaraana.m (ka0)}, sakkacca~n~neva pahaara.m  deti, no asakkacca.m. ta.m kissa hetu? `maa me yoggapatho  nassaa'ti.
text.732: [03] ``siihoti kho, bhikkhave, tathaagatasseta.m adhivacana.m arahato  sammaasambuddhassa. ya.m kho, bhikkhave, tathaagato parisaaya dhamma.m  deseti, idamassa hoti siihanaadasmi.m. bhikkhuuna~ncepi, bhikkhave,  tathaagato dhamma.m deseti, sakkacca~n~neva tathaagato dhamma.m deseti, no  asakkacca.m; bhikkhuniina~ncepi, bhikkhave, tathaagato dhamma.m deseti,  sakkacca~n~neva tathaagato dhamma.m deseti, no asakkacca.m; upaasakaana~ncepi,  bhikkhave, tathaagato dhamma.m deseti, sakkacca~n~neva ^a^T3.0138^ea^ tathaagato dhamma.m deseti,  no asakkacca.m; upaasikaana~ncepi, bhikkhave, tathaagato dhamma.m deseti,  sakkacca~n~neva tathaagato dhamma.m deseti, no asakkacca.m; puthujjanaana~ncepi,  bhikkhave, tathaagato dhamma.m deseti antamaso annabhaaranesaadaanampi  {annabhaaranesaadaana.m (ka0)},  sakkacca~n~neva tathaagato dhamma.m deseti, no asakkacca.m. ta.m kissa hetu?  dhammagaru, bhikkhave, tathaagato dhammagaaravo''ti. navama.m.
text.734: [03] 100^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosambiya.m  viharati ghositaaraame. {cuu.lava0 333, 341} tena kho pana samayena kakudho naama  koliyaputto {ko.liiyaputto (sii0 syaa0 ka0)} aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa upa.t.thaako adhunaakaala"nkato  a~n~natara.m manomaya.m kaaya.m upapanno. tassa evaruupo attabhaavapa.tilaabho  hoti -- seyyathaapi naama dve vaa tii.ni vaa maagadhakaani {maagadhikaani (sii0  pii0 ka0)} gaamakkhettaani. so tena attabhaavapa.tilaabhena neva   attaana.m {nevattaana.m byaabaadheti (sii0)} no para.m byaabaadheti.
text.735: [03] atha kho kakudho devaputto yenaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m abhivaadetvaa  ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito ^a^P3.0123^ea^ kho kakudho  devaputto aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m ^a^M2.0108^ea^ etadavoca --  ``devadattassa, bhante, evaruupa.m icchaagata.m uppajji -- `aha.m  bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharissaamii'ti. sahacittuppaadaa ca, bhante, devadatto  tassaa iddhiyaa parihiino''ti. idamavoca kakudho devaputto. ida.m  vatvaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa  tatthevantaradhaayi.
text.736: [03] atha ^a^V2.0115^ea^ kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami ^a^T3.0139^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.  ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhagavanta.m  etadavoca --
text.737: [03] ``kakudho naama, bhante, koliyaputto mama.m upa.t.thaako  adhunaakaala"nkato a~n~natara.m manomaya.m kaaya.m upapanno hoti. tassa  evaruupo attabhaavapa.tilaabho -- seyyathaapi naama dve vaa tii.ni vaa  maagadhakaani gaamakkhettaani. so tena attabhaavapa.tilaabhena neva attaana.m  no para.m byaabaadheti. atha kho, bhante, kakudho devaputto yenaaha.m  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi.  ekamanta.m .thito kho, bhante, kakudho devaputto ma.m etadavoca --  `devadattassa, bhante, evaruupa.m icchaagata.m uppajji -- aha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m  pariharissaamiiti. sahacittuppaadaa ca, bhante, devadatto tassaa iddhiyaa  parihiino'ti. idamavoca, bhante, kakudho devaputto. ida.m vatvaa ma.m  abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayii''ti.
text.738: [03] ``ki.m pana te, moggallaana, kakudho devaputto cetasaa ceto  paricca vidito -- `ya.m ki~nci kakudho devaputto bhaasati sabba.m ta.m  tatheva hoti, no a~n~nathaa'''ti? ``cetasaa ceto paricca vidito  me, bhante, kakudho devaputto -- `ya.m ki~nci kakudho devaputto bhaasati  sabba.m ta.m tatheva hoti, no a~n~nathaa'''ti. ``rakkhasseta.m, moggallaana,  vaaca.m! (rakkhasseta.m, moggallaana, vaaca.m) {( ) sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 potthakesu  natthi cuu.lava0 333 pana sabbatthapi dissatiyeva}! idaani so moghapuriso  attanaava attaana.m paatukarissati ^a^T3.0140^ea^.
text.739: [03] ``pa~ncime, moggallaana, satthaaro santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m.  katame pa~nca? idha ^a^P3.0124^ea^, moggallaana, ekacco  satthaa aparisuddhasiilo samaano `parisuddhasiilomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati  `parisuddha.m me siila.m pariyodaata.m ^a^M2.0109^ea^ asa.mkili.t.tha'nti. tamena.m  saavakaa eva.m jaananti -- `aya.m kho bhava.m satthaa aparisuddhasiilo  samaano parisuddhasiilomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati `parisuddha.m me siila.m  pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti. maya~nceva kho pana gihiina.m  aaroceyyaama, naassassa manaapa.m. ya.m kho panassa amanaapa.m,   katha.m na.m {katha.m nu ta.m (sii0), katha.m nu (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0), katha.m  ta.m (katthaci)}   maya.m tena samudaacareyyaama -- `sammannati kho pana  ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena; ya.m tumo  karissati tumova tena pa~n~naayissatii'ti ^a^T3.0141^ea^ ^a^V2.0116^ea^. evaruupa.m kho,  moggallaana, satthaara.m saavakaa siilato rakkhanti; evaruupo ca pana  satthaa saavakehi siilato rakkha.m paccaasiisati {paccaasi.msati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  pii0)}.
text.74: [03] 20^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^T3.0015^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu attahitaaya ca pa.tipanno hoti parahitaaya ca. katamehi  pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attanaa ca siilasampanno hoti,  para~nca siilasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa ca samaadhisampanno hoti,  para~nca samaadhisampadaaya samaadapeti, attanaa ca pa~n~naasampanno hoti,  para~nca pa~n~naasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa ca vimuttisampanno hoti,  para~nca vimuttisampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa ca  vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno hoti, para~nca vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaaya  samaadapeti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu attahitaaya ca pa.tipanno hoti parahitaaya caa''ti. dasama.m.
text.740: [03] ``puna capara.m, moggallaana, idhekacco satthaa aparisuddhaajiivo  samaano `parisuddhaajiivomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati `parisuddho me aajiivo  pariyodaato asa.mkili.t.tho'ti. tamena.m saavakaa eva.m jaananti -- `aya.m  kho bhava.m satthaa aparisuddhaajiivo samaano parisuddhaajiivomhii'ti  pa.tijaanaati `parisuddho me aajiivo pariyodaato asa.mkili.t.tho'ti.  maya~nceva kho pana gihiina.m aaroceyyaama, naassassa manaapa.m. ya.m kho  panassa amanaapa.m, katha.m na.m maya.m tena samudaacareyyaama -- `sammannati  kho pana ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena; ya.m  tumo karissati tumova tena pa~n~naayissatii'ti. evaruupa.m kho,  moggallaana, satthaara.m saavakaa aajiivato rakkhanti; evaruupo ca pana  satthaa saavakehi aajiivato rakkha.m paccaasiisati.
text.741: [03] ``puna capara.m, moggallaana, idhekacco satthaa  aparisuddhadhammadesano samaano `parisuddhadhammadesanomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati  `parisuddhaa me dhammadesanaa pariyodaataa asa.mkili.t.thaa'ti. tamena.m  saavakaa eva.m jaananti -- `aya.m kho bhava.m satthaa aparisuddhadhammadesano  samaano parisuddhadhammadesanomhii'ti ^a^P3.0125^ea^ pa.tijaanaati  `parisuddhaa me dhammadesanaa pariyodaataa asa.mkili.t.thaa'ti. maya~nceva  kho pana gihiina.m aaroceyyaama, naassassa manaapa.m. ya.m kho panassa  amanaapa.m, katha.m na.m maya.m tena samudaacareyyaama -- `sammannati kho pana  ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena; ya.m ^a^T3.0142^ea^ tumo  karissati tumova tena pa~n~naayissatii'ti. evaruupa.m kho, moggallaana,  satthaara.m saavakaa dhammadesanato rakkhanti ^a^M2.0110^ea^; evaruupo ca pana  satthaa saavakehi dhammadesanato rakkha.m paccaasiisati.
text.742: [03] ``puna capara.m, moggallaana, idhekacco satthaa  aparisuddhaveyyaakara.no samaano `parisuddhaveyyaakara.nomhii'ti  pa.tijaanaati `parisuddha.m me veyyaakara.na.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti.  tamena.m saavakaa eva.m jaananti -- `aya.m kho bhava.m satthaa  aparisuddhaveyyaakara.no samaano parisuddhaveyyaakara.nomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati  `parisuddha.m me veyyaakara.na.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti. maya~nceva  kho pana gihiina.m aaroceyyaama, naassassa manaapa.m ^a^V2.0117^ea^. ya.m kho  panassa amanaapa.m, katha.m na.m maya.m tena samudaacareyyaama -- `sammannati  kho pana ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena; ya.m   tumo karissati tumova tena pa~n~naayissatii'ti. evaruupa.m kho,  moggallaana, satthaara.m saavakaa veyyaakara.nato rakkhanti; evaruupo ca  pana satthaa saavakehi veyyaakara.nato rakkha.m paccaasiisati.
text.743: [03] ``puna capara.m, moggallaana, idhekacco satthaa  aparisuddha~naa.nadassano samaano `parisuddha~naa.nadassanomhii'ti  pa.tijaanaati `parisuddha.m me ~naa.nadassana.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti.  tamena.m saavakaa eva.m jaananti -- `aya.m kho bhava.m satthaa  aparisuddha~naa.nadassano samaano parisuddha~naa.nadassanomhii'ti  pa.tijaanaati `parisuddha.m me ~naa.nadassana.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti.  maya~nceva kho pana gihiina.m aaroceyyaama, naassassa manaapa.m. ya.m kho  panassa amanaapa.m, katha.m na.m maya.m tena samudaacareyyaama ^a^P3.0126^ea^  -- `sammannati kho pana  ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena; ya.m tumo  karissati tumova tena pa~n~naayissatii'ti. evaruupa.m kho, moggallaana,  satthaara.m saavakaa ~naa.nadassanato rakkhanti; evaruupo ca pana satthaa  saavakehi ~naa.nadassanato rakkha.m paccaasiisati. ime kho, moggallaana,  pa~nca satthaaro santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m.
text.744: [03] ``aha.m kho pana, moggallaana, parisuddhasiilo samaano  `parisuddhasiilomhii'ti pa.tijaanaami `parisuddha.m me siila.m pariyodaata.m  asa.mkili.t.tha'nti. na ca ma.m saavakaa siilato rakkhanti, na caaha.m  saavakehi siilato rakkha.m paccaasiisaami. parisuddhaajiivo samaano  `parisuddhaajiivomhii'ti pa.tijaanaami `parisuddho me aajiivo  pariyodaato asa.mkili.t.tho'ti. na ca ma.m saavakaa ^a^M2.0111^ea^ aajiivato  rakkhanti, na caaha.m saavakehi aajiivato ^a^T3.0143^ea^ rakkha.m paccaasiisaami.  parisuddhadhammadesano samaano `parisuddhadhammadesanomhii'ti pa.tijaanaami  `parisuddhaa me dhammadesanaa pariyodaataa asa.mkili.t.thaa'ti. na ca ma.m  saavakaa dhammadesanato rakkhanti, na caaha.m saavakehi dhammadesanato  rakkha.m paccaasiisaami. parisuddhaveyyaakara.no samaano  `parisuddhaveyyaakara.nomhii'ti pa.tijaanaami `parisuddha.m me veyyaakara.na.m  pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti. na ca ma.m saavakaa veyyaakara.nato  rakkhanti, na caaha.m saavakehi veyyaakara.nato rakkha.m paccaasiisaami.  parisuddha~naa.nadassano samaano `parisuddha~naa.nadassanomhii'ti  pa.tijaanaami `parisuddha.m me ~naa.nadassana.m ^a^V2.0118^ea^ pariyodaata.m  asa.mkili.t.tha'nti. na ca ma.m saavakaa ~naa.nadassanato rakkhanti, na  caaha.m saavakehi ~naa.nadassanato rakkha.m paccaasiisaamii''ti. dasama.m.

text.753: [03] 101^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^T3.0145^ea^ ^a^V2.0119^ea^ ^a^M2.0112^ea^, bhikkhave,  sekhavesaarajjakara.naa dhammaa. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  saddho hoti, siilavaa hoti, bahussuto hoti, aaraddhaviiriyo hoti,  pa~n~navaa hoti.
text.754: [03] ``ya.m, bhikkhave, assaddhassa saarajja.m hoti, saddhassa ta.m  saarajja.m na hoti. tasmaaya.m dhammo sekhavesaarajjakara.no.
text.755: [03] ``ya.m, bhikkhave, dussiilassa saarajja.m hoti, siilavato ta.m  saarajja.m na hoti. tasmaaya.m dhammo sekhavesaarajjakara.no.
text.756: [03] ``ya.m, bhikkhave, appassutassa saarajja.m hoti, bahussutassa ta.m  saarajja.m na hoti. tasmaaya.m dhammo sekhavesaarajjakara.no.
text.757: [03] ``ya.m, bhikkhave, kusiitassa saarajja.m hoti, aaraddhaviiriyassa ta.m  saarajja.m na hoti. tasmaaya.m dhammo sekhavesaarajjakara.no.
text.758: [03] ``ya.m, bhikkhave, duppa~n~nassa saarajja.m hoti, pa~n~navato ta.m  saarajja.m na hoti. tasmaaya.m dhammo sekhavesaarajjakara.no. ime kho,  bhikkhave, pa~nca sekhavesaarajjakara.naa dhammaa''ti. pa.thama.m.
text.760: [03] 102^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0120^ea^ ^a^P3.0128^ea^,  bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ussa"nkitaparisa"nkito hoti  paapabhikkhuuti api akuppadhammopi {api akuppadhammo (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}.
text.761: [03] katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vesiyaagocaro vaa  hoti, vidhavaagocaro vaa hoti, thullakumaarikaagocaro vaa hoti,  pa.n.dakagocaro vaa hoti, bhikkhuniigocaro vaa hoti.
text.762: [03] ``imehi ^a^M2.0113^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu ussa"nkitaparisa"nkito hoti paapabhikkhuuti api  akuppadhammopii''ti. dutiya.m.
text.764: [03] 103^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato  mahaacoro sandhimpi chindati, nillopampi harati, ekaagaarikampi  karoti, paripanthepi ti.t.thati. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave,  mahaacoro visamanissito ca hoti, gahananissito ca,  balavanissito ca, bhogacaagii ca, ekacaarii ca.
text.765: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, mahaacoro visamanissito hoti?  idha, bhikkhave, mahaacoro nadiividugga.m vaa nissito hoti  pabbatavisama.m vaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, mahaacoro visamanissito  hoti.
text.766: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, mahaacoro gahananissito hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, mahaacoro ti.nagahana.m vaa nissito hoti rukkhagahana.m vaa  rodha.m {gedha.m (sii0) a0 ni0  3.51} vaa mahaavanasa.n.da.m vaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, mahaacoro  gahananissito hoti.
text.767: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, mahaacoro balavanissito hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, mahaacoro raajaana.m ^a^V2.0121^ea^ vaa raajamahaamattaana.m vaa  nissito hoti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `sace ma.m koci ki~nci  ^a^P3.0129^ea^ vakkhati, ime me raajaano vaa raajamahaamattaa vaa  pariyodhaaya attha.m bha.nissantii'ti. sace na.m koci ki~nci aaha,  tyassa raajaano vaa raajamahaamattaa vaa pariyodhaaya attha.m bha.nanti.  eva.m kho, bhikkhave, mahaacoro balavanissito hoti.
text.768: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, mahaacoro bhogacaagii hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, mahaacoro a.d.dho hoti mahaddhano mahaabhogo. tassa eva.m  hoti -- `sace ma.m koci ki~nci vakkhati, ito bhogena  pa.tisantharissaamii'ti. sace na.m ^a^T3.0146^ea^ koci ki~nci aaha, tato bhogena  pa.tisantharati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, mahaacoro bhogacaagii hoti.
text.769: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, mahaacoro ekacaarii hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, mahaacoro ekakova gaha.naani {niggaha.naani (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}   kattaa hoti. ta.m kissa hetu?  `maa me ^a^M2.0114^ea^ guyhamantaa bahiddhaa sambheda.m agama.msuu'ti. eva.m  kho, bhikkhave, mahaacoro ekacaarii hoti.
text.770: [03] ``imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato mahaacoro  sandhimpi chindati nillopampi harati ekaagaarikampi karoti  paripanthepi ti.t.thati.
text.771: [03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato  paapabhikkhu khata.m upahata.m attaana.m pariharati, saavajjo ca hoti  saanuvajjo vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavati. katamehi pa~ncahi?  idha, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu visamanissito ca hoti, gahananissito  ca, balavanissito ca, bhogacaagii ca, ekacaarii ca.
text.772: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu visamanissito hoti?  idha, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu visamena kaayakammena samannaagato hoti,  visamena vaciikammena samannaagato hoti, visamena manokammena  samannaagato hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu visamanissito  hoti.
text.773: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu gahananissito hoti? idha  ^a^P3.0130^ea^, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu micchaadi.t.thiko ^a^V2.0122^ea^  hoti antaggaahikaaya di.t.thiyaa samannaagato. eva.m kho, bhikkhave,  paapabhikkhu gahananissito hoti.
text.774: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu balavanissito hoti?  idha, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu raajaana.m vaa raajamahaamattaana.m vaa nissito  hoti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `sace ma.m koci ki~nci vakkhati, ime  me raajaano vaa ^a^T3.0147^ea^ raajamahaamattaa vaa pariyodhaaya attha.m bha.nissantii'ti.  sace na.m koci ki~nci aaha, tyassa raajaano vaa raajamahaamattaa vaa  pariyodhaaya attha.m bha.nanti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu  balavanissito hoti.
text.775: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu bhogacaagii hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu laabhii hoti  ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. tassa eva.m  hoti -- `sace ma.m koci ki~nci vakkhati, ito laabhena  pa.tisantharissaamii'ti. sace na.m koci ki~nci aaha, tato laabhena  pa.tisantharati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu bhogacaagii hoti.
text.776: [03] ``katha~nca ^a^M2.0115^ea^, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu ekacaarii hoti?  idha, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu ekakova paccantimesu janapadesu nivaasa.m  kappeti. so tattha kulaani upasa"nkamanto laabha.m labhati. eva.m kho,  bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu ekacaarii hoti.
text.777: [03] ``imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato  paapabhikkhu khata.m upahata.m attaana.m pariharati, saavajjo ca hoti  saanuvajjo vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavatii''ti. tatiya.m.
text.779: [03] 104^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu sama.nesu sama.nasukhumaalo hoti.
text.78: [22] da.t.thabba~nca puna kuu.ta.m, cattaaropi hitena caati..
text.780: [03] ``katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yaacitova  bahula.m ciivara.m paribhu~njati, appa.m ayaacito; yaacitova bahula.m pi.n.dapaata.m  paribhu~njati, appa.m ayaacito; yaacitova bahula.m ^a^V2.0123^ea^ senaasana.m  paribhu~njati, appa.m ayaacito; yaacitova bahula.m  gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m paribhu~njati, appa.m ayaacito. yehi  kho ^a^P3.0131^ea^ pana sabrahmacaariihi saddhi.m viharati ^a^T3.0148^ea^, tyassa {tyaassa (ka0) a0 ni0  4.87}  manaapeneva bahula.m kaayakammena samudaacaranti, appa.m amanaapena;  manaapeneva bahula.m vaciikammena samudaacaranti, appa.m amanaapena;  manaapeneva bahula.m manokammena samudaacaranti, appa.m amanaapena;  manaapa.myeva upahaara.m upaharanti, appa.m amanaapa.m. yaani kho pana taani  vedayitaani pittasamu.t.thaanaani vaa semhasamu.t.thaanaani vaa vaatasamu.t.thaanaani  vaa sannipaatikaani vaa utupari.naamajaani vaa visamaparihaarajaani vaa  opakkamikaani vaa kammavipaakajaani vaa, taanissa na bahudeva  uppajjanti. appaabaadho hoti, catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m  di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii  akasiralaabhii, aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m  di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. imehi  kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sama.nesu  sama.nasukhumaalo hoti.
text.781: [03] ``ya~nhi ta.m, bhikkhave, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `sama.nesu  sama.nasukhumaalo'ti, mameva ta.m, bhikkhave, sammaa {mameva ta.m sammaa (?)} vadamaano vadeyya --  `sama.nesu sama.nasukhumaalo'ti ^a^M2.0116^ea^. aha~nhi, bhikkhave,  yaacitova bahula.m ciivara.m paribhu~njaami, appa.m ayaacito; yaacitova  bahula.m pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njaami, appa.m ayaacito; yaacitova bahula.m  senaasana.m paribhu~njaami, appa.m ayaacito; yaacitova bahula.m  gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m paribhu~njaami, appa.m ayaacito. yehi  kho pana bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m viharaami, te ma.m manaapeneva bahula.m  kaayakammena samudaacaranti, appa.m amanaapena ^a^T3.0149^ea^; manaapeneva bahula.m  vaciikammena samudaacaranti, appa.m amanaapena; manaapeneva bahula.m  manokammena samudaacaranti, appa.m amanaapena; manaapa.myeva upahaara.m  upaharanti, appa.m amanaapa.m. yaani kho pana taani vedayitaani --  pittasamu.t.thaanaani vaa semhasamu.t.thaanaani vaa vaatasamu.t.thaanaani vaa  sannipaatikaani vaa utupari.naamajaani vaa visamaparihaarajaani vaa  opakkamikaani vaa kammavipaakajaani vaa ^a^P3.0132^ea^ -- taani  me na bahudeva uppajjanti. appaabaadhohamasmi, catunna.m kho  panasmi {catunna.m kho pana (sii0), catunna.m (syaa0 pii0)} jhaanaana.m   aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii {nikaamalaabhii homi (sii0 ka0)}  akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa  upasampajja viharaami.
text.782: [03] ``ya~nhi ^a^V2.0124^ea^ ta.m, bhikkhave, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya --  `sama.nesu sama.nasukhumaalo'ti, mameva ta.m, bhikkhave, sammaa vadamaano  vadeyya -- `sama.nesu sama.nasukhumaalo'''ti. catuttha.m.
text.784: [03] 105^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, phaasuvihaaraa. katame  pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno metta.m kaayakamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti  sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva raho ca, metta.m vaciikamma.m...pe0... metta.m  manokamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva raho ca. yaani  taani siilaani akha.n.daani acchiddaani asabalaani akammaasaani  bhujissaani vi~n~nuppasatthaani aparaama.t.thaani samaadhisa.mvattanikaani,  tathaaruupehi siilehi siilasaama~n~nagato viharati sabrahmacaariihi aavi  ceva raho ca. yaaya.m di.t.thi ariyaa niyyaanikaa niyyaati takkarassa  sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya, tathaaruupaaya di.t.thiyaa di.t.thisaama~n~nagato viharati ^a^T3.0150^ea^  sabrahmacaariihi aavi ceva raho ca. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca  phaasuvihaaraa''ti. pa~ncama.m.
text.786: [03] 106^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M2.0117^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa kosambiya.m viharati  ghositaaraame. atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m  nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca --
text.787: [03] ``kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu sa"nghe {bhikkhu.msa.mgho (syaa0 pii0)} viharanto phaasu.m  vihareyyaa''ti? ``yato kho, aananda, bhikkhu ^a^P3.0133^ea^  attanaa {attanaa ca (pii0 ka0)} siilasampanno hoti, no {no ca (ka0)}  para.m adhisiile sampavattaa {sampavattaa hoti (ka0)}; ettaavataapi  kho, aananda, bhikkhu sa"nghe viharanto phaasu.m vihareyyaa''ti.
text.788: [03] ``siyaa pana, bhante, a~n~nopi pariyaayo yathaa bhikkhu sa"nghe  viharanto phaasu.m vihareyyaa''ti? ``siyaa, aananda {aanandaati bhagavaa aavoca  (syaa0 pii0)}! yato kho,  aananda, bhikkhu attanaa siilasampanno hoti, no para.m adhisiile  sampavattaa; attaanupekkhii ca hoti, no paraanupekkhii; ettaavataapi kho,  aananda, bhikkhu sa"nghe viharanto phaasu.m vihareyyaa''ti.
text.789: [03] ``siyaa ^a^V2.0125^ea^ pana, bhante, a~n~nopi pariyaayo yathaa  bhikkhu sa"nghe viharanto phaasu.m vihareyyaa''ti? ``siyaa, aananda!  yato kho, aananda, bhikkhu attanaa siilasampanno hoti, no para.m  adhisiile sampavattaa; attaanupekkhii ca hoti, no paraanupekkhii;  apa~n~naato ca hoti, tena ca apa~n~naatakena no paritassati;  ettaavataapi kho, aananda, bhikkhu ^a^T3.0151^ea^ sa"nghe viharanto phaasu.m  vihareyyaa''ti.
text.790: [03] ``siyaa pana, bhante, a~n~nopi pariyaayo yathaa bhikkhu sa"nghe  viharanto phaasu.m vihareyyaa''ti? ``siyaa, aananda! yato kho,  aananda, bhikkhu attanaa siilasampanno hoti, no para.m adhisiile  sampavattaa; attaanupekkhii ca hoti, no paraanupekkhii; apa~n~naato ca  hoti, tena ca apa~n~naatakena no paritassati; catunna~nca {catunna.m (pii0 ka0)} jhaanaana.m  aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti  akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii; ettaavataapi kho, aananda, bhikkhu  sa"nghe viharanto phaasu.m vihareyyaa''ti.

text.796: [03] ``imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu  aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m  pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. sattama.m.
text.798: [03] 108^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo...pe0... anuttara.m  pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa.
text.799: [03] ``katamehi, pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asekhena  siilakkhandhena samannaagato hoti, asekhena samaadhikkhandhena  samannaagato hoti, asekhena ^a^M2.0119^ea^ pa~n~naakkhandhena samannaagato  hoti, asekhena vimuttikkhandhena samannaagato hoti, asekhena  vimutti~naa.nadassanakkhandhena samannaagato hoti. imehi kho,  bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo  hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. a.t.thama.m.
text.8: [03] ``tasmaatiha ^a^V2.0002^ea^, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `saddhaabalena  samannaagataa bhavissaama sekhabalena, hiriibalena samannaagataa bhavissaama  sekhabalena, ottappabalena samannaagataa bhavissaama sekhabalena,  viiriyabalena samannaagataa bhavissaama sekhabalena, pa~n~naabalena  samannaagataa bhavissaama sekhabalenaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave,  sikkhitabba''nti. idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu  bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti. pa.thama.m.
text.801: [03] 109^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^P3.0135^ea^, bhikkhave,  dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu caatuddiso hoti. katamehi pa~ncahi?  idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto  viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii,  samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu; bahussuto hoti sutadharo  sutasannicayo ^a^T3.0153^ea^, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa  pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m  brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa  vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa; santu.t.tho  hoti itariitaraciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena;  catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii  hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii; aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m  cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa ^a^V2.0127^ea^  sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. imehi, kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi  dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu caatuddiso hotii''ti. navama.m.
text.803: [03] 110^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu ala.m ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevitu.m.  katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti...pe0...  samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu; bahussuto hoti...pe0... di.t.thiyaa  suppa.tividdhaa; aaraddhaviiriyo viharati thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo  anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu; catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m  di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii  akasiralaabhii; aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m  ^a^P3.0136^ea^ di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja  viharati. imehi ^a^M2.0120^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi  samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani  pa.tisevitu''nti. dasama.m.
text.806: [21] saarajja.m ^a^T3.0154^ea^ sa"nkito coro, sukhumaala.m phaasu pa~ncama.m.
text.807: [22] aananda siilaasekhaa ca, caatuddiso ara~n~nena caati..
text.81: [03] 21^b^.^eb^ ``so ^a^V2.0014^ea^ vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaaravo  appatisso asabhaagavuttiko `sabrahmacaariisu aabhisamaacaarika.m dhamma.m  ^a^P3.0015^ea^ paripuuressatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.  `aabhisamaacaarika.m dhamma.m aparipuuretvaa sekha.m {sekkha.m (ka0)} dhamma.m paripuuressatii'ti  neta.m ^a^T3.0016^ea^ .thaana.m vijjati. `sekha.m dhamma.m aparipuuretvaa siilaani  paripuuressatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `siilaani aparipuuretvaa  sammaadi.t.thi.m paripuuressatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `sammaadi.t.thi.m  aparipuuretvaa sammaasamaadhi.m paripuuressatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.
text.810: [03] 111^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0128^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  kuluupako bhikkhu kulesu appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca agaru ca  abhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi pa~ncahi? asanthavavissaasii {asanthutavissaasii  (sii0), asandhavavissaasii (ka0)} ca hoti,  anissaravikappii ca, vissa.t.thupasevii {viyatthupasevii (sii0), byatthupasevii (syaa0  ka.m0), vyattuupasevii (pii0)} ca, upaka.n.nakajappii ca,  atiyaacanako ca. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi  samannaagato kuluupako bhikkhu kulesu appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca  agaru ca abhaavaniiyo ca.
text.811: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato kuluupako bhikkhu  kulesu piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi  pa~ncahi? na asanthavavissaasii ca hoti, na anissaravikappii ca,  na vissa.t.thupasevii ca, na upaka.n.nakajappii ca, na atiyaacanako ca.  imehi ^a^P3.0137^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi  samannaagato kuluupako bhikkhu kulesu piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu  ca bhaavaniiyo caa''ti. pa.thama.m.
text.813: [03] 112^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  pacchaasama.no na aadaatabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? atiduure vaa  gacchati accaasanne vaa ^a^T3.0155^ea^, na pattapariyaapanna.m ^a^M2.0121^ea^ ga.nhati, aapattisaamantaa  bha.namaana.m na nivaareti, bha.namaanassa antarantaraa katha.m opaateti,  duppa~n~no hoti ja.lo e.lamuugo. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi  dhammehi samannaagato pacchaasama.no na aadaatabbo.
text.814: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato pacchaasama.no  aadaatabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? naatiduure gacchati na accaasanne,  pattapariyaapanna.m ga.nhati, aapattisaamantaa bha.namaana.m nivaareti  ^a^V2.0129^ea^, bha.namaanassa na antarantaraa katha.m opaateti, pa~n~navaa hoti aja.lo  ane.lamuugo. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato  pacchaasama.no aadaatabbo''ti. dutiya.m.
text.816: [03] 113^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu abhabbo sammaasamaadhi.m upasampajja viharitu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi?  idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti ruupaana.m, akkhamo saddaana.m,  akkhamo gandhaana.m, akkhamo rasaana.m, akkhamo pho.t.thabbaana.m. imehi  kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu abhabbo  sammaasamaadhi.m upasampajja viharitu.m.
text.817: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu bhabbo  sammaasamaadhi.m upasampajja viharitu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha  ^a^P3.0138^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khamo hoti ruupaana.m, khamo  saddaana.m, khamo gandhaana.m, khamo rasaana.m, khamo pho.t.thabbaana.m. imehi  kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu bhabbo  sammaasamaadhi.m upasampajja viharitu''nti. tatiya.m.
text.819: [03] 114^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa magadhesu viharati  andhakavinde. atha ^a^T3.0156^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m  nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m aananda.m bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.82: [01] ``so ^a^M2.0013^ea^ vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaaravo sappatisso  sabhaagavuttiko `sabrahmacaariisu aabhisamaacaarika.m dhamma.m paripuuressatii'ti  .thaanameta.m vijjati. `aabhisamaacaarika.m dhamma.m paripuuretvaa sekha.m dhamma.m  paripuuressatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. `sekha.m dhamma.m paripuuretvaa  siilaani paripuuressatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. `siilaani paripuuretvaa  sammaadi.t.thi.m paripuuressatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. `sammaadi.t.thi.m  paripuuretvaa sammaasamaadhi.m paripuuressatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjatii''ti.  pa.thama.m.
text.820: [03] ``ye te, aananda, bhikkhuu navaa acirapabbajitaa adhunaagataa  ima.m dhammavinaya.m, te vo, aananda, bhikkhuu pa~ncasu dhammesu  samaadapetabbaa {samaadaapetabbaa (?)} nivesetabbaa pati.t.thaapetabbaa ^a^M2.0122^ea^. katamesu pa~ncasu? `etha  tumhe, aavuso, siilavaa hotha, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvutaa viharatha  aacaaragocarasampannaa a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavino, samaadaaya  sikkhatha sikkhaapadesuu'ti -- iti paatimokkhasa.mvare samaadapetabbaa  nivesetabbaa pati.t.thaapetabbaa.
text.821: [03] ```etha tumhe, aavuso, indriyesu guttadvaaraa viharatha  aarakkhasatino nipakkasatino {nipakasatino (sii0 syaa0), nepakkasatino  (?)}, saarakkhitamaanasaa ^a^V2.0130^ea^ sataarakkhena cetasaa  samannaagataa'ti -- iti indriyasa.mvare samaadapetabbaa nivesetabbaa  pati.t.thaapetabbaa.
text.822: [03] ```etha tumhe, aavuso, appabhassaa hotha, bhasse  pariyantakaarino'ti -- iti bhassapariyante samaadapetabbaa nivesetabbaa  pati.t.thaapetabbaa.
text.823: [03] ```etha tumhe, aavuso, aara~n~nikaa hotha, ara~n~navanapatthaani  pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevathaa'ti -- iti kaayavuupakaase  samaadapetabbaa nivesetabbaa pati.t.thaapetabbaa.
text.824: [03] ```etha tumhe, aavuso, sammaadi.t.thikaa hotha sammaadassanena  samannaagataa'ti -- iti sammaadassane samaadapetabbaa nivesetabbaa  pati.t.thaapetabbaa. ye ^a^P3.0139^ea^ te, aananda, bhikkhuu navaa  acirapabbajitaa adhunaagataa ima.m dhammavinaya.m, te vo, aananda, bhikkhuu  imesu pa~ncasu dhammesu samaadapetabbaa nivesetabbaa pati.t.thaapetabbaa''ti ^a^T3.0157^ea^.  catuttha.m.
text.826: [03] 115^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagataa  bhikkhunii yathaabhata.m nikkhittaa eva.m niraye. katamehi pa~ncahi?  aavaasamaccharinii hoti, kulamaccharinii hoti, laabhamaccharinii hoti,  va.n.namaccharinii hoti, dhammamaccharinii hoti. imehi kho,  bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagataa bhikkhunii yathaabhata.m nikkhittaa  eva.m niraye.
text.827: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagataa bhikkhunii yathaabhata.m  nikkhittaa eva.m sagge. katamehi pa~ncahi? na aavaasamaccharinii  hoti, na kulamaccharinii hoti, na laabhamaccharinii hoti, na  va.n.namaccharinii hoti, na dhammamaccharinii hoti ^a^M2.0123^ea^. imehi kho,  bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagataa bhikkhunii yathaabhata.m nikkhittaa  eva.m sagge''ti. pa~ncama.m.
text.829: [03] 116^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0131^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagataa  bhikkhunii yathaabhata.m nikkhittaa eva.m niraye. katamehi pa~ncahi?  ananuvicca apariyogaahetvaa ava.n.naarahassa va.n.na.m bhaasati, ananuvicca  apariyogaahetvaa va.n.naarahassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, ananuvicca  apariyogaahetvaa appasaadaniiye .thaane pasaada.m upada.mseti, ananuvicca  apariyogaahetvaa pasaadaniiye .thaane appasaada.m upada.mseti, saddhaadeyya.m  vinipaateti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagataa  bhikkhunii yathaabhata.m nikkhittaa eva.m niraye.
text.830: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagataa bhikkhunii yathaabhata.m  nikkhittaa eva.m sagge. katamehi pa~ncahi? anuvicca pariyogaahetvaa  ava.n.naarahassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, anuvicca pariyogaahetvaa va.n.naarahassa  va.n.na.m bhaasati, anuvicca ^a^P3.0140^ea^ pariyogaahetvaa ^a^T3.0158^ea^  appasaadaniiye .thaane appasaada.m upada.mseti, anuvicca pariyogaahetvaa  pasaadaniiye .thaane pasaada.m upada.mseti, saddhaadeyya.m na vinipaateti.  imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagataa bhikkhunii yathaabhata.m  nikkhittaa eva.m sagge''ti. cha.t.tha.m.
text.832: [03] 117^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagataa  bhikkhunii yathaabhata.m nikkhittaa eva.m niraye. katamehi pa~ncahi?  ananuvicca apariyogaahetvaa ava.n.naarahassa va.n.na.m bhaasati, ananuvicca  apariyogaahetvaa va.n.naarahassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, issukinii ca hoti,  maccharinii ca, saddhaadeyya.m {saddhaadeyya~nca (syaa0)} vinipaateti. imehi kho, bhikkhave,  pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagataa bhikkhunii yathaabhata.m nikkhittaa eva.m  niraye.
text.833: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagataa bhikkhunii yathaabhata.m  nikkhittaa eva.m sagge. katamehi pa~ncahi? anuvicca pariyogaahetvaa  ava.n.naarahassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, anuvicca pariyogaahetvaa va.n.naarahassa  va.n.na.m bhaasati ^a^M2.0124^ea^, anissukinii ca hoti, amaccharinii ca, saddhaadeyya.m  ^a^V2.0132^ea^ na vinipaateti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagataa  bhikkhunii yathaabhata.m nikkhittaa eva.m sagge''ti. sattama.m.
text.835: [03] 118^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagataa  bhikkhunii yathaabhata.m nikkhittaa eva.m niraye. katamehi pa~ncahi?  ananuvicca apariyogaahetvaa ava.n.naarahassa va.n.na.m bhaasati, ananuvicca  apariyogaahetvaa va.n.naarahassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, micchaadi.t.thikaa ca  hoti, micchaasa"nkappaa ca, saddhaadeyya.m vinipaateti. imehi kho,  bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagataa bhikkhunii yathaabhata.m nikkhittaa  eva.m niraye.
