text.85: [01] ``so vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaaravo sappatisso  sabhaagavuttiko `sabrahmacaariisu aabhisamaacaarika.m dhamma.m paripuuressatii'ti  .thaanameta.m vijjati. `aabhisamaacaarika.m dhamma.m paripuuretvaa sekha.m dhamma.m  paripuuressatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. sekha.m dhamma.m paripuuretvaa  siilakkhandha.m paripuuressatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. `siilakkhandha.m  paripuuretvaa samaadhikkhandha.m ^a^T3.0017^ea^ paripuuressatii'ti .thaanameta.m ^a^P3.0016^ea^  vijjati. `samaadhikkhandha.m paripuuretvaa pa~n~naakkhandha.m paripuuressatii'ti  .thaanameta.m vijjatii''ti. dutiya.m.
text.850: [03] ``ya.m ^a^M2.0126^ea^ ki~nci {ya.m ki~nci (syaa0 ka.m0)}, bhikkhave,   bhikkhu.m dubbala.m {bhikkhave dubbala.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} gilaanaka.m pa~nca  dhammaa na vijahanti, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- `nacirasseva aasavaana.m  khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissatii'''ti.
text.851: [03] ``katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ^a^T3.0161^ea^ asubhaanupassii kaaye  viharati, aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~nii, sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~nii {sabbatthapi evameva  dissati},  sabbasa"nkhaaresu ^a^P3.0143^ea^ aniccaanupassii, mara.nasa~n~naa kho  panassa ajjhatta.m suupa.t.thitaa hoti. ya.m ki~nci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu.m  dubbala.m gilaanaka.m ime pa~nca dhammaa na vijahanti, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m  -- `nacirasseva aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa upasampajja  viharissatii'''ti. pa.thama.m.
text.853: [03] 122^b^.^eb^ ``yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vaa  bhikkhunii vaa pa~nca dhamme bhaaveti pa~nca dhamme bahuliikaroti, tassa  dvinna.m phalaana.m a~n~natara.m phala.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- di.t.theva dhamme a~n~naa, sati  vaa upaadisese anaagaamitaa.
text.854: [03] ``katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ajjhatta~n~neva  sati suupa.t.thitaa hoti dhammaana.m udayatthagaaminiyaa ^a^V2.0135^ea^ pa~n~naaya,  asubhaanupassii kaaye viharati, aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~nii, sabbaloke  anabhiratasa~n~nii, sabbasa"nkhaaresu aniccaanupassii. yo hi koci,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu vaa bhikkhunii vaa ime pa~nca dhamme bhaaveti ime  pa~nca dhamme bahuliikaroti, tassa dvinna.m phalaana.m a~n~natara.m phala.m  paa.tika"nkha.m -- di.t.theva dhamme a~n~naa, sati vaa upaadisese  anaagaamitaa''ti. dutiya.m.
text.856: [03] 123^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  gilaano duupa.t.thaako {dupa.t.thaako (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0) mahaava0 366} hoti.   katamehi pa~ncahi? asappaayakaarii hoti,  sappaaye matta.m na jaanaati, bhesajja.m nappa.tisevitaa hoti, atthakaamassa  gilaanupa.t.thaakassa ^a^T3.0162^ea^ na yathaabhuuta.m aabaadha.m aavikattaa hoti abhikkamanta.m vaa  abhikkamatiiti pa.tikkamanta.m vaa pa.tikkamatiiti .thita.m vaa .thitoti,  uppannaana.m saariirikaana.m ^a^M2.0127^ea^ vedanaana.m dukkhaana.m tibbaana.m {tippaana.m (sii0)  mahaava0 366} kharaana.m ka.tukaana.m  asaataana.m amanaapaana.m paa.naharaana.m anadhivaasakajaatiko hoti. imehi  ^a^P3.0144^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato  gilaano duupa.t.thaako hoti.
text.857: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato gilaano suupa.t.thaako  hoti. katamehi pa~ncahi? sappaayakaarii hoti, sappaaye matta.m  jaanaati, bhesajja.m pa.tisevitaa hoti, atthakaamassa gilaanupa.t.thaakassa  yathaabhuuta.m aabaadha.m aavikattaa hoti abhikkamanta.m vaa abhikkamatiiti  pa.tikkamanta.m vaa pa.tikkamatiiti .thita.m vaa .thitoti, uppannaana.m saariirikaana.m  vedanaana.m dukkhaana.m tibbaana.m kharaana.m ka.tukaana.m asaataana.m amanaapaana.m  paa.naharaana.m adhivaasakajaatiko hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi  dhammehi samannaagato gilaano suupa.t.thaako hotii''ti. tatiya.m.
text.859: [03] 124^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  gilaanupa.t.thaako naala.m gilaana.m upa.t.thaatu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi?  nappa.tibalo hoti bhesajja.m sa.mvidhaatu.m; sappaayaasappaaya.m na jaanaati,  asappaaya.m upanaameti, sappaaya.m apanaameti; aamisantaro gilaana.m  upa.t.thaati, no mettacitto ^a^V2.0136^ea^; jegucchii hoti uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa vanta.m  vaa khe.la.m vaa niiharitu.m; nappa.tibalo hoti gilaana.m kaalena kaala.m  dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetu.m samaadapetu.m {samaadaapetu.m (?) mahaava0 366} samuttejetu.m   sampaha.msetu.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi ^a^T3.0163^ea^ samannaagato gilaanupa.t.thaako naala.m  gilaana.m upa.t.thaatu.m.
text.860: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato gilaanupa.t.thaako ala.m  gilaana.m upa.t.thaatu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? pa.tibalo hoti bhesajja.m  sa.mvidhaatu.m; sappaayaasappaaya.m jaanaati, asappaaya.m apanaameti, sappaaya.m  upanaameti; mettacitto gilaana.m upa.t.thaati, no aamisantaro; ajegucchii  hoti uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa vanta.m vaa khe.la.m vaa niiharitu.m; pa.tibalo  hoti gilaana.m kaalena kaala.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetu.m samaadapetu.m  samuttejetu.m sampaha.msetu.m. imehi ^a^P3.0145^ea^ kho, bhikkhave,  pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato gilaanupa.t.thaako ala.m gilaana.m upa.t.thaatu''nti.  catuttha.m.
text.862: [03] 125^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^M2.0128^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammaa anaayussaa.  katame pa~nca? asappaayakaarii hoti, sappaaye matta.m na jaanaati,  apari.natabhojii ca hoti, akaalacaarii ca hoti, abrahmacaarii ca.  ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa anaayussaa.
text.863: [03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa aayussaa. katame pa~nca?  sappaayakaarii hoti, sappaaye matta.m jaanaati, pari.natabhojii ca hoti,  kaalacaarii ca hoti, brahmacaarii ca. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa  aayussaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.
text.865: [03] 126^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa anaayussaa.  katame pa~nca? asappaayakaarii hoti, sappaaye matta.m na jaanaati,  apari.natabhojii ca hoti, dussiilo ca, paapamitto ca. ime kho,  bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa anaayussaa.
text.866: [03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa aayussaa. katame pa~nca ^a^T3.0164^ea^?  sappaayakaarii hoti, sappaaye matta.m ^a^V2.0137^ea^ jaanaati, pari.natabhojii ca hoti,  siilavaa ca, kalyaa.namitto ca. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa  aayussaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.
text.868: [03] 127^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu naala.m sa"nghamhaa vapakaasitu.m {vi + apa + kaasitu.m = vapakaasitu.m}. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu asantu.t.tho hoti itariitarena ciivarena, asantu.t.tho  hoti itariitarena pi.n.dapaatena, asantu.t.tho hoti itariitarena senaasanena,  asantu.t.tho hoti itariitarena gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena,  kaamasa"nkappabahulo ca viharati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi  dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu naala.m sa"nghamhaa vapakaasitu.m.
text.869: [03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m  sa"nghamhaa vapakaasitu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha ^a^P3.0146^ea^,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti itariitarena ciivarena, santu.t.tho hoti  itariitarena pi.n.dapaatena, santu.t.tho hoti itariitarena senaasanena, santu.t.tho  hoti itariitarena gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena ^a^M2.0129^ea^,  nekkhammasa"nkappabahulo {na kaamasa"nkappabahulo (ka0)} ca viharati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi  dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m sa"nghamhaa vapakaasitu''nti. sattama.m.
text.87: [03] 23^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, jaataruupassa upakkilesaa,  yehi upakkilesehi upakkili.t.tha.m jaataruupa.m na ceva mudu hoti na ca  kammaniya.m na ca pabhassara.m pabha"ngu ca na ca sammaa upeti kammaaya.  katame pa~nca? ayo, loha.m, tipu, siisa.m, sajjha.m {sajjhu (sii0)} -- ime kho,  bhikkhave, pa~nca jaataruupassa upakkilesaa ^a^M2.0014^ea^, yehi upakkilesehi  upakkili.t.tha.m jaataruupa.m na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniya.m na ca  pabhassara.m pabha"ngu ca na ca sammaa upeti kammaaya. yato ca kho,  bhikkhave, jaataruupa.m imehi pa~ncahi upakkilesehi vimutta.m {vippamutta.m (sii0)} hoti, ta.m  hoti jaataruupa.m mudu ca kammaniya~nca pabhassara~nca na ca pabha"ngu sammaa  upeti kammaaya. yassaa yassaa ca {yassa kassaci (syaa0 pii0)} pi.landhanavikatiyaa aaka"nkhati  -- yadi muddikaaya yadi ku.n.dalaaya yadi giiveyyakaaya {giiveyyakena (syaa0 ka.m0  ka0, a0 ni0  3.102)} yadi  suva.n.namaalaaya -- ta~ncassa attha.m anubhoti.
text.871: [03] 128^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, sama.nadukkhaani.  katamaani pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asantu.t.tho hoti itariitarena  ciivarena, asantu.t.tho hoti itariitarena pi.n.dapaatena, asantu.t.tho hoti  itariitarena senaasanena, asantu.t.tho hoti itariitarena  gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena, anabhirato ^a^T3.0165^ea^ ca brahmacariya.m carati.  imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca sama.nadukkhaani.
text.872: [03] ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, sama.nasukhaani. katamaani pa~nca?  idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti itariitarena ciivarena, santu.t.tho  hoti itariitarena pi.n.dapaatena, santu.t.tho hoti itariitarena ^a^V2.0138^ea^ senaasanena,  santu.t.tho hoti itariitarena gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena, abhirato  ca brahmacariya.m carati. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca  sama.nasukhaanii''ti. a.t.thama.m.
text.874: [03] 129^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aapaayikaa nerayikaa  parikuppaa atekicchaa. katame pa~nca? maataa {maatara.m (ka0)} jiivitaa voropitaa  hoti, pitaa {pitara.m (ka0)} jiivitaa voropito {voropitaa (ka0)} hoti,   araha.m {arahanta.m (ka0), arahaa (syaa0)} jiivitaa voropito  hoti, tathaagatassa du.t.thena cittena lohita.m uppaadita.m hoti, sa"ngho  bhinno hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aapaayikaa nerayikaa  parikuppaa atekicchaa''ti. navama.m.
text.876: [03] 130^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^P3.0147^ea^, bhikkhave,  byasanaani. katamaani pa~nca? ~naatibyasana.m, bhogabyasana.m,  rogabyasana.m, siilabyasana.m, di.t.thibyasana.m. na, bhikkhave, sattaa  ~naatibyasanahetu vaa ^a^M2.0130^ea^ bhogabyasanahetu vaa rogabyasanahetu vaa kaayassa  bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjanti.  siilabyasanahetu vaa, bhikkhave, sattaa di.t.thibyasanahetu vaa kaayassa bhedaa  para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjanti. imaani  kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca byasanaani.
text.877: [01] ``pa~ncimaa, bhikkhave, sampadaa. katamaa pa~nca?  ~naatisampadaa, bhogasampadaa, aarogyasampadaa, siilasampadaa, di.t.thisampadaa.  na, bhikkhave, sattaa ~naatisampadaahetu vaa bhogasampadaahetu vaa  aarogyasampadaahetu ^a^T3.0166^ea^ vaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m  upapajjanti. siilasampadaahetu vaa, bhikkhave, sattaa di.t.thisampadaahetu  vaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjanti. imaa  kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca sampadaa''ti. dasama.m.
text.88: [03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncime cittassa upakkilesaa, yehi  upakkilesehi upakkili.t.tha.m citta.m na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniya.m na  ca pabhassara.m pabha"ngu ca na ca sammaa samaadhiyati aasavaana.m khayaaya.  katame pa~nca? kaamacchando, byaapaado, thinamiddha.m {thiinamiddha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  pii0)}, uddhaccakukkucca.m,  vicikicchaa -- ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca cittassa upakkilesaa yehi  upakkilesehi upakkili.t.tha.m citta.m na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniya.m na  ca pabhassara.m pabha"ngu ca na ca sammaa ^a^T3.0018^ea^ samaadhiyati aasavaana.m khayaaya.  yato ca kho, bhikkhave, citta.m imehi pa~ncahi upakkilesehi vimutta.m  hoti, ta.m hoti citta.m mudu ca kammaniya~nca ^a^P3.0017^ea^  pabhassara~nca na ca pabha"ngu sammaa samaadhiyati aasavaana.m khayaaya.  yassa yassa ca abhi~n~naasacchikara.niiyassa dhammassa citta.m  abhininnaameti abhi~n~naasacchikiriyaaya tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m  paapu.naati sati sati aayatane.
text.884: [03] 131^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0140^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato  raajaa cakkavattii dhammeneva cakka.m vatteti {pavatteti (syaa0 pii0 ka0)}; ta.m hoti   cakka.m appa.tivattiya.m {appativattiya.m (sii0)}  ^a^P3.0148^ea^ kenaci manussabhuutena paccatthikena paa.ninaa.
text.885: [03] ``katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, raajaa cakkavattii attha~n~nuu  ca hoti, dhamma~n~nuu ca, matta~n~nuu ca, kaala~n~nuu ca, parisa~n~nuu ca.  imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagato raajaa cakkavattii  dhammeneva cakka.m pavatteti; ta.m hoti cakka.m appa.tivattiya.m kenaci  manussabhuutena paccatthikena paa.ninaa.
text.886: [03] ``evameva.m ^a^M2.0131^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato  tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho dhammeneva anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavatteti; ta.m  hoti cakka.m appa.tivattiya.m sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena  vaa ^a^T3.0167^ea^ brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m.
text.887: [01] ``katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, tathaagato araha.m  sammaasambuddho attha~n~nuu, dhamma~n~nuu, matta~n~nuu, kaala~n~nuu, parisa~n~nuu.  imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato tathaagato araha.m  sammaasambuddho dhammeneva anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavatteti; ta.m hoti dhammacakka.m  appa.tivattiya.m sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa  vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi''nti. pa.thama.m.
text.889: [03] 132^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato  ra~n~no cakkavattissa je.t.tho putto pitaraa pavattita.m cakka.m dhammeneva  anuppavatteti; ta.m hoti cakka.m appa.tivattiya.m kenaci manussabhuutena  paccatthikena paa.ninaa.
text.89: [03] ``so ^a^V2.0016^ea^ sace aaka"nkhati -- `anekavihita.m iddhividha.m  paccanubhaveyya.m -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa assa.m, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko  assa.m; aavibhaava.m, tirobhaava.m; tiroku.t.ta.m tiropaakaara.m tiropabbata.m  asajjamaano gaccheyya.m, seyyathaapi aakaase; pathaviyaapi ummujjanimujja.m  kareyya.m, seyyathaapi udake; udakepi abhijjamaano gaccheyya.m, seyyathaapi  pathaviya.m; aakaasepi palla"nkena kameyya.m, seyyathaapi pakkhii saku.no;  imepi candimasuuriye {candimasuriye (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} eva.mmahiddhike   eva.mmahaanubhaave paa.ninaa parimaseyya.m {paraamaseyya.m (ka0)}  parimajjeyya.m yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteyya'nti, tatra tatreva  sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati aayatane.
text.890: [03] ``katamehi ^a^V2.0141^ea^ pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no cakkavattissa  je.t.tho putto attha~n~nuu ca hoti, dhamma~n~nuu ca, matta~n~nuu ca, kaala~n~nuu ca,  parisa~n~nuu ca. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagato  ra~n~no cakkavattissa je.t.tho putto pitaraa pavattita.m cakka.m dhammeneva  anuppavatteti; ta.m hoti cakka.m appa.tivattiya.m kenaci manussabhuutena  paccatthikena paa.ninaa.
text.891: [03] ``evameva.m ^a^P3.0149^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi  samannaagato saariputto tathaagatena anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavattita.m sammadeva  anuppavatteti; ta.m hoti cakka.m appa.tivattiya.m sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa  devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m.
text.892: [03] ``katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, saariputto attha~n~nuu,  dhamma~n~nuu, matta~n~nuu ^a^T3.0168^ea^, kaala~n~nuu, parisa~n~nuu. imehi kho, bhikkhave,  pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato saariputto tathaagatena anuttara.m dhammacakka.m  pavattita.m sammadeva anuppavatteti; ta.m hoti cakka.m appa.tivattiya.m sama.nena  vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa  lokasmi''nti. dutiya.m.
text.894: [03] 133^b^.^eb^ ``yopi ^a^M2.0132^ea^ so {yopi kho (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, bhikkhave,   raajaa cakkavattii  dhammiko dhammaraajaa, sopi na araajaka.m cakka.m vattetii''ti. eva.m vutte  a~n~nataro bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko pana, bhante, ra~n~no  cakkavattissa dhammikassa dhammara~n~no raajaa''ti? ``dhammo,  bhikkhuu''ti bhagavaa avoca.
text.895: [03] ``idha, bhikkhu, raajaa cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa  dhamma~n~neva nissaaya dhamma.m sakkaronto dhamma.m garu.m karonto dhamma.m  apacaayamaano dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammaadhipateyyo dhammika.m  rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahati antojanasmi.m.
text.896: [01] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhu, raajaa cakkavattii dhammiko  dhammaraajaa dhamma~n~neva nissaaya dhamma.m sakkaronto dhamma.m garu.m karonto  dhamma.m apacaayamaano dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammaadhipateyyo dhammika.m  rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahati khattiyesu anuyantesu {anuyuttesu (sii0) a0 ni0  3.14}  ...pe0...  balakaayasmi.m braahma.nagahapatikesu negamajaanapadesu ^a^V2.0142^ea^ sama.nabraahma.nesu  migapakkhiisu. sa ^a^P3.0150^ea^ kho so, bhikkhu, raajaa  cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa dhamma~n~neva nissaaya dhamma.m sakkaronto  dhamma.m garu.m karonto dhamma.m apacaayamaano dhammaddhajo dhammaketu  dhammaadhipateyyo dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahitvaa antojanasmi.m  dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahitvaa khattiyesu anuyantesu  balakaayasmi.m braahma.nagahapatikesu negamajaanapadesu sama.nabraahma.nesu  migapakkhiisu dhammeneva cakka.m pavatteti; ta.m hoti cakka.m appa.tivattiya.m  kenaci manussabhuutena paccatthikena ^a^T3.0169^ea^ paa.ninaa.
text.897: [03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhu, tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho  dhammiko dhammaraajaa dhamma~n~neva nissaaya dhamma.m sakkaronto dhamma.m garu.m  karonto dhamma.m apacaayamaano dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammaadhipateyyo  dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahati bhikkhuusu -- `evaruupa.m kaayakamma.m  sevitabba.m, evaruupa.m kaayakamma.m na sevitabba.m; evaruupa.m vaciikamma.m  sevitabba.m, evaruupa.m vaciikamma.m na sevitabba.m; evaruupa.m manokamma.m  sevitabba.m, evaruupa.m manokamma.m na sevitabba.m; evaruupo aajiivo  sevitabbo, evaruupo aajiivo na sevitabbo; evaruupo gaamanigamo  sevitabbo, evaruupo gaamanigamo na sevitabbo'ti.
text.898: [03] ``puna ^a^M2.0133^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhu, tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho dhammiko  dhammaraajaa dhamma~n~neva nissaaya dhamma.m sakkaronto dhamma.m garu.m karonto  dhamma.m apacaayamaano dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammaadhipateyyo dhammika.m  rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahati bhikkhuniisu {bhikkhuusu bhikkhuniisu (sii0 pii0)}  ...pe0... upaasakesu...pe0...  upaasikaasu -- `evaruupa.m kaayakamma.m sevitabba.m, evaruupa.m kaayakamma.m na  sevitabba.m; evaruupa.m vaciikamma.m sevitabba.m, evaruupa.m vaciikamma.m na  sevitabba.m; evaruupa.m manokamma.m sevitabba.m, evaruupa.m manokamma.m na  sevitabba.m; evaruupo aajiivo sevitabbo, evaruupo aajiivo na  sevitabbo; evaruupo gaamanigamo sevitabbo, evaruupo gaamanigamo na  sevitabbo'''ti.
text.899: [03] ``sa kho so, bhikkhu, tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho  dhammiko ^a^P3.0151^ea^ dhammaraajaa dhamma~n~neva nissaaya dhamma.m  sakkaronto dhamma.m garu.m karonto dhamma.m apacaayamaano dhammaddhajo  dhammaketu dhammaadhipateyyo dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahitvaa  bhikkhuusu, dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahitvaa bhikkhuniisu,  dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahitvaa upaasakesu, dhammika.m  rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahitvaa upaasikaasu dhammeneva anuttara.m dhammacakka.m  pavatteti; ta.m hoti cakka.m ^a^V2.0143^ea^ appa.tivattiya.m sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena  vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi''nti. tatiya.m.
text.90: [03] ``so ^a^M2.0015^ea^ sace aaka"nkhati -- `dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya  atikkantamaanusikaaya ubho sadde su.neyya.m -- dibbe ca maanuse ca ye  duure santike caa'ti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati  aayatane.
text.901: [03] 134^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato  raajaa khattiyo muddhaavasitto yassa.m yassa.m disaaya.m viharati,  sakasmi.myeva vijite viharati.
text.902: [03] ``katamehi ^a^T3.0170^ea^ pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, raajaa khattiyo  muddhaavasitto ubhato sujaato hoti maatito ca pitito ca,  sa.msuddhagaha.niko, yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho  jaativaadena; a.d.dho hoti mahaddhano mahaabhogo  paripu.n.nakosako.t.thaagaaro; balavaa kho pana hoti catura"nginiyaa senaaya  samannaagato assavaaya ovaadapa.tikaraaya; pari.naayako kho panassa  hoti pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii pa.tibalo atiitaanaagatapaccuppanne atthe  cintetu.m; tassime cattaaro dhammaa yasa.m paripaacenti. so iminaa  yasapa~ncamena ^a^M2.0134^ea^ {yasena pa~ncamena (ka0), pa~ncamena (sii0)} dhammena   samannaagato yassa.m yassa.m disaaya.m viharati,  sakasmi.myeva vijite viharati. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m,  bhikkhave, hoti vijitaaviina.m.
text.903: [01] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu yassa.m yassa.m disaaya.m viharati, vimuttacittova {vimuttacitto (sii0 pii0),  vimuttacitto ca (ka0)} viharati.  katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti,  paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu  vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu -- raajaava  ^a^P3.0152^ea^ khattiyo muddhaavasitto jaatisampanno; bahussuto  hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa  majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m  parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti  dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa --  raajaava ^a^V2.0144^ea^ khattiyo muddhaavasitto a.d.dho mahaddhano mahaabhogo  paripu.n.nakosako.t.thaagaaro; aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m  pahaanaaya kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo  anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu -- raajaava khattiyo muddhaavasitto  balasampanno; pa~n~navaa hoti udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato  ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa -- raajaava  khattiyo muddhaavasitto pari.naayakasampanno; tassime cattaaro dhammaa  vimutti.m paripaacenti ^a^T3.0171^ea^. so iminaa vimuttipa~ncamena dhammena  samannaagato yassa.m yassa.m disaaya.m viharati vimuttacittova viharati.  ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, bhikkhave, hoti vimuttacittaana''nti.  catuttha.m.
text.905: [03] 135^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato  ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa je.t.tho putto rajja.m pattheti. katamehi  pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa je.t.tho  putto ubhato sujaato hoti maatito ca pitito ca, sa.msuddhagaha.niko,  yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena;  abhiruupo hoti ^a^M2.0135^ea^ dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya  samannaagato; maataapituuna.m piyo hoti manaapo; negamajaanapadassa piyo  hoti manaapo; yaani taani ra~n~na.m khattiyaana.m muddhaavasittaana.m  sippa.t.thaanaani hatthismi.m vaa assasmi.m vaa rathasmi.m vaa dhanusmi.m vaa  tharusmi.m vaa tattha sikkhito hoti anavayo.
text.906: [03] ``tassa ^a^P3.0153^ea^ eva.m hoti -- `aha.m khomhi  ubhato sujaato maatito ca pitito ca, sa.msuddhagaha.niko, yaava sattamaa  pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena. kasmaaha.m rajja.m na  pattheyya.m! aha.m khomhi abhiruupo dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya  va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagato. kasmaaha.m rajja.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m  khomhi maataapituuna.m piyo manaapo. kasmaaha.m rajja.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m  khomhi negamajaanapadassa piyo manaapo. kasmaaha.m rajja.m na pattheyya.m!  aha.m khomhi yaani taani ra~n~na.m khattiyaana.m muddhaavasittaana.m ^a^T3.0172^ea^  sippa.t.thaanaani hatthismi.m vaa assasmi.m vaa rathasmi.m vaa dhanusmi.m vaa  tharusmi.m vaa, tattha {tatthamhi (sii0), tatthapi (ka0)} sikkhito   anavayo. kasmaaha.m rajja.m na  pattheyya'nti! imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagato  ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa je.t.tho putto rajja.m pattheti.
text.907: [03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu  aasavaana.m khaya.m pattheti. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  saddho hoti, saddahati tathaagatassa bodhi.m -- `itipi so bhagavaa  araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro  ^a^V2.0145^ea^ purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. appaabaadho  hoti appaata"nko, samavepaakiniyaa gaha.niyaa samannaagato naatisiitaaya  naaccu.nhaaya majjhimaaya padhaanakkhamaaya; asa.tho hoti amaayaavii,  yathaabhuuta.m attaana.m aavikattaa satthari vaa vi~n~nuusu vaa sabrahmacaariisu;  aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m  dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu  dhammesu; pa~n~navaa hoti udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato  ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa.
text.908: [03] ``tassa ^a^M2.0136^ea^ eva.m hoti -- `aha.m khomhi saddho, saddahaami  tathaagatassa bodhi.m -- itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho...pe0...  satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. `kasmaaha.m aasavaana.m ^a^P3.0154^ea^  khaya.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m khomhi appaabaadho appaata"nko  samavepaakiniyaa gaha.niyaa samannaagato naatisiitaaya naaccu.nhaaya  majjhimaaya padhaanakkhamaaya. kasmaaha.m aasavaana.m khaya.m na pattheyya.m!  aha.m khomhi asa.tho amaayaavii yathaabhuuta.m attaana.m aavikattaa satthari vaa  vi~n~nuusu vaa sabrahmacaariisu. kasmaaha.m aasavaana.m khaya.m na pattheyya.m!  aha.m khomhi aaraddhaviiriyo viharaami akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya,  kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro  kusalesu dhammesu. kasmaaha.m aasavaana.m ^a^T3.0173^ea^ khaya.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m  khomhi pa~n~navaa udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya  nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa. kasmaaha.m aasavaana.m khaya.m  na pattheyya'nti! imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu aasavaana.m khaya.m patthetii''ti. pa~ncama.m.
text.91: [03] ``so sace aaka"nkhati -- `parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m cetasaa  ceto paricca pajaaneyya.m -- saraaga.m vaa citta.m saraaga.m cittanti  pajaaneyya.m, viitaraaga.m vaa citta.m viitaraaga.m cittanti ^a^P3.0018^ea^  pajaaneyya.m, sadosa.m vaa citta.m sadosa.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, viitadosa.m vaa  ^a^T3.0019^ea^ citta.m viitadosa.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, samoha.m vaa citta.m samoha.m cittanti  pajaaneyya.m, viitamoha.m vaa citta.m viitamoha.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, sa.mkhitta.m  vaa citta.m sa.mkhitta.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, vikkhitta.m vaa citta.m vikkhitta.m  cittanti pajaaneyya.m, mahaggata.m vaa citta.m mahaggata.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m,  amahaggata.m vaa citta.m amahaggata.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, sauttara.m vaa citta.m  sauttara.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, anuttara.m vaa citta.m anuttara.m cittanti  pajaaneyya.m, samaahita.m vaa citta.m samaahita.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m,  asamaahita.m vaa citta.m asamaahita.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, vimutta.m vaa citta.m  vimutta.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, avimutta.m vaa citta.m avimutta.m cittanti  pajaaneyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati  aayatane.
text.910: [03] 136^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato  ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa je.t.tho putto oparajja.m {uparajja.m (syaa0 pii0  ka0)} pattheti.  katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa  je.t.tho putto ubhato sujaato hoti maatito ca pitito ca,  sa.msuddhagaha.niko, yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho  jaativaadena; abhiruupo hoti dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya  va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagato; maataapituuna.m piyo hoti manaapo,  balakaayassa piyo hoti manaapo; pa.n.dito hoti viyatto medhaavii  pa.tibalo atiitaanaagatapaccuppanne atthe cintetu.m.
text.911: [03] ``tassa ^a^V2.0146^ea^ eva.m hoti -- `aha.m khomhi ubhato sujaato maatito  ca pitito ca, sa.msuddhagaha.niko, yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto  anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena. kasmaaha.m oparajja.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m khomhi  abhiruupo dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya  samannaagato. kasmaaha.m oparajja.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m khomhi  maataapituuna.m piyo ^a^M2.0137^ea^ manaapo. kasmaaha.m oparajja.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m  ^a^P3.0155^ea^ khomhi balakaayassa piyo manaapo. kasmaaha.m  oparajja.m ^a^T3.0174^ea^ na pattheyya.m! aha.m khomhi pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii  pa.tibalo atiitaanaagatapaccuppanne atthe cintetu.m. kasmaaha.m oparajja.m na  pattheyya'nti! imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagato  ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa je.t.tho putto oparajja.m pattheti.
text.912: [03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu  aasavaana.m khaya.m pattheti. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  siilavaa hoti...pe0... samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu; bahussuto  hoti...pe0... di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa; catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu  suppati.t.thitacitto {supa.t.thitacitto (sii0 syaa0), suupa.t.thitacitto (ka0)} hoti;   aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m  pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo  anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu; pa~n~navaa hoti, udayatthagaaminiyaa  pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa  dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa.
text.913: [03] ``tassa eva.m hoti -- `aha.m khomhi siilavaa,  paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharaami aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu  vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhaami sikkhaapadesu. kasmaaha.m  aasavaana.m khaya.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m khomhi bahussuto sutadharo  sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa  pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m {satthaa bya~njanaa (sii0)} kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m  brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaa me dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa  vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa. kasmaaha.m  aasavaana.m khaya.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m khomhi catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu  suppati.t.thitacitto. kasmaaha.m aasavaana.m khaya.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m  khomhi aaraddhaviiriyo viharaami akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya,  kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro  kusalesu dhammesu. kasmaaha.m aasavaana.m khaya.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m  khomhi pa~n~navaa udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya  nibbedhikaaya ^a^P3.0156^ea^ sammaa ^a^V2.0147^ea^ dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa.  kasmaaha.m aasavaana.m khaya.m na pattheyya'nti! imehi kho, bhikkhave,  pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aasavaana.m khaya.m patthetii''ti.  cha.t.tha.m.
text.915: [03] 137^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^T3.0175^ea^ ^a^M2.0138^ea^, bhikkhave, appa.m rattiyaa supanti,  bahu.m jagganti. katame pa~nca? itthii, bhikkhave, purisaadhippaayaa  appa.m rattiyaa supati, bahu.m jaggati. puriso, bhikkhave,  itthaadhippaayo appa.m rattiyaa supati, bahu.m jaggati. coro, bhikkhave,  aadaanaadhippaayo appa.m rattiyaa supati, bahu.m jaggati.   raajaa {raajayutto (pii0 ka0)},  bhikkhave, raajakara.niiyesu yutto appa.m rattiyaa supati, bahu.m jaggati.  bhikkhu, bhikkhave, visa.myogaadhippaayo appa.m rattiyaa supati, bahu.m  jaggati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca appa.m rattiyaa supanti, bahu.m  jaggantii''ti. sattama.m.
text.917: [03] 138^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato  ra~n~no naago bhattaadako ca hoti okaasaphara.no ca la.n.dasaara.no ca  salaakaggaahii ca ra~n~no naagotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. katamehi pa~ncahi?  idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago akkhamo hoti ruupaana.m, akkhamo  saddaana.m, akkhamo gandhaana.m, akkhamo rasaana.m, akkhamo pho.t.thabbaana.m.  imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no naago  bhattaadako ca okaasaphara.no ca la.n.dasaara.no ca salaakaggaahii ca,  ra~n~no naagotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.
text.918: [03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu  bhattaadako ca hoti, okaasaphara.no ca ma~ncapii.thamaddano {pii.thamaddano (sii0 syaa0  ka.m0 pii0)} ca  salaakaggaahii ca, bhikkhutveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. katamehi pa~ncahi?  idha ^a^P3.0157^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti ruupaana.m,  akkhamo saddaana.m, akkhamo gandhaana.m, akkhamo rasaana.m, akkhamo  pho.t.thabbaana.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato  bhikkhu ^a^T3.0176^ea^ bhattaadako ca hoti okaasaphara.no ca ma~ncapii.thamaddano ca  salaakaggaahii ca, bhikkhutveva sa"nkha.m gacchatii''ti. a.t.thama.m.
text.92: [03] ``so sace aaka"nkhati -- `anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m  anussareyya.m, seyyathida.m {seyyathiida.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} -- ekampi   jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi  jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo  viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaariisampi jaatiyo  pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi  anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi ^a^V2.0017^ea^ sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe --  amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro  eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato ^a^T3.0020^ea^ cuto amutra  udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro  eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto  idhuupapannoti, iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m  anussareyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati  aayatane.
text.920: [03] 139^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0148^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato  ra~n~no naago na raajaaraho hoti na raajabhoggo, na ra~n~no a"nga.mtveva  sa"nkha.m gacchati ^a^M2.0139^ea^. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago  akkhamo hoti ruupaana.m, akkhamo saddaana.m, akkhamo gandhaana.m,  akkhamo rasaana.m, akkhamo pho.t.thabbaana.m.
text.921: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago akkhamo hoti ruupaana.m?  idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago sa"ngaamagato hatthikaaya.m vaa disvaa  assakaaya.m vaa disvaa rathakaaya.m vaa disvaa pattikaaya.m vaa disvaa  sa.msiidati visiidati, na santhambhati na sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m.  eva.m kho, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago akkhamo hoti ruupaana.m.
text.922: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago akkhamo hoti saddaana.m?  idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago sa"ngaamagato hatthisadda.m vaa sutvaa  assasadda.m vaa sutvaa rathasadda.m vaa sutvaa pattisadda.m vaa sutvaa  bheripa.navasa"nkhati.navaninnaadasadda.m vaa sutvaa sa.msiidati visiidati, na  santhambhati na sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave,  ra~n~no naago akkhamo hoti saddaana.m.
text.923: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago akkhamo hoti gandhaana.m?  idha ^a^P3.0158^ea^, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago sa"ngaamagato ye te  ra~n~no naagaa abhijaataa sa"ngaamaavacaraa tesa.m muttakariisassa gandha.m  ghaayitvaa sa.msiidati visiidati, na santhambhati na sakkoti sa"ngaama.m  otaritu.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago akkhamo hoti gandhaana.m.
text.924: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago akkhamo hoti ^a^T3.0177^ea^ rasaana.m?  idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago sa"ngaamagato ekissaa vaa  ti.nodakadattiyaa vimaanito {vihaniito (syaa0), vihaanito (katthaci)} dviihi   vaa tiihi vaa catuuhi vaa pa~ncahi  vaa ti.nodakadattiihi vimaanito sa.msiidati visiidati, na santhambhati  na sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago  akkhamo hoti rasaana.m.
text.925: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago akkhamo hoti pho.t.thabbaana.m?  idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago ^a^V2.0149^ea^ sa"ngaamagato ekena vaa saravegena  viddho, dviihi vaa tiihi vaa catuuhi vaa pa~ncahi vaa saravegehi viddho  sa.msiidati visiidati, na ^a^M2.0140^ea^ santhambhati na sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m.  eva.m kho, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago akkhamo hoti pho.t.thabbaana.m.
text.926: [03] ``imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no  naago na raajaaraho hoti na raajabhoggo na ra~n~no a"nga.mtveva sa"nkha.m  gacchati.
text.927: [03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu  na aahuneyyo hoti na paahuneyyo na dakkhi.neyyo na a~njalikara.niiyo  na anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti ruupaana.m, akkhamo saddaana.m, akkhamo  gandhaana.m, akkhamo rasaana.m, akkhamo pho.t.thabbaana.m.
text.928: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti ruupaana.m? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa rajaniiye ruupe saarajjati, na  sakkoti citta.m samaadahitu.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo  hoti ruupaana.m.
text.929: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti saddaana.m? idha  ^a^P3.0159^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sotena ^a^T3.0178^ea^ sadda.m sutvaa rajaniiye  sadde saarajjati, na sakkoti citta.m samaadahitu.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu akkhamo hoti saddaana.m.
text.93: [03] ``so ^a^M2.0016^ea^ ^a^P3.0019^ea^ sace aaka"nkhati -- `dibbena  cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passeyya.m cavamaane  upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage  satte pajaaneyya.m -- ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa  vaciiduccaritena samannaagataa manoduccaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m  upavaadakaa micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa  para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa; ime vaa pana  bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa vaciisucaritena samannaagataa  manosucaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa  sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m  loka.m upapannaati, iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena  satte passeyya.m cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne,  sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaaneyya'nti, tatra tatreva  sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati aayatane.
text.930: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti gandhaana.m? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa rajaniiye gandhe saarajjati,  na sakkoti citta.m samaadahitu.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo  hoti gandhaana.m.
text.931: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti rasaana.m? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa rajaniiye rase saarajjati, na  sakkoti citta.m samaadahitu.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo  hoti rasaana.m.
text.932: [03] ``katha~nca ^a^V2.0150^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti pho.t.thabbaana.m?  idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa rajaniiye pho.t.thabbe  saarajjati, na sakkoti citta.m samaadahitu.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu akkhamo hoti pho.t.thabbaana.m.

text.94: [03] ``so sace aaka"nkhati -- `aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m  cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa  upasampajja vihareyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati  sati aayatane''ti. tatiya.m.

text.949: [03] 140^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato  ra~n~no naago raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"nga.mtveva sa"nkha.m  gacchati. katamehi ^a^M2.0143^ea^ pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago sotaa ca  hoti, hantaa ca, rakkhitaa ca, khantaa ca, gantaa ca.
text.950: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago sotaa hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago yamena.m hatthidammasaarathi {hatthidammasaarathii (sii0)} kaara.na.m kaareti --  yadi vaa katapubba.m yadi vaa akatapubba.m ^a^P3.0162^ea^ -- ta.m a.t.thi.m  katvaa {a.t.thikatvaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) a0 ni0  4.114} manasi   katvaa sabba.m cetasaa {sabbacetasaa (?)} samannaaharitvaa ohitasoto su.naati.  eva.m kho, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago sotaa hoti.
text.951: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago hantaa hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago sa"ngaamagato hatthimpi hanati {hanti (sii0 pii0)}, hatthaaruhampi  hanati, assampi hanati, assaaruhampi hanati, rathampi hanati,  rathikampi {rathaaruhampi (pii0)} hanati, pattikampi hanati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, ra~n~no  naago hantaa hoti.
text.952: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago rakkhitaa hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago sa"ngaamagato ^a^V2.0153^ea^ rakkhati purima.m kaaya.m, rakkhati  pacchima.m kaaya.m, rakkhati purime paade, rakkhati pacchime paade, rakkhati  siisa.m, rakkhati ka.n.ne, rakkhati dante, rakkhati so.n.da.m, rakkhati  vaaladhi.m, rakkhati hatthaaruha.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago  rakkhitaa hoti.
text.953: [03] ``katha~nca ^a^T3.0182^ea^, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago khantaa hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago sa"ngaamagato khamo hoti sattippahaaraana.m  asippahaaraana.m usuppahaaraana.m pharasuppahaaraana.m  bheripa.navasa"nkhati.navaninnaadasaddaana.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, ra~n~no  naago khantaa hoti.
text.954: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago gantaa hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago yamena.m hatthidammasaarathi disa.m peseti -- yadi  vaa gatapubba.m yadi vaa agatapubba.m -- ta.m khippameva gantaa hoti. eva.m  kho, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago gantaa hoti.

text.958: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hantaa hoti? idha, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu uppanna.m kaamavitakka.m naadhivaaseti, pajahati vinodeti (hanati) {( )  natthi sii0 pii0 potthakesu a0 ni0  4.114}  byantiikaroti anabhaava.m gameti; uppanna.m byaapaadavitakka.m...pe0... uppanna.m  vihi.msaavitakka.m...pe0... uppannuppanne paapake akusale dhamme  naadhivaaseti ^a^T3.0183^ea^, pajahati vinodeti (hanati) {( ) natthi sii0 pii0 potthakesu  a0 ni0  4.114} byantiikaroti anabhaava.m  gameti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hantaa hoti.
text.959: [03] ``katha~nca ^a^V2.0154^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu rakkhitaa hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na nimittaggaahii hoti  naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m  abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa  sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati; rakkhati cakkhundriya.m; cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m  aapajjati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya  rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya  na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m  manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa  dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati; rakkhati manindriya.m;  manindriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu rakkhitaa  hoti.
text.96: [03] 24^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0  5.168;  6.50;  7.65}   ``dussiilassa ^a^T3.0021^ea^, bhikkhave, siilavipannassa  hatuupaniso hoti sammaasamaadhi; sammaasamaadhimhi asati  sammaasamaadhivipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m;  yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane asati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanavipannassa hatuupaniso  hoti nibbidaaviraago; nibbidaaviraage asati  nibbidaaviraagavipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti vimutti~naa.nadassana.m.  seyyathaapi ^a^V2.0018^ea^, bhikkhave, rukkho saakhaapalaasavipanno. tassa papa.tikaapi  na paaripuuri.m gacchati, tacopi na paaripuuri.m ^a^P3.0020^ea^ gacchati,  pheggupi na paaripuuri.m gacchati, saaropi na paaripuuri.m gacchati; evameva.m  kho, bhikkhave, dussiilassa siilavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti  sammaasamaadhi; sammaasamaadhimhi asati sammaasamaadhivipannassa  hatuupanisa.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane asati  yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti ^a^M2.0017^ea^ nibbidaaviraago;  nibbidaaviraage asati nibbidaaviraagavipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti  vimutti~naa.nadassana.m.
text.960: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khantaa hoti? idha, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu khamo hoti siitassa u.nhassa jighacchaaya pipaasaaya  .da.msamakasavaataatapasariisa {... siri.msapa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pasamphassaana.m;   duruttaana.m duraagataana.m vacanapathaana.m  uppannaana.m saariirikaana.m vedanaana.m dukkhaana.m tibbaana.m kharaana.m ka.tukaana.m  asaataana.m amanaapaana.m paa.naharaana.m ^a^M2.0145^ea^ adhivaasakajaatiko hoti. eva.m  kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khantaa hoti.
text.961: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gantaa hoti? idha ^a^P3.0164^ea^,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu yaa saa disaa agatapubbaa iminaa  diighena addhunaa, yadida.m sabbasa"nkhaarasamatho sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggo  ta.nhaakkhayo viraago nirodho nibbaana.m, ta.m khippa~n~neva gantaa hoti.  eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ^a^T3.0184^ea^ gantaa hoti.
text.962: [03] ``imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu  aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. dasama.m.
text.965: [21] cakkaanuvattanaa raajaa, yassa.mdisa.m dve ceva patthanaa.
text.966: [22] appa.msupati bhattaado, akkhamo ca sotena caati..
text.969: [03] 141^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^V2.0155^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo  sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame pa~nca? datvaa avajaanaati, sa.mvaasena  avajaanaati, aadheyyamukho {aadiyyamukho (sii0), aadeyyamukho (syaa0 ka.m0),  aadiyamukho (pii0) a.t.thakathaaya pa.thamasa.mva.n.nanaanuruupa.m. pu0 pa0 193  passitabba.m} hoti, lolo hoti, mando momuuho   hoti {mando hoti momuuho (sii0)}.
text.97: [03] ``siilavato, bhikkhave, siilasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti  sammaasamaadhi; sammaasamaadhimhi sati sammaasamaadhisampannassa  upanisasampanna.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane sati  yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidaaviraago;  nibbidaaviraage sati nibbidaaviraagasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti  vimutti~naa.nadassana.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, rukkho  saakhaapalaasasampanno. tassa papa.tikaapi paaripuuri.m gacchati, tacopi  paaripuuri.m gacchati, pheggupi paaripuuri.m gacchati, saaropi paaripuuri.m  gacchati; evameva.m ^a^T3.0022^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, siilavato siilasampannassa  upanisasampanno hoti sammaasamaadhi; sammaasamaadhimhi sati  sammaasamaadhisampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m;  yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane sati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno  hoti nibbidaaviraago; nibbidaaviraage sati  nibbidaaviraagasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti  vimutti~naa.nadassana''nti. catuttha.m.
text.970: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo datvaa avajaanaati? idha,  bhikkhave, puggalo puggalassa deti  ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m. tassa eva.m  hoti -- `aha.m demi; aya.m pa.tigga.nhaatii'ti. tamena.m datvaa  avajaanaati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo datvaa avajaanaati.
text.971: [03] ``katha~nca ^a^M2.0146^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalo sa.mvaasena avajaanaati? idha  ^a^P3.0165^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalo puggalena saddhi.m sa.mvasati dve  vaa tii.ni vaa vassaani. tamena.m sa.mvaasena avajaanaati. eva.m kho,  bhikkhave, puggalo sa.mvaasena avajaanaati.
text.972: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo aadheyyamukho ^a^T3.0185^ea^ hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo parassa va.n.ne vaa ava.n.ne vaa bhaasiyamaane  ta.m khippa~n~neva adhimuccitaa {adhimuccito (syaa0)} hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo  aadheyyamukho hoti.
text.973: [01] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo lolo hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ittarasaddho hoti ittarabhattii ittarapemo  ittarappasaado. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo lolo hoti.
text.974: [01] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo mando momuuho hoti?  idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo kusalaakusale dhamme na jaanaati,  saavajjaanavajje dhamme na jaanaati, hiinappa.niite dhamme na jaanaati  ^a^V2.0156^ea^, ka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaage dhamme na jaanaati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo  mando momuuho hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca puggalaa santo  sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. pa.thama.m.
text.976: [03] 142^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo  sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco  puggalo aarabhati ca vippa.tisaarii ca hoti; ta~nca cetovimutti.m  pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa  akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti.
text.977: [03] {pu0 pa0 191} ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo aarabhati, na  vippa.tisaarii hoti; ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m  nappajaanaati yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa  nirujjhanti.
text.978: [03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na aarabhati,  vippa.tisaarii ^a^P3.0166^ea^ hoti; ta~nca cetovimutti.m ^a^T3.0186^ea^  pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa  akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti.
text.979: [03] ``idha ^a^M2.0147^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na aarabhati na  vippa.tisaarii hoti; ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m  nappajaanaati yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa  nirujjhanti.
text.980: [03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na aarabhati na  vippa.tisaarii hoti; ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa  nirujjhanti.
text.981: [03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m puggalo aarabhati ca vippa.tisaarii ca  hoti, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati yatthassa  te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa ^a^V2.0157^ea^ nirujjhanti, so  evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aayasmato kho aarambhajaa {aarabbhajaa (pii0 ka0),  aarabhajaa (syaa0 ka.m0)} aasavaa  sa.mvijjanti, vippa.tisaarajaa aasavaa pava.d.dhanti {sa.mva.d.dhanti (ka0)}, saadhu vataayasmaa  aarambhaje aasave pahaaya vippa.tisaaraje aasave pa.tivinodetvaa citta.m  pa~n~na~nca bhaavetu {bhaavetu.m (sii0 pii0)}; evamaayasmaa amunaa pa~ncamena puggalena samasamo  bhavissatii'''ti.
text.982: [03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m puggalo aarabhati na vippa.tisaarii  hoti, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati yatthassa  te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, so  evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aayasmato kho aarambhajaa aasavaa  sa.mvijjanti, vippa.tisaarajaa aasavaa na pava.d.dhanti, saadhu vataayasmaa  aarambhaje aasave pahaaya citta.m pa~n~na~nca bhaavetu; evamaayasmaa ^a^T3.0187^ea^ amunaa  pa~ncamena puggalena samasamo bhavissatii'''ti.
text.983: [03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m puggalo na aarabhati vippa.tisaarii  hoti, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati yatthassa  te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, so  evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aayasmato ^a^P3.0167^ea^ kho  aarambhajaa aasavaa na sa.mvijjanti, vippa.tisaarajaa aasavaa pava.d.dhanti,  saadhu vataayasmaa vippa.tisaaraje aasave pa.tivinodetvaa citta.m pa~n~na~nca  bhaavetu; evamaayasmaa amunaa pa~ncamena puggalena samasamo bhavissatii''' ti.
text.984: [03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m puggalo na aarabhati na vippa.tisaarii  hoti, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati yatthassa  te uppannaa paapakaa ^a^M2.0148^ea^ akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, so  evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aayasmato kho aarambhajaa aasavaa na  sa.mvijjanti, vippa.tisaarajaa aasavaa na pava.d.dhanti, saadhu vataayasmaa  citta.m pa~n~na~nca bhaavetu; evamaayasmaa amunaa pa~ncamena puggalena  samasamo bhavissatii'''ti.
text.985: [03] ``iti kho, bhikkhave, ime cattaaro puggalaa amunaa pa~ncamena  puggalena eva.m ovadiyamaanaa eva.m anusaasiyamaanaa anupubbena aasavaana.m  khaya.m paapu.nantii''ti {pu0 pa0 191}. dutiya.m.
text.987: [03] 143^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V2.0158^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane  kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa  pattaciivaramaadaaya vesaali.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. tena kho pana samayena  pa~ncamattaana.m licchavisataana.m saarandade cetiye sannisinnaana.m  sannipatitaana.m ayamantaraakathaa ^a^T3.0188^ea^ udapaadi -- ``pa~ncanna.m ratanaana.m  paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m. katamesa.m pa~ncanna.m? hatthiratanassa  paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m, assaratanassa paatubhaavo dullabho  lokasmi.m, ma.niratanassa paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m, itthiratanassa  paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m, gahapatiratanassa paatubhaavo dullabho  lokasmi.m. imesa.m pa~ncanna.m ratanaana.m paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi''nti.
text.988: [03] atha ^a^P3.0168^ea^ kho te licchavii magge purisa.m .thapesu.m {pesesu.m (syaa0 ka0)}  -- ``yadaa tva.m {yathaa tva.m (sii0 pii0)}, ambho purisa, passeyyaasi bhagavanta.m, atha amhaaka.m  aaroceyyaasii''ti. addasaa kho so puriso bhagavanta.m duuratova  aagacchanta.m; disvaana yena te licchavii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te  licchavii etadavoca -- ``aya.m so, bhante, bhagavaa gacchati araha.m  sammaasambuddho; yassadaani kaala.m ma~n~nathaa''ti.
text.989: [03] atha kho te licchavii yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa  kho te licchavii bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m --
text.99: [03] 25^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi anuggahitaa  sammaadi.t.thi cetovimuttiphalaa ca hoti cetovimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca,  pa~n~naavimuttiphalaa ca hoti pa~n~naavimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca.
text.990: [03] ``saadhu, bhante, yena saarandada.m cetiya.m tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m  upaadaayaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho bhagavaa  yena ^a^M2.0149^ea^ saarandada.m cetiya.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane  nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa te licchavii etadavoca -- ``kaaya  nuttha, licchavii, etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa, kaa ca pana vo  antaraakathaa vippakataa''ti? ``idha, bhante, amhaaka.m sannisinnaana.m  sannipatitaana.m ayamantaraakathaa udapaadi -- `pa~ncanna.m ratanaana.m paatubhaavo  dullabho lokasmi.m. katamesa.m pa~ncanna.m ^a^T3.0189^ea^? hatthiratanassa paatubhaavo  dullabho lokasmi.m, assaratanassa paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m,  ma.niratanassa paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m, itthiratanassa paatubhaavo  dullabho lokasmi.m, gahapatiratanassa paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m.  imesa.m pa~ncanna.m ratanaana.m paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi'''nti.
text.991: [03] ``kaamaadhimuttaana.m ^a^V2.0159^ea^ vata, bho, licchaviina.m {kaamaadhimuttaana.m vata vo  licchaviina.m (sii0), kaamaadhimuttaana.m vata vo licchavii (syaa0),  kaamaadhimuttaana.mva vo licchavii (?)} kaama.myeva aarabbha  antaraakathaa udapaadi. pa~ncanna.m, licchavii, ratanaana.m paatubhaavo dullabho  lokasmi.m. katamesa.m pa~ncanna.m? tathaagatassa arahato sammaasambuddhassa  paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m, tathaagatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa  ^a^P3.0169^ea^ desetaa puggalo dullabho lokasmi.m,  tathaagatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desitassa vi~n~naataa puggalo  dullabho lokasmi.m, tathaagatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desitassa  vi~n~naataa {vi~n~naatassa (sii0 pii0) a0 ni0  5.195} dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno   puggalo dullabho lokasmi.m, kata~n~nuu  katavedii puggalo dullabho lokasmi.m. imesa.m kho, licchavii, pa~ncanna.m  ratanaana.m paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi''nti. tatiya.m.
text.993: [03] 144^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saakete viharati  tika.n.dakiivane {ka.n.dakiivane (sa.m0 ni0  5.902)}. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --  ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m.  bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.994: [03] ``saadhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaalena kaala.m appa.tikuule  pa.tikuulasa~n~nii {appa.tikkuule pa.tikkuulasa~n~nii (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vihareyya.   saadhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaalena kaala.m  pa.tikuule appa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya. saadhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  kaalena kaala.m appa.tikuule ca pa.tikuule ^a^M2.0150^ea^ ca pa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya.  saadhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaalena kaala.m pa.tikuule ca appa.tikuule ca  appa.tikuulasa~n~nii ^a^T3.0190^ea^ vihareyya. saadhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaalena kaala.m  pa.tikuula~nca appa.tikuula~nca tadubhaya.m abhinivajjetvaa upekkhako vihareyya  sato sampajaano.
text.995: [03] ``ki~nca {katha~nca (sii0 pii0 ka0)}, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasa.m pa.ticca appa.tikuule  pa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya? `maa me rajaniiyesu dhammesu raago  udapaadii'ti -- ida.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasa.m pa.ticca  appa.tikuule pa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya.
text.996: [03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasa.m pa.ticca pa.tikuule  appa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya? `maa me dosaniiyesu dhammesu doso  udapaadii'ti -- ida.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasa.m pa.ticca pa.tikuule  appa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya.
text.997: [03] ``ki~nca ^a^V2.0160^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasa.m ^a^P3.0170^ea^  pa.ticca appa.tikuule ca pa.tikuule ca pa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya? `maa me  rajaniiyesu dhammesu raago udapaadi, maa me dosaniiyesu dhammesu doso  udapaadii'ti -- ida.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasa.m pa.ticca  appa.tikuule ca pa.tikuule ca pa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya.
text.998: [03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasa.m pa.ticca pa.tikuule ca  appa.tikuule ca appa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya? `maa me dosaniiyesu  dhammesu doso udapaadi, maa me rajaniiyesu dhammesu raago udapaadii'ti  -- ida.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasa.m pa.ticca pa.tikuule ca  appa.tikuule ca appa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya.
text.999: [03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasa.m pa.ticca pa.tikuula~nca  appa.tikuula~nca tadubhaya.m abhinivajjetvaa upekkhako vihareyya? `sato  sampajaano maa me ^a^T3.0191^ea^ kvacani {kvacini (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} katthaci   ki~ncana.m {ki~ncana (sii0 pii0)} rajaniiyesu dhammesu raago  udapaadi, maa me kvacani katthaci ki~ncana.m dosaniiyesu dhammesu doso  udapaadi, maa me kvacani katthaci ki~ncana.m mohaniiyesu dhammesu moho  udapaadii'ti -- ida.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasa.m pa.ticca  pa.tikuula~nca appa.tikuula~nca tadubhaya.m abhinivajjetvaa upekkhako vihareyya  sato sampajaano''ti. catuttha.m.
